hanzi: 不用麻烦了。
pinyin: bù yòng má fan le。
english: Don't bother.

hanzi: 我怎么知道。
pinyin: wǒ zěn me zhī dào。
english: How should I know.

hanzi: 你干得很好。
pinyin: nǐ gàn de hěn hào。
english: You did a good job.

hanzi: 我不喜欢体操.
pinyin: wǒ bù xǐ huan tǐ cāo.
english: I don't like gym.

hanzi: 汽车在外头。
pinyin: qì chē zài wài tou。
english: The car is outside.

hanzi: 我操作机器。
pinyin: wǒ cāo zuò jī qì。
english: I operate a machine.

hanzi: 她出身高贵.
pinyin: tā chū shēn gāo guì.
english: She was a lady by birth.

hanzi: 我马上就来。
pinyin: wǒ mǎ shàng jiù lái。
english: I'll be right with you.

hanzi: 也许下一次吧。
pinyin: yě xǔ xià yī cì ba。
english: Maybe some other time.

hanzi: 他满心欢喜。
pinyin: tā mǎn xīn huān xǐ。
english: Joy filled his breast.

hanzi: 一切都会好的。
pinyin: yī qiè dū huì hǎo de。
english: Everything will be OK.

hanzi: 他以写作为生。
pinyin: tā yǐ xiě zuò wéi shēng。
english: He lives by his pen.

hanzi: 多足的有许多足的
pinyin: duō zú de yǒu xǔ duō zú de
english: Having many feet.

hanzi: 你真是太好了。
pinyin: nǐ zhēn shì tài hào le。
english: You're just wonderful.

hanzi: 我没有意识到。
pinyin: wǒ méi yǒu yì shí dào。
english: I wasn't aware of that.

hanzi: 我知道那种感觉。
pinyin: wǒ zhī dào nà zhòng gǎn jué。
english: I know the feeling.

hanzi: 我们加快了脚步.
pinyin: wǒ men jiā kuài le jiǎo bù.
english: We quickened our steps.

hanzi: 农作物需要雨水。
pinyin: nóng zuò wù xū yào yǔ shuǐ。
english: The crops need rain.

hanzi: 他的级别比我高。
pinyin: tā de jí bié bì wǒ gāo。
english: He is above me in rank.

hanzi: 地理试题很难.
pinyin: dì lǐ shì tí hěn nàn.
english: The geography paper was difficult.

hanzi: 我向他们祝愿幸运
pinyin: wǒ xiàng tā men zhù yuàn xìng yùn
english: I wish them luck.

hanzi: 主要应当责备你.
pinyin: zhǔ yào yīng dāng zé bèi nǐ.
english: You are mainly to blame.

hanzi: 祝你一路平安。
pinyin: zhù nǐ yī lù píng ān。
english: I wish you a good journey.

hanzi: 他们开我的玩笑。
pinyin: tā men kāi wǒ de wán xiào。
english: They played a joke on me.

hanzi: 社论的中心内容
pinyin: shè lùn de zhōng xīn nèi róng
english: The meat of the editorial.

hanzi: 决不应该责备她.
pinyin: jué bù yīng gāi zé bèi tā.
english: She was in no way to blame.

hanzi: 总之, 你做得不好.
pinyin: zǒng zhī,  nǐ zuò de bù hǎo.
english: In brief, your work is bad.

hanzi: 眼看天就要亮了。
pinyin: yǎn kàn tiān jiù yào liàng le。
english: It'll be daylight soon.

hanzi: 前几天他得病了。
pinyin: qián jǐ tiān tā dé bìng le。
english: He fall sick the other day.

hanzi: 他很容易打交道。
pinyin: tā hěn róng yì dǎ jiāo dào。
english: He is easy to deal with.

hanzi: 这可不是开玩笑的事。
pinyin: zhè kě bú shì kāi wán xiào de shì。
english: It is no joke.

hanzi: 我们必须面对现实。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū miàn duì xiàn shí。
english: We must face reality.

hanzi: 别跟我再说这事了。
pinyin: biè gēn wǒ zài shuō zhè shì le。
english: I wouldn't hear of it.

hanzi: 等到雨停了再说吧.
pinyin: děng dào yǔ tíng le zài shuō ba.
english: Wait until the rain stops.

hanzi: 我和她长谈了一次。
pinyin: wǒ huò tā cháng tán le yī cì。
english: I had a long talk with her.

hanzi: 她难得看电影.
pinyin: tā nán dé kàn diàn yǐng.
english: She seldom, if ever, goes to the cinema.

hanzi: 我觉得这是我的义务。
pinyin: wǒ jué de zhè shì wǒ de yì wù。
english: I feel it is my duty.

hanzi: 锻炼可增进健康。
pinyin: duàn liàn kě zēng jìn jiàn kāng。
english: Exercise promotes health.

hanzi: 请跟我说实话。
pinyin: qǐng gēn wǒ shuō shí huà。
english: Be kind enough to tell me the truth.

hanzi: 我怕我是着凉了。
pinyin: wǒ pà wǒ shì zháo liáng le。
english: I'm afraid I've caught a chill.

hanzi: 她向河的上游而行。
pinyin: tā xiàng hé de shàng yóu ér xìng。
english: She went up the river.

hanzi: 他的动机是好的.
pinyin: tā de dòng jī shì hǎo de.
english: He was acting from the best of motives.

hanzi: 他每天大便两次。
pinyin: tā měi tiān dà biàn liǎng cì。
english: He goes to stool twice a day.

hanzi: 他是第一流的学者。
pinyin: tā shì dì yī liú de xué zhě。
english: He ranks high as a scholar.

hanzi: 使用了各种车辆.
pinyin: shǐ yòng le gè zhǒng chē liàng.
english: All manner of vehicles were used.

hanzi: 这次考试比较容易。
pinyin: zhè cì kǎo shì bǐ jiào róng yì。
english: The exam was relatively easy.

hanzi: 你一定是在开玩笑吧。
pinyin: nǐ yī dìng shì zài kāi wán xiào ba。
english: You must be joking.

hanzi: 可能别处还需要它。
pinyin: kě néng bié chù huán xū yào tā。
english: It may be wanted elsewhere.

hanzi: 今年复活节来得早.
pinyin: jīn nián Fù huó jié lái de zǎo.
english: Easter comes early this year.

hanzi: 他不懂是非.
pinyin: tā bù dǒng shì fēi.
english: He doesn't know the difference between right and wrong.

hanzi: 苹果树正在开花。
pinyin: píng guǒ shù zhèng zài kāi huā。
english: The apple trees are blossoming.

hanzi: 我的外祖父要来了。
pinyin: wǒ de wài zǔ fù yào lái le。
english: My maternal grandfather is coming.

hanzi: 这是我给你开的药方。
pinyin: zhè shì wǒ jǐ nǐ kāi de yào fāng。
english: Here's my prescription.

hanzi: 我今晚不想念书。
pinyin: wǒ jīn wǎn bù xiǎng niàn shū。
english: I don't feel like studying tonight.

hanzi: 教堂在学校附近。
pinyin: jiào táng zài xué xiào fù jìn。
english: The church is close to the school.

hanzi: 说不定他已经死了.
pinyin: shuō bù dìng tā yǐ jīng sǐ le.
english: For all I know he could be dead.

hanzi: 谢谢你给我们送礼物。
pinyin: xiè xie nǐ jǐ wǒ men sòng lǐ wù。
english: Thank you for the present.

hanzi: 墙上有一张图画。
pinyin: qiáng shàng yǒu yī zhāng tú huà。
english: There is one picture on the wall.

hanzi: 他们多半坐汽车来。
pinyin: tā men duō bàn zuò qì chē lái。
english: They'll very likely come by car.

hanzi: 这个单词有五个字母。
pinyin: zhè gè dān cí yǒu wǔ gè zì mǔ。
english: This word has five letters.

hanzi: 她的心脏还在跳动。
pinyin: tā de xīn zàng huán zài tiào dòng。
english: Her heart was still beating.

hanzi: 他正在上初中。
pinyin: tā zhèng zài shàng chū zhōng。
english: He is studying at a junior middle school.

hanzi: 我的外祖父要来了。
pinyin: wǒ de wài zǔ fù yào lái le。
english: My maternal grandfather is coming.

hanzi: 我听了这消息十分不安.
pinyin: wǒ tìng le zhè xiāo xi shí fēn bù ān.
english: The news had me worried.

hanzi: 他不是出卖我们的人。
pinyin: tā bú shì chū mài wǒ men de rén。
english: He is not the man selling us.

hanzi: 他苦笑着回想她。
pinyin: tā kǔ xiào zhuó huí xiǎng tā。
english: He thought of her with a rueful smile.

hanzi: 那个坏蛋已被收买。
pinyin: nèi gè huài dàn yǐ bèi shōu mǎi。
english: That scoundrel has been got at.

hanzi: 我听见有流水的声音.
pinyin: wǒ tīng jiàn yǒu liú shuǐ de shēng yīn.
english: I can hear running water.

hanzi: 她写作比我好得多。
pinyin: tā xiě zuò bì wǒ hào de duō。
english: She is far better than me at writing.

hanzi: 今年的复活节来得早.
pinyin: jīn nián de Fù huó jié lái de zǎo.
english: Easter falls early this year.

hanzi: 每星期我去游泳两次。
pinyin: měi xīng qī wǒ qù yóu yǒng liǎng cì。
english: Twice weekly I go swimming.

hanzi: 说不定他已经死了。
pinyin: shuō bù dìng tā yǐ jīng sǐ le。
english: He may be dead for aught I know.

hanzi: 整个早上都是阴天。
pinyin: zhěng gè zǎo shang dōu shì yīn tiān。
english: It's been cloudy all morning.

hanzi: 很多人反对人工流产.
pinyin: hěn duō rén fǎn duì rén gōng liú chǎn.
english: Many people are anti-abortion.

hanzi: 思考正确是重要的。
pinyin: sī kǎo zhèng què shì zhòng yào de。
english: Thinking correctly is important.

hanzi: 他一再说他很忙。
pinyin: tā yī zài shuō tā hěn máng。
english: He repeated several times that he was busy.

hanzi: 你使我非常为难。
pinyin: nǐ shǐ wǒ fēi cháng wéi nán。
english: You place me in a very difficult position.

hanzi: 不久他就跑在后头了。
pinyin: bù jiǔ tā jiù pǎo zài hòu tou le。
english: Soon he fell behind in the race.

hanzi: 他当上了省长.
pinyin: tā dàng shàng le shěng zhǎng.
english: He established himself as governor of the province.

hanzi: 现在到了紧要关头。
pinyin: xiàn zài dào le jǐn yào guān tóu。
english: We have come to the critical moment.

hanzi: 她千方百计想离开。
pinyin: tā qiān fāng bǎi jì xiǎng lí kāi。
english: She made every attempt to go.

hanzi: 她一点儿常识也没有.
pinyin: tā yī diǎnr cháng shí yě méi yǒu.
english: She hasn't an ounce of common sense.

hanzi: 你得等候适当时机.
pinyin: nǐ de děng hòu shì dàng shí jī.
english: You'll have to watch for the right moment.

hanzi: 每个人都是注定要死的。
pinyin: měi gè rén dōu shì zhù dìng yào sǐ de。
english: Everyone is doomed to die.

hanzi: 他是理科主考人之一。
pinyin: tā shì lǐ kē zhǔ kǎo rén zhī yī。
english: He is one of the science examiners.

hanzi: 他是一位社会主义者。
pinyin: tā shì yī wèi shè huì zhǔ yì zhě。
english: He is a socialism person.

hanzi: 我们听到外面有脚步声.
pinyin: wǒ men tīng dào wài mian yǒu jiǎo bù shēng.
english: We heard steps outside.

hanzi: 我好像听见有人喊叫.
pinyin: wǒ hǎo xiàng tīng jiàn yǒu rén hǎn jiào.
english: I thought I heard sb calling.

hanzi: 风从四面八方吹来.
pinyin: fēng zòng sì miàn bā fāng chuī lái.
english: The wind blew from all quarters.

hanzi: 他一直工作到深夜.
pinyin: tā yī zhí gōng zuò dào shēn yè.
english: He carried on working long into the night.

hanzi: 不要把过去的事都翻出来。
pinyin: bù yào bǎ guò qu de shì dōu fān chū lai。
english: Don't rake up the past.

hanzi: 我觉得我有义务不这样。
pinyin: wǒ jué de wǒ yǒu yì wù bù zhè yàng。
english: I feel it is my duty not to.

hanzi: 这所学校原先很小.
pinyin: zhè suǒ xué xiào yuán xiān hěn xiǎo.
english: The school was originally quite small.

hanzi: 船头划开水面前进.
pinyin: chuán tou huà kāi shuǐ miàn qián jìn.
english: The bows of the ship sliced the water.

hanzi: 中国首先使用火药。
pinyin: Zhōng guó shǒu xiān shǐ yòng huǒ yào。
english: Gunpowder first came in in China.

hanzi: 我亲眼看见他拿了钱。
pinyin: wǒ qīn yǎn kàn jiàn tā ná le qián。
english: I personally see him taking money.

hanzi: 今天看上去是个晴天。
pinyin: jīn tiān kàn shàng qù shì gè qíng tiān。
english: Looks like a fine day today.

hanzi: 城市之外的一个小地方
pinyin: chéng shì zhī wài de yī gè xiǎo dì fang
english: A little place outside the city.

hanzi: 我们本星期宴请大使.
pinyin: wǒ men běn xīng qī yàn qǐng dà shǐ.
english: We're dining the ambassador this week.

hanzi: 我们上学时在同一班.
pinyin: wǒ men shàng xué shí zài tóng yī bān.
english: We were in the same class at school.

hanzi: 她发表时事广播演说。
pinyin: tā fā biǎo shí shì guǎng bō yǎn shuō。
english: She broadcasts on current affairs.

hanzi: 他送给女友一束花。
pinyin: tā sòng jǐ nu:3 yǒu yī shù huā。
english: He gave a bunch of flowers to his girlfriend.

hanzi: 窗口摆了一些书。
pinyin: chuāng kǒu bǎi le yī xiē shū。
english: There was an arrangement of books in the window.

hanzi: 谁也不会相信那个借口.
pinyin: shéi yě bù kuài xiāng xìn nèi gè jiè kǒu.
english: No one will buy that excuse.

hanzi: 设法用钱大方一点。
pinyin: shè fǎ yòng qián dà fāng yī diǎn。
english: Try to be more generous with your money.

hanzi: 他去邮局买些邮票。
pinyin: tā qù yóu jú mǎi xiē yóu piào。
english: He went to the post-office to buy some stamps.

hanzi: 是的，这事我知道，谢谢。
pinyin: shì de， zhè shì wǒ zhī dào， xiè xie。
english: Yes, I know that, thanks.

hanzi: 房间里有些电器。
pinyin: fáng jiān lǐ yǒu xiē diàn qì。
english: There are some electrical apparatus in the room.

hanzi: 我就给你开一张药方。
pinyin: wǒ jiù jǐ nǐ kāi yī zhāng yào fāng。
english: I'll just give you a prescription.

hanzi: 你一点也没让我为难.
pinyin: nǐ yī diǎn yě mò ràng wǒ wéi nán.
english: You didn't embarrass me in the slightest.

hanzi: 他是国务院的发言人。
pinyin: tā shì guó wù yuàn de fā yán rén。
english: He is the spokesman of the council.

hanzi: 他写作文或读散文。
pinyin: tā xiě zuò wén huò dú sǎn wén。
english: He wrote a composition or (he) read an essay.

hanzi: 我打电话时, 她早已走了.
pinyin: wǒ dǎ diàn huà shí,  tā zǎo yǐ zǒu le.
english: She had already left when I phoned.

hanzi: 许多男孩都渴望冒险。
pinyin: xǔ duō nán hái dōu kě wàng mào xiǎn。
english: Many boys have a thirst for adventure.

hanzi: 我愿意白白地将它给你。
pinyin: wǒ yuàn yì bái bái de jiàng tā jǐ nǐ。
english: I will give it to you for nothing.

hanzi: 云是天空中的水汽团。
pinyin: yún shì tiān kōng zhòng dì shuǐ qì tuán。
english: A cloud is a mass of vapor in the sky.

hanzi: 大部分工作已经完成.
pinyin: dà bù fen gōng zuò yǐ jīng wán chéng.
english: The bulk of the work has already been done.

hanzi: 这里不过是打一个比方。
pinyin: zhè lǐ bù guò shì dǎ yī gè bǐ fang。
english: Here we speak only by way of analogy.

hanzi: 基本的事实面对着我们。
pinyin: jī běn de shì shí miàn duì zhuó wǒ men。
english: The elemental truth was facing us.

hanzi: 是的，我已听说这消息了。
pinyin: shì de， wǒ yǐ tīng shuō zhè xiāo xi le。
english: Yes, I've heard about the news.

hanzi: 公共汽车日夜都有班次。
pinyin: gōng gòng qì chē rì yè dōu yǒu bān cì。
english: The bus service runs day and night.

hanzi: 她的导师说她进步很大.
pinyin: tā de dǎo shī shuō tā jìn bù hěn dà.
english: Her tutor says she is making good progress.

hanzi: 我的工钱不够买一辆汽车。
pinyin: wǒ de gōng qián bù gòu mǎi yī liàng qì chē。
english: My wages won't run to a car.

hanzi: 我们深深感谢你的支持。
pinyin: wǒ men shēn shēn gǎn xiè nǐ de zhī chí。
english: We are deeply grateful for your support.

hanzi: 这会儿我不想出去散步。
pinyin: zhè kuài er wǒ bù xiǎng chū qù sàn bù。
english: I don't feel like a walk just now.

hanzi: 他一口气喝完了那一大杯。
pinyin: tā yī kǒu qì hè wán le nà yī dà bēi。
english: He emptied the glass at on draft.

hanzi: 他好几个晚上开夜车学习。
pinyin: tā hǎo jǐ gè wǎn shang kāi yè jū xué xí。
english: He stayed up nights studying.

hanzi: 我们责备他行为不检点。
pinyin: wǒ men zé bèi tā xíng wéi bù jiǎn diǎn。
english: We condemned him for his bad conduct.

hanzi: 我认为那电影不怎么样。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi nà diàn yǐng bù zěn me yàng。
english: I don't think much of the movie.

hanzi: 他就是那个带头的学生。
pinyin: tā jiù shì nèi gè dài tóu de xué sheng。
english: He is the student who begins the dance.

hanzi: 这一观念一向不太得人心。
pinyin: zhè yī guān niàn yí xiàng bù tài de rén xīn。
english: The idea never really took on.

hanzi: 我对地理只是一知半解.
pinyin: wǒ duì dì lǐ zhǐ shì yī zhī bàn xiè.
english: I have only a sketchy knowledge of geography.

hanzi: 我请他去给我晚报拿来。
pinyin: wǒ qǐng tā qù jǐ wǒ wǎn bào ná lái。
english: I asked him to fetch me the evening paper.

hanzi: 不用说他照例来得很晚。
pinyin: bù yòng shuō tā zhào lì lái de hěn wǎn。
english: Needless to say, he came late as usual.

hanzi: 雪花轻轻拍打着窗户。
pinyin: xuě huā qīng qīng pāi da zhuó chuāng hu。
english: Snowflakes were patting against the window.

hanzi: 那辆出租车飞快地开走了。
pinyin: nà liàng chū zū chē fēi kuài de kāi zǒu le。
english: The taxi sped off at full speed.

hanzi: 万一下雨，他们就不能去了。
pinyin: wàn yī xià yǔ， tā men jiù bù néng qù le。
english: In case of rain, they can't go.

hanzi: 你不是支持我就是反对我。
pinyin: nǐ bú shì zhī chí wǒ jiù shì fǎn duì wǒ。
english: You are either with me or against me.

hanzi: 门口有个男人要求见你。
pinyin: mén kǒu yǒu gè nán rén yāo qiú xiàn nǐ。
english: Some man at the door is asking to see you.

hanzi: 这本书教我们如何写作。
pinyin: zhè běn shū jiào wǒ men rú hé xiě zuò。
english: The book is used to teach us how to write.

hanzi: 父亲下午总要睡个午觉。
pinyin: fù qīn xià wǔ zǒng yào shuì gè wǔ jiào。
english: Father always takes a nap in the afternoon.

hanzi: 我不知道他的动力是什么。
pinyin: wǒ bù zhī dào tā de dòng lì shì shén me。
english: I don't understand what his motive is.

hanzi: 她和我在学院里是同学。
pinyin: tā huò wǒ zài xué yuàn lǐ shì tóng xué。
english: She and I were contemporaries at college.

hanzi: 这孩子一心想要这样东西。
pinyin: zhè hái zi yī xīn xiǎng yào zhè yàng dōng xi。
english: The child has set his heart on it.

hanzi: 我就他的小说向他提问。
pinyin: wǒ jiù tā de xiǎo shuō xiàng tā tí wèn。
english: I plied him with questions about his novel.

hanzi: 他们决定开办一家合作社。
pinyin: tā men jué dìng kāi bàn yī jiā hé zuò shè。
english: They decided to set up a cooperative.

hanzi: 把词典时时 放在手边.
pinyin: bǎ cí diǎn shí shí  fàng zài shǒu biān.
english: Keep your dictionary ready (to hand) at all times.

hanzi: 铅因其重而常派上用场.
pinyin: qiān yīn qí zhòng ér cháng pài shàng yòng chǎng.
english: Lead is often used because of its weight.

hanzi: 路的前方有一个公共汽车站.
pinyin: lù de qián fāng yǒu yī gè gōng gòng qì chē zhàn.
english: There's a bus-stop down the road

hanzi: 我从报纸上得知这个消息。
pinyin: wǒ zòng bào zhǐ shàng dé zhī zhè gè xiāo xi。
english: I learned this news from the newspaper.

hanzi: 他用心解决这个困难问题。
pinyin: tā yòng xīn jiě jué zhè gè kùn nan wèn tí。
english: He applied his mind to the difficulty.

hanzi: 我们等到天气好些再说.
pinyin: wǒ men děng dào tiān qì hǎo xiē zài shuō.
english: We're waiting until the weather picks up a bit.

hanzi: 她脸上有不满的表情。
pinyin: tā liǎn shàng yǒu bù mǎn de biǎo qíng。
english: There was an expression of discontent on her face.

hanzi: 请给我找一个放糖的容器。
pinyin: qǐng jǐ wǒ zhǎo yī gè fàng táng de róng qì。
english: Please find me a receptacle for sugar.

hanzi: 整个工作只需要半个小时。
pinyin: zhěng gè gōng zuò zhǐ xū yào bàn gè xiǎo shí。
english: The whole job only takes half an hour.

hanzi: 设想有一所带大花园的房子.
pinyin: shè xiǎng yǒu yī suǒ dài dà huā yuán de fáng zi.
english: Imagine a house with a big garden.

hanzi: 这部新的电影下个月发行。
pinyin: zhè bù xīn de diàn yǐng xià gè yuè fā xíng。
english: The new film will be released next month.

hanzi: 别哭，你现在已经是大男孩了。
pinyin: biè kū， nǐ xiàn zài yǐ jīng shì dà nán hái le。
english: Don't cry, you are a big boy now.

hanzi: 这个人走在我们前头开路。
pinyin: zhè gè rén zǒu zài wǒ men qián tou kāi lù。
english: The man went ahead of us to clear the course.

hanzi: 任何国家都不容忽视教育。
pinyin: rèn hé guó jiā dōu bù róng hū shì jiào yù。
english: No country can afford to neglect education.

hanzi: 桌子上摆着各种各样的物体。
pinyin: zhuō zi shàng bǎi zhuó gè zhǒng gè yàng de wù tǐ。
english: Various objects were on the table.

hanzi: 我们将把这房子租给你一年。
pinyin: wǒ men jiàng bǎ zhè fáng zi zū jǐ nǐ yī nián。
english: We will lease you the house for one year.

hanzi: 她已全面掌握了这一学科。
pinyin: tā yǐ quán miàn zhǎng wò le zhè yī xué kē。
english: She has a comprehensive grasp of the subject.

hanzi: 你必须在一个安定的地方读书。
pinyin: nǐ bì xū zài yī gè ān dìng de dì fang dú shū。
english: You need to study in a quiet place.

hanzi: 我们应该对下一代负责。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi duì xià yī dài fù zé。
english: We should be responsible for the generation as yet unborn.

hanzi: 我们这里的天气多半是暖和的。
pinyin: wǒ men zhè lǐ de tiān qì duō bàn shì nuǎn huó de。
english: Our weather has been mostly warm.

hanzi: 时间表上有一些变动。
pinyin: shí jiàn biǎo shàng yǒu yī xiē biàn dòng。
english: There have been a few alterations to the timetable.

hanzi: 我想我能来，但还说不定。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng wǒ néng lái， dàn hái shuō bù dìng。
english: I think I can come, but don't rely on it.

hanzi: 我看最好还是给你做些化验。
pinyin: wǒ kàn zuì hǎo hái shì jǐ nǐ zuò xiē huà yàn。
english: I think we'd better give you a few test.

hanzi: 我总得想个办法完成任务。
pinyin: wǒ zǒng děi xiǎng gè bàn fǎ wán chéng rèn wu。
english: I must fulfil my task by some means or other.

hanzi: 我对儿子的教育十分操心.
pinyin: wǒ duì ér zi de jiào yù shí fēn cāo xīn.
english: I am very much exercised about the education of my son.

hanzi: 那男子一举一动像个大男孩。
pinyin: nà nán zǐ yī jǔ yī dòng xiàng gè dà nán hái。
english: That man behaves like an overgrown child.

hanzi: 一个早期的国家，还没有自治
pinyin: yī gè zǎo qī de guó jiā， huán méi yǒu zì zhì
english: An embryonic nation, not yet self-governing.

hanzi: 去年他进了大学研读近代史。
pinyin: qù nián tā jìn le dà xué yán dú jìn dài shǐ。
english: He came up last year to read Modern History.

hanzi: 他从来没有对计划表示不满。
pinyin: tā cóng lái méi yǒu duì jì huà biǎo shì bù mǎn。
english: He has never dissatisfied with this plan.

hanzi: 他思考了几分钟才作答复。
pinyin: tā sī kǎo le jǐ fēn zhōng cái zuò dá fù。
english: He pondered for some minutes before giving an answer.

hanzi: 好天气使农作物长得很好。
pinyin: hào tiān qì shǐ nóng zuò wù zhǎng de hěn hào。
english: The fine weather is bringing the crops on nicely.

hanzi: 我们正前方就是人民广场。
pinyin: wǒ men zhèng qián fāng jiù shì rén mín guǎng chǎng。
english: Directly ahead of us is the Peoples Square.

hanzi: 离开房间前，请把灯关掉。
pinyin: lí kāi fáng jiān qián， qǐng bǎ dēng guān diào。
english: Please turn the light off before leaving the room.

hanzi: 我们四个人挤在座位上.
pinyin: wǒ men sì gè rén jǐ zài zuò wèi shàng.
english: There were four of us squashed up against each other on the seat.

hanzi: 她在危急关头总是挺身而出.
pinyin: tā zài wēi jí guān tóu zǒng shì tǐng shēn ér chū.
english: She's always to the fore at moments of crisis.

hanzi: 你必须学会适应世间的生活。
pinyin: nǐ bì xū xué huì shì yìng shì jiàn de shēng huó。
english: You must learn to live in the world as it is.

hanzi: 你应当时时刻刻注意礼节.
pinyin: nǐ yīng dāng shí shí kè kè zhù yì lǐ jié.
english: It behoves you (ie You ought) to be courteous at all times.

hanzi: 你看来累了. 你需要好好休息一下.
pinyin: nǐ kàn lai lèi le.  nǐ xū yào hǎo hǎo xiū xi yī xià.
english: You look tired. You need a good rest.

hanzi: 这本书是原始民族神话集。
pinyin: zhè běn shū shì yuán shǐ mín zú shén huà jí。
english: The book is about the mythologies of primitive races.

hanzi: 我想要一只和你一样的照相机。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng yào yī zhǐ huò nǐ yí yàng de zhào xiàng jī。
english: I want the same camera as you have.

hanzi: 这本书是原始民族神话集。
pinyin: zhè běn shū shì yuán shǐ mín zú shén huà jí。
english: The book is about the mythologies of primitive races.

hanzi: 孩子们早已吃掉不少食物.
pinyin: hái zi men zǎo yǐ jí diào bù shǎo shí wù.
english: Already the children had made considerable inroads on the food.

hanzi: 我想在十字路口下车可不准。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng zài shí zì lù kǒu xià chē kě bù zhǔn。
english: I wanted off at the cross road, but was refused.

hanzi: 共产主义是以马克思主义为基础.
pinyin: gòng chǎn zhǔ yì shì yǐ Mǎ kè sī zhǔ yì wèi jī chǔ.
english: Communism is based on Marxism.

hanzi: 我经常带我的孩子们去公园玩。
pinyin: wǒ jīng cháng dài wǒ de hái zi men qù gōng yuán wàn。
english: I often take my children to play in the park.

hanzi: 给以时间的话，他们可能会同意。
pinyin: gěi yǐ shí jiān de huà， tā men kě néng huì tóng yì。
english: Given time, they will probably agree.

hanzi: 汽车在交通信号灯处停住了.
pinyin: qì chē zài jiāo tōng xìn hào dēng chù tíng zhù le.
english: The car came to a full stop at the traffic lights.

hanzi: 她在明信片上草草地写了几个字.
pinyin: tā zài míng xìn piàn shàng cǎo cǎo de xiě le jǐ ge zì.
english: She scrawled a few words on a postcard.

hanzi: 做事要有是非观念和正义感.
pinyin: zuò shì yào yǒu shì fēi guān niàn huò zhèng yì gǎn.
english: Be guided by your sense of what is right and just.

hanzi: 做事要有是非观念和正义感.
pinyin: zuò shì yào yǒu shì fēi guān niàn huò zhèng yì gǎn.
english: Be guided by your sense of what is right and just.

hanzi: 他的演讲中有许多可笑的错误。
pinyin: tā de yǎn jiǎng zhòng yǒu xǔ duō kě xiào de cuò wù。
english: He made many ludicrous mistakes in his speech.

hanzi: 小孩通过图画识字很好。
pinyin: xiǎo hái tōng guò tú huà shí zì hěn hǎo。
english: It is a good idea for children to learn to read by way of pictures.

hanzi: 收集这些邮票花了我一百块钱。
pinyin: shōu jí zhè xie yóu piào huā le wǒ yī bǎi kuài qián。
english: It cost me 100 dollars to collect the stamps.

hanzi: 如果明天天气好，我门可能出门。
pinyin: rú guǒ míng tiān tiān qì hào， wǒ mén kě néng chū mén。
english: If it is fine tomorrow, we may go out.

hanzi: 讲话时他经常参考笔记。
pinyin: jiǎng huà shí tā jīng cháng cān kǎo bǐ jì。
english: He frequently referred to the notes during the course of the talk.

hanzi: 那里就是他度过大半生的地方。
pinyin: nà li jiù shì tā dù guò dà bàn shēng de dì fang。
english: That's (the place) where he spent most of his life.

hanzi: 他的祖先来到英国的时候是难民.
pinyin: tā de zǔ xiān lái dào Yīng guó de shí hou shì nàn mín.
english: His ancestors had come to England as refugees.

hanzi: 她是能谅解的, 她是个大好人.
pinyin: tā shì néng liàng jiě de,  tā shì gè dà hào rén.
english: She'll understand and forgive; she's really quite human.

hanzi: 你不必向我请示可自行做些变动.
pinyin: nǐ bù bì xiàng wǒ qǐng shì kě zì xíng zuò xiē biàn dòng.
english: You don't need my say-so to change things.

hanzi: 他四处张望，要确定周围没人。
pinyin: tā sì chù zhāng wàng， yào què dìng zhōu wéi mò rén。
english: He looked around to confirm that he was alone.

hanzi: 他四处张望，要确定周围没人。
pinyin: tā sì chù zhāng wàng， yào què dìng zhōu wéi mò rén。
english: He looked around to confirm that he was alone.

hanzi: 她听到这一消息时表情就变了。
pinyin: tā tīng dào zhè yī xiāo xi shí biǎo qíng jiù biàn le。
english: Her expression changed when she heard the news.

hanzi: 小酒店里净是身穿花呢衣服的农民.
pinyin: xiǎo jiǔ diàn lǐ jìng shì shēn chuān huā ne yī fu de nóng mín.
english: The pub was full of tweedy farmers.

hanzi: 小心--你要是出事故, 我要负责的.
pinyin: xiǎo xīn-- nǐ yào shì chū shì gù,  wǒ yào fù zé de.
english: Be careful if you have an accident I'll be liable.

hanzi: 她在最不合适的时候讲出了实话。
pinyin: tā zài zuì bù hé shì de shí hou jiǎng chū le shí huà。
english: She plumped out the truth at the oddest times.

hanzi: 今年学校已开除了三名学生.
pinyin: jīn nián xué xiào yǐ kāi chú le sān míng xué sheng.
english: There have been three expulsions from the school this year.

hanzi: 伟大的画家总是走在时代的前头。
pinyin: wěi dà de huà jiā zǒng shì zǒu zài shí dài de qián tou。
english: A great painter is usually ahead of his time.

hanzi: 这医院有内科病房和外科病房.
pinyin: zhè yī yuàn yǒu nèi kē bìng fáng huò wài kē bìng fáng.
english: The hospital has a medical ward and a surgical ward.

hanzi: 影片的一些部分以慢动作重放。
pinyin: yǐng piàn de yī xiē bù fen yǐ màn dòng zuò zhòng fàng。
english: Parts of the film were shown again in slow motion.

hanzi: 这一排排的房屋外表都是一样的。
pinyin: zhè yī pái pǎi de fáng wū wài biǎo dōu shì yí yàng de。
english: The rows of houses were uniform in appearance.

hanzi: 他又年轻又漂亮, 而且还很富有.
pinyin: tā yòu nián qīng yòu piào liang,  ér qiě huán hěn fù yǒu.
english: He is young and good-looking, and also very rich.

hanzi: 这工作一年之内不见得能完成.
pinyin: zhè gōng zuò yī nián zhī nèi bù jiàn de néng wán chéng.
english: The job is unlikely to be finished inside (of) a year.

hanzi: 你再迟到一次, 就把你开除.
pinyin: nǐ zài chí dào yī cì,  jiù bǎ nǐ kāi chú.
english: Arrive late once more and (ie If you arrive late once more) you're fired.

hanzi: 在我的老友当中，他看来最为年轻。
pinyin: zài wǒ de lǎo yǒu dāng zhōng， tā kàn lai zuì wéi nián qīng。
english: Among my old friends he has worn best.

hanzi: 虽然汤药很苦，我还是不得不喝了。
pinyin: suī rán tāng yào hěn kǔ， wǒ hái shì bù dé bù hè le。
english: I had to take the herb tea although it's bitter.

hanzi: 进一步细想后，她明白了自己的错误。
pinyin: jìn yí bù xì xiǎng hòu， tā míng bai le zì jǐ de cuò wù。
english: On further reflection she saw her mistake.

hanzi: 起初谁都没有注意到小孩不见了.
pinyin: qǐ chū shéi dōu méi yǒu zhù yì dào xiǎo hái bù jiàn le.
english: At first nobody noticed the child's disappearance.

hanzi: 他们有些人在进行高级研究工作。
pinyin: tā men yǒu xiē rén zài jìn xíng gāo jí yán jiū gōng zuò。
english: Some of them are engaged in advanced studies.

hanzi: 信息产业在我国是新兴产业。
pinyin: xìn xī chǎn yè zài wǒ guó shì xīn xīng chǎn yè。
english: The information industry is an infant industry in our country.

hanzi: 我在谈话中当然会十分小心的。
pinyin: wǒ zài tán huà zhòng dāng rán kuài shí fēn xiǎo xīn de。
english: I'll certainly be most discreet in my conversation.

hanzi: 这个村子里家家户户都没有自来水.
pinyin: zhè gè cūn zi lǐ jiā jiā hù hù dōu méi yǒu zì lái shuǐ.
english: The houses in this village are without water.

hanzi: 被误解的被错误地理解或错误地领会的
pinyin: bèi wù jiě de bèi cuò wù dì lǐ xiè huò cuò wù de lǐng huì de
english: Incorrectly understood or interpreted.

hanzi: 这医院有内科病房和外科病房。
pinyin: zhè yī yuàn yǒu nèi kē bìng fáng huò wài kē bìng fáng。
english: The hospital have a medical ward and a surgical ward.

hanzi: 昨天下雨了, 结果比赛被取消。
pinyin: zuó tiān xià yǔ le,  jié guǒ bǐ sài bèi qǔ xiāo。
english: It rained yesterday and in consequence the match was canceled.

hanzi: 他提出这种要求，只能说是正当的。
pinyin: tā tí chū zhè zhǒng yāo qiú， zhǐ néng shuō shì zhèng dāng de。
english: It's only just that he should claim it.

hanzi: 如果我需要你来帮忙，我会打电话的。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ xū yào nǐ lái bāng máng， wǒ kuài dǎ diàn huà de。
english: If I need you to come and help I'll call.

hanzi: 从那个观点看，这工作就容易了。
pinyin: zòng nèi gè guān diǎn kàn， zhè gōng zuò jiù róng yì le。
english: Look at from that point of view, the job become easy.

hanzi: 直到几个月后，他才知道这故事。
pinyin: zhí dào jǐ ge yuè hòu， tā cái zhī dào zhè gù shì。
english: It was not until a few months later that he knew the story.

hanzi: 我要不时地再给你们介绍一些成语。
pinyin: wǒ yào bu shí de zài jǐ nǐ men jiè shào yī xiē chéng yǔ。
english: I'll give you some more idioms from time to time.

hanzi: 姑不论胜负, 这场比赛想必十分精彩.
pinyin: gū bù lùn shèng fù,  zhè chǎng bǐ sài xiǎng bì shí fēn jīng cǎi.
english: Win or lose, it should be a very good match.

hanzi: 他不分白天黑夜, 想打电话就打.
pinyin: tā bù fēn bái tiān hēi yè,  xiǎng dǎ diàn huà jiù dǎ.
english: He's inclined to telephone at all hours of the day or night.

hanzi: 经过这许多年月, 他的体力不如从前了.
pinyin: jīng guò zhè xǔ duō nián yuè,  tā de tǐ lì bù rú cóng qián le.
english: His strength has diminished over the years.

hanzi: 这演说很动听，可是没什么内容。
pinyin: zhè yǎn shuō hěn dòng tìng， kě shì mò shén me nèi róng。
english: It's a clever speech, but there was no real meat in it.

hanzi: 我们要面对面的研究一下这种情况。
pinyin: wǒ men yào miàn duì miàn de yán jiū yī xià zhè zhǒng qíng kuàng。
english: We must discuss the situation eyeball to eyeball.

hanzi: 我只要做的就是说服他跟我们一起去。
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ yào zuò de jiù shì shuō fú tā gēn wǒ men yī qǐ qù。
english: All I have to do is persuade him to go with us.

hanzi: 他从她那里问出了他所需要的信息。
pinyin: tā zòng tā nà li wèn chū le tā suǒ xū yào de xìn xī。
english: He succeeded in eliciting the information he needed from her.

hanzi: 那一定是别人的外衣, 不是我的.
pinyin: nà yī dìng shì bié rén de wài yī,  bú shì wǒ de.
english: That must be somebody else's (ie some other person's) coat; it isn't mine.

hanzi: 因为热爱大自然，他常常去爬山。
pinyin: yīn wèi rè ài dà zì rán， tā cháng cháng qù pá shān。
english: (Being) a lover of nature, he often goes mountain climbing.

hanzi: 他是大学教师联合会的一名成员。
pinyin: tā shì dà xué jiào shī lián hé kuài de yī míng chéng yuán。
english: He is a member of the Association of University Teachers.

hanzi: 病人安静地躺在内科病房的床上。
pinyin: bìng rén ān jìng de tǎng zài nèi kē bìng fáng de chuáng shàng。
english: The patient lay quietly on his bed in the medical ward.

hanzi: 这个学期我们将学习社会主义原理。
pinyin: zhè gè xué qī wǒ men jiàng xué xí shè huì zhǔ yì yuán lǐ。
english: We'll have a subject of socialist principles this term.

hanzi: 老师要求我把演说的要点记下来。
pinyin: lǎo shī yāo qiú wǒ bǎ yǎn shuō de yào diǎn jì xia lai。
english: The teacher asked me to note down the main points of the speech.

hanzi: 我们不能自满, 必须继续努力改进.
pinyin: wǒ men bù néng zì mǎn,  bì xū jì xù nǔ lì gǎi jìn.
english: There's no room for complacency; we must continue to try to improve.

hanzi: 要不是我的工作没做完, 我真想去。
pinyin: yào bu shì wǒ de gōng zuò mò zuò wán,  wǒ zhēn xiǎng qù。
english: I would like to go only that I haven't finished my work.

hanzi: 除非有钱，要不然我是不会买房子的。
pinyin: chú fēi yǒu qián， yào bu rán wǒ shì bù huì mǎi fáng zi de。
english: Unless (being) rich, I am not going to buy a house.

hanzi: 如果你愿意卖的话，我想买你的房子。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ yuàn yì mài de huà， wǒ xiǎng mǎi nǐ de fáng zi。
english: I'd like to buy your house if you are willing to sell it.

hanzi: 因天气寒冷，今年的作物成熟得晚。
pinyin: yīn tiān qì hán lěng， jīn nián de zuò wù chéng shú de wǎn。
english: Because of the cold weather the crops are late this year.

hanzi: 这机器是为水下使用而特别改装的。
pinyin: zhè jī qì shì wèi shuǐ xià shǐ yòng ér tè bié gǎi zhuāng de。
english: This machine has been specially adapted for underwater use.

hanzi: 学年中期考试一学年中期进行的考试
pinyin: xué nián zhōng qī kǎo shì yī xué nián zhōng qī jìn xíng de kǎo shì
english: An examination given in the middle of a school year.

hanzi: 到工地的所有参观者必须带上安全帽。
pinyin: dào gōng dì de suǒ yǒu cān guān zhě bì xū dài shàng ān quán mào。
english: All visitors to the site must wear safety helmet.

hanzi: 他没有钱, 所以, 他必定会出现的。
pinyin: tā méi yǒu qián,  suǒ yǐ,  tā bì dìng kuài chū xiàn de。
english: He hasn't got any money, so he's bound to turn up sooner or later.

hanzi: 我经常收到读过我的书的读者的来信。
pinyin: wǒ jīng cháng shōu dào dú guò wǒ de shū de dú zhě de lái xìn。
english: I regularly get letters from people who have read my books.

hanzi: 她在难民中工作是因为她有很深的信念.
pinyin: tā zài nàn mín zhòng gōng zuò shì yīn wèi tā yǒu hěn shēn de xìn niàn.
english: A deep faith underlies her work among refugees.

hanzi: 你还是告诉她吧, 因为她迟早会发觉的.
pinyin: nǐ hái shì gào su tā ba,  yīn wèi tā chí zǎo kuài fā jué de.
english: You should tell her, because she'll find out sooner or later.

hanzi: 计算机科学目前已是一门成熟的学科。
pinyin: jì suàn jī kē xué mù qián yǐ shì yī mén chéng shú de xué kē。
english: Computer science is now a fully-fledged academic subject.

hanzi: 我努力想听清他讲课讲的每一字每一句。
pinyin: wǒ nǔ lì xiǎng tìng qīng tā jiǎng kè jiǎng de měi yī zì měi yī jù。
english: I tried hard not to lose a word of his lecture.

hanzi: 这座新工厂是那些最新设想的体现。
pinyin: zhè zuò xīn gōng chǎng shì nà xiē zuì xīn shè xiǎng de tǐ xiàn。
english: The new factory is the embodiment of the very latest ideas.

hanzi: 他的回答只不过是把我的讲义重复了一遍。
pinyin: tā de huí dá zhǐ bù guò shì bǎ wǒ de jiǎng yì chóng fù le yī biàn。
english: His answer is just a rehash version of my lecture.

hanzi: 当老师提问题时学生们都举起了手。
pinyin: dàng lǎo shī tí wèn tí shí xué sheng men dōu jǔ qǐ le shǒu。
english: The pupils all put up their hands when the teacher asks them questions.

hanzi: 这本书太难而不适合大多数的高中生。
pinyin: zhè běn shū tài nàn ér bù shì hé dà duō shù de gāo zhōng shēng。
english: The book is too difficult for most senior high school students.

hanzi: 再伟大的学者也没有办法解答这个难题吧。
pinyin: zài wěi dà de xué zhě yě méi yǒu bàn fǎ jiě dá zhè gè nán tí ba。
english: The greatest scholar cannot solve this difficult problem.

hanzi: 再伟大的学者也没有办法解答这个难题吧。
pinyin: zài wěi dà de xué zhě yě méi yǒu bàn fǎ jiě dá zhè gè nán tí ba。
english: The greatest scholar cannot solve this difficult problem.

hanzi: 他很关心别人, 因而大家都把他当作亲人.
pinyin: tā hěn guān xīn bié rén,  yīn ér dà jiā dōu bǎ tā dàng zuò qīn rén.
english: He showed such concern that people took him to be a relative.

hanzi: 我母亲好些年前讲的故事我都回想得起来。
pinyin: wǒ mǔ qīn hǎo xiē nián qián jiǎng de gù shì wǒ dōu huí xiǎng de qǐ lai。
english: I can recall stories that my mother told me years ago.

hanzi: 新医院的全部设备需要一年才能装备好。
pinyin: xīn yī yuàn de quán bù shè bèi xū yào yī nián cái néng zhuāng bèi hào。
english: The complete equipment of the new hospital will take a year.

hanzi: 平民们在广场上集会反对他们的新市长。
pinyin: píng mín men zài guǎng chǎng shàng jí huì fǎn duì tā men de xīn shì zhǎng。
english: The rabbles met on the square to oppose their new mayor.

hanzi: 我是今天早晨从报纸上知道这条消息的。
pinyin: wǒ shì jīn tiān zǎo chén zòng bào zhǐ shàng zhī dào zhè tiáo xiāo xi de。
english: I learned this piece of news from the newspaper this morning.

hanzi: 对不起, 你只能在八号窗口买旅行支票。
pinyin: duì bù qǐ,  nǐ zhǐ néng zài bā hào chuāng kǒu mǎi lu:3 xíng zhī piào。
english: I am sorry, you can only buy traveler's check at Window Eight.

hanzi: 旅游可以使人增长见闻，尤其对年轻人。
pinyin: lu:3 yóu kě yǐ shǐ rén zēng zhǎng jiàn wén， yóu qí duì nián qīng rén。
english: Travel is an edifying experience, especially for young people.

hanzi: 要学好英语就要处处学习用英语思考。
pinyin: yào xué hào Yīng yǔ jiù yào chù chù xué xí yòng Yīng yǔ sī kǎo。
english: To learn English well one has to learn to think in English at every turn.

hanzi: 他们都是自愿的, 完全是因为喜欢做而做的.
pinyin: tā men dōu shì zì yuàn de,  wán quán shì yīn wèi xǐ huan zuò ér zuò de.
english: They're all volunteers, doing it just for the love of the thing.

hanzi: 我们建立更多的水力发电站，这是重要的。
pinyin: wǒ men jiàn lì gèng duō de shuǐ lì fā diàn zhàn， zhè shì zhòng yào de。
english: It is important that we build more hydroelectric power stations.

hanzi: 很清楚，电动汽车在工艺技术上是可行的。
pinyin: hěn qīng chu， diàn dòng qì chē zài gōng yì jì shù shàng shì kě xíng de。
english: It's quite clear that the electric car is technically feasible.

hanzi: 这条河河水的深度是那条河河水深度的一半。
pinyin: zhè tiáo hé hé shuǐ de shēn dù shì nà tiáo hé hé shuǐ shēn dù de yī bàn。
english: The depth of water in this river is half that in that river.

hanzi: 你应该查字典找出这个单词的正确读音。
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi zhā zì diǎn zhǎo chū zhè gè dān cí de zhèng què dú yīn。
english: You should look up the right pronunciation of this word in the dictionary.

hanzi: 我突然想到一个办法可以让我们改进这种局面.
pinyin: wǒ tū rán xiǎng dào yī gè bàn fǎ kě yǐ ràng wǒ men gǎi jìn zhè zhǒng jú miàn.
english: It suddenly struck me how we could improve the situation.

hanzi: 我们喜欢的饭馆已客满, 所以我们只得到别处去.
pinyin: wǒ men xǐ huan de fàn guǎn yǐ kè mǎn,  suǒ yǐ wǒ men zhǐ dé dào bié chù qù.
english: Our favourite restaurant was full, so we had to go elsewhere.

hanzi: 在这样重要的场合, 我们有幸能欢迎...
pinyin: zài zhè yàng zhòng yào de chǎng hé,  wǒ men yǒu xìng néng huān yíng...
english: On an occasion such as this (ie as important as this) we are privileged to welcome...

hanzi: 我很难设想能到英国以外的地方去生活.
pinyin: wǒ hěn nàn shè xiǎng néng dào Yīng guó yǐ wài de dì fang qù shēng huó.
english: I can't imagine living (ie don't think I shall ever live) anywhere but England.

hanzi: 人家告诉我她很可爱，可是她根本不是那样。
pinyin: rén jiā gào su wǒ tā hěn kě ài， kě shì tā gēn běn bú shì nà yàng。
english: People had told me she was very pleasant but she's nothing of the kind.

hanzi: 如果我们要克服困难，我们就要有进取精神。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ men yào kè fú kùn nan， wǒ men jiù yào yǒu jìn qǔ jīng shén。
english: We need a spirit of enterprise if we are to overcome our difficulties.

hanzi: 我们本周有紧急任务, 所以人人都该出把力.
pinyin: wǒ men běn zhōu yǒu jǐn jí rèn wu,  suǒ yǐ rén rén dōu gāi chū bǎ lì.
english: We've an urgent job on this week, so it's (a case of) all hands to the pump.

hanzi: 几年来, 几百个留学生在那所大学学习过。
pinyin: jǐ nián lái,  jǐ bǎi gè liú xué shēng zài nà suǒ dà xué xué xí guò。
english: Over the years, hundreds of overseas students have studied at that university.

hanzi: 我想我找到了简便方法，给钱而不是花时间。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng wǒ zhǎo dào le jiǎn biàn fāng fǎ， jǐ qián ér bú shì huā shí jiān。
english: I think I'll take the easy way out and give money instead of time.

hanzi: 这位研究生得一个字一个字地读他导师写的东西。
pinyin: zhè wèi yán jiū shēng de yī gè zì yī gè zì de dú tā dǎo shī xiě de dōng xi。
english: The graduate student has to spell out what his tutor had written.

hanzi: 我太生气了, 我一定要当面告诉她我对她的看法。
pinyin: wǒ tài shēng qì le,  wǒ yī dìng yào dāng miàn gào su tā wǒ duì tā de kàn fǎ。
english: I am so angry that I'll tell her to her face what I think of her.

hanzi: 当了名人的麻烦之一是在街上被人指指点点。
pinyin: dàng le míng rén de má fan zhī yī shì zài jiē shàng bèi rén zhǐ zhǐ diǎn diǎn。
english: One of the penalties of fame is that people point at you on the street.

hanzi: 这位研究生得一个字一个字地读他导师写的东西。
pinyin: zhè wèi yán jiū shēng de yī gè zì yī gè zì de dú tā dǎo shī xiě de dōng xi。
english: The graduate student has to spell out what his tutor had written.

hanzi: 可别让他谈起政治来, 要不然他一谈就得一个晚上.
pinyin: kě biè ràng tā tán qǐ zhèng zhì lái,  yào bu rán tā yī tán jiù de yī gè wǎn shang.
english: Don't set him off talking politics or he'll go on all evening.

hanzi: 站在那儿的那个人就是我们一直在谈论的那个人。
pinyin: zhàn zài nà r de nèi gè rén jiù shì wǒ men yī zhí zài tán lùn de nèi gè rén。
english: The man standing over there is the very man that we have been talking about.

hanzi: 他们热心照顾这个年轻的姑娘，给她吃的，给她住处。
pinyin: tā men rè xīn zhào gu zhè gè nián qīng de gū niang， jǐ tā jí de， jǐ tā zhù chù。
english: They befriended the young girl, providing her with food and shelter.

hanzi: 他装作一本正经，可是你看得出他是在开玩笑。
pinyin: tā zhuāng zuò yī běn zhèng jing， kě shì nǐ kàn dé chū tā shì zài kāi wán xiào。
english: He pretended to be serious, but you could tell that he had hi tongue in his cheek.

hanzi: 现在的时装和我还是小女孩时候流行的样子很不一样了。
pinyin: xiàn zài de shí zhuāng huò wǒ hái shì xiǎo nu:3 hái shí hou liú xíng de yàng zi hěn bù yí yàng le。
english: Fashions have changed a lot since I was a little girl.

hanzi: 只有知道如何生活的人们, 才会开始认识自己和人生。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu zhī dào rú hé shēng huó de rén men,  cái kuài kāi shǐ rèn shi zì jǐ huò rén shēng。
english: Only those who learn how to live can come to know themselves and life.

hanzi: 我现在讲的话，我相信也是在座许多同志的想法。
pinyin: wǒ xiàn zài jiǎng de huà， wǒ xiāng xìn yě shì zài zuò xǔ duō tóng zhì de xiǎng fǎ。
english: In what I am saying now I believe I speak also for many others present at this meeting.

hanzi: 报社记者把部长团团围住，坚持要他发表一个声明。
pinyin: bào shè jì zhě bǎ bù zhǎng tuán tuán wéi zhù， jiān chí yào tā fā biǎo yī gè shēng míng。
english: Newspaper reporters pushed round the Minister, urging him to give them a statement.

hanzi: 在一般情况下他都和我们一起来, 只是他现在身体不太好.
pinyin: zài yì bān qíng kuàng xià tā dōu huò wǒ men yī qǐ lái,  zhǐ shì tā xiàn zài shēn tǐ bù tài hào.
english: In the ordinary way he would have come with us, but he's not feeling well.

hanzi: 信息技术的发展是二十世纪工业技术上的最大进步。
pinyin: xìn xī jì shù de fā zhǎn shì èr shí shì jì gōng yè jì shù shàng de zuì dà jìn bù。
english: The development of the information technology is the greatest technological advance of the 20th century.

hanzi: 你平时如果努力学习，在考试前就不必这样整夜开夜车了。
pinyin: nǐ píng shí rú guǒ nǔ lì xué xí， zài kǎo shì qián jiù bù bì zhè yàng zhěng yè kāi yè jū le。
english: If you work hard at other times, you won't have to sit up all night before the exam.

hanzi: 我算不上是个好水手，但我喜欢坐着我的小船在河上游玩。
pinyin: wǒ suàn bù shàng shì gè hào shuǐ shǒu， dàn wǒ xǐ huan zuò zhuó wǒ de xiǎo chuán zài hé shàng yóu wàn。
english: I am not much of a sailor, but I like to about, in my little boat on their river.

hanzi: 化石的记录
pinyin: huà shí de jì lù
english: A fossil record.

hanzi: 饼烤胡了.
pinyin: bǐng kǎo hú le.
english: The cakes were burnt to a cinder.

hanzi: 铅是重金属.
pinyin: qiān shì zhòng jīn shǔ.
english: Lead is a heavy metal.

hanzi: 他口试不及格.
pinyin: tā kǒu shì bù jí gé.
english: He failed the oral.

hanzi: 是的，肯定的。
pinyin: shì de， kěn dìng de。
english: Yes, definitely.

hanzi: 她很有头脑。
pinyin: tā hěn yǒu tóu nǎo。
english: She has a good brain.

hanzi: 她泪眼模糊.
pinyin: tā lèi yǎn mó hu.
english: Her eyes clouded with tears.

hanzi: 你看上去心虚。
pinyin: nǐ kàn shàng qù xīn xū。
english: You look guilty.

hanzi: 他精于品味。
pinyin: tā jīng yú pǐn wèi。
english: He has a refined palate.

hanzi: 指引方向的神
pinyin: zhǐ yǐn fāng xiàng de shén
english: A guiding spirit.

hanzi: 雨季已来临。
pinyin: yǔ jì yǐ lái lín。
english: The moist season has set in.

hanzi: 我不想打架.
pinyin: wǒ bù xiǎng dǎ jià.
english: I had no stomach for a fight.

hanzi: 决议被搁置。
pinyin: jué yì bèi gē zhì。
english: The decision was set aside.

hanzi: 别胡说八道了。
pinyin: biè hú shuō bā dào le。
english: Don't talk nonsense.

hanzi: 我们即将动身.
pinyin: wǒ men jí jiāng dòng shēn.
english: We're about to start.

hanzi: 议会解散了。
pinyin: yì huì jiě sàn le。
english: The parliament was dissolved.

hanzi: 我们刚刚订婚.
pinyin: wǒ men gāng gang dìng hūn.
english: We've just got engaged.

hanzi: 我们已发射升空.
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ fā shè shēng kōng.
english: We have lift-off.

hanzi: 他绝非学者。
pinyin: tā jué fēi xué zhě。
english: He is anything but a scholar.

hanzi: 船已接近陆地.
pinyin: chuán yǐ jiē jìn lù dì.
english: The ship was nearing land.

hanzi: 不顾他们的警告
pinyin: bù gù tā men de jǐng gào
english: Neglected their warnings.

hanzi: 他情绪激动。
pinyin: tā qíng xù jī dòng。
english: He got an inflammation of passion.

hanzi: 这块糕饼好极了.
pinyin: zhè kuài gāo bǐng hào jí le.
english: This cake is heavenly.

hanzi: 她紧紧地挨著他.
pinyin: tā jǐn jǐn de ái著 tā.
english: She snuggled close up to him.

hanzi: 人群散开了.
pinyin: rén qún sàn kāi le.
english: The crowd dispersed (in all directions).

hanzi: 他五官端正。
pinyin: tā wǔ guān duān zhèng。
english: He has very regular features.

hanzi: 我们进展顺利.
pinyin: wǒ men jìn zhǎn shùn lì.
english: We're getting along swimmingly.

hanzi: 随即紧随这之后
pinyin: suí jí jǐn suí zhè zhī hòu
english: Immediately after this.

hanzi: 他有一双套鞋。
pinyin: tā yǒu yī shuāng tào xié。
english: He has a pair of overshoes.

hanzi: 我可不是闹着玩的。
pinyin: wǒ kě bú shì nào zhuó wàn de。
english: I mean it.

hanzi: 他上下打量我。
pinyin: tā shàng xià dǎ liang wǒ。
english: He looked me up and down.

hanzi: 你可真有胆量.
pinyin: nǐ kě zhēn yǒu dǎn liàng.
english: You must have a lot of courage.

hanzi: 他冲入战场中。
pinyin: tā chòng rù zhàn chǎng zhòng。
english: He rushed into the fray.

hanzi: 她光著脚四处走.
pinyin: tā guāng著 jué sì chù zǒu.
english: She goes about barefoot.

hanzi: 国庆节快到了。
pinyin: guó qìng jié kuài dào le。
english: National Day drew near.

hanzi: 我恨不得我很富有.

pinyin: zī liào yīng gāi míng bai yì dǒng。
english: The information ought to be made more accessible.

hanzi: 商人向他们供应货物。
pinyin: shāng rén xiàng tā men gōng yìng huò wù。
english: The merchant supplies goods to them.

hanzi: 这些轮子须同速转动.
pinyin: zhè xie lún zi xū tóng sù zhuǎn dòng.
english: The wheels must synchronize as they revolve.

hanzi: 我是学校足球队的队员。
pinyin: wǒ shì xué xiào zú qiú duì de duì yuán。
english: I am in the school football team.

hanzi: 我不打算主持这次会议。
pinyin: wǒ bù dǎ suàn zhǔ chí zhè cì huì yì。
english: I don't intend to chair the meeting.

hanzi: 这趟列车是开往北京的。
pinyin: zhè tàng liè chē shì kāi wàng Běi jīng de。
english: The train is bound for Beijing.

hanzi: 这种树木可见于平原。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng shù mù kě jiàn yú píng yuán。
english: Such trees can be found in the plains.

hanzi: 他因粗心大意而丢了工作.
pinyin: tā yīn cū xīn dà yì ér diū le gōng zuò.
english: His carelessness lost him the job.

hanzi: 我对他在哪儿感到很好奇。
pinyin: wǒ duì tā zài nǎ r gǎn dào hěn hǎo qí。
english: I am curious about where he is.

hanzi: 他因得到胜利而洋洋得意。
pinyin: tā yīn dé dào shèng lì ér yáng yáng dé yì。
english: He gloried in his victory.

hanzi: 无论如何现在已经太迟了.
pinyin: wú lùn rú hé xiàn zài yǐ jīng tài chí le.
english: It's too late now, anyhow.

hanzi: 沿河两岸种着松树。
pinyin: yàn hé liǎng àn zhòng zhuó sōng shù。
english: Pine trees were planted all along the river.

hanzi: 及时补一针，省得补九针。
pinyin: jí shí bǔ yī zhēn， shěng de bǔ jiǔ zhēn。
english: A stitch in time saves nine.

hanzi: 议会是政府的一个机构。
pinyin: yì huì shì zhèng fǔ de yī gè jī gòu。
english: Parliament is an organ of government.

hanzi: 店员要轮流休息。
pinyin: diàn yuán yào lún liú xiū xi。
english: The shop assistants had to have their days off by turns.

hanzi: 列车车次已大幅度减少.
pinyin: liè chē jū cì yǐ dà fú dù jiǎn shǎo.
english: Train services have been cut to the bone.

hanzi: 这帮人正被警方追捕。
pinyin: zhè bāng rén zhèng bèi jǐng fāng zhuī bǔ。
english: The gang is being hunted by the police.

hanzi: 她把来访者引进屋子里。
pinyin: tā bǎ lái fǎng zhě yǐn jìn wū zi lǐ。
english: She ushered the visitor into the room.

hanzi: 他们在教堂接受了洗礼。
pinyin: tā men zài jiào táng jiē shòu le xǐ lǐ。
english: They received baptism at the church.

hanzi: 本人认为此案证据不足.
pinyin: běn rén rèn wéi cǐ àn zhèng jù bù zú.
english: The case, I would submit, is not proven.

hanzi: 他们把饼干倒在盘子里。
pinyin: tā men bǎ bǐng gān dào zài pán zi lǐ。
english: They emptied the biscuits onto the plate.

hanzi: 领土被侵占者瓜分.
pinyin: lǐng tǔ bèi qīn zhàn zhě guā fēn.
english: The territory was carved up by the occupying powers.

hanzi: 他一口气喝了一品脱牛奶.
pinyin: tā yī kǒu qì hè le yī pǐn tuō niú nǎi.
english: He drank a pint of milk in one go.

hanzi: 敌军在数量上占优势.
pinyin: dí jūn zài shù liàng shàng zhàn yōu shì.
english: The enemy forces were superior in numbers.

hanzi: 我只得把他让进客厅。
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ dé bǎ tā ràng jìn kè tīng。
english: I felt obliged to invite him into the parlor.

hanzi: 这次会议的议程如下....
pinyin: zhè cì huì yì de yì chéng rú xià....
english: The agenda for the meeting is as follows....

hanzi: 我只得把他让进客厅。
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ dé bǎ tā ràng jìn kè tīng。
english: I felt obliged to invite him into the parlor.

hanzi: 他沉默不语意味着同意了。
pinyin: tā chén mò bù yù yì wèi zhe tóng yì le。
english: His silence implied agreement.

hanzi: 正数的数目是无穷的。
pinyin: zhèng shuò de shù mù shì wú qióng de。
english: The number of positive numbers is infinite.

hanzi: 他无疑是较优秀的选手.
pinyin: tā wú yí shì jiào yōu xiù de xuǎn shǒu.
english: He is without dispute the better player.

hanzi: 她自愿参加救济工作.
pinyin: tā zì yuàn cān jiā jiù jì gōng zuò.
english: She volunteered (her services) for relief work.

hanzi: 过去的事哭也是白费力气。
pinyin: guò qu de shì kū yě shì bái fèi lì qi。
english: It is no use crying about the past.

hanzi: 她始终坚持自己的信念。
pinyin: tā shǐ zhōng jiān chí zì jǐ de xìn niàn。
english: She always holds to her convictions.

hanzi: 那只猫拖著断腿吃力地走.
pinyin: nà zhǐ māo tuō著 duàn tuǐ chī lì de zǒu.
english: The cat was dragging its broken leg.

hanzi: 我是一名广播电台的听众。
pinyin: wǒ shì yī míng guǎng bō diàn tái de tīng zhòng。
english: I am a broadcasting auditor.

hanzi: 火山气体的温度很高。
pinyin: huǒ shān qì tǐ de wēn dù hěn gāo。
english: The temperature of volcanic gases is very high.

hanzi: 她是我们公司的一位秘书。
pinyin: tā shì wǒ men gōng sī de yī wèi mì shū。
english: She is a secretary in our company.

hanzi: 一大群人耐心地静候着。
pinyin: yī dà qún rén nài xīn de jìng hòu zhuó。
english: A patient throng was waiting in silence.

hanzi: 她眼中流露出调皮的神情.
pinyin: tā yǎn zhòng liú lù chū tiáo pí de shén qíng.
english: There was mischief in her eyes.

hanzi: 飞机因大雾推迟降落。
pinyin: fēi jī yīn dà wù tuī chí jiàng luò。
english: The plane's landing was delayed because of fog.

hanzi: 采访过程是预先录制好的.
pinyin: cǎi fǎng guò chéng shì yù xiān lù zhì hǎo de.
english: The interview was pre-recorded.

hanzi: 飞机在浓雾上空飞行。
pinyin: fēi jī zài nóng wù shàng kōng fēi xíng。
english: The aircraft was flying above thick fog.

hanzi: 政府中较具影响力的圈子
pinyin: zhèng fǔ zhòng jiào jù yǐng xiǎng lì de quān zi
english: The inner circles of government.

hanzi: 让我替你拿外衣和帽子吧.
pinyin: ràng wǒ tì nǐ ná wài yī huò mào zi ba.
english: Let me relieve you of your coat and hat.

hanzi: 有头脑不仅指受过教育。
pinyin: yǒu tóu nǎo bù jǐn zhǐ shòu guò jiào yù。
english: Brains are more than just education.

hanzi: 把这些宝石藏在保险箱里.
pinyin: bǎ zhè xie bǎo shí zàng zài bǎo xiǎn xiāng lǐ.
english: Shut the jewels up in the safe.

hanzi: 我会尽一切可能帮助你。
pinyin: wǒ kuài jìn yī qiè kě néng bāng zhù nǐ。
english: I'll do everything possible to help you.

hanzi: 老板强迫他做此难事。
pinyin: lǎo bǎn qiǎng pò tā zuò cǐ nàn shì。
english: The boss forced this difficult task upon him.

hanzi: 我必须找人把收音机修理好。
pinyin: wǒ bì xū zhǎo rén bǎ shōu yīn jī xiū lǐ hào。
english: I must get the radio fixed.

hanzi: 她正在戏剧研讨班学习。
pinyin: tā zhèng zài xì jù yán tǎo bān xué xí。
english: She is studying in a theatre workshop.

hanzi: 这战场的情景触目惊心.
pinyin: zhè zhàn chǎng de qíng jǐng chù mù jīng xīn.
english: The battlefield was a fearsome sight.

hanzi: 石块朝四面八方乱飞。
pinyin: shí kuài cháo sì miàn bā fāng luàn fēi。
english: Stones were flying about in every direction.

hanzi: 鸟儿在清晨高声歌唱。
pinyin: niǎo er zài qīng chén gāo shēng gē chàng。
english: Birds sing loudest in the early morning.

hanzi: 我们测量了温度的变化.
pinyin: wǒ men cè liàng le wēn dù de biàn huà.
english: We measured the difference(s) in temperature.

hanzi: 鸟儿在清晨高声歌唱。
pinyin: niǎo er zài qīng chén gāo shēng gē chàng。
english: Birds sing loudest in the early morning.

hanzi: 不要把烟灰掉在地毯上。
pinyin: bù yào bǎ yān huī diào zài dì tǎn shàng。
english: Don't drop cigarette ash on the carpet.

hanzi: 这地板需要好好清扫一下。
pinyin: zhè dì bǎn xū yào hǎo hǎo qīng sǎo yī xià。
english: This floor needs a good sweep.

hanzi: 这些座位是留给贵宾的.
pinyin: zhè xie zuò wèi shì liú jǐ guì bīn de.
english: These seats are reserved for special guests.

hanzi: 怕这怕那的人是软弱的人。
pinyin: pà zhè pà nà de rén shì ruǎn ruò de rén。
english: A fearful person is a weak person.

hanzi: 不需水的，如一冷却系统
pinyin: bù xū shuǐ de， rú yī lěng què xì tǒng
english: Not requiring water, as a cooling system.

hanzi: 所有这些完全都是多余的。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu zhè xie wán quán dōu shì duō yú de。
english: All this is totally unnecessary.

hanzi: 这所房子不适合人居住。
pinyin: zhè suǒ fáng zi bù shì hé rén jū zhù。
english: This house is unfit for human habitation.

hanzi: 我不知道他是否愿意来。
pinyin: wǒ bù zhī dào tā shì fǒu yuàn yì lái。
english: I don't know whether he is willing to come.

hanzi: 万一我忘记，请提醒我。
pinyin: wàn yī wǒ wàng jì， qǐng tí xǐng wǒ。
english: In case (=If) I forget, please remind me.

hanzi: 他被那可怕的景象吓呆了.
pinyin: tā bèi nà kě pà de jǐng xiàng xià dāi le.
english: He stood aghast at the terrible sight.

hanzi: 大麻可用来做衣服和绳子。
pinyin: dà má kě yòng lái zuò yī fu huò shéng zi。
english: Hemp can be used for cloth and ropes.

hanzi: 一条标语在黑板正上方。
pinyin: yī tiáo biāo yǔ zài hēi bǎn zhèng shàng fāng。
english: A slogan is over the blackboard.

hanzi: 我心里充满了青春的欢乐。
pinyin: wǒ xīn lǐ chōng mǎn le qīng chūn de huān lè。
english: I'm full of the joys of spring.

hanzi: 他退休前是空军中将。
pinyin: tā tuì xiū qián shì kōng jūn zhōng jiàng。
english: He was an Air Marshal before retirement.

hanzi: 你的行为说明你很自私.
pinyin: nǐ de xíng wéi shuō míng nǐ hěn zì sī.
english: This behaviour illustrates your selfishness.

hanzi: 大雨紧跟着闪电而来。
pinyin: dà yǔ jǐn gēn zhe shǎn diàn ér lái。
english: Heavy rain came on the heels of the lightening.

hanzi: 这个岛难得有船停靠.
pinyin: zhè gè dǎo nán dé yǒu chuán tíng kào.
english: The island is seldom, if ever, visited by ships.

hanzi: 我心里充满了青春的欢乐。
pinyin: wǒ xīn lǐ chōng mǎn le qīng chūn de huān lè。
english: I'm full of the joys of spring.

hanzi: 我们不得不采取预防措施。
pinyin: wǒ men bù dé bù cǎi qǔ yù fáng cuò shī。
english: We had to take preventive measures.

hanzi: 五星红旗迎风飘扬。
pinyin: wǔ xīng hóng qí yíng fēng piāo yáng。
english: The five-star red flag is fluttering in the wind.

hanzi: 她兴高采烈地为他送行。
pinyin: tā xìng gāo cài liè de wèi tā sòng xíng。
english: She sent him off in high spirits.

hanzi: 我们的起居室里铺了地毯。
pinyin: wǒ men de qǐ jū shì lǐ pù le dì tǎn。
english: Our living room is covered with a carpet.

hanzi: 吸烟对你的健康没有好处。
pinyin: xī yān duì nǐ de jiàn kāng méi yǒu hǎo chu。
english: Smoking is not good for your health.

hanzi: 他的死讯已电告其家属。
pinyin: tā de sǐ xùn yǐ diàn gào qí jiā shǔ。
english: News of his death was cabled to his family.

hanzi: 将军下令部下攻城。
pinyin: jiāng jūn xià lìng bù xià gōng chéng。
english: The general commanded his men to attack the city.

hanzi: 床单的中间部分磨薄了。
pinyin: chuáng dān de zhōng jiān bù fen mò bò le。
english: The sheets have worn thin in the middle.

hanzi: 他已整装待发要去滑雪了.
pinyin: tā yǐ zhěng zhuāng dài fà yào qù huá xuě le.
english: He was all kitted out to go skiing.

hanzi: 据说我们的祖先是猴子。
pinyin: jù shuō wǒ men de zǔ xiān shì hóu zi。
english: It is said that our progenitors are monkeys.

hanzi: 面包主要是由面粉做成的。
pinyin: miàn bāo zhǔ yào shì yóu miàn fěn zuò chéng de。
english: Bread is chiefly made of flour.

hanzi: 把植物的根插入混合肥料中.
pinyin: bǎ zhí wù de gēn chā rù hùn hé féi liào zhòng.
english: Bed the roots in the compost.

hanzi: 他的行为一直无可质疑。
pinyin: tā de xíng wéi yī zhí wú kě zhì yí。
english: His conduct has always been above suspicion.

hanzi: 他的行为表明他是可敬的。
pinyin: tā de xíng wéi biǎo míng tā shì kě jìng de。
english: His conduct speaks him honorable.

hanzi: 我已决定购买那辆自行车。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jué dìng gòu mǎi nà liàng zì xíng chē。
english: I've decided to buy that bike.

hanzi: 要找他时，他偏偏不在。
pinyin: yào zhǎo tā shí， tā piān piān bù zài。
english: He must needs go away when he was wanted.

hanzi: 她两眼露出幸福的光彩。
pinyin: tā liǎng yǎn lù chū xìng fú de guāng cǎi。
english: Her eyes were sparkling with happiness.

hanzi: 这药物引起了剧烈的反应.
pinyin: zhè yào wù yǐn qǐ le jù liè de fǎn yìng.
english: The medicine produced a violent reaction.

hanzi: 我对他的功劳评价不很高。
pinyin: wǒ duì tā de gōng láo píng jià bù hěn gāo。
english: I don't rate his merits very high.

hanzi: 他决定到我们的岛上居住。
pinyin: tā jué dìng dào wǒ men de dǎo shàng jū zhù。
english: He decided to dwell on our island.

hanzi: 这两个村子相距三英里。
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè cūn zi xiàng jù sān yīng lǐ。
english: The two villages are three miles apart.

hanzi: 我们拥护自由和正义。
pinyin: wǒ men yōng hù zì yóu huò zhèng yì。
english: We stand up for the cause of liberty and justice.

hanzi: 她咽下眼泪, 强作笑容.
pinyin: tā yè xià yǎn lèi,  qiáng zuò xiào róng.
english: She gulped back her tears and tried to smile.

hanzi: 这药物引起了剧烈的反应.
pinyin: zhè yào wù yǐn qǐ le jù liè de fǎn yìng.
english: The medicine produced a violent reaction.

hanzi: 与其给折扣，不如减价。
pinyin: yǔ qí jǐ zhé kòu， bù rú jiǎn jià。
english: Better reduce the price than allow a discount.

hanzi: 他兴高采烈地离开了屋子。
pinyin: tā xìng gāo cài liè de lí kāi le wū zi。
english: He left the house in high spirits.

hanzi: 我们只得忍受她的坏脾气。
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ dé rěn shòu tā de huài pí qì。
english: We have to put up with her bad temper.

hanzi: 他和他的大哥一样聪明。
pinyin: tā huò tā de dà gē yí yàng cōng míng。
english: He is no less clever than his elder brother.

hanzi: 所有汽车都需要定期检修.
pinyin: suǒ yǒu qì chē dōu xū yào dìng qī jiǎn xiū.
english: All cars require servicing regularly.

hanzi: 把我应付你的钱都加在一起。
pinyin: bǎ wǒ yìng fu nǐ de qián dōu jiā zài yī qǐ。
english: Add up all the money I owe you.

hanzi: 我们只得忍受她的坏脾气。
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ dé rěn shòu tā de huài pí qì。
english: We have to put up with her bad temper.

hanzi: 男孩儿们恨不得马上就出发.
pinyin: nán háir men hèn bù dé mǎ shàng jiù chū fā.
english: The boys were champing to start.

hanzi: 这个地方的电视成天开著.
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang de diàn shì chéng tiān kāi著.
english: The TV stays on all day at this place.

hanzi: 球打在墙上又反弹回来。
pinyin: qiú dǎ zài qiáng shàng yòu fǎn dàn huí lai。
english: The ball hit the wall and bounced off it.

hanzi: 她喝茶时弯起小指头。
pinyin: tā hè chá shí wān qǐ xiǎo zhǐ tou。
english: She crooked her little finger as she drank her tea.

hanzi: 大家以热烈的掌声欢迎她.
pinyin: dà jiā yǐ rè liè de zhǎng shēng huān yíng tā.
english: She was received with warm applause.

hanzi: 孩子们整整齐齐排好队。
pinyin: hái zi men zhěng zhěng qí qí pǎi hào duì。
english: The children lined up in an orderly fashion.

hanzi: 她似乎是有意地做这些事。
pinyin: tā sì hu shì yǒu yì de zuò zhè xie shì。
english: She seems to do these things on purpose.

hanzi: 他的政治观点相当极端。
pinyin: tā de zhèng zhì guān diǎn xiāng dāng jí duān。
english: His political views are rather extreme.

hanzi: 彩旗增加了节日的欢乐。
pinyin: cǎi qí zēng jiā le jié rì de huān lè。
english: Color flags added to the gaiety of the festival.

hanzi: 他失足自十英尺高处跌了下来.
pinyin: tā shī zú zì shí yīng chǐ gāo chù diē le xia lai.
english: He slipped and fell ten feet.

hanzi: 也许就是路过顺便来看看。
pinyin: yě xǔ jiù shì lù guò shùn biàn lái kàn kàn。
english: Maybe he just came by to drop in.

hanzi: 她处处表现得极为阔气.
pinyin: tā chù chù biǎo xiàn de jí wéi kuò qì.
english: She gave every appearance of being extremely rich.

hanzi: 她对我发出靠近她的暗号。
pinyin: tā duì wǒ fā chū kào jìn tā de àn hào。
english: She made a sign for me to approach her.

hanzi: 他们把领土割让给邻国。
pinyin: tā men bǎ lǐng tǔ gē ràng jǐ lín guó。
english: They ceded territory to a neighboring state.

hanzi: 他的钱是我的三倍还不止。
pinyin: tā de qián shì wǒ de sān bèi huán bù zhǐ。
english: He has more than three times my money.

hanzi: 你应该多注意一点仪表.
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi duō zhù yì yī diǎn yí biǎo.
english: You should take more pride in your appearance.

hanzi: 从一副牌中任意选出一张
pinyin: zòng yī fù pái zhòng rèn yì xuǎn chū yī zhāng
english: Chose a card at random from the deck.

hanzi: 营地有充足的食品供应。
pinyin: yíng dì yǒu chōng zú de shí pǐn gōng yìng。
english: The camp has a plentiful supply of food.

hanzi: 这些公式我并不全都记得。
pinyin: zhè xie gōng shì wǒ bìng bù quán dōu jì de。
english: I do not remember all these formula.

hanzi: 事实不容许有其它的解释。
pinyin: shì shí bù róng xǔ yǒu qí tā de jiě shì。
english: The facts permit no other explanation.

hanzi: 我们在月光下静静地坐着。
pinyin: wǒ men zài yuè guāng xià jìng jìng de zuò zhuó。
english: We sat quietly in the moonshine.

hanzi: 这女孩把线的两端结起来。
pinyin: zhè nu:3 hái bǎ xiàn de liǎng duān jié qǐ lai。
english: The girl tied the ends of the thread.

hanzi: 她给了我一张铁路网图解。
pinyin: tā jǐ le wǒ yī zhāng tiě lù wǎng tú xiè。
english: She gave me a diagram of railway network.

hanzi: 她想方设法惹我发脾气。
pinyin: tā xiǎng fāng shè fǎ rě wǒ fà pí qì。
english: She tried to needle me into losing my temper.

hanzi: 他努力追求自己的奋斗目标.
pinyin: tā nǔ lì zhuī qiú zì jǐ de fèn dòu mù biāo.
english: He pursues his aims with diligence.

hanzi: 小时是时间的一个量度单位。
pinyin: xiǎo shí shì shí jiān de yī gè liáng dù dān wèi。
english: An hour is a measure of time.

hanzi: 面包主要是由面粉做成的。
pinyin: miàn bāo zhǔ yào shì yóu miàn fěn zuò chéng de。
english: Bread is chiefly made of flour.

hanzi: 她不想伤害孩子的感情。
pinyin: tā bù xiǎng shāng hài hái zi de gǎn qíng。
english: She hesitated to hurt the child's feelings.

hanzi: 风景被发电厂破坏了。
pinyin: fēng jǐng bèi fā diàn chǎng pò huài le。
english: This landscape is disfigured by a power station.

hanzi: 重击有力而声音响亮的重击
pinyin: zhòng jī yǒu lì ér shēng yīn xiǎng liàng de zhòng jī
english: A forceful, resounding blow.

hanzi: 农民过去受地主的压迫.
pinyin: nóng mín guò qu shòu dì zhǔ de yā pò.
english: Peasants used to be subject to the local landowner.

hanzi: 他做此事是为环境所迫。
pinyin: tā zuò cǐ shì shì wèi huán jìng suǒ pò。
english: He was forced by the circumstances to do this.

hanzi: 他们决定要打破传统.
pinyin: tā men jué dìng yào dǎ pò chuán tǒng.
english: They decided to break with (ie not observe) tradition.

hanzi: 你招惹那条狗, 它会咬你的.
pinyin: nǐ zhāo rě nà tiáo gǒu,  tā kuài yǎo nǐ de.
english: If you provoke the dog, it will bite you.

hanzi: 他的失败是再明白不过了。
pinyin: tā de shī bài shì zài míng bai bù guò le。
english: His failure is as plain as plain can be.

hanzi: 月光映在平静的海面上。
pinyin: yuè guāng yìng zài píng jìng de hǎi miàn shàng。
english: The moonlight shone on the calm sea.

hanzi: 她像一个渴望玩具的小孩。
pinyin: tā xiàng yī gè kě wàng wán jù de xiǎo hái。
english: She is like a child lusting for toys.

hanzi: 现在随时都有火箭发射.
pinyin: xiàn zài suí shí dōu yǒu huǒ jiàn fā shè.
english: Space rockets are being sent up all the time.

hanzi: 发动机将水沿管道抽来。
pinyin: fā dòng jī jiàng shuǐ yàn guǎn dào chōu lái。
english: The engine draws water along the pipe.

hanzi: 给我一份打印出的统计资料.
pinyin: jǐ wǒ yī fèn dǎ yìn chū de tǒng jì zī liào.
english: Get me a printout of the statistics.

hanzi: 煤矿工人都是能吃苦耐劳的.
pinyin: méi kuàng gōng rén dōu shì néng chī kǔ nài láo de.
english: Coal-miners are a tough breed.

hanzi: 心脏是维持生命必须的器官。
pinyin: xīn zàng shì wéi chí shēng mìng bì xū de qì guān。
english: The heart is a vital organ.

hanzi: 我们把书在地板上堆起来。
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ shū zài dì bǎn shàng duī qǐ lai。
english: We put the books in piles on the floor.

hanzi: 她处处表现得极为阔气.
pinyin: tā chù chù biǎo xiàn de jí wéi kuò qì.
english: She gave every appearance of being extremely rich.

hanzi: 我们的工作好比一场战斗。
pinyin: wǒ men de gōng zuò hǎo bǐ yī chǎng zhàn dòu。
english: Our work can be compared to a battle.

hanzi: 他因玩忽职守而被开除了。
pinyin: tā yīn wàn hū zhí shǒu ér bèi kāi chú le。
english: He is dismissed for neglecting of duty.

hanzi: 四个四分之一可构成一个整体.
pinyin: sì gè sì fēn zhī yī kě gòu chéng yī gè zhěng tǐ.
english: Four quarters make a whole.

hanzi: 我时常听人说起这类事情.
pinyin: wǒ shí cháng tìng rén shuō qǐ zhè lèi shì qing.
english: I've often heard tell of such things.

hanzi: 他把一些书放在窗台上。
pinyin: tā bǎ yī xiē shū fàng zài chuāng tái shàng。
english: He keeps some books on the window ledge.

hanzi: 是她最先使用的这种药品。
pinyin: shì tā zuì xiān shǐ yòng de zhè zhǒng yào pǐn。
english: She pioneered the use of the drug.

hanzi: 他得到越多，想要的也越多。
pinyin: tā dé dào yuè duō， xiǎng yào de yě yuè duō。
english: The more he has, the more he wants.

hanzi: 警察让他出示身份证。
pinyin: jǐng chá ràng tā chū shì shēn fèn zhèng。
english: The police asked him to show his identity card.

hanzi: 这所房子应该卖个好价钱。
pinyin: zhè suǒ fáng zi yīng gāi mài gè hào jià qian。
english: This house should fetch a good price.

hanzi: 我们应该依照规定行事。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi yī zhào guī dìng xìng shì。
english: We should act in conformity with the rules.

hanzi: 他不许我单独一人走回家。
pinyin: tā bù xǔ wǒ dān dú yī rén zǒu huí jiā。
english: He wouldn't hear of my walking home alone.

hanzi: 我理论，而不是和他吵架。
pinyin: wǒ lǐ lùn， ér bú shì huò tā chǎo jià。
english: I reasoned rather than quarreled with him.

hanzi: 他的大脑看来功能正常。
pinyin: tā de dà nǎo kàn lai gōng néng zhèng cháng。
english: His brain seems to be functioning normally.

hanzi: 很难判断他到底多大岁数。
pinyin: hěn nàn pàn duàn tā dào dǐ duō dà suì shu。
english: It was difficult to tell his exact age.

hanzi: 他当初的积极性已淡下去了.
pinyin: tā dāng chū de jī jí xìng yǐ dàn xià qu le.
english: His original enthusiasm has turned sour.

hanzi: 空气压力使水通过管道.
pinyin: kōng qì yā lì shǐ shuǐ tōng guò guǎn dào.
english: Air pressure forces the water through the pipe.

hanzi: 我们曾请求法院调查。
pinyin: wǒ men zēng qǐng qiú fǎ yuàn diào chá。
english: We made an application to the court for an inquiry.

hanzi: 他喜欢自命为知识分子.
pinyin: tā xǐ huan zì mìng wèi zhī shi fèn zǐ.
english: He likes to set himself up as an intellectual.

hanzi: 上个礼拜我还看到你哥哥。
pinyin: shàng gè lǐ bài wǒ huán kàn dào nǐ gē ge。
english: I saw your brother as late as last week.

hanzi: 他追求简已有六个月之久.
pinyin: tā zhuī qiú jiǎn yǐ yǒu liù gè yuè zhī jiǔ.
english: He had been courting Jane for six months.

hanzi: 他们出动军队包围了该城.
pinyin: tā men chū dòng jūn duì bāo wéi le gāi chéng.
english: They have surrounded the town with troops.

hanzi: 我想寻找我的一个老同学。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng xún zhǎo wǒ de yī gè lǎo tóng xué。
english: I want to search out an old school friend.

hanzi: 不要做违背他心意的事。
pinyin: bù yào zuò wéi bèi tā xīn yì de shì。
english: Don't do anything that should go against his will.

hanzi: 他觉得很难说出自己的感受.
pinyin: tā jué de hěn nàn shuō chū zì jǐ de gǎn shòu.
english: He finds it hard to say what he feels.

hanzi: 我一点都不理会他们的感受.
pinyin: wǒ yī diǎn dōu bù lǐ kuài tā men de gǎn shòu.
english: I don't care a jot for their feelings.

hanzi: 他照大小顺序排列这些书。
pinyin: tā zhào dà xiǎo shùn xù pái liè zhè xie shū。
english: He ranged the books according to size.

hanzi: 沿海鱼的数量已减少了.
pinyin: yán hǎi yú de shù liàng yǐ jiǎn shǎo le.
english: The number of fish in coastal waters has decreased.

hanzi: 人们穿著古装参加游行.
pinyin: rén men chuān著 gǔ zhuāng cān jiā yóu xíng.
english: People wore historical costumes for the parade.

hanzi: 线路上有短路需要换线.
pinyin: xiàn lù shàng yǒu duǎn lù xū yào huàn xiàn.
english: The wiring is faulty and needs to be replaced.

hanzi: 有勇气做某事，有胆量做某事
pinyin: yǒu yǒng qì zuò mǒu shì， yǒu dǎn liàng zuò mǒu shì
english: Have the nerve for [to do]sth.

hanzi: 他的行为招致尖锐的批评。
pinyin: tā de xíng wéi zhāo zhì jiān ruì de pī píng。
english: His behavior called forth sharp criticism.

hanzi: 这份工作主要是行政性的。
pinyin: zhè fèn gōng zuò zhǔ yào shì xíng zhèng xìng de。
english: This job is mainly administrative.

hanzi: 他对任何打扰都感到不耐烦。
pinyin: tā duì rèn hé dǎ rǎo dōu gǎn dào bù nài fán。
english: He was impatient of any interruption.

hanzi: 我们得跑著去, 要不就太晚了.
pinyin: wǒ men de pǎo著 qù,  yào bu jiù tài wǎn le.
english: We must run, otherwise we'll be too late.

hanzi: 她不把我们的警告放在心上。
pinyin: tā bù bǎ wǒ men de jǐng gào fàng zài xīn shàng。
english: She paid no heed to our warnings.

hanzi: 排演话剧的过程很复杂.
pinyin: pǎi yǎn huà jù de guò chéng hěn fù zá.
english: The mechanics of staging a play are very complicated.

hanzi: 她用步子测量了房间的长度.
pinyin: tā yòng bù zi cè liàng le fáng jiān de cháng dù.
english: She paced out the length of the room.

hanzi: 从长远看, 物价肯定要涨.
pinyin: zòng cháng yuǎn kàn,  wù jià kěn dìng yào zhàng.
english: In the long run pricesare bound to rise.

hanzi: 天气预报是一门模糊的科学.
pinyin: tiān qì yù bào shì yī mén mó hu de kē xué.
english: Weather forecasting is an inexact science.

hanzi: 这是认识过程的一次飞跃。
pinyin: zhè shì rèn shi guò chéng de yī cì fēi yuè。
english: It is a leap in the process of cognition.

hanzi: 我不在乎你们会说我什么。
pinyin: wǒ bù zài hū nǐ men kuài shuō wǒ shén me。
english: I do not care what you will say about me.

hanzi: 光线太暗，我看书有困难。
pinyin: guāng xiàn tài àn， wǒ kàn shū yǒu kùn nan。
english: The light was too dim for me to read easily.

hanzi: 今年夏季农作物成熟得早.
pinyin: jīn nián xià jì nóng zuò wù chéng shú de zǎo.
english: The summer crops were forward this year.

hanzi: 评委会即将宣布优胜者.
pinyin: píng wěi kuài jí jiāng xuān bù yōu shèng zhě.
english: The jury is/are about to announce the winners.

hanzi: 她受委托负责这项计划.
pinyin: tā shòu wěi tuō fù zé zhè xiàng jì huà.
english: She was entrusted with the direction of the project.

hanzi: 无实质的，无价值的，无根据的
pinyin: wú shí zhì de， wú jià zhí de， wú gēn jù de
english: Lacking substance, value, or basis.

hanzi: 我们已经订阅了一份晚报。
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ jīng dìng yuè le yī fèn wǎn bào。
english: We have subscribed to an evening newspaper.

hanzi: 她歌唱得象小鸟一样快乐。
pinyin: tā gē chàng de xiàng xiǎo niǎo yí yàng kuài lè。
english: She sing as merrily as a little bird.

hanzi: 我预定了到北京的直达车票。
pinyin: wǒ yù dìng le dào Běi jīng de zhí dá jū piào。
english: I booked a ticket through to Peking.

hanzi: 她的裙子有非常精致的花边。
pinyin: tā de qún zi yǒu fēi cháng jīng zhì de huā biān。
english: Her skirt has very exquisite lace.

hanzi: 她的婚姻不能自主.
pinyin: tā de hūn yīn bù néng zì zhǔ.
english: She is not free to follow her own inclination in the matter ofmarriage.

hanzi: 网球俱乐部组织了一次舞会。
pinyin: wǎng qiú jù yuè bù zǔ zhī le yī cì wǔ huì。
english: The tennis club has organized a dance.

hanzi: 他们到酒店喝了一品脱的啤酒.
pinyin: tā men dào jiǔ diàn hè le yī pǐn tuō de pí jiǔ.
english: They stopped at the pub for a pint.

hanzi: 校园内严禁吸烟。
pinyin: xiào yuán nèi yán jìn xī yān。
english: The prohibition against smoking on school grounds is strictly enforced.

hanzi: 有两座新房子正在修建。
pinyin: yǒu liǎng zuò xīn fáng zi zhèng zài xiū jiàn。
english: There are two new houses under construction.

hanzi: 他们紧急请求国际援助。
pinyin: tā men jǐn jí qǐng qiú guó jì yuán zhù。
english: They've made an urgent request for international aid.

hanzi: 护士抽了我的血样去化验。
pinyin: hù shi chōu le wǒ de xuè yàng qù huà yàn。
english: The nurse took a sample of my blood for tests.

hanzi: 她把钱均分给两个孩子.
pinyin: tā bǎ qián jūn fēn jǐ liǎng gè hái zi.
english: She portioned out the money equally between both children.

hanzi: 这场演出正在进行实况转播.
pinyin: zhè chǎng yǎn chū zhèng zài jìn xíng shí kuàng zhuǎn bō.
english: This show is going out live.

hanzi: 这可以说是一个战术的错误。
pinyin: zhè kě yǐ shuō shì yī gè zhàn shù de cuò wù。
english: One may call it a mistake in tactics.

hanzi: 他为我们树立了一个好榜样。
pinyin: tā wèi wǒ men shù lì le yī gè hào bǎng yàng。
english: He set up a fine example to all of us.

hanzi: 昨天他清除了门前的垃圾。
pinyin: zuó tiān tā qīng chú le mén qián de垃圾。
english: He cleared away the rubbish at door yesterday.

hanzi: 恐龙已绝种几百万年了。
pinyin: kǒng lóng yǐ jué zhòng jǐ bǎi Wàn nián le。
english: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.

hanzi: 从投资的角度来考虑那件事.
pinyin: zòng tóu zī de jiǎo dù lái kǎo lu:4 nà jiàn shì.
english: Think of it in terms of an investment.

hanzi: 她把我拉到一旁，对我耳语。
pinyin: tā bǎ wǒ lā dào yī páng， duì wǒ ěr yǔ。
english: She drew me aside and whispered in my ear.

hanzi: 我们的经理对我们要求很严格。
pinyin: wǒ men de jīng lǐ duì wǒ men yāo qiú hěn yán gé。
english: Our manager is very strict with us.

hanzi: 老师对他的学生非常严格。
pinyin: lǎo shī duì tā de xué sheng fēi cháng yán gé。
english: The teacher is very strict with his students.

hanzi: 那个典礼有点像洗礼仪式.
pinyin: nèi gè diǎn lǐ yǒu diǎn xiàng xǐ lǐ yí shì.
english: The ceremony was something like a christening.

hanzi: 他不是军官而是普通士兵。
pinyin: tā bú shì jūn guān ér shì pǔ tōng shì bīng。
english: He's not an officer, but a common soldier.

hanzi: 他时常带我妹妹去剧院。
pinyin: tā shí cháng dài wǒ mèi mei qù jù yuàn。
english: He takes my sister out to the theatre now and then.

hanzi: 小猫喝了牛奶，又洗了脸。
pinyin: xiǎo māo hè le niú nǎi， yòu xǐ le liǎn。
english: The little cat drank its milk and washed its face.

hanzi: 大家的反应如何难以估计。
pinyin: dà jiā de fǎn yìng rú hé nán yǐ gū jì。
english: It was difficult to gauge how people would respond.

hanzi: 这机器一触即可停止或开动.
pinyin: zhè jī qì yī chù jí kě tíng zhǐ huò kāi dòng.
english: The machine stops and starts at a touch.

hanzi: 我无论如何也不卖那幅画.
pinyin: wǒ wú lùn rú hé yě bù mài nà fú huà.
english: I wouldn't sell that picture for all the world.

hanzi: 这台机器把麦子磨成面粉。
pinyin: zhè tái jī qì bǎ mài zi mò chéng miàn fěn。
english: This machine crushes wheat grain to make flour.

hanzi: 政府正在重新检讨形势。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ zhèng zài chóng xīn jiǎn tǎo xíng shì。
english: The government is reviewing the situation.

hanzi: 站在他旁的是一位劳动模范。
pinyin: zhàn zài tā páng de shì yī wèi láo dòng mó fàn。
english: Standing by him was a model worker.

hanzi: 那孩子正经历困难的阶段。
pinyin: nà hái zi zhèng jing lì kùn nan de jiē duàn。
english: The child is going through a difficult phase.

hanzi: 一丝笑容使她脸上平添了生气.
pinyin: yī sī xiào róng shǐ tā liǎn shàng píng tiān le shēng qì.
english: A smile animated her face.

hanzi: 这台机器把麦子磨成面粉。
pinyin: zhè tái jī qì bǎ mài zi mò chéng miàn fěn。
english: This machine crushes wheat grain to make flour.

hanzi: 她把山羊毛纺成毛线.
pinyin: tā bǎ shān yáng máo fǎng chéng máo xiàn.
english: She spins goat's hair into wool/spins wool from goat's hair.

hanzi: 你需用快刀才能把结切断.
pinyin: nǐ xū yòng kuài dāo cái néng bǎ jié qiē duàn.
english: You need a sharp knife to cut through the knot.

hanzi: 某些植物具有药物效用.
pinyin: mǒu xiē zhí wù jù yǒu yào wù xiào yòng.
english: Certain plants have medicinal (ie healing) properties.

hanzi: 一个新规则很快就要出台了。
