pinyin: fēn sàn bīng lì shì dǎo zhì shī bài de yuán yīn。
english: Dispersion of forces led up to the defeat.

hanzi: 这项宣布引起了剧烈的内乱.
pinyin: zhè xiàng xuān bù yǐn qǐ le jù liè de nèi luàn.
english: The announcement led to violent civil disorders.

hanzi: 我们给她些压力她就会讲出来。
pinyin: wǒ men jǐ tā xiē yā lì tā jiù kuài jiǎng chū lai。
english: She'll sing if we put the pressure on.

hanzi: 他们使用紫外线灯杀死害虫。
pinyin: tā men shǐ yòng zǐ wài xiàn dēng shā sǐ hài chóng。
english: They use ultraviolet lamp to kill pests.

hanzi: 他打开了门，招手让我进去。
pinyin: tā dǎ kāi le mén， zhāo shǒu ràng wǒ jìn qù。
english: He opened the door and motioned me to come in.

hanzi: 他们的厨房尽是最新式的器具.
pinyin: tā men de chú fáng jìn shì zuì xīn shì de qì jù.
english: Their kitchen is full of the latest gadgets.

hanzi: 我决不会有意伤害你的感情.
pinyin: wǒ jué bù kuài yǒu yì shāng hài nǐ de gǎn qíng.
english: I would never intentionally hurt your feelings.

hanzi: 那些儿童分成小组做游戏.
pinyin: nà xiē ér tóng fèn chéng xiǎo zǔ zuò yóu xì.
english: The children were separated into groups for the game.

hanzi: 马感觉到了危险，于是停了下来。
pinyin: mǎ gǎn jué dào le wēi xiǎn， yú shì tíng le xia lai。
english: The horse sensed danger and stopped.

hanzi: 现在选修理科的学生少了.
pinyin: xiàn zài xuǎn xiū lǐ kē de xué sheng shào le.
english: Fewer students are opting for science courses nowadays.

hanzi: 我们的样品是通过邮包寄送的。
pinyin: wǒ men de yàng pǐn shì tōng guò yóu bāo jì sòng de。
english: By parcel post our samples were sent.

hanzi: 目光远大的人便也心胸开阔。
pinyin: mù guāng yuǎn dà de rén pián yě xīn xiōng kāi kuò。
english: Those who take long views are broad-minded.

hanzi: 他跑得飞快，足以抓住那小偷。
pinyin: tā pǎo de fēi kuài， zú yǐ zhuā zhù nà xiǎo tōu。
english: He ran fast enough to catch the thief.

hanzi: 他讲的话是有意鼓动群众的.
pinyin: tā jiǎng de huà shì yǒu yì gǔ dòng qún zhòng de.
english: His speech was calculated to stir up the crowd.

hanzi: 我将对后果承担全部责任。
pinyin: wǒ jiàng duì hòu guǒ chéng dān quán bù zé rèn。
english: I'll bear full responsibility for the consequences.

hanzi: 他那副样子可谓是苦难的典型。
pinyin: tā nà fù yàng zi kě wèi shì kǔ nàn de diǎn xíng。
english: He looked the personification of misery.

hanzi: 他们编了一个找到宝石的故事.
pinyin: tā men biān le yī gè zhǎo dào bǎo shí de gù shì.
english: They pitched a yarn about finding the jewels.

hanzi: 他一块一块地装配飞机模型。
pinyin: tā yī kuài yī kuài de zhuāng pèi fēi jī mó xíng。
english: He assembled the model aircraft bit by bit.

hanzi: 液体表面渐渐地结了一层皮.
pinyin: yè tǐ biǎo miàn jiàn jiàn de jié le yī céng pí.
english: The surface of the liquid gradually crusted over.

hanzi: 他的破产和他的妻子很有关系。
pinyin: tā de pò chǎn huò tā de qī zi hěn yǒu guān xi。
english: His wife had much to do with his bankruptcy.

hanzi: 他很自私, 不想把汽车借给我.
pinyin: tā hěn zì sī,  bù xiǎng bǎ qì chē jiè jǐ wǒ.
english: He's too selfish to think of lending me his car.

hanzi: 他的个性体现在他的文章中。
pinyin: tā de gè xìng tǐ xiàn zài tā de wén zhāng zhòng。
english: His personality comes through in his writing.

hanzi: 我是表兄弟姐妹中年龄最大的。
pinyin: wǒ shì biǎo xiōng dì jiě mèi zhōng nián líng zuì dà de。
english: I am the eldest among my cousins.

hanzi: 你的拒绝让我感到十分为难。
pinyin: nǐ de jù jué ràng wǒ gǎn dào shí fēn wéi nán。
english: Your refusal puts me in an awkward predicament.

hanzi: 他的建议被认为是切实可行的。
pinyin: tā de jiàn yì bèi rèn wéi shì qiè shí kě xíng de。
english: His proposal is thought of as practical.

hanzi: 他叫秘书把文件复制一份。
pinyin: tā jiào mì shū bǎ wén jiàn fù zhì yī fèn。
english: He asked his secretary to make a copy of the document.

hanzi: 她丈夫一死她受到沉重的打击.
pinyin: tā zhàng fu yī sǐ tā shòu dào chén zhòng de dǎ jī.
english: She took a bad knock when her husband died.

hanzi: 他正在尽力弄明白他的意思。
pinyin: tā zhèng zài jìn lì nòng míng bai tā de yì si。
english: He is trying his best to understand his meaning.

hanzi: 夹叉射击按这种方式射出的炮弹
pinyin: jiá chǎ shè jī àn zhè zhǒng fāng shì shè chū de pào dàn
english: The shells fired in such a manner.

hanzi: 国王拒绝评论选举的结果。
pinyin: guó wáng jù jué píng lùn xuǎn jǔ de jié guǒ。
english: The king refuses to comment on the election results.

hanzi: 那会议自始至终十分无聊.
pinyin: nà huì yì zì shǐ zhì zhōng shí fēn wú liáo.
english: The meeting was one big yawn from start to finish.

hanzi: 他只不过是照背讲义而已.
pinyin: tā zhǐ bù guò shì zhào bèi jiǎng yì ér yǐ.
english: He's simply regurgitating stuff remembered from lectures.

hanzi: 他的批评者多，而赞美者少。
pinyin: tā de pī píng zhě duō， ér zàn měi zhě shào。
english: His critics are many and his admirers (are) few.

hanzi: 学生们每天轮流打扫教室。
pinyin: xué sheng men měi tiān lún liú dǎ sǎo jiào shì。
english: The students clean the classroom everyday in turn.

hanzi: 他抢走我手中的提包就跑了.
pinyin: tā qiǎng zǒu wǒ shǒu zhòng dì tí bāo jiù pǎo le.
english: He just grabbed the bag from my hand and ran off.

hanzi: 目光远大的人便也心胸开阔。
pinyin: mù guāng yuǎn dà de rén pián yě xīn xiōng kāi kuò。
english: Those who take long views are broad-minded.

hanzi: 艺术家巧妙地捕捉住她的笑容.
pinyin: yì shù jiā qiǎo miào de bǔ zhuō zhù tā de xiào róng.
english: The artist has caught her smile perfectly.

hanzi: 他跌倒时,头碰到箱子的一角。
pinyin: tā diē dào shí, tou pèng dào xiāng zǐ de yī jué。
english: He fell and hit his head on the corner of a box.

hanzi: 我太粗心大意, 使他很生气.
pinyin: wǒ tài cū xīn dà yì,  shǐ tā hěn shēng qì.
english: He got very annoyed with me about my carelessness.

hanzi: 我们决定把婚礼推迟到明年。
pinyin: wǒ men jué dìng bǎ hūn lǐ tuī chí dào míng nián。
english: We decided to delay our wedding until next year.

hanzi: 我等著她回来, 心里越来越不安.
pinyin: wǒ děng著 tā huí lai,  xīn lǐ yuè lái yuè bù ān.
english: I waited with growing unease for her return.

hanzi: 他并不以这方面专家自居。
pinyin: tā bìng bù yǐ zhè fāng miàn zhuān jiā zì jū。
english: He has no pretensions to being an expert on the subject.

hanzi: 她有典型的金牛座性格.
pinyin: tā yǒu diǎn xíng de jīn niú zuò xìng gé.
english: She is a typical Taurus/Taurean/has a typical Taurean personality.

hanzi: 麻醉是一项伟大的医学创新。
pinyin: má zuì shì yí xiàng wěi dà de yī xué chuàng xīn。
english: Anesthesia was a great innovation in medicine.

hanzi: 他给他们出主意怎样制止侵略。
pinyin: tā jǐ tā men chū zhǔ yi zěn yàng zhì zhǐ qīn lu:è。
english: He advised them how to stop the invasion.

hanzi: 法官劝告他改变生活方式。
pinyin: fǎ guān quàn gào tā gǎi biàn shēng huó fāng shì。
english: The judge advised him to amend his way of living.

hanzi: 我将对后果承担全部责任。
pinyin: wǒ jiàng duì hòu guǒ chéng dān quán bù zé rèn。
english: I'll bear full responsibility for the consequences.

hanzi: 他居然还活著使她感到惊异.
pinyin: tā jū rán huán huó著 shǐ tā gǎn dào jīng yì.
english: She was amazed/It amazed her that he was still alive.

hanzi: 四面八方立即伸出援助之手。
pinyin: sì miàn bā fāng lì jí shēn chū yuán zhù zhī shǒu。
english: Offers of help are coming in thick and fast.

hanzi: 医生给她注射以减轻疼痛.
pinyin: yī shēng jǐ tā zhù shè yǐ jiǎn qīng téng tòng.
english: The doctor gave her an injection to alleviate the pain.

hanzi: 其它与此相关或相似的一种瓜
pinyin: qí tā yù cǐ xiāng guān huò xiāng sì de yī zhòng guā
english: Any of several other related or similar melons.

hanzi: 那条小路就是我们这片地的界线.
pinyin: nà tiáo xiǎo lù jiù shì wǒ men zhè piàn de de jiè xiàn.
english: The lane is the boundary of our land.

hanzi: 中国着手进行大规模的改革。
pinyin: Zhōng guó zhū shǒu jìn xíng dà guī mó de gǎi gé。
english: China embark on a massive programme of reform.

hanzi: 杂货商有种类繁多的存货。
pinyin: zá huò shāng yǒu zhǒng lèi fán duō de cún huò。
english: The grocer's has plenty varieties of goods in stock.

hanzi: 打开窗户，让新鲜的空气进来。
pinyin: dǎ kāi chuāng hu， ràng xīn xiān de kōng qì jìn lái。
english: Open the window and let in some fresh air.

hanzi: 这项答复未能使他完全满意。
pinyin: zhè xiàng dá fù wèi néng shǐ tā wán quán mǎn yì。
english: The answer was not quite satisfactory to him.

hanzi: 你需要增加蛋白质以增强体质.
pinyin: nǐ xū yào zēng jiā dàn bái zhí yǐ zēng qiáng tǐ zhì.
english: You need more protein to build you up.

hanzi: 解放军队获得了大部分奖牌。
pinyin: jiě fàng jūn duì huò dé le dà bù fen jiǎng pái。
english: The army team carried off most of the medals.

hanzi: 政府发出了预防水灾的警告。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ fā chū le yù fáng shuǐ zāi de jǐng gào。
english: The government put out a warning against flood.

hanzi: 她认定自己受到了迫害.
pinyin: tā rèn dìng zì jǐ shòu dào le pò hài.
english: She persists in the belief/in believing that she is being persecuted.

hanzi: 他的火车头模型缺了一个零件.
pinyin: tā de huǒ chē tóu mó xíng quē le yī gè líng jiàn.
english: He lost one of the pieces of his model engine.

hanzi: 这一小群人发出了刺耳的喊叫。
pinyin: zhè yī xiǎo qún rén fā chū le cì ěr de hǎn jiào。
english: A ragged shout went up from the small crowd.

hanzi: 在所有四季当中，夏天最热。
pinyin: zài suǒ yǒu sì jì dāng zhōng， xià tiān zuì rè。
english: Of all the four seasons, summer is the hottest.

hanzi: 他们强迫我做违背我心意的事。
pinyin: tā men qiǎng pò wǒ zuò wéi bèi wǒ xīn yì de shì。
english: They forced me to do things against my will.

hanzi: 她在剧中扮演了一个次要的角色。
pinyin: tā zài jù zhòng bàn yǎn le yī gè cì yào de jué sè。
english: She acted as a minor role in the play.

hanzi: 欢呼声在远处逐渐消失了.
pinyin: huān hū shēng zài yuǎn chù zhú jiàn xiāo shī le.
english: The sound of the cheering faded (away) in the distance.

hanzi: 新鲜空气和运动有益于健康。
pinyin: xīn xiān kōng qì huò yùn dòng yǒu yì yú jiàn kāng。
english: Fresh air and exercise are good for the health.

hanzi: 火星是太阳系的第四颗行星。
pinyin: huǒ xīng shì tài yáng xì de dì sì kē xíng xīng。
english: Mars is the fourth planet in order from the sun.

hanzi: 听我讲课的人已大大减少了.
pinyin: tìng wǒ jiǎng kè de rén yǐ dà dà jiǎn shǎo le.
english: Attendance at my lectures has fallen off considerably.

hanzi: 他在同事中受到的评价很高。
pinyin: tā zài tóng shì zhòng shòu dào de píng jià hěn gāo。
english: He is highly estimated among his colleagues.

hanzi: 这个学期他选修了泛读课程。
pinyin: zhè gè xué qī tā xuǎn xiū le fàn dú kè chéng。
english: He selected an extensive reading course this term.

hanzi: 我认为他的一些看法并不怎么样。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi tā de yī xiē kàn fǎ bìng bù zěn me yàng。
english: I don't think much of his ideas.

hanzi: 赞成举办选美的是年轻人。
pinyin: zàn chéng jǔ bàn xuǎn měi de shì nián qīng rén。
english: It is young people who favor holding beauty pageants.

hanzi: 灯塔每一分钟发出两次信号。
pinyin: dēng tǎ měi yī fēn zhōng fā chū liǎng cì xìn hào。
english: The lighthouse flashes signals twice a minute.

hanzi: 她听到出事的消息吃了一惊。
pinyin: tā tīng dào chū shì de xiāo xi jí le yī jīng。
english: The news of the accident gave her an unpleasant jolt.

hanzi: 士兵们背起行装，继续前进。
pinyin: shì bīng men bèi qǐ xìng zhuāng， jì xù qián jìn。
english: The soldiers shouldered their kit and moved on.

hanzi: 如同地球一样，火星绕太阳转。
pinyin: rú tóng dì qiú yí yàng， huǒ xīng rào tài yáng zhuàn。
english: Like the earth, Mars go round the Sun.

hanzi: 铜比其他材料导电性能好。
pinyin: tóng bì qí tā cái liào dǎo diàn xìng néng hào。
english: Copper conducts electricity better than other materials.

hanzi: 听众全体起立向演讲者欢呼.
pinyin: tīng zhòng quán tǐ qǐ lì xiàng yǎn jiǎng zhě huān hū.
english: The audience rose bodily to cheer the speaker.

hanzi: 她把盖子轻拍了几下使它松动.
pinyin: tā bǎ gài zi qīng pāi le jǐ xià shǐ tā sōng dòng.
english: She gave the lid a few gentle taps to loosen it.

hanzi: 教师们评我的笔试试卷不及格。
pinyin: jiào shī men píng wǒ de bǐ shì shì juàn bù jí gé。
english: The teachers failed me on the written paper.

hanzi: 本市每年举行一次夏季音乐节。
pinyin: běn shì měi nián jǔ xíng yī cì xià jì yīn yuè jié。
english: This city has a music festival every summer.

hanzi: 外科医生首先切开血管。
pinyin: wài kē yī shēng shǒu xiān qiè kāi xuè guǎn。
english: First the surgeon performed the section of the blood vessel.

hanzi: 他们有三个队员防守球门.
pinyin: tā men yǒu sān gè duì yuán fáng shǒu qiú mén.
english: They had three players defending the goal (against attack).

hanzi: 那辆汽车一转弯就不见了.
pinyin: nà liàng qì chē yī zhuǎn wān jiù bù jiàn le.
english: The car turned (round) the corner and disappeared from sight.

hanzi: 我喜欢这乡村，尤其是在春天。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan zhè xiāng cūn， yóu qí shì zài chūn tiān。
english: I love the country, especially in spring.

hanzi: 这两种元素已经化学合成.
pinyin: zhè liǎng zhòng yuán sù yǐ jīng huà xué hé chéng.
english: The two elements are synthesized by a chemical process.

hanzi: 把小麦从农场运到面粉厂。
pinyin: bǎ xiǎo mài zòng nóng chǎng yùn dào miàn fěn chǎng。
english: Wheat is transported from the farms to the mills.

hanzi: 部队包围了这城市好几个月。
pinyin: bù duì bāo wéi le zhè chéng shì hǎo jǐ gè yuè。
english: The army has laid siege to the city several months.

hanzi: 司令员对地形作了仔细研究。
pinyin: sī lìng yuán duì dì xíng zuò le zǐ xì yán jiū。
english: The commander made a detailed study of the terrain.

hanzi: 这两种元素已经化学合成.
pinyin: zhè liǎng zhòng yuán sù yǐ jīng huà xué hé chéng.
english: The two elements are synthesized by a chemical process.

hanzi: 你决不要受别人意见的支配。
pinyin: nǐ jué bù yào shòu bié rén yì jiàn de zhī pèi。
english: You must not be governed by the opinions of others.

hanzi: 消防队员无法控制这场大火。
pinyin: xiāo fáng duì yuán wú fǎ kòng zhì zhè chǎng dà huǒ。
english: The firemen were unable to control the blaze.

hanzi: 咱们努力收拾这个混乱的局面吧.
pinyin: zán men nǔ lì shōu shi zhè gè hùn luàn de jú miàn ba.
english: Let's try to straighten out this confusion.

hanzi: 士兵们遭到近距离的火力射击。
pinyin: shì bīng men zāo dào jìn jù lí de huǒ lì shè jī。
english: The soldiers got fired into at close quarters.

hanzi: 没有空气或水，我们就无法生存。
pinyin: méi yǒu kōng qì huò shuǐ， wǒ men jiù wú fǎ shēng cún。
english: We can't live without air or water.

hanzi: 他的言谈中流露著自满的口气.
pinyin: tā de yán tán zhòng liú lù著 zì mǎn de kǒu qì.
english: There was a note of self-satisfaction in his speech.

hanzi: 渐渐地, 这种货币不再通用。
pinyin: jiàn jiàn de,  zhè zhǒng huò bì bù zài tōng yòng。
english: Gradually, this kind of currency fell into disuse.

hanzi: 这家饭馆的价钱对我来说贵了些.
pinyin: zhè jiā fàn guǎn de jià qian duì wǒ lái shuō guì le xiē.
english: This restaurant is a bit pricey for me.

hanzi: 把多余的杯子都重新装入箱中.
pinyin: bǎ duō yú de bēi zi dōu chóng xīn zhuāng rù xiāng zhòng.
english: Repack all the superfluous cups in the box.

hanzi: 你要把这些书按字母顺序排好.
pinyin: nǐ yào bǎ zhè xie shū àn zì mǔ shùn xù pǎi hào.
english: You must arrange these books in alphabetical order.

hanzi: 我错了，我愿为此承担责任。
pinyin: wǒ cuò le， wǒ yuàn wèi cǐ chéng dān zé rèn。
english: I made a mistake and I will assume responsibility for it.

hanzi: 那种新式样不久就失去了吸引力。
pinyin: nà zhòng xīn shì yàng bù jiǔ jiù shī qù le xī yǐn lì。
english: The new fashion soon lost its appeal.

hanzi: 当官的无疑将决定我们的未来。
pinyin: dàng guān de wú yí jiàng jué dìng wǒ men de wèi lái。
english: Officialdom will no doubt decide our future.

hanzi: 他问我身上是否带着打火机。
pinyin: tā wèn wǒ shēn shàng shì fǒu dài zhuó dǎ huǒ jī。
english: He asked me if I had a cigarette lighter with me.

hanzi: 这座建筑物不符合安全条例。
pinyin: zhè zuò jiàn zhù wù bù fú hé ān quán tiáo lì。
english: The building does not conform to safety regulations.

hanzi: 你的论点太薄弱了，说服不了我。
pinyin: nǐ de lùn diǎn tài bó ruò le， shuō fú bù liǎo wǒ。
english: Your argument is too weak to convince me.

hanzi: 卡车转弯时车上货物滑离了原位.
pinyin: kǎ chē zhuǎn wān shí jū shàng huò wù huá lí le yuán wèi.
english: The lorry turned and its load slipped.

hanzi: 我们正交谈时, 线路被切断了.
pinyin: wǒ men zhèng jiāo tán shí,  xiàn lù bèi qiē duàn le.
english: We were cut off in the middle of our conversation.

hanzi: 这理论否定了一切传统信念.
pinyin: zhè lǐ lùn fǒu dìng le yī qiè chuán tǒng xìn niàn.
english: This theory is a negation of all traditional beliefs.

hanzi: 那些云彩在山顶上空停留不散.
pinyin: nà xiē yún cai zài shān dǐng shàng kōng tíng liú bù sàn.
english: Clouds have settled over the mountain tops.

hanzi: 当军官的应懂得怎样统率士兵
pinyin: dàng jūn guān de yìng dǒng de zěn yàng tǒng shuài shì bīng
english: An officer must know how to handle his men.

hanzi: 我们已用白线画出运动场地.
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ yòng bái xiàn huà chū yùn dòng cháng de.
english: We have marked the playing area off with a white line.

hanzi: 本市每年举行一次夏季音乐节。
pinyin: běn shì měi nián jǔ xíng yī cì xià jì yīn yuè jié。
english: This city has a music festival every summer.

hanzi: 她在工作中表现出高度的技巧.
pinyin: tā zài gōng zuò zhòng biǎo xiàn chū gāo dù de jì qiǎo.
english: She shows a high degree of skill in her work.

hanzi: 保守党势必接连第三届执政.
pinyin: bǎo shǒu dǎng shì bì jiē lián dì sān jiè zhí zhèng.
english: The Tories in their third term will be unstoppable.

hanzi: 无论如何我们也只能听其自然。
pinyin: wú lùn rú hé wǒ men yě zhǐ néng tìng qí zì rán。
english: Be that as it may, I'll leave it as it is.

hanzi: 他在抬沉重的家具时扭伤了腰。
pinyin: tā zài tái chén zhòng de jiā jù shí niǔ shāng le yāo。
english: He did his back in lifting heavy furniture.

hanzi: 她转移目光不看那可怕的情景。
pinyin: tā zhuǎn yí mù guāng bù kàn nà kě pà de qíng jǐng。
english: She averted her eyes from the terrible sight.

hanzi: 管子工对管道做了仔细的检查。
pinyin: guǎn zi gōng duì guǎn dào zuò le zǐ xì de jiǎn chá。
english: The plumber made a careful check of the pipes.

hanzi: 最好是不服用药物自然入睡。
pinyin: zuì hǎo shì bù fú yòng yào wù zì rán rù shuì。
english: It is better to sleep naturally than taking medicine.

hanzi: 他出身于一个小资产阶级家庭。
pinyin: tā chū shēn yú yī gè xiǎo zī chǎn jiē jí jiā tíng。
english: He came from a petty-bourgeois family.

hanzi: 这个计画因缺乏资金而难以实现.
pinyin: zhè gè jì huà yīn quē fá zī jīn ér nán yǐ shí xiàn.
english: The project was hamstrung by lack of funds.

hanzi: 距离六英里以外的东西很难看清.
pinyin: jù lí liù yīng lǐ yǐ wài de dōng xi hěn nán kàn qīng.
english: At a distance of six miles you can't see much.

hanzi: 待在像这样的地方不合我的身份。
pinyin: dài zài xiàng zhè yàng de dì fang bù hé wǒ de shēn fèn。
english: I don't belong in the place like this.

hanzi: 她转移目光不看那可怕的情景。
pinyin: tā zhuǎn yí mù guāng bù kàn nà kě pà de qíng jǐng。
english: She averted her eyes from the terrible sight.

hanzi: 她把书放在一旁, 点了一支香烟.
pinyin: tā bǎ shū fàng zài yī páng,  diǎn le yī zhī xiāng yān.
english: She set aside her book and lit a cigarette.

hanzi: 有些人相信上帝创造了世界。
pinyin: yǒu xiē rén xiāng xìn shàng dì chuàng zào le shì jiè。
english: Some people believe that God created the world.

hanzi: 听了这话，他不由得笑了起来。
pinyin: tìng le zhè huà， tā bù yóu de xiào le qǐ lai。
english: Hearing the words, he couldn't keep from laughing.

hanzi: 这只猫毛很光滑，看来喂得很好。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ māo máo hěn guāng hua， kàn lai wèi de hěn hào。
english: The cat looked very sleek and well fed.

hanzi: 这本书包含你所需的一切资料。
pinyin: zhè běn shū bāo hán nǐ suǒ xū de yī qiè zī liào。
english: This book contains all the information you need.

hanzi: 有些人想将私有大麻合法化.
pinyin: yǒu xiē rén xiǎng jiàng sī yǒu dà má hé fǎ huà.
english: Some people want to legalize the possession of cannabis.

hanzi: 四面八方立即伸出援助之手。
pinyin: sì miàn bā fāng lì jí shēn chū yuán zhù zhī shǒu。
english: Offers of help are coming in thick and fast.

hanzi: 获胜的队扛著队长走出场地.
pinyin: huò shèng de duì káng著 duì zhǎng zǒu chū chǎng dì.
english: The winning team chaired their captain off the field.

hanzi: 这项新工作对我来说处处称心如意.
pinyin: zhè xiàng xīn gōng zuò duì wǒ lái shuō chù chù chèn xīn rú yì.
english: This new job suits me to a T.

hanzi: 如今女子再也不接受此种待遇了.
pinyin: rú jīn nu:3 zǐ zài yě bù jiē shòu cǐ zhòng dài yù le.
english: Women today no longer accept such treatment.

hanzi: 他的指控遭到一阵愤怒的反对声。
pinyin: tā de zhǐ kòng zāo dào yī zhèn fèn nù de fǎn duì shēng。
english: His charges were met with cries of anger.

hanzi: 实际成本比我们预料的高得多.
pinyin: shí jì chéng běn bì wǒ men yù liào de gāo de duō.
english: The actual cost was much higher than we had expected.

hanzi: 他的拒绝对我们是一个无情的打击。
pinyin: tā de jù jué duì wǒ men shì yī gè wú qíng de dǎ jī。
english: His refusal was a merciless blow to us.

hanzi: 他对该提议轻率的拒绝激怒了我。
pinyin: tā duì gāi tí yì qīng shuài de jù jué jī nù le wǒ。
english: His rash dismissal of the offer annoyed me.

hanzi: 只有时间才能证明你是否正确。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu shí jiān cái néng zhèng míng nǐ shì fǒu zhèng què。
english: Only time will tell if you are right.

hanzi: 角制的用动物角或类似物质制成的
pinyin: jué zhì de yòng dòng wù jué huò lèi sì wù zhì zhì chéng de
english: Made of horn or a similar substance.

hanzi: 他每次将一粒花生扔进嘴里。
pinyin: tā měi cì jiàng yī lì huā shēng rēng jìn zuǐ lǐ。
english: He tossed the peanuts into his mouth one at a time.

hanzi: 他因与母亲分离而感到不快。
pinyin: tā yīn yù mǔ qīn fēn lí ér gǎn dào bù kuài。
english: He was unhappy because of his separation from his mother.

hanzi: 推动的，原动力的引起或产生行动的
pinyin: tuī dòng de， yuán dòng lì de yǐn qǐ huò chǎn shēng xíng dòng de
english: Causing or producing motion.

hanzi: 但这并没有使他们动摇或退缩。
pinyin: dàn zhè bìng méi yǒu shǐ tā men dòng yáo huò tuì suō。
english: But this did not make them waver or retreat.

hanzi: 那位海军军官让他离开基地。
pinyin: nà wèi hǎi jūn jūn guān ràng tā lí kāi jī dì。
english: The naval officer asked him to stay away from the base.

hanzi: 精神上的缺少物质形式的或实质的
pinyin: jīng shén shàng de quē shǎo wù zhì xíng shì de huò shí zhì de
english: Lacking material form or substance.

hanzi: 客观地说，他绝无成功的可能。
pinyin: kè guān de shuō， tā jué wú chéng gōng de kě néng。
english: Objectively speaking, he can't possibly succeed.

hanzi: 我已经把数据输入到计算机中了。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng bǎ shù jù shū rù dào jì suàn jī zhòng le。
english: I have inputted the data into a computer.

hanzi: 我不爱看歌剧，喜欢听室内乐。
pinyin: wǒ bù ài kàn gē jù， xǐ huan tìng shì nèi yuè。
english: I don't like opera; chamber music is more my style.

hanzi: 不要责备他，他毕竟是个新手。
pinyin: bù yào zé bèi tā， tā bì jìng shì gè xīn shǒu。
english: Don't blame on him, after all, he is a green hand.

hanzi: 汽车以惊人的速度向桥冲过去。
pinyin: qì chē yǐ jīng rén de sù dù xiàng qiáo chòng guò qu。
english: The car rushed at the bridge at astonishing speed.

hanzi: 他们不仅没有前进，反而后退了。
pinyin: tā men bù jǐn méi yǒu qián jìn， fǎn ér hòu tuì le。
english: Instead of pressing forward, then drew back.

hanzi: 他们穿着各式各样的旧衣服。
pinyin: tā men chuān zhuó gè shì gè yàng de jiù yī fu。
english: They are wearing a motley collection of old clothes.

hanzi: 他们计划做穿越太平洋的旅行。
pinyin: tā men jì huà zuò chuān yuè tài píng yáng de lu:3 xíng。
english: They planned to voyage across the Pacific Ocean.

hanzi: 下届选举谁能获胜无法预知。
pinyin: xià jiè xuǎn jǔ shéi néng huò shèng wú fǎ yù zhī。
english: It's impossible to tell who will win the next election.

hanzi: 难怪她病了，她几乎什么都没吃。
pinyin: nán guài tā bìng le， tā jī hū shén me dōu mò jí。
english: No wonder she's ill. She eats next to nothing.

hanzi: 我的家乡在这条河的上游地区。
pinyin: wǒ de jiā xiāng zài zhè tiáo hé de shàng yóu dì qū。
english: My hometown is in the upper reaches of the river.

hanzi: 她样子寒酸, 客人不禁暗自发笑.
pinyin: tā yàng zi hán suān,  kè ren bù jīn àn zì fà xiào.
english: Her shabby appearance drew sniggers from the guests.

hanzi: 我在人群中寻找她，但看不到。
pinyin: wǒ zài rén qún zhòng xún zhǎo tā， dàn kàn bù dào。
english: I looked for her in the crowd but couldn't see her.

hanzi: 两国间贸易因战争而中断.
pinyin: liǎng guó jiàn mào yì yīn zhàn zhēng ér zhōng duàn.
english: Trade between the two countries was interrupted by the war.

hanzi: 他虽被命令不许去，但还是去了。
pinyin: tā suī bèi mìng lìng bù xǔ qù， dàn hái shì qù le。
english: He went, notwithstanding he was ordered to stay.

hanzi: 我们在危险的时候应该保持冷静。
pinyin: wǒ men zài wēi xiǎn de shí hou yīng gāi bǎo chí lěng jìng。
english: We should keep our composure in danger.

hanzi: 她轻轻地咳了一声好引起我注意。
pinyin: tā qīng qīng de ké le yī shēng hào yǐn qǐ wǒ zhù yì。
english: She gave a quiet cough to attract my attention.

hanzi: 该文件据称是一项正式声明.
pinyin: gāi wén jiàn jù chēng shì yí xiàng zhèng shì shēng míng.
english: The document purports to be an official statement.

hanzi: 你能觉察出他们之间有对立情绪.
pinyin: nǐ néng jué chá chū tā men zhī jiān yǒu duì lì qíng xù.
english: You could sense the antagonism between them.

hanzi: 我在人群中寻找她，但看不到。
pinyin: wǒ zài rén qún zhòng xún zhǎo tā， dàn kàn bù dào。
english: I looked for her in the crowd but couldn't see her.

hanzi: 你居然建议这样的事，太可笑了。
pinyin: nǐ jū rán jiàn yì zhè yàng de shì， tài kě xiào le。
english: It was absurd of you to suggest such a thing.

hanzi: 别再为我们花的每个小钱费心思了.
pinyin: biè zài wèi wǒ men huā de měi gè xiǎo qián fèi xīn si le.
english: Stop niggling about every penny we spend.

hanzi: 他最后总算把那几个特务甩掉了。
pinyin: tā zuì hòu zǒng suàn bǎ nà jǐ ge tè wu shuǎi diào le。
english: The spies were finally thrown off his track.

hanzi: 拖了那么久，他终于完成了论文。
pinyin: tuō le nà me jiǔ， tā zhōng yú wán chéng le lùn wén。
english: After much delay, he finished his paper at last.

hanzi: 我恐怕没有抓住你的论据的思路。
pinyin: wǒ kǒng pà méi yǒu zhuā zhù nǐ de lùn jù de sī lù。
english: I'm afraid I've lost the thread of your argument.

hanzi: 我的汽车电池没电了, 需要充电.
pinyin: wǒ de qì chē diàn chí mò diàn le,  xū yào chōng diàn.
english: My car battery has run down; it needs recharging.

hanzi: 我在人群中寻找她，但看不到。
pinyin: wǒ zài rén qún zhòng xún zhǎo tā， dàn kàn bù dào。
english: I looked for her in the crowd but couldn't see her.

hanzi: 上流阶层社会等级，尤指高等级
pinyin: shàng liú jiē céng shè huì děng jí， yóu zhǐ gāo děng jí
english: Social rank or caste, especially high rank.

hanzi: 这座城市位于加拿大的西北部。
pinyin: zhè zuò chéng shì wèi yú jiā ná dà de xī běi bù。
english: The city is located in the northwest part of Canada.

hanzi: 地产的发展逐渐占据了农田.
pinyin: dì chǎn de fā zhǎn zhú jiàn zhàn jù le nóng tián.
english: Increasingly, farm land is yielding to property development.

hanzi: 街道十分拥挤, 汽车无法通行.
pinyin: jiē dào shí fēn yōng jǐ,  qì chē wú fǎ tōng xíng.
english: The street was so crowded that cars were unable to pass.

hanzi: 路面结冰了，今晚要格外小心。
pinyin: lù miàn jié bīng le， jīn wǎn yào gé wài xiǎo xīn。
english: Take special care tonight because the road is icy.

hanzi: 空气是气体的混合物，不是化合物。
pinyin: kōng qì shì qì tǐ de hùn hé wù， bú shì huà hé wù。
english: Air is a mixture, not a compound of gases.

hanzi: 士兵们装备好了武器和弹药.
pinyin: shì bīng men zhuāng bèi hào le wǔ qì huò dàn yào.
english: The soldiers were well equipped with weapons and ammunition.

hanzi: 他已把各项任务分配给队员们.
pinyin: tā yǐ bǎ gè xiàng rèn wu fēn pèi jǐ duì yuán men.
english: He apportioned the members of the team their various tasks.

hanzi: 我们逐一光顾了城里所有的酒店.
pinyin: wǒ men zhú yī guāng gù le chéng lǐ suǒ yǒu de jiǔ diàn.
english: We did/went the rounds of all the pubs in town.

hanzi: 他渴望一见那些熟悉的老面孔。
pinyin: tā kě wàng yī xiàn nà xiē shú xī de lǎo miàn kǒng。
english: He yearned for a sight of the old, familiar faces.

hanzi: 政府通过了一项不得人心的决议。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ tōng guò le yí xiàng bù dé rén xīn de jué yì。
english: The government passed an unpopular decision.

hanzi: 依照你的指示我去了那个地方。
pinyin: yī zhào nǐ de zhǐ shì wǒ qù le nèi gè dì fang。
english: I went to the place in conformity with your instructions.

hanzi: 你作判断时要尽量做到不存偏见.
pinyin: nǐ zuò pàn duàn shí yào jìn liàng zuò dào bù cún piān jiàn.
english: Try not to be prejudiced in your judgements.

hanzi: 你不关心妻子儿女是说不过去的.
pinyin: nǐ bù guān xīn qī zi ér nu:3 shì shuō bù guò qù de.
english: You can't justify neglecting your wife and children.

hanzi: 科学家们正在寻找一种新元素。
pinyin: kē xué jiā men zhèng zài xún zhǎo yī zhòng xīn yuán sù。
english: The scientists are in search of a new element.

hanzi: 女王光临，我们感到不胜荣幸。
pinyin: nu:3 wáng guāng lín， wǒ men gǎn dào bù shèng róng xìng。
english: We were graced with the presence of the Queen.

hanzi: 他毕业于一所知名的外语学院。
pinyin: tā bì yè yú yī suǒ zhī míng de wài yǔ xué yuàn。
english: He graduated from a famous foreign language institute.

hanzi: 战争的持续意味着食品短缺。
pinyin: zhàn zhēng de chí xù yì wèi zhe shí pǐn duǎn quē。
english: Continuance of the war will mean shortage of the food.

hanzi: 我们太忙, 许多工作得招人承包.
pinyin: wǒ men tài máng,  xǔ duō gōng zuò de zhāo rén chéng bāo.
english: We're so busy we have to farm out a lot of work.

hanzi: 小说常被改编为舞台剧本。
pinyin: xiǎo shuō cháng bèi gǎi biān wèi wǔ tái jù běn。
english: Novels are often adapted for the stage, television and radio.

hanzi: 我们每年给三个研究生的奖学金.
pinyin: wǒ men měi nián jǐ sān gè yán jiū shēng de jiǎng xué jīn.
english: We give three research fellowships a year.

hanzi: 我们存了一些钱，以备老年之用。
pinyin: wǒ men cún le yī xiē qián， yǐ bèi lǎo nián zhī yòng。
english: We have saved some money against our old age.

hanzi: 小说常被改编为舞台剧本。
pinyin: xiǎo shuō cháng bèi gǎi biān wèi wǔ tái jù běn。
english: Novels are often adapted for the stage, television and radio.

hanzi: 就我而言，我并不反对你的计划。
pinyin: jiù wǒ ér yán， wǒ bìng bù fǎn duì nǐ de jì huà。
english: As far as I am concerned, I'm not against your plan.

hanzi: 他细看天水相连的地方, 寻找陆地.
pinyin: tā xì kàn Tiān shuǐ xiāng lián de dì fang,  xún zhǎo lù dì.
english: He scanned the horizon, looking for land.

hanzi: 用电量最大的时候是在黄昏时.
pinyin: yòng diàn liàng zuì dà de shí hou shì zài huáng hūn shí.
english: Demand for electricity peaks in the early evening.

hanzi: 警方开始调查事故的原因。
pinyin: jǐng fāng kāi shǐ diào chá shì gù de yuán yīn。
english: The police instituted an inquiry into the cause of the accident.

hanzi: 修筑一条铁路要花费许多劳动力。
pinyin: xiū zhù yī tiáo tiě lù yào huā fèi xǔ duō láo dòng lì。
english: It takes a lot of labor to build a railway.

hanzi: 不要这么赶，否则你可能会出事故。
pinyin: bù yào zhè me gǎn， fǒu zé nǐ kě néng kuài chū shì gù。
english: Do not rush or you may have an accident.

hanzi: 他是远征军的司令/探险队的队长。
pinyin: tā shì yuǎn zhēng jūn de sī lìng/ tàn xiǎn duì de duì zhǎng。
english: He is the commander of the expedition.

pinyin: tā dé dào tí shēng， dān fù le gèng dà de zé rèn。
english: She took on greater responsibilities when she was promoted.

hanzi: 那群少年正合着摇摆音乐的节拍跳舞。
pinyin: nà qún shào nián zhèng hé zhuó yáo bǎi yīn yuè de jié pāi tiào wǔ。
english: The teenagers were rocking about.

hanzi: 为独立而斗争的势头日益增长。
pinyin: wèi dú lì ér dòu zhēng de shì tóu rì yì zēng zhǎng。
english: The struggle for independence is gaining momentum every day.

hanzi: 那幅画和当时的景象完全一致。
pinyin: nà fú huà huò dāng shí de jǐng xiàng wán quán yī zhì。
english: The drawing is on all fours with the scene at that moment.

hanzi: 他正在这样干时被一位民兵撞见了。
pinyin: tā zhèng zài zhè yàng gàn shí bèi yī wèi mín bīng zhuàng jiàn le。
english: A militiaman surprised him in the act.

hanzi: 肥皂粉别用得太多, 这儿的水很软.
pinyin: féi zào fěn biè yòng de tài duō,  zhèr de shuǐ hěn ruǎn.
english: Don't use much soap powder the water here is very soft.

hanzi: 这种汽车可以在自身长度范围内掉头.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng qì chē kě yǐ zài zì shēn cháng dù fàn wéi nèi diào tóu.
english: This car will turn in its own length.

hanzi: 他已有十三年未在电影中露面了。
pinyin: tā yǐ yǒu shí sān nián wèi zài diàn yǐng zhòng lòu miàn le。
english: He hadn't appeared in a film for thirteen years.

hanzi: 第二次世界大战使原子弹产生。
pinyin: dì èr cì shì jiè dà zhàn shǐ yuán zǐ dàn chǎn shēng。
english: The Second World War brought the atomic bomb into being.

hanzi: 近来对古典音乐的兴趣又浓厚起来。
pinyin: jìn lái duì gǔ diǎn yīn yuè de xìng qu yòu nóng hòu qǐ lai。
english: Interest in classic music has revived recently.

hanzi: 这两种计算机价格没多大差别.
pinyin: zhè liǎng zhòng jì suàn jī jià gé mò duō dà chā bié.
english: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.

hanzi: 这些小学生是由两位老师带领的.
pinyin: zhè xie xiǎo xué shēng shì yóu liǎng wèi lǎo shī dài lǐng de.
english: The children were shepherded around by two teachers.

hanzi: 我们在有人引导下参观了大教堂.
pinyin: wǒ men zài yǒu rén yǐn dǎo xià cān guān le dà jiào táng.
english: We were given a conducted (ie guided) tour of the cathedral.

hanzi: 他习惯于发号施令，而不是恳求他人。
pinyin: tā xí guàn yú fà hào shī lìng， ér bú shì kěn qiú tā rén。
english: He was accustomed to command, not to entreat.

hanzi: 那个印第安人是临近部落的成员。
pinyin: nèi gè yìn dì ān rén shì lín jìn bù luò de chéng yuán。
english: That Indian man is a member of the neighbouring tribe.

hanzi: 这辆拖拉机因使用不经心而损坏了。
pinyin: zhè liàng tuō lā jī yīn shǐ yòng bù jīng xīn ér sǔn huài le。
english: The tractor had been damaged by rough usage.

hanzi: 我痛苦地看着这个破得粉碎的花瓶。
pinyin: wǒ tòng kǔ de kàn zhuó zhè gè pò de fěn suì de huā píng。
english: I looked painfully at the vase broken into pieces.

hanzi: 孩子们眼巴巴地等候话剧开始。
pinyin: hái zi men yǎn bā bā de děng hòu huà jù kāi shǐ。
english: With expectant faces, children are waiting for the drama to start.

hanzi: 喷气式飞机正要起飞时出了事故。
pinyin: pèn qì shì fēi jī zhèng yào qǐ fēi shí chū le shì gù。
english: The accident happened as the jet was about to take off.

hanzi: 这次飞行由于技术的原因而被推迟。
pinyin: zhè cì fēi xíng yóu yú jì shù de yuán yīn ér bèi tuī chí。
english: The flight was delayed owing to technical reasons.

hanzi: 他逃到巴西，企图逃避恢恢法网。
pinyin: tā táo dào Bā xī， qǐ tú táo bì huī huī fǎ wǎng。
english: He fled to Brazil trying to escape the long arm of the law.

hanzi: 喜讯传来，人们顿时欢呼起来。
pinyin: xǐ xùn zhuàn lái， rén men dùn shí huān hū qǐ lai。
english: People broke into cheers at once when they heard the good news.

hanzi: 他闪到一旁让那些等候的人过去。
pinyin: tā shǎn dào yī páng ràng nà xiē děng hòu de rén guò qu。
english: He turned aside and let those who were waiting pass by.

hanzi: 拥有世界冠军是我们每个公民的骄傲。
pinyin: yōng yǒu shì jiè guàn jūn shì wǒ men měi gè gōng mín de jiāo ào。
english: It's a civic pride to have a champion.

hanzi: 最近有关离婚的电视剧太多了。
pinyin: zuì jìn yǒu guān lí hūn de diàn shì jù tài duō le。
english: There has been a surfeit of plays about divorce on the TV recently.

hanzi: 我们通过无线电同那只船保持联系。
pinyin: wǒ men tōng guò wú xiàn diàn tóng nà zhǐ chuán bǎo chí lián xì。
english: We made contact with the ship by radio.

hanzi: 他们的研究项目实用价值很有限。
pinyin: tā men de yán jiū xiàng mù shí yòng jià zhí hěn yǒu xiàn。
english: Their research project has limited practical utility.

hanzi: 英国硬币的正面有女王的头像.
pinyin: Yīng guó yìng bì de zhèng miàn yǒu nu:3 wáng de tou xiàng.
english: The head of the Queen appears on the obverse of British coins.

hanzi: 印度向许多国家出口茶叶和棉花.
pinyin: Yìn dù xiàng xǔ duō guó jiā chū kǒu chá yè huò mián hua.
english: India exports tea and cotton to many different countries.

hanzi: 这个快乐的孩子以轻快活泼的步子走着。
pinyin: zhè gè kuài lè de hái zi yǐ qīng kuài huó po de bù zi zǒu zhuó。
english: The happy boy walked with jaunty steps.

hanzi: 我刚好及时到会，才算没受责备。
pinyin: wǒ gāng hǎo jí shí dào kuài， cái suàn mò shòu zé bèi。
english: I saved my bacon by arriving just in time for the meeting.

hanzi: 这个条约将成为持久和平的开端。
pinyin: zhè gè tiáo yuē jiàng chéng wéi chí jiǔ hé píng de kāi duān。
english: The treaty will be the threshold of lasting peace.

hanzi: 我从来不赞同政治上的极端主义.
pinyin: wǒ cóng lái bù zàn tóng zhèng zhì shàng de jí duān zhǔ yì.
english: I have never associated myself with political extremism.

hanzi: 她最喜爱的运动是滑雪, 其次是冰球.
pinyin: tā zuì xǐ ài de yùn dòng shì huá xuě,  qí cì shì bīng qiú.
english: Next to skiing her favourite sport was ice-hockey.

hanzi: 贵宾们在大餐厅参加一个宴会。
pinyin: guì bīn men zài dà cān tīng cān jiā yī gè yàn huì。
english: The guests partook of a luxurious repast in the banqueting hall.

hanzi: 我留下了张条子以便与她取得联系。
pinyin: wǒ liú xià le zhāng tiáo zi yǐ biàn yù tā qǔ dé lián xì。
english: I left a message so as to be sure of contacting her.

hanzi: 假如我有选择的余地, 我三十岁就退休.
pinyin: jiǎ rú wǒ yǒu xuǎn zé de yú de,  wǒ sān shí suì jiù tuì xiū.
english: If I had the choice, I would retire at thirty.

hanzi: 只有一个人能做这项工作，那就是你。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu yī gè rén néng zuò zhè xiàng gōng zuò， nà jiù shì nǐ。
english: Only one person can do the job, namely you.

hanzi: 她赞扬的话鼓舞人们工作更努力。
pinyin: tā zàn yáng de huà gǔ wǔ rén men gōng zuò gèng nǔ lì。
english: Her words of praise were a stimulus for people to work harder.

hanzi: 这就是兴趣与技能是有区别的。
pinyin: zhè jiù shì xìng qu yù jì néng shì yǒu qū bié de。
english: The point is there is a difference between an interest and a skill.

hanzi: 船只本身需要海军和空军的保护。
pinyin: chuán zhī běn shēn xū yào hǎi jūn huò kōng jūn de bǎo hù。
english: The ships required the protection of naval and air power.

hanzi: 医生无法解释高烧何以持久不退。
pinyin: yī shēng wú fǎ jiě shì gāo shāo hé yǐ chí jiǔ bù tuì。
english: The doctor couldn't explain the persistence of the fever.

hanzi: 词典中的词是按字母顺序排列的.
pinyin: cí diǎn zhòng dì cí shì àn zì mǔ shùn xù pái liè de.
english: The words in the dictionary are arranged in alphabetical order.

hanzi: 他终于摆脱了这么一项乏味的工作。
pinyin: tā zhōng yú bǎi tuō le zhè me yí xiàng fá wèi de gōng zuò。
english: He was able to cast off such an uninteresting task.

hanzi: 已经证实，记忆存在于某些金属中。
pinyin: yǐ jīng zhèng shí， jì yì cún zài yú mǒu xiē jīn shǔ zhòng。
english: Memory has been shown to reside in some metals.

hanzi: 这孩子看上去脸色不好，一副有病的样子。
pinyin: zhè hái zi kàn shàng qù liǎn sè bù hǎo， yī fù yǒu bìng de yàng zi。
english: The child looked pale and wan.

hanzi: 该公司已被美国一企业集团接管。
pinyin: gāi gōng sī yǐ bèi Měi guó yī qǐ yè jí tuán jiē guǎn。
english: The firm has been taken over by an American conglomerate.

hanzi: 按照规定，任何时候均需有人值班。
pinyin: àn zhào guī dìng， rèn hé shí hou jūn xū yǒu rén zhí bān。
english: The rule is that someone must be on duty at all times.

hanzi: 该学院采用新的外语教学法。
pinyin: gāi xué yuàn cǎi yòng xīn de wài yǔ jiào xué fǎ。
english: New methods of teaching foreign languages are adopted in this institute.

hanzi: 建造这座建筑物花了好几个月时间。
pinyin: jiàn zào zhè zuò jiàn zhù wù huā le hǎo jǐ gè yuè shí jiān。
english: The erection of the building took several months.

hanzi: 我经常接到我们部队战友们的来信。
pinyin: wǒ jīng cháng jiē dào wǒ men bù duì zhàn yǒu men de lái xìn。
english: I often hear from my comrades-in-arms in the army.

hanzi: 资源管理是一项重要的经营技能。
pinyin: zī yuán guǎn lǐ shì yí xiàng zhòng yào de jīng yíng jì néng。
english: Resources management is an important business skill.

hanzi: 他们使河流改道以便向城市供水。
pinyin: tā men shǐ hé liú gǎi dào yǐ biàn xiàng chéng shì gōng shuǐ。
english: They diverted the river to supply water to the town.

hanzi: 预测电子工业的前途一片大好.
pinyin: yù cè diàn zǐ gōng yè de qián tú yī piàn dà hào.
english: The prognosis for the future of the electronics industry is encouraging.

hanzi: 书和我的关系正如同水和植物的关系。
pinyin: shū huò wǒ de guān xi zhèng rú tóng shuǐ huò zhí wù de guān xi。
english: As water is to the plant, so are books to me.

hanzi: 展现在我们面前的是一片广阔的土地。
pinyin: zhǎn xiàn zài wǒ men miàn qián de shì yī piàn guǎng kuò de tǔ dì。
english: A wide stretch of land spread in front of us.

hanzi: 别浪费时间了我们还有正经事要做。
pinyin: biè làng fèi shí jiān le wǒ men hái yǒu zhèng jing shì yào zuò。
english: Stop footling about, we have serious work to do.

hanzi: 那两个公司已合作研制新型赛车.
pinyin: nà liǎng gè gōng sī yǐ hé zuò yán zhì xīn xíng sài chē.
english: The two companies have teamed up to develop a new racing car.

hanzi: 实行国家控制是根本违背美国观念的.
pinyin: shí xíng guó jiā kòng zhì shì gēn běn wéi bèi Měi guó guān niàn de.
english: Statecontrol is a very un-American notion.

hanzi: 变质从一种物质向另一种物质的转化
pinyin: biàn zhì zòng yī zhòng wù zhì xiàng lìng yī zhòng wù zhì de zhuǎn huà
english: Conversion of one substance into another.

hanzi: 凡是定长远的计画都难免出偏差.
pinyin: fán shì dìng cháng yuǎn de jì huà dōu nán miǎn chū piān chā.
english: Long-term planning is always rather a hit-or-miss affair.

hanzi: 他觉得这所学校对戏剧不够重视.
pinyin: tā jué de zhè suǒ xué xiào duì xì jù bù gòu zhòng shì.
english: He feels that there is not enough stress on drama at the school.

hanzi: 这一章包含著作者论证的主要部分.
pinyin: zhè yī zhāng bāo hán著 zuó zhě lùn zhèng de zhǔ yào bù fen.
english: This chapter contains the meat of the writer's argument.

hanzi: 我极力控制住自己没对他喊叫起来。
pinyin: wǒ jí lì kòng zhì zhù zì jǐ mò duì tā hǎn jiào qǐ lai。
english: I only just managed to stop myself from shouting at him.

hanzi: 她接受多项委托, 设计公共建筑.
pinyin: tā jiē shòu duō xiàng wěi tuō,  shè jì gōng gòng jiàn zhù.
english: She has received many commissions to design public buildings.

hanzi: 他们试图预测这场足球比赛的结果。
pinyin: tā men shì tú yù cè zhè chǎng zú qiú bǐ sài de jié guǒ。
english: They tried to forecast the result of the football match.

hanzi: 语文教学既是一门科学又是一种艺术。
pinyin: yǔ wén jiào xué jì shì yī mén kē xué yòu shì yī zhòng yì shù。
english: Language teaching is both a science and art.

hanzi: 我一点头, 就是暗示你把会议中断.
pinyin: wǒ yī diǎn tou,  jiù shì àn shì nǐ bǎ huì yì zhōng duàn.
english: When I nod my head, that's your cue to interrupt the meeting.

hanzi: 他重复了几遍直到记住为止.
pinyin: tā chóng fù le jǐ biàn zhí dào jì zhu wéi zhǐ.
english: He repeated it several times over (ie again and again) until he could remember it.

hanzi: 他只听到他们交谈中无足轻重的部分.
pinyin: tā zhǐ tīng dào tā men jiāo tán zhòng wú zú qīng zhòng de bù fen.
english: He only heard the fag-end of their conversation.

hanzi: 理奇比你占优势, 因为他会讲德语。
pinyin: lǐ qí bì nǐ zhàn yōu shì,  yīn wèi tā kuài jiǎng dé yǔ。
english: Rich has an advantage over you since he can speak German.

hanzi: 孩子们不断吵架，破坏了我们的假期。
pinyin: hái zi men bù duàn chǎo jià， pò huài le wǒ men de jià qī。
english: The children kept quarreling and spoiled our holiday.

hanzi: 人民群众普遍反对突然实行的变革.
pinyin: rén mín qún zhòng pǔ biàn fǎn duì tū rán shí xíng de biàn gé.
english: The populace at large is/are opposed to sudden change.

hanzi: 我们发现可折叠的桌子使用非常方便。
pinyin: wǒ men fā xiàn kě zhé dié de zhuō zi shǐ yòng fēi cháng fāng biàn。
english: We find our folding table a great convenience.

hanzi: 这些勇敢的士兵会保卫我们的国家的。
pinyin: zhè xie yǒng gǎn de shì bīng kuài bǎo wèi wǒ men de guó jiā de。
english: These gallant soldiers will protect our country.

hanzi: 我决不就这一问题与他通信.
pinyin: wǒ jué bù jiù zhè yī wèn tí yù tā tōng xìn.
english: I refused to enter into any correspondence (ie exchange letters) with him about it.

hanzi: 所有飞机均须先加油方能作长途飞行.
pinyin: suǒ yǒu fēi jī jūn xū xiān jiā yóu fāng néng zuò cháng tú fēi xíng.
english: All aircraft must fuel before a long flight.

hanzi: 她不知道以后等待她的将是什么命运。
pinyin: tā bù zhī dào yǐ hòu děng dài tā de jiàng shì shén me mìng yùn。
english: She wondered what fate had in store for her next.

hanzi: 我们穿过田野时，惊动了一只野兔。
pinyin: wǒ men chuān guò tián yě shí， jīng dòng le yī zhǐ yě tù。
english: As we were walking across the fields, we started a hare.

hanzi: 她想要打破世界纪录，已接近成功。
pinyin: tā xiǎng yào dǎ pò shì jiè jì lù， yǐ jiē jìn chéng gōng。
english: Her attempt to break the world record nearly came off.

hanzi: 这次危难是对他的勇气和技能的考验。
pinyin: zhè cì wēi nàn shì duì tā de yǒng qì huò jì néng de kǎo yàn。
english: The crisis put his courage and skill to the test.

hanzi: 他用欺骗手段说服她在文件上签字。
pinyin: tā yòng qī piàn shǒu duàn shuō fú tā zài wén jiàn shàng qiān zì。
english: He persuaded her to sign the document by guile.

hanzi: 不要责骂这孩子, 他过了那一阵就会好的.
pinyin: bù yào zé mà zhè hái zi,  tā guò le nà yī zhèn jiù kuài hǎo de.
english: Don't scold the boy; he'll come round in time.

hanzi: 专家们对该计划的可行性意见不一。
pinyin: zhuān jiā men duì gāi jì huà de kě xíng xìng yì jiàn bù yī。
english: Experts were divided on the feasibility of the project.

hanzi: 把学生的兴趣尽力引导到理科方面.
pinyin: bǎ xué sheng de xìng qu jìn lì yǐn dǎo dào lǐ kē fāng miàn.
english: Try to orientate your students towards the science subjects.

hanzi: 她被选定在这部影片中扮演女主角。
pinyin: tā bèi xuǎn dìng zài zhè bù yǐng piàn zhòng bàn yǎn nu:3 zhǔ jué。
english: She was chosen to play the heroine in this film.

hanzi: 游击队在那个省开辟了一条新战线。
pinyin: yóu jī duì zài nèi gè xǐng kāi pì le yī tiáo xīn zhàn xiàn。
english: The guerrillas opened up a new front in that province.

hanzi: 沉重的脚步声显示教师已经走近了。
pinyin: chén zhòng de jiǎo bù shēng xiǎn shì jiào shī yǐ jīng zǒu jìn le。
english: Heavy footsteps signalled the teacher's approach.

hanzi: 我的新秘书很好，确实是难得的人才。
pinyin: wǒ de xīn mì shū hěn hǎo， què shí shì nán dé de rén cái。
english: My new secretary is very good; quite a find, in fact.

hanzi: 这一行业的工作环境已有很大改善.
pinyin: zhè yī xíng yè de gōng zuò huán jìng yǐ yǒu hěn dà gǎi shàn.
english: Working conditions in the industry have improved greatly.

hanzi: 几个行人在结冰的人行道上滑倒了.
pinyin: jǐ ge xíng rén zài jié bīng de rén xìng dào shàng huā dǎo le.
english: Several pedestrians had come to grief on the icy pavement.

hanzi: 他收集的邮票是我的三倍还不止。
pinyin: tā shōu jí de yóu piào shì wǒ de sān bèi huán bù zhǐ。
english: He has collected more than three times as many stamps as I (have).

hanzi: 这个小岛包含著小而完整的自然界.
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo dǎo bāo hán著 xiǎo ér wán zhěng de zì rán jiè.
english: This small island contains the whole of nature in microcosm.

hanzi: 政府设法干扰游击队的无线电通讯.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ shè fǎ gān rǎo yóu jī duì de wú xiàn diàn tōng xùn.
english: The government tried to jam the guerrillas' transmissions.

hanzi: 楼上的房间要比底层的暖和得多。
pinyin: lóu shàng de fáng jiān yào bì dǐ céng de nuǎn huó de duō。
english: The upstairs rooms are much warmer than those on the ground floor.

hanzi: 损害程度比当初预想的要严重得多。
pinyin: sǔn hài chéng dù bì dāng chū yù xiǎng de yào yán zhòng de duō。
english: Damage is much greater than was at first anticipated.

hanzi: 我们需要几个男子作心理学实验对象.
pinyin: wǒ men xū yào jǐ ge nán zǐ zuò xīn lǐ xué shí yàn duì xiàng.
english: We need some male subjects for a psychology experiment.

hanzi: 医生无法解释高烧何以持久不退.
pinyin: yī shēng wú fǎ jiě shì gāo shāo hé yǐ chí jiǔ bù tuì.
english: The doctor couldn't explain the persistence of the high temperature.

hanzi: 他收集的邮票是我的三倍还不止。
pinyin: tā shōu jí de yóu piào shì wǒ de sān bèi huán bù zhǐ。
english: He has collected more than three times as many stamps as I (have).

hanzi: 这俱乐部被知识分子小集团把持著.
pinyin: zhè jù yuè bù bèi zhī shi fèn zǐ xiǎo jí tuán bǎ chí著.
english: The club is dominated by a small clique of intellectuals.

hanzi: 你很快就会对这些程序完全熟悉了.
pinyin: nǐ hěn kuài jiù kuài duì zhè xie chéng xù wán quán shú xī le.
english: You will soon become fully acquainted with the procedures.

hanzi: 这兄弟俩决定去美国碰碰运气。
pinyin: zhè xiōng dì liǎng jué dìng qù Měi guó pèng pèng yùn qi。
english: These two brothers decided to go to America to try their fortunes.

hanzi: 每个零件在装配前都经过仔细检查.
pinyin: měi gè líng jiàn zài zhuāng pèi qián dōu jīng guò zǐ xì jiǎn chá.
english: Each component is carefully checked before assembly.

hanzi: 这家饭馆常有政治家和记者光顾.
pinyin: zhè jiā fàn guǎn cháng yǒu zhèng zhì jiā huò jì zhě guāng gù.
english: The restaurant is patronized by politicians and journalists.

hanzi: 中部地区一个国家或地区的中部或内陆
pinyin: zhōng bù dì qū yī gè guó jiā huò dì qū de zhōng bù huò nèi lù
english: The middle or interior part of a country or region.

hanzi: 我们应充分利用丰富的人力资源。
pinyin: wǒ men yìng chōng fèn lì yòng fēng fù de rén lì zī yuán。
english: We shall take full advantage of our rich source of human beings.

hanzi: 她的活泼与兴高采烈的情绪把他迷住了.
pinyin: tā de huó po yù xìng gāo cài liè de qíng xù bǎ tā mí zhù le.
english: He was charmed by her vivacity and high spirits.

hanzi: 他是个敢于思考的人，富有创新观点。
pinyin: tā shì gè gǎn yú sī kǎo de rén， fù yǒu chuàng xīn guān diǎn。
english: He is a bold thinker, with lots of original ideas.

hanzi: 解放后，他被任命为这个厂的厂长。
pinyin: jiě fàng hòu， tā bèi rèn mìng wèi zhè gè chǎng de chǎng zhǎng。
english: He was named director of the plant after liberation.

hanzi: 我不能忍受现代生活的压力和紧张。
pinyin: wǒ bù néng rěn shòu xiàn dài shēng huó de yā lì huò jǐn zhāng。
english: I can't bear the stresses and strains of modern life.

hanzi: 那位穿军装的人恐怕就是团长了。
pinyin: nà wèi chuān jūn zhuāng de rén kǒng pà jiù shì tuán zhǎng le。
english: The man in the army uniform will be the regiment commander.

hanzi: 我们复制了计算机磁盘以防意外。
pinyin: wǒ men fù zhì le jì suàn jī cí pán yǐ fáng yì wài。
english: We make copies of our computer disks as a safeguard against accidents.

hanzi: 我的小狗一听到打雷就藏到床底下。
pinyin: wǒ de xiǎo gǒu yī tīng dào dǎ léi jiù zàng dào chuáng dǐ xia。
english: My little dog always hides under the bed when it thunders.

hanzi: 这个人显示出对戏剧界的守旧态度。
pinyin: zhè gè rén xiǎn shì chū duì xì jù jiè de shǒu jiù tài du。
english: The man displayed provincial attitudes towards the theatre.

hanzi: 本身行为不正, 则不宜批评别人.
pinyin: běn shēn xíng wéi bù zhèng,  zé bù yí pī píng bié rén.
english: You can ill afford to criticize others when you behave so badly yourself.

hanzi: 这是某党派选举前的政治广播节目。
pinyin: zhè shì mǒu dǎng pài xuǎn jǔ qián de zhèng zhì guǎng bō jié mù。
english: Here is a political party broadcast before an election.

hanzi: 这部电影已在电影院及电视上放映.
pinyin: zhè bù diàn yǐng yǐ zài diàn yǐng yuàn jí diàn shì shàng fàng yìng.
english: The film has been screened in the cinema and on TV.

hanzi: 他是个敢于思考的人，富有创新观点。
pinyin: tā shì gè gǎn yú sī kǎo de rén， fù yǒu chuàng xīn guān diǎn。
english: He is a bold thinker, with lots of original ideas.

hanzi: 父亲是烈士的那个女孩学习非常刻苦。
pinyin: fù qīn shì liè shì de nèi gè nu:3 hái xué xí fēi cháng kè kǔ。
english: That girl whose father is martyr studies very hard.

hanzi: 我母亲和我一起向你表示美好的祝愿.
pinyin: wǒ mǔ qīn huò wǒ yī qǐ xiàng nǐ biǎo shì měi hǎo de zhù yuàn.
english: Mother joins (with) me in sending you our best wishes.

hanzi: 改革教育制度将是一个艰难的过程.
pinyin: gǎi gé jiào yù zhì dù jiàng shì yī gè jiān nán de guò chéng.
english: Reforming the education system will be a difficult process.

hanzi: 伞衣降落伞打开以获得空气浮力的部分
pinyin: sǎn yì jiàng luò sǎn dǎ kāi yǐ huò dé kōng qì fú lì de bù fen
english: The part of a parachute that opens up to catch the air.

hanzi: 乘客只可以在公共汽车的上层吸烟。
pinyin: chéng kè zhǐ kě yǐ zài gōng gòng qì chē de shàng céng xī yān。
english: Passengers may smoke only on the upper deck of the bus.

hanzi: 预算中的最大一项照例是国防费用.
pinyin: yù suàn zhòng dì zuì dà yí xiàng zhào lì shì guó fáng fèi yòng.
english: As usual, the lion's share of the budget is for defence.

hanzi: 我们拍战斗场面需要上百的临时演员.
pinyin: wǒ men pāi zhàn dòu chǎng miàn xū yào shàng bǎi de lín shí yǎn yuán.
english: We need hundreds of extras for the battle scenes.

hanzi: 厨师们在大队人马之前到了野地营地。
pinyin: chú shī men zài dà duì rén mǎ zhī qián dào le yě de yíng dì。
english: The cooks arrive on camp in advance of the main party.

hanzi: 我忍不住常哼那支难听的果冻广告歌。
pinyin: wǒ rěn bú zhù cháng hng nà zhī nàn tìng de guǒ dòng guǎng gào gē。
english: I can't stop humming that awful jelly jingle.

hanzi: 我承认这事的责任完全由我承担.
pinyin: wǒ chéng rèn zhè shì de zé rèn wán quán yóu wǒ chéng dān.
english: I accept that the responsibility for this lies squarely at my door.

hanzi: 公车是如此拥挤，我被挤得动弹不得。
pinyin: gōng jū shì rú cǐ yōng jǐ， wǒ bèi jǐ de dòng dàn bù dé。
english: The bus is so full that I am jammed in and can not move.

hanzi: 我带你出去用餐, 花费多少都无所谓.
pinyin: wǒ dài nǐ chū qù yòng cān,  huā fèi duō shao dōu wú suǒ wèi.
english: I'm going to take you out to dinner, no expense spared.

hanzi: 预算中的最大一项照例是国防费用.
pinyin: yù suàn zhòng dì zuì dà yí xiàng zhào lì shì guó fáng fèi yòng.
english: As usual, the lion's share of the budget is for defence.

hanzi: 乘客们拥挤在火车站上等候乘车。
pinyin: chéng kè men yōng jǐ zài huǒ chē zhàn shàng děng hòu chéng chē。
english: Passengers thronged the station waiting for their trains.

hanzi: 我觉得我没有勇气告诉他这个坏消息。
pinyin: wǒ jué de wǒ méi yǒu yǒng qì gào su tā zhè gè huài xiāo xi。
english: I don't think I have the courage to tell him the bad news.

hanzi: 录音磁带的复制质量有了很大改进。
pinyin: lù yīn cí dài de fù zhì zhì liàng yǒu le hěn dà gǎi jìn。
english: The reproductive quality of audio tapes has improved enormously.

hanzi: 这两个敌对的党派之间没有共同点.
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè dí duì de dǎng pài zhī jiān méi yǒu gòng tóng diǎn.
english: The two rival parties have no common ground between them.

hanzi: 他们对办理的每项业务收取一定的费用。
pinyin: tā men duì bàn lǐ de měi xiàng yè wù shōu qǔ yī dìng de fèi yòng。
english: They charge a fixed rate for each transaction.

hanzi: 父亲答应让他的儿子单独出国旅行。
pinyin: fù qīn dā ying ràng tā de ér zi dān dú chū guó lu:3 xíng。
english: The father allowed (=permitted) his son to travel abroad alone.

hanzi: 他的政治观点在两个极端之间摇摆不定.
pinyin: tā de zhèng zhì guān diǎn zài liǎng gè jí duān zhī jiān yáo bǎi bù dìng.
english: He oscillates between political extremes.

hanzi: 他的政治观点在两个极端之间摇摆不定.
pinyin: tā de zhèng zhì guān diǎn zài liǎng gè jí duān zhī jiān yáo bǎi bù dìng.
english: He oscillates between political extremes.

hanzi: 图书管理员从书架上随便拿了一本书。
pinyin: tú shū guǎn lǐ yuán zòng shū jià shàng suí biàn ná le yī běn shū。
english: The librarian took a book at random from the shelf.

hanzi: 这个房客因为没有交房租而被赶出去了。
pinyin: zhè gè fáng kè yīn wèi méi yǒu jiāo fáng zū ér bèi gǎn chū qù le。
english: The tenant was evicted for non-payment of rent.

hanzi: 这些天我运气好, 一切都进行得很顺利。
pinyin: zhè xie tiān wǒ yùn qi hào,  yī qiè dōu jìn xíng de hěn shùn lì。
english: I am in luck these days and everything goes well.

hanzi: 人群向后退开，让救护车可以开过去。
pinyin: rén qún xiàng hòu tuì kāi， ràng jiù hù chē kě yǐ kāi guò qu。
english: The crowd bore back so that the ambulance could pass.

hanzi: 车身机动车的金属和塑料的外部结构
pinyin: chē shēn jī dòng chē de jīn shǔ huò sù liào de wài bù jié gòu
english: The metal or plastic external structure of a motor vehicle.

hanzi: 往来交往个人或群体间的交往或交际
pinyin: wǎng lái jiāo wǎng gè rén huò qún tǐ jiàn de jiāo wǎng huò jiāo jì
english: Dealings or communications between persons or groups.

hanzi: 她买了一些木材下脚料做厨房用架子.
pinyin: tā mǎi le yī xiē mù cái xià jué liào zuò chú fáng yòng jià zi.
english: She bought some timber off-cuts to build kitchen shelves.

hanzi: 最小的响声也会吓着这个胆小的孩子的。
pinyin: zuì xiǎo de xiǎng shēng yě kuài xià zhuó zhè gè dǎn xiǎo de hái zi de。
english: The least noise would startle the timid child.

hanzi: 我们希望能够和平过渡到新的制度。
pinyin: wǒ men xī wàng néng gòu hé píng guò dù dào xīn de zhì dù。
english: We hope there will be a peaceful transition to the new system.

hanzi: 健全的精神是与健康的身体不可分割的。
pinyin: jiàn quán de jīng shén shì yù jiàn kāng de shēn tǐ bù kě fēn gē de。
english: A sound mind is inseparable from a sound body.

hanzi: 他的迅速康复是由于他的健全的体质。
pinyin: tā de xùn sù kāng fù shì yóu yú tā de jiàn quán de tǐ zhì。
english: His quick recovery is ascribable to his sound constitution.

hanzi: 如果你不加紧努力，你考试会不及格的。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bù jiā jǐn nǔ lì， nǐ kǎo shì kuài bù jí gé de。
english: If you don't pull your socks up, you'll fail the exam.

hanzi: 她用灵巧的双手为我织了一副手套。
pinyin: tā yòng líng qiǎo de shuāng shǒu wèi wǒ zhī le yī fù shǒu tào。
english: She knitted a pair of mittens for me with her nimble fingers.

hanzi: 无线电和电视是重要的通信手段。
pinyin: wú xiàn diàn huò diàn shì shì zhòng yào de tōng xìn shǒu duàn。
english: Radio and television are important means of communication.

hanzi: 我们听到了他走在楼梯上沉重的脚步声。
pinyin: wǒ men tīng dào le tā zǒu zài lóu tī shàng chén zhòng de jiǎo bù shēng。
english: We heard his heavy tread on the staircase.

hanzi: 在平静的海面上航行我感到很舒服。
pinyin: zài píng jìng de hǎi miàn shàng háng xíng wǒ gǎn dào hěn shū fu。
english: I felt comfortable sailing on the smoothness of the sea.

hanzi: 尽管困难在增加，但我们毫不灰心。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn kùn nan zài zēng jiā， dàn wǒ men háo bú huī xīn。
english: Difficulties were increasing. Even then we did not lose heart.

hanzi: 照相机的镜头不可受到阳光的直射。
pinyin: zhào xiàng jī de jìng tóu bù kě shòu dào yáng guāng de zhí shè。
english: The camera lens must be screened from direct sunlight.

hanzi: 在我祖父看来，我爸爸仍然是个小孩。
pinyin: zài wǒ zǔ fù kàn lai， wǒ bà ba réng rán shì gè xiǎo hái。
english: It seems to my grandfather that my father is still a child.

hanzi: 这些音乐家作了一场绝对完美的演出。
pinyin: zhè xie yīn yuè jiā zuò le yī chǎng jué duì wán měi de yǎn chū。
english: These musicians gave an absolutely faultless performance.

hanzi: 他由于忽视安全操作规程而受到责备。
pinyin: tā yóu yú hū shì ān quán cāo zuò guī chéng ér shòu dào zé bèi。
english: He was taxed with neglecting the safety regulations.

hanzi: 各队为取得第一名在激烈的竞争中遭遇
pinyin: gè duì wèi qǔ dé dì yī míng zài jī liè de jìng zhēng zhòng zāo yù
english: The teams met in fierce contention for first place.

hanzi: 这根绳子不够结实，所以我们用金属线。
pinyin: zhè gēn shéng zi bù gòu jiē shi， suǒ yǐ wǒ men yòng jīn shǔ xiàn。
english: The rope was not strong enough, so we used wire.

hanzi: 上次我去那家酒吧，喝的酒分量不足。
pinyin: shàng cì wǒ qù nà jiā jiǔ bā， hè de jiǔ fèn liàng bù zú。
english: The last time I went to that pub I was given short measure.

hanzi: 神经外科学神经系统中任何部分的外科学
pinyin: shén jīng wài kē xué shén jīng xì tǒng zhòng rèn hé bù fen de wài kē xué
english: Surgery on any part of the nervous system.

hanzi: 生产成本的增加必定使价格上涨。
pinyin: shēng chǎn chéng běn de zēng jiā bì dìng shǐ jià gé shàng zhǎng。
english: Any increase in production costs is bound to send up prices.

hanzi: 因受到严重损坏，这座桥不再使用了。
pinyin: yīn shòu dào yán zhòng sǔn huài， zhè zuò qiáo bù zài shǐ yòng le。
english: Seriously damaged, the bridge is no longer in use.

hanzi: 这条大船的马达坏了，无法再航行了。
pinyin: zhè tiáo dà chuán de mǎ dá huài le， wú fǎ zài háng xíng le。
english: With its engine broken, this great ship was not navigable.

hanzi: 我已经注意到这幅画中色彩的层次。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng zhù yì dào zhè fú huà zhòng sè cǎi de céng cì。
english: I have noticed the subtle gradation in colour in this painting.

hanzi: 他们直接从厂商那里购买了这台机器。
pinyin: tā men zhí jiē zòng chǎng shāng nà li gòu mǎi le zhè tái jī qì。
english: They bought the machine directly from the manufacturer.

hanzi: 这种新的传染病对抗菌素有抗药性。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xīn de chuán rǎn bìng duì kàng jùn sù yǒu kàng yào xìng。
english: This new type of infection is resistant to antibiotics.

hanzi: 在我方的沉重打击下，敌军被迫后退。
pinyin: zài wǒ fāng de chén zhòng dǎ jī xià， dí jūn bèi pò hòu tuì。
english: The enemy was forced to get back under our massive blows.

hanzi: 在我们大多数办公室任职的是志愿人员。
pinyin: zài wǒ men dà duō shù bàn gōng shì rèn zhí de shì zhì yuàn rén yuán。
english: Most of our offices are staffed by volunteers.

hanzi: 简而言之，我认为我们应该接受他的提议。
pinyin: jiǎn ér yán zhī， wǒ rèn wéi wǒ men yīng gāi jiē shòu tā de tí yì。
english: Briefly, I think we should accept his offer.

hanzi: 这位体操选手敢于做惊险的高难度动作
pinyin: zhè wèi tǐ cāo xuǎn shǒu gǎn yú zuò jīng xiǎn de gāo nán dù dòng zuò
english: The gymnast dared a breathtakingly difficult move.

hanzi: 你可以使用联机打印机把数据打印出来。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ shǐ yòng lián jī dǎ yìn jī bǎ shù jù dǎ yìn chū lai。
english: You may use an online printer to print out the data.

hanzi: 植物从泥土中吸收矿物质和其他养料.
pinyin: zhí wù zòng ní tǔ zhòng xī shōu kuàng wù zhì huò qí tā yǎng liào.
english: Plants draw minerals and other nutrients from the soil.

hanzi: 因无人维持秩序, 教室里一片混乱.
pinyin: yīn wú rén wéi chí zhì xù,  jiào shì lǐ yī piàn hùn luàn.
english: With no one to keep order the situation in the classroom was chaotic.

hanzi: 如果你万一见到他，请代我向他致意。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ wàn yī xiàn dào tā， qǐng dài wǒ xiàng tā zhì yì。
english: If you should happen to see him, please give him my regards.

hanzi: 她投诉这些问题侵犯了她的个人自由.
pinyin: tā tóu sù zhè xie wèn tí qīn fàn le tā de gè rén zì yóu.
english: She complained that the questions were an invasion of (her) privacy.

hanzi: 我们正要去度假，他却偏偏摔断了腿。
pinyin: wǒ men zhèng yào qù dù jià， tā què piān piān shuāi duàn le tuǐ。
english: He must needs break a leg just before we go on holiday.

hanzi: 我们出门散步时，孩子们总是落在后头。
pinyin: wǒ men chū mén sàn bù shí， hái zi men zǒng shì luò zài hòu tou。
english: The children always lag behind when we go for a walk.

hanzi: 各公司应邀投标承建新高速公路.
pinyin: gè gōng sī yìng yāo tóu biāo chéng jiàn xīn gāo sù gōng lù.
english: Firms were invited to tender for the construction of the new motorway.

hanzi: 为了收集数据我们发给他们一些调查表。
pinyin: wèi le shōu jí shù jù wǒ men fà jǐ tā men yī xiē diào chá biǎo。
english: We gave them some questionnaires for collecting data.

hanzi: 他那些模糊的想法变成了一个明确的计划.
pinyin: tā nà xiē mó hu de xiǎng fǎ biàn chéng le yī gè míng què de jì huà.
english: His vague ideas crystallized into a definite plan.

hanzi: 我妹妹每天都吃天然食品，但是我不吃。
pinyin: wǒ mèi mei měi tiān dōu jí tiān rán shí pǐn， dàn shì wǒ bù jí。
english: My sister eats natural foods every day, but I don't.

hanzi: 不到半小时后，他开始有点忍耐不住了。
pinyin: bù dào bàn xiǎo shí hòu， tā kāi shǐ yǒu diǎn rěn nài bú zhù le。
english: After half an hour, his patience began to wear out.

hanzi: 她工作的时候就把小儿子送到托儿所。
pinyin: tā gōng zuò de shí hou jiù bǎ xiǎo ér zi sòng dào tuō er suǒ。
english: She sent her little son to a nursery when she was working.

hanzi: 这个国家百分之九十的地方都是温带。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā bǎi fēn zhī jiǔ shí de dì fang dōu shì wēn dài。
english: Ninety per cent of the country lies in the temperate zone.

hanzi: 不能让你着凉。快去把湿衣服换掉。
pinyin: bù néng ràng nǐ zháo liáng。 kuài qù bǎ shī yī fu huàn diào。
english: I can't have you catching cold. Run and change your wet things.

hanzi: 尽管他的祖父是贵族，他却非常穷困。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn tā de zǔ fù shì guì zú， tā què fēi cháng qióng kùn。
english: Although his grandfather was a nobleman, he was very poor.

hanzi: 检阅官方对兵营或部队的检查或考察
pinyin: jiǎn yuè guān fāng duì bīng yíng huò bù duì de jiǎn chá huò kǎo chá
english: Official examination or review, as of barracks or troops.

hanzi: 手术成功了，病人现在已脱离危险。
pinyin: shǒu shù chéng gōng le， bìng rén xiàn zài yǐ tuō lí wēi xiǎn。
english: The operation is a success and now the patient is out of danger.

hanzi: 如果你万一见到他，请代我向他致意。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ wàn yī xiàn dào tā， qǐng dài wǒ xiàng tā zhì yì。
english: If you should happen to see him, please give him my regards.

hanzi: 这个国家缺少一个能起作用的中立党派.
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā quē shǎo yī gè néng qǐ zuò yòng de zhōng lì dǎng pài.
english: This country lacks an effective party of the centre.

hanzi: 要想召集会议什么的，就要出个通知。
pinyin: yào xiǎng zhào jí huì yì shén me de， jiù yào chū gè tōng zhī。
english: If you want to call a meeting or anything, put up a notice.

hanzi: 小型的或微小的尺寸很小或尺寸缩得很小的
pinyin: xiǎo xíng de huò wēi xiǎo de chǐ cun hěn xiǎo huò chǐ cun suō de hěn xiǎo de
english: Being on a small or greatly reduced scale.

hanzi: 这个会我来不了, 我让助手代我出席.
pinyin: zhè gè kuài wǒ lái bù liǎo,  wǒ ràng zhù shǒu dài wǒ chū xí.
english: I can't attend the meeting but I'll send my assistant in my stead.

hanzi: 本阅览室的参考书不得私自带出。
pinyin: běn yuè lǎn shì de cān kǎo shū bù dé sī zì dài chū。
english: No reference books are to be taken out of the reading room without permission.

hanzi: 背书小学生将已准备好的课文口头背出来
pinyin: bèi shū xiǎo xué shēng jiàng yǐ zhǔn bèi hǎo de kè wén kǒu tóu bèi chū lai
english: Oral delivery of prepared lessons by a pupil.

hanzi: 在过去的五十年里，老虎的数目锐减。
pinyin: zài guò qu de wǔ shí nián lǐ， lǎo hǔ de shù mù ruì jiǎn。
english: The number of tigers has reduced abruptly in the last fifty years.

hanzi: 他这人疑心太重, 连自己的母亲也不相信.
pinyin: tā zhè rén yí xīn tài zhòng,  lián zì jǐ de mǔ qīn yě bù xiāng xìn.
english: He's so suspicious he would distrust his own mother.

hanzi: 别那样对我大声嚷嚷，我能听清楚。
pinyin: biè nà yàng duì wǒ dà shēng rǎng rǎng， wǒ néng tìng qīng chu。
english: Don't shout into my ears like that, I can hear you perfectly well.

hanzi: 他们因那个孩子有说服力的理由相信了他。
pinyin: tā men yīn nèi gè hái zi yǒu shuō fú lì de lǐ yóu xiāng xìn le tā。
english: They believed the child by his persuasive reasons.

hanzi: 我们所需要的金属要求具有下列特性。
pinyin: wǒ men suǒ xū yào de jīn shǔ yāo qiú jù yǒu xià liè tè xìng。
english: The metal we need requires the following particular properties.

hanzi: 她责备他竟把他们的结婚周年纪念日忘了.
pinyin: tā zé bèi tā jìng bǎ tā men de jié hūn zhōu nián jì niàn rì wàng le.
english: She reproached him for forgetting their anniversary.

hanzi: 我要去购物，因为我需要买些日用品。
pinyin: wǒ yào qù gòu wù， yīn wèi wǒ xū yào mǎi xiē rì yòng pǐn。
english: I'm going shopping because I need to buy some daily necessities.

hanzi: 他对是否参加考察队仍拿不定主意.
pinyin: tā duì shì fǒu cān jiā kǎo chá duì réng ná bù dìng zhǔ yi.
english: He's still hesitating about joining/over whether to join the expedition.

hanzi: 孩子们的前途一向是我心中最重要的事。
pinyin: hái zi men de qián tú yí xiàng shì wǒ xīn zhōng zuì zhòng yào de shì。
english: The children's future is always uppermost in my mind.

hanzi: 当别人注意他时，他就会退缩一旁。
pinyin: dàng bié rén zhù yì tā shí， tā jiù kuài tuì suō yī páng。
english: He had a tendency to shrink up whenever attention was focused on him.

hanzi: 克文病得严重以致无法来上课。
pinyin: kè wén bìng de yán zhòng yǐ zhì wú fǎ lái shàng kè。
english: Kevin is so sick that he can't come to class. (=Kevin is too sick to come to class.)

hanzi: 主教在仪式上为许多人施行了坚信礼.
pinyin: zhǔ jiào zài yí shì shàng wèi xǔ duō rén shī xíng le jiān xìn lǐ.
english: The bishop conducted a number of confirmations at the service.

hanzi: 你最好不要碰这些衣服，好避免传染病。
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo bù yào pèng zhè xie yī fu， hào bì miǎn chuán rǎn bìng。
english: You'd better not touch these coats to avoid contagion.

hanzi: 没有任何事干扰村里一向平静的生活.
pinyin: méi yǒu rèn hé shì gān rǎo cūn lǐ yí xiàng píng jìng de shēng huó.
english: Nothing disturbs the peaceful current of life in the village.

hanzi: 在这一测验中你与专家较量一下技巧吧。
pinyin: zài zhè yī cè yàn zhòng nǐ yù zhuān jiā jiào liàng yī xià jì qiǎo ba。
english: Match your skill against the experts in this quiz.

hanzi: 老人给我们讲述了一个口头流传的故事。
pinyin: lǎo rén jǐ wǒ men jiǎng shù le yī gè kǒu tóu liú chuán de gù shì。
english: The old man told us a story passed on by oral tradition.

hanzi: 有些国家的燃料供应非常有限。
pinyin: yǒu xiē guó jiā de rán liào gōng yìng fēi cháng yǒu xiàn。
english: There are some countries where (=in which) the supply of fuel is very limited.

hanzi: 在处理紧急事件时，速度是非常重要的。
pinyin: zài chǔ lǐ jǐn jí shì jiàn shí， sù dù shì fēi cháng zhòng yào de。
english: Speed is of the essence in dealing with an emergency.

hanzi: 老乡们告诉我爸爸，他的处境很危险。
pinyin: lǎo xiāng men gào su wǒ bà ba， tā de chǔ jìng hěn wēi xiǎn。
english: My father was warned by the villagers that he was in great danger.

hanzi: 这位新闻记者的著作很受年轻人的欢迎。
pinyin: zhè wèi xīn wén jì zhě de著 zuò hěn shòu nián qīng rén de huān yíng。
english: This journalist's works are popular among young people.

hanzi: 这样一种错误可能导致灾难性的后果。
pinyin: zhè yàng yī zhòng cuò wù kě néng dǎo zhì zāi nàn xìng de hòu guǒ。
english: Such a mistake would perhaps lead to disastrous consequences.

hanzi: 让我们讨论一些咱们可以自由谈论的事吧。
pinyin: ràng wǒ men tǎo lùn yī xiē zán men kě yǐ zì yóu tán lùn de shì ba。
english: Let us discuss such things as we can talk it freely.

hanzi: 我认为能向各位贵宾演讲十分荣幸.
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi néng xiàng gè wèi guì bīn yǎn jiǎng shí fēn róng xìng.
english: I esteem it a privilege to address such a distinguished audience.

hanzi: 要想赶上其他同学, 我得特别努力才行。
pinyin: yào xiǎng gǎn shàng qí tā tóng xué,  wǒ de tè bié nǔ lì cái xìng。
english: I have to work hard to catch up with the other students.

hanzi: 他那次发作是他缺乏自制力的典型事例.
pinyin: tā nà cì fā zuò shì tā quē fá zì zhì lì de diǎn xíng shì lì.
english: That outburst was a typical example of his lack of self-control.

hanzi: 法庭上原告和被告双方都有各自的律师。
pinyin: fǎ tíng shàng yuán gào huò bèi gào shuāng fāng dōu yǒu gè zi de lu:4 shī。
english: Each side of a case in court has its own counsel.

hanzi: 品德就是自我在暗地里独处时的样子。
pinyin: pǐn dé jiù shì zì wǒ zài àn de lǐ dú chù shí de yàng zi。
english: Character is what we are when we are alone with ourselves in the dark.

hanzi: 士兵在那场战斗中用尽了所有的弹药。
pinyin: shì bīng zài nà chǎng zhàn dòu zhòng yòng jìn le suǒ yǒu de dàn yào。
english: The soldiers expended all their ammunition in that fight.

hanzi: 在过去十年里，医学取得了巨大的进步。
pinyin: zài guò qu shí nián lǐ， yī xué qǔ dé le jù dà de jìn bù。
english: There have been great advances in medicine in the last ten years.

hanzi: 我希望他不要将烟灰往地毯上乱弹。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng tā bù yào jiàng yān huī wàng dì tǎn shàng luàn tán。
english: I wish he would refrain from scattering his ash all over the carpet.

hanzi: 电线快磨破了，使用起来可能有危险。
pinyin: diàn xiàn kuài mò pò le， shǐ yòng qǐ lai kě néng yǒu wēi xiǎn。
english: The electric wire is fraying and could be dangerous to handle.

hanzi: 那个工厂需要大量钢铁以维持生产。
pinyin: nèi gè gōng chǎng xū yào dà liàng gāng tiě yǐ wéi chí shēng chǎn。
english: The factory is in great demand of steel to keep up production.

hanzi: 从这个角度来看, 画中的女子面带微笑.
pinyin: zòng zhè gè jiǎo dù lái kàn,  huà zhòng dì nu:3 zǐ miàn dài wēi xiào.
english: Seen from this angle the woman in the picture is smiling.

hanzi: 他向我请教那件事以表示对我的敬意。
pinyin: tā xiàng wǒ qǐng jiào nà jiàn shì yǐ biǎo shì duì wǒ de jìng yì。
english: He paid me the compliment of consulting me about the affair.

hanzi: 近代研究已使这个问题大为明朗化了。
pinyin: jìn dài yán jiū yǐ shǐ zhè gè wèn tí dà wèi míng lǎng huà le。
english: Modern investigations have thrown great light on this question.

hanzi: 在选举前后政客们总要许愿讨好民众。
pinyin: zài xuǎn jǔ qián hòu zhèng kè men zǒng yào xǔ yuàn tǎo hào mín zhòng。
english: Politicians bid for popular favour around election time.

hanzi: 皇家园林卫队保护皇家森林和公园的看守者
pinyin: huáng jiā yuán lín wèi duì bǎo hù huáng jiā sēn lín huò gōng yuán de kàn shǒu zhě
english: The keeper of a royal forest or park.

hanzi: 对投资期限较长者可获百分之二的奖励.
pinyin: duì tóu zī qī xiàn jiào zhǎng zhě kě huò bǎi fēn zhī èr de jiǎng lì.
english: A premium of 2 per cent is paid on long-term investments.

hanzi: 上次考试他给我指点错了，所以我没及格。
pinyin: shàng cì kǎo shì tā jǐ wǒ zhǐ diǎn cuò le， suǒ yǐ wǒ mò jí gé。
english: He gave me a bum steer on the last exam that I failed.

hanzi: 战时的艰苦包括食物配给和燃料短缺.
pinyin: zhàn shí de jiān kù bāo kuò shí wù pèi jǐ huò rán liào duǎn quē.
english: Wartime austerities included food rationing and shortage of fuel.

hanzi: 这种书桌的高低可以按照你的需要调节。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng shū zhuō de gāo dī kě yǐ àn zhào nǐ de xū yào tiáo jié。
english: This kind of desk can be adjusted to the height you need.

hanzi: 我已养成一到家就打开电视机的习惯.
pinyin: wǒ yǐ yǎng chéng yī dào jiā jiù dǎ kāi diàn shì jī de xí guàn.
english: I've got into the habit of switching on the TV as soon as I gethome.

hanzi: 要加入俱乐部必须有一位会员做介绍人.
pinyin: yào jiā rù jù yuè bù bì xū yǒu yī wèi huì yuán zuò jiè shào rén.
english: To join the club you have to be put up by an existing member.

hanzi: 这样一种错误可能导致灾难性的后果。
pinyin: zhè yàng yī zhòng cuò wù kě néng dǎo zhì zāi nàn xìng de hòu guǒ。
english: Such a mistake would perhaps lead to disastrous consequences.

hanzi: 他对那把墨水倒翻在书上的孩子臭骂了一顿。
pinyin: tā duì nà bǎ mò shuǐ dào fān zài shū shàng de hái zi chòu mà le yī dùn。
english: He swore at the boy who dropped ink on the book.

hanzi: 我不明白你们为什么对这件事感到如此好笑。
pinyin: wǒ bù míng bái nǐ men wèi shén me duì zhè jiàn shì gǎn dào rú cǐ hǎo xiào。
english: I fail to see why you find it so amusing.

hanzi: 这样一种错误可能导致灾难性的后果。
pinyin: zhè yàng yī zhòng cuò wù kě néng dǎo zhì zāi nàn xìng de hòu guǒ。
english: Such a mistake would perhaps lead to disastrous consequences.

hanzi: 我讨厌与那些没有人情味的大公司打交道。
pinyin: wǒ tǎo yàn yù nà xiē méi yǒu rén qíng wèi de dà gōng sī dǎ jiāo dào。
english: I hate dealing with large impersonal companies.

hanzi: 下雨了，他们不得不在旅馆里待了一整天。
pinyin: xià yǔ le， tā men bù dé bù zài lu:3 guǎn lǐ dài le yī zhěng tiān。
english: It was raining; they had to stay in the inn the whole day.

hanzi: 目前，这个国家的人民正在日益觉醒。
pinyin: mù qián， zhè gè guó jiā de rén mín zhèng zài rì yì jué xǐng。
english: At present the people in this country are increasingly awakening.

hanzi: 他下决心每天要读一小时有益读物。
pinyin: tā xià jué xīn měi tiān yào dú yī xiǎo shí yǒu yì dú wù。
english: He made a resolution to read something profitable for one hour every day.

hanzi: 政府为到访的元首派出了武装卫队.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ wèi dào fǎng de yuán shǒu pài chū le wǔ zhuāng wèi duì.
english: The government provided an armed escort for the visiting head of State.

hanzi: 他对他们的候选人发表了一些有利的评论。
pinyin: tā duì tā men de hòu xuǎn rén fā biǎo le yī xiē yǒu lì de píng lùn。
english: He made several favorable comments about their candidate.

hanzi: 边界从北部山地一直延伸到南部海岸.
pinyin: biān jiè zòng běi bù shān dì yī zhí yán shēn dào nán bù hǎi àn.
english: The frontier ranges from the northern hills to the southern coast.

hanzi: 计算机手册将告诉你如何连接打印机线
pinyin: jì suàn jī shǒu cè jiàng gào su nǐ rú hé lián jiē dǎ yìn jī xiàn
english: The computer manual will tell you how to attach a line printer.

hanzi: 对队员的挑选似乎完全是主观决定的。
pinyin: duì duì yuán de tiāo xuǎn sì hu wán quán shì zhǔ guān jué dìng de。
english: The choice of players for the team seems completely arbitrary.

hanzi: 这些商品现正供应不足，价格会上涨。
pinyin: zhè xie shāng pǐn xiàn zhèng gōng yìng bù zú， jià gé kuài shàng zhǎng。
english: These goods are in short supply; the price will be high.

hanzi: 在我国, 一般人家里没有集中供热设备.
pinyin: zài wǒ guó,  yī bān rén jiā lǐ méi yǒu jí zhōng gòng rè shè bèi.
english: People don't have central heating in their houses in my country.

hanzi: 他用自来水龙头流出的凉水把手洗干净。
pinyin: tā yòng zì lái shuǐ lóng tóu liú chū de liáng shuǐ bǎ shǒu xǐ gān jìng。
english: He cleaned his hands in the cold water from the tap.

hanzi: 你太粗心了，居然连你妈妈的生日也忘了。
pinyin: nǐ tài cū xīn le， jū rán lián nǐ mā ma de shēng rì yě wàng le。
english: It was thoughtless of you to forget your mother's birthday.

hanzi: 不跟你父亲打个招呼就走是非常不合适的。
pinyin: bù gēn nǐ fù qīn dǎ gè zhāo hu jiù zǒu shì fēi cháng bù hé shì de。
english: To go away without telling your father is most irregular.

hanzi: 他教导说，战争有正义的和非正义的两种。
pinyin: tā jiào dǎo shuō， zhàn zhēng yǒu zhèng yì de huò fēi zhèng yì de liǎng zhòng。
english: He taught that wars can be just or unjust.

hanzi: 他们闻到做菜的味儿, 知道眼看要吃饭了.
pinyin: tā men wén dào zuò cài de wèi er,  zhī dào yǎn kàn yào chī fàn le.
english: The smell of cooking told them there was a meal in the offing.

hanzi: 现代社会的每个人都面临着激烈的竞争。
pinyin: xiàn dài shè huì de měi gè rén dōu miàn lín zhuó jī liè de jìng zhēng。
english: Everyone in modern society faces the keen competition.

hanzi: 几家公司正为争取一项合同而互相竞争。
pinyin: jǐ jiā gōng sī zhèng wèi zhēng qǔ yí xiàng hé tong ér hù xiāng jìng zhēng。
english: Several companies are competing for the contract.

hanzi: 注重尊严的人都会轻视那种行为。
pinyin: zhù zhòng zūn yán de rén dū huì qīng shì nà zhòng xíng wéi。
english: All people with a sense of decency will look down upon such conduct as that.

hanzi: 该项装置是按照热力上升的原理运转的。
pinyin: gāi xiàng zhuāng zhì shì àn zhào rè lì shàng shēng de yuán lǐ yùn zhuǎn de。
english: The system works on the principle that heat rises.

hanzi: 从高处往下看, 那些农田像是几何图案.
pinyin: zòng gāo chù wàng xià kàn,  nà xiē nóng tián xiàng shì jǐ hé tú àn.
english: Seen from above, the fields looked like a geometrical pattern.

hanzi: 她很会让那些给她出难题的人自讨没趣。
pinyin: tā hěn kuài ràng nà xiē jǐ tā chū nán tí de rén zì tǎo mò qù。
english: She know how to score off people who ask difficult question.

hanzi: 该项装置是按照热力上升的原理运转的。
pinyin: gāi xiàng zhuāng zhì shì àn zhào rè lì shàng shēng de yuán lǐ yùn zhuǎn de。
english: The system works on the principle that heat rises.

hanzi: 因为尺子被书盖住了，所以我没找到它。
pinyin: yīn wèi chǐ zi bèi shū gě zhù le， suǒ yǐ wǒ mò zhǎo dào tā。
english: I could not find my ruler because it was covered up by the books.

hanzi: 这个户头为你提供了一个现成的收入来源.
pinyin: zhè gè hù tóu wèi nǐ tí gōng le yī gè xiàn chéng de shōu rù lái yuán.
english: This account provides you with a ready source of income.

hanzi: 我们可以根据你的特殊需要设计保险单。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ gēn jù nǐ de tè shū xū yào shè jì bǎo xiǎn shàn。
english: We can tailor the insurance policy according to your special needs.

hanzi: 这个户头为你提供了一个现成的收入来源.
pinyin: zhè gè hù tóu wèi nǐ tí gōng le yī gè xiàn chéng de shōu rù lái yuán.
english: This account provides you with a ready source of income.

hanzi: 该项装置是按照热力上升的原理运转的。
pinyin: gāi xiàng zhuāng zhì shì àn zhào rè lì shàng shēng de yuán lǐ yùn zhuǎn de。
english: The system works on the principle that heat rises.

hanzi: 这段时间的失业人数又达到了创纪录水平。
pinyin: zhè duàn shí jiān de shī yè rén shù yòu dá dào le chuàng jì lù shuǐ píng。
english: In this period, unemployment reaches record levels.

hanzi: 该项装置是按照热力上升的原理运转的。
pinyin: gāi xiàng zhuāng zhì shì àn zhào rè lì shàng shēng de yuán lǐ yùn zhuǎn de。
english: The system works on the principle that heat rises.

hanzi: 所有爱好和平的人都强烈反对军备竞赛。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu ài hào hé píng de rén dōu qiáng liè fǎn duì jūn bèi jìng sài。
english: All those who love peace are strongly against arms race.

hanzi: 根据出身不同而区别待人是不对的.
pinyin: gēn jù chū shēn bù tóng ér qū bié dài rén shì bù duì de.
english: It is wrong to differentiate between people according to their family background.

hanzi: 相声这种艺术形式让老百姓喜闻乐见。
pinyin: xiàng shēng zhè zhǒng yì shù xíng shì ràng lǎo bǎi xìng xǐ wén yuè xiàn。
english: Cross talks are an art form people love to see and hear.

hanzi: 在法律上，你没有义务非回答这些问题不可。
pinyin: zài fǎ lu:4 shàng， nǐ méi yǒu yì wù fēi huí dá zhè xie wèn tí bù kě。
english: You are not legally bound to answer these questions.

hanzi: 我们面临许多问题, 但终将获得成功.
pinyin: wǒ men miàn lín xǔ duō wèn tí,  dàn zhōng jiàng huò dé chéng gōng.
english: We are faced with a lot of problems but we'll win through in the end.

hanzi: 无产阶级专政是共产主义的目标之一.
pinyin: wú chǎn jiē jí zhuān zhèng shì gòng chǎn zhǔ yì de mù biāo zhī yī.
english: The dictatorship of the proletariat is one of the aims of Communism.

hanzi: 试验没有成功，尽管如此，还是值得做的。
pinyin: shì yàn méi yǒu chéng gōng， jǐn guǎn rú cǐ， hái shì zhí de zuò de。
english: The experiment failed. It was, nevertheless, worth making.

hanzi: 他与世隔绝一个月，力图把功课赶上去。
pinyin: tā yù shì gé jué yī gè yuè， lì tú bǎ gōng kè gǎn shàng qù。
english: He shut himself away for a month to catch up on his academic work.

hanzi: 一堆，一叠按堆排放或扔在一起的一些东西
pinyin: yī duī， yī dié àn duī pái fàng huò rēng zài yī qǐ de yī xiē dōng xi
english: A quantity of objects stacked or thrown together in a heap.

hanzi: 人们认为这座神庙是古典式设计的范例。
pinyin: rén men rèn wéi zhè zuò shén miào shì gǔ diǎn shì shè jì de fàn lì。
english: The temple has been considered an example of classic design.

hanzi: 他们在围墙下面挖地道通向远处林中.
pinyin: tā men zài wéi qiáng xià mian wā dì dao tōng xiàng yuǎn chù lín zhòng.
english: They tunnelled along under the walls and up into the woods beyond.

hanzi: 她离开小岛而在法国的大都市中成名。
pinyin: tā lí kāi xiǎo dǎo ér zài fǎ guó de dà dū shì zhòng chéng míng。
english: She left the small island and became famous in metropolitan France.

hanzi: 安装可靠的报警设备以减低被盗的风险.
pinyin: ān zhuāng kě kào de bào jǐng shè bèi yǐ jiǎn dī bèi dào de fēng xiǎn.
english: To minimize the risk of burglary, install a good alarm system.

hanzi: 那司机等候绿灯放行，让发动机空转著。
pinyin: nà sī jī děng hòu lu:4 dēng fàng xìng， ràng fā dòng jī kòng zhuàn著。
english: The driver waited for the green light, his engine racing.

hanzi: 您一定发现我们产品的包装美观讲究。
pinyin: nín yī dìng fā xiàn wǒ men chǎn pǐn de bāo zhuāng měi guān jiǎng jiù。
english: I think you'll find the packing beautiful and quite well-done.

hanzi: 他的衬衫很薄, 连里面穿的背心都能看见.
pinyin: tā de chèn shān hěn bò,  lián lǐ miàn chuān de bèi xīn dōu néng kàn jiàn.
english: His shirt was so thin that his vest showed through (it).

hanzi: 我们有一台万一断电时使用的备用发电机。
pinyin: wǒ men yǒu yī tái wàn yī duàn diàn shí shǐ yòng de bèi yòng fā diàn jī。
english: We have an auxiliary generator in case of power cuts.

hanzi: 简伸长脖子张望，在人群中找她的母亲。
pinyin: jiǎn shēn cháng bó zi zhāng wàng， zài rén qún zhòng zhǎo tā de mǔ qīn。
english: Jane craned her neck to look for her mother in the crowd.

hanzi: 你愿意告诉谁就告诉谁--对我来说都无所谓.
pinyin: nǐ yuàn yì gào su shéi jiù gào su shéi-- duì wǒ lái shuō dōu wú suǒ wèi.
english: Tell whoever you like it makes no difference to me.

hanzi: 他是地方行政官员, 也就是说是文官.
pinyin: tā shì dì fang xíng zhèng guān yuán,  yě jiù shì shuō shì wén guān.
english: He's a local government administrator, that is to say a Civil Servant.

hanzi: 她对我们的警告充耳不闻，结果迷失了方向。
pinyin: tā duì wǒ men de jǐng gào chōng ěr bù wén， jié guǒ mí shī le fāng xiàng。
english: She turn a deaf ear to our warning and get lose.

hanzi: 他经常用充满爱意的语言谈论他的女朋友。
pinyin: tā jīng cháng yòng chōng mǎn ài yì de yǔ yán tán lùn tā de nu:3 péng you。
english: He often talks about his girlfriend in terms of love.

hanzi: 邮包一定投递错了，因为她一直没有收到。
pinyin: yóu bāo yī dìng tóu dì cuò le， yīn wèi tā yī zhí méi yǒu shōu dào。
english: The parcel must have miscarry, for she never receive it.

hanzi: 她显然丝毫也不顾及别人以及别人的感情.
pinyin: tā xiǎn ran sī háo yě bù gù jí bié rén yǐ jí bié rén de gǎn qíng.
english: She shows a total disregard for other people and their feelings.

hanzi: 她显然丝毫也不顾及别人以及别人的感情.
pinyin: tā xiǎn ran sī háo yě bù gù jí bié rén yǐ jí bié rén de gǎn qíng.
english: She shows a total disregard for other people and their feelings.

hanzi: 总统有六名警卫员时时刻刻在左右保卫.
pinyin: zǒng tǒng yǒu liù míng jǐng wèi yuán shí shí kè kè zài zuǒ yòu bǎo wèi.
english: The President always has six bodyguards in close attendance.

hanzi: 经过化学分析，我们知道了矿石的构成。
pinyin: jīng guò huà xué fēn xī， wǒ men zhī dào le kuàng shí de gòu chéng。
english: After chemical assay, we have known the composition of the ore.

hanzi: 另一候选人的主要不利条件是她的年龄问题.
pinyin: lìng yī hòu xuǎn rén de zhǔ yào bù lì tiáo jiàn shì tā de nián líng wèn tí.
english: The other candidate's main disadvantage is her age.

hanzi: 学术界人士有学术观点或学术背景的人
pinyin: xué shù jiè rén shì yǒu xué shù guān diǎn huò xué shù bèi jǐng de rén
english: A person who has an academic viewpoint or a scholarly background.

hanzi: 我在做出决定之前不得不再三考虑此事。
pinyin: wǒ zài zuò chū jué dìng zhī qián bù dé bù zài sān kǎo lu:4 cǐ shì。
english: I have to turn the matter over and over before make a decision.

hanzi: 把你们的器材准备好，开始行动的时刻到了。
pinyin: bǎ nǐ men de qì cái zhǔn bèi hào， kāi shǐ xíng dòng de shí kè dào le。
english: Get your equipment ready, it's coming up to zero hour.

hanzi: 他不仅以才能出名，而且是出名的好心。
pinyin: tā bù jǐn yǐ cái néng chū míng， ér qiě shì chū míng de hǎo xīn。
english: He is famous not only for his talent but (also) for his kindness.

hanzi: 一位体育界的著名人士被邀请为决赛开球。
pinyin: yī wèi tǐ yù jiè de著 míng rén shì bèi yāo qǐng wèi jué sài kāi qiú。
english: A sports personality was invited to kick off at die final.

hanzi: 刺客因某种政治原因杀了那个知名人士。
pinyin: cì kè yīn mǒu zhǒng zhèng zhì yuán yīn shā le nèi gè zhī míng rén shì。
english: The assassin killed the famous person for political reasons.

hanzi: 我不知道这件衣服的价钱，它的标签掉了。
pinyin: wǒ bù zhī dào zhè jiàn yī fu de jià qian， tā de biāo qiān diào le。
english: I don't know the price of the dress; its ticket has fallen off.

hanzi: 他是地方行政官员, 也就是说是文官.
pinyin: tā shì dì fang xíng zhèng guān yuán,  yě jiù shì shuō shì wén guān.
english: He's a local government administrator, that is to say a Civil Servant.

hanzi: 私人小汽车能给人很大的舒服和机动性。
pinyin: sī rén xiǎo qì chē néng jǐ rén hěn dà de shū fu huò jī dòng xìng。
english: A private car gives a much greater degree of comfort and mobility.

hanzi: 这套装置必须经过试验之后才能投产。
pinyin: zhè tào zhuāng zhì bì xū jīng guò shì yàn zhī hòu cái néng tóu chǎn。
english: The system will have to be tested before it goes into production.

hanzi: 我深信每个人都是靠出卖什么东西生活的。
pinyin: wǒ shēn xìn měi gè rén dōu shì kào chū mài shén me dōng xi shēng huó de。
english: I am convinced(that) everyone lives by selling something.

hanzi: 市长要根据议会的议案来制定政策。
pinyin: shì zhǎng yào gēn jù yì huì de yì àn lái zhì dìng zhèng cè。
