english: His hands were yet red with blood.

hanzi: 他一再挥棍向我打来.
pinyin: tā yī zài huī gùn xiàng wǒ dǎ lái.
english: He struck at me repeatedly with a stick.

hanzi: 小丑扮出了可笑的鬼脸。
pinyin: xiǎo chǒu bàn chū le kě xiào de guǐ liǎn。
english: The clowns pulled funny faces.

hanzi: 教堂内严禁摄影.
pinyin: jiào táng nèi yán jìn shè yǐng.
english: Photography is strictly forbidden in the cathedral.

hanzi: 期末考卷已评完分数了.
pinyin: qī mò kǎo juàn yǐ píng wán fēn shù le.
english: The term papers have been graded.

hanzi: 我从来就厌恶早起.
pinyin: wǒ cóng lái jiù yàn wù zǎo qǐ.
english: I've always had an aversion to getting up early.

hanzi: 他勉强被容许留在这里。
pinyin: tā miǎn qiǎng bèi róng xǔ liú zài zhè lǐ。
english: He is here on sufferance.

hanzi: 他是个业余摄影爱好者。
pinyin: tā shì gè yè yú shè yǐng ài hào zhě。
english: He is an amateur photographer.

hanzi: 他们也想摧毁地下室。
pinyin: tā men yě xiǎng cuī huǐ dì xià shì。
english: Also they want to destroy the basement.

hanzi: 一轮明月当空照耀着。
pinyin: yī lún míng yuè dàng kòng zhào yào zhuó。
english: Overhead the moon was shining.

hanzi: 凶杀是最可恶的犯罪。
pinyin: xiōng shā shì zuì kě wù de fàn zuì。
english: Murder is the most abominable crime.

hanzi: 我舅舅是个地道的牛仔。
pinyin: wǒ jiù jiu shì gè dì dao de niú zǎi。
english: My uncle is a sure-enough cowboy.

hanzi: 她的衣服让钉子给钩住了。
pinyin: tā de yī fu ràng dīng zi jǐ gōu zhù le。
english: Her dress caught on a nail.

hanzi: 一连串不幸的事发生了。
pinyin: yī lián chuàn bù xìng de shì fā shēng le。
english: A series of mischance happened.

hanzi: 这块地毯是波斯制造的。
pinyin: zhè kuài dì tǎn shì Bō sī zhì zào de。
english: This carpet was made in Persia.

hanzi: 她把孩子紧紧抱在怀里。
pinyin: tā bǎ hái zi jǐn jǐn bào zài huái lǐ。
english: She clasped the baby to her bosom.

hanzi: 那恰好符合我们的需要。
pinyin: nà qià hǎo fú hé wǒ men de xū yào。
english: That answers precisely to our need.

hanzi: 他为他的行为感到惭愧。
pinyin: tā wèi tā de xíng wéi gǎn dào cán kuì。
english: He is ashamed of his behavior.

hanzi: 权利和职责是分不开的.
pinyin: quán lì huò zhí zé shì fèn bù kāi de.
english: Rights are inseparable from duties.

hanzi: 她的歌唱得已是炉火纯青.
pinyin: tā de gē chàng de yǐ shì lú huǒ chún qīng.
english: Her singing was perfection.

hanzi: 湿润的风从南方吹来。
pinyin: shī rùn de fēng zòng nán fāng chuī lái。
english: A humid wind blew from the south.

hanzi: 他们竭力要把火焰扑灭.
pinyin: tā men jié lì yào bǎ huǒ yán pū miè.
english: They tried to extinguish the flames.

hanzi: 有一团疑云笼罩著他.
pinyin: yǒu yī tuán yí yún lǒng zhào著 tā.
english: A cloud of suspicion is hanging over him.

hanzi: 圈著的动物繁殖不好.
pinyin: quān著 de dòng wù fán zhí bù hǎo.
english: Wild animals don't breed well in captivity.

hanzi: 一个钉子挂破了我的袜子。
pinyin: yī gè dīng zi guà pò le wǒ de wà zi。
english: I ripped my stocking on a nail.

hanzi: 汽车停止时震动了一下。
pinyin: qì chē tíng zhǐ shí zhèn dòng le yī xià。
english: The car stopped with a jolt.

hanzi: 卧室的窗户面向街道.
pinyin: wò shì de chuāng hu miàn xiàng jiē dào.
english: The bedroom windows give on to the street.

hanzi: 这块地毯是俄国风格的。
pinyin: zhè kuài dì tǎn shì E2 guó fēng gé de。
english: This carpet is of Russian style.

hanzi: 她与老板私奔了.
pinyin: tā yù lǎo bǎn sī bēn le.
english: She ran away with her boss/She and her boss ran away (together).

hanzi: 他笑着看着这个婴儿。
pinyin: tā xiào zhuó kàn zhuó zhè gè yīng ér。
english: He looked at the baby with a smile.

hanzi: 他居然有脸要求赔偿。
pinyin: tā jū rán yǒu liǎn yāo qiú péi cháng。
english: He had the gall to sue for damages.

hanzi: 不合理的规则被废除了。
pinyin: bù hé lǐ de guī zé bèi fèi chú le。
english: The unreasonable rules were revoked.

hanzi: 他用枕头把婴儿闷死了.
pinyin: tā yòng zhěn tou bǎ yīng ér mèn sǐ le.
english: He smothered the baby with a pillow.

hanzi: 他的书在柜子里找到了。
pinyin: tā de shū zài guì zi lǐ zhǎo dào le。
english: His book turned up in the cupboard.

hanzi: 他们爆发出一阵笑声。
pinyin: tā men bào fā chū yī zhèn xiào shēng。
english: They burst into a spasm of laughter.

hanzi: 大树小树都已长出嫩芽.
pinyin: dà shù xiǎo shù dōu yǐ zhǎng chū nèn yá.
english: The trees and hedgerows are in bud.

hanzi: 这块地毯是俄国风格的。
pinyin: zhè kuài dì tǎn shì E2 guó fēng gé de。
english: This carpet is of Russian style.

hanzi: 修了一道堤坝挡住洪水.
pinyin: xiū le yī dào dī bà dàng zhù hóng shuǐ.
english: A dyke was built to retain the floods.

hanzi: 拔掉塞子, 把水放掉.
pinyin: bá diào sè zi,  bǎ shuǐ fàng diào.
english: Pull (out) the plug and let the water drain away.

hanzi: 他那份工作报酬甚微.
pinyin: tā nà fèn gōng zuò bào chóu shèn wēi.
english: He gets paid peanuts for doing that job.

hanzi: 我们在夜幕掩护下行进.
pinyin: wǒ men zài yè mù yǎn hù xià xíng jìn.
english: We travelled under cover of darkness.

hanzi: 这个盒子的盖揭不起来了。
pinyin: zhè gè hé zi de gě jiē bù qǐ lai le。
english: The top of this box won't lift(off).

hanzi: 他抑扬顿挫地朗诵诗歌。
pinyin: tā yì yáng dùn cuò de lǎng sòng shī gē。
english: He read the poems with cadence.

hanzi: 深深的皱纹布上他的额头.
pinyin: shēn shēn de zhòu wén bù shàng tā de é tóu.
english: Deep furrows lined his brow.

hanzi: 取笑一个瞎子是残忍的。
pinyin: qǔ xiào yī gè xiā zi shì cán rěn de。
english: It's cruel to make fun of a blind man.

hanzi: 千万要警惕呀, 我恳求你.
pinyin: qiān wàn yào jǐng tì ya,  wǒ kěn qiú nǐ.
english: Be on your guard, I conjure you.

hanzi: 该病起初是器质性疾患.
pinyin: gāi bìng qǐ chū shì qì zhì xìng jí huàn.
english: The illness is organic in origin.

hanzi: 闪电通常伴有雷声。
pinyin: shǎn diàn tōng cháng bàn yǒu léi shēng。
english: Lightning usually accompanies thunder.

hanzi: 参观博物馆被推迟了。
pinyin: cān guān bó wù guǎn bèi tuī chí le。
english: Our visit to the museum is postponed.

hanzi: 她因患百日咳打了一针.
pinyin: tā yīn huàn bǎi rì ké dǎ le yī zhēn.
english: She was given a needle for whooping cough.

hanzi: 整个地形十分平坦.
pinyin: zhěng gè dì xíng shí fēn píng tǎn.
english: The whole landscape looked as flat as a pancake.

hanzi: 有些水果和种子有外壳。
pinyin: yǒu xiē shuǐ guǒ huò zhǒng zi yǒu wài ké。
english: Some fruits and seeds have hulls.

hanzi: 灌木散布在树林之中。
pinyin: guàn mù sàn bù zài shù lín zhī zhōng。
english: Bushes were interspersed among trees.

hanzi: 我喜欢熟桃的香甜味。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan shú táo de xiāng tián wèi。
english: I like the luscious taste of ripe peaches.

hanzi: 那盏灯悬挂在桌子上方。
pinyin: nà zhǎn dēng xuán guà zài zhuō zi shàng fāng。
english: The lamp hung over the table.

hanzi: 桌子上有一盏煤油灯。
pinyin: zhuō zi shàng yǒu yī zhǎn méi yóu dēng。
english: There was a kerosene lamp on the table.

hanzi: 他心事重重，眉头紧锁。
pinyin: tā xīn shì chóng chóng， méi tóu jǐn suǒ。
english: Care sat heavily on his brow.

hanzi: 他们全都惊讶地瞪着眼。
pinyin: tā men quán dōu jīng yà de dèng zhuó yǎn。
english: They all stared with astonishment.

hanzi: 千千万万的人死于饥荒。
pinyin: qiān qiān wàn wàn de rén sǐ yú jī huang。
english: Thousands of people died of famine.

hanzi: 这果酱罐的盖子拧不开.
pinyin: zhè guǒ jiàng guàn de gài zi nìng bù kāi.
english: The lid of this jam pot won't unscrew.

hanzi: 已派士兵去镇压动乱.
pinyin: yǐ pài shì bīng qù zhèn yā dòng luàn.
english: Soldiers were sent in to quell the riots.

hanzi: 卫兵派驻在监狱四周。
pinyin: wèi bīng pài zhù zài jiān yù sì zhōu。
english: Guards were stationed around the prison.

hanzi: 我倾向于同意你的观点。
pinyin: wǒ qīng xiàng yú tóng yì nǐ de guān diǎn。
english: I'm disposed to agree with you.

hanzi: 他被查出得了不治之症。
pinyin: tā bèi chá chū dé le bù zhì zhī zhèng。
english: He was found in incurable disease.

hanzi: 海水拍打著悬崖的底部。
pinyin: hǎi shuǐ pāi da著 xuán yá de dǐ bù。
english: The sea washes the base of the cliffs.

hanzi: 浴室的地面上都是水.
pinyin: yù shì de dì miàn shàng dōu shì shuǐ.
english: The bathroom floor was swimming with water.

hanzi: 冰山把那船撞出了窟窿.
pinyin: bīng shān bǎ nà chuán zhuàng chū le kū long.
english: The ship was holed by an iceberg.

hanzi: 裁缝把这套衣服做坏了。
pinyin: cái féng bǎ zhè tào yī fu zuò huài le。
english: The tailor has butchered this suit.

hanzi: 示威者与警察发生冲突.
pinyin: shì wēi zhě yù jǐng chá fā shēng chōng tū.
english: Demonstrators clashed with police.

hanzi: 她投诉说她受到委屈.
pinyin: tā tóu sù shuō tā shòu dào wěi qū.
english: She complained of the wrongs she had suffered.

hanzi: 被告还押候审一星期.
pinyin: bèi gào huán yā hòu shěn yī xīng qī.
english: The accused was remanded in custody for a week.

hanzi: 此庙由粗大的柱子支撑.
pinyin: cǐ miào yóu cū dà de zhù zi zhī chēng.
english: The temple is supported by massive columns.

hanzi: 久旱使很多人陷入饥饿。
pinyin: jiǔ hàn shǐ hěn duō rén xiàn rù jī è。
english: The long drought famished many people.

hanzi: 你一定要维护自己的权利.
pinyin: nǐ yī dìng yào wéi hù zì jǐ de quán lì.
english: You must stand up for your rights.

hanzi: 他沉浸在巨大的欢乐之中。
pinyin: tā chén jìn zài jù dà de huān lè zhī zhōng。
english: He is in immeasurable joy.

hanzi: 他把金属丝重新焊上去了。
pinyin: tā bǎ jīn shǔ sī chóng xīn hàn shàng qù le。
english: He soldered the wire back on.

hanzi: 他猛击对手的身体.
pinyin: tā měng jī duì shǒu de shēn tǐ.
english: He punished his opponent with fierce punches to the body.

hanzi: 这好消息使我精神大振。
pinyin: zhè hào xiāo xi shǐ wǒ jīng shén dà zhèn。
english: The good news lifted my spirits.

hanzi: 孩子们在沙坑中玩耍。
pinyin: hái zi men zài shā kēng zhòng wàn shuǎ。
english: The children were playing in the sand pit.

hanzi: 他逝世的消息使人震惊.
pinyin: tā shì shì de xiāo xi shǐ rén zhèn jīng.
english: The news of his death was a bombshell.

hanzi: 他一口气吹灭了蜡烛。
pinyin: tā yī kǒu qì chuī miè le là zhú。
english: He blew out the candles with a single puff.

hanzi: 财富并不一定带来快乐。
pinyin: cái fù bìng bù yī dìng dài lái kuài lè。
english: Money doesn't always bring happiness.

hanzi: 山的半中腰有一座亭子。
pinyin: shān de bàn zhòng yāo yǒu yī zuò tíng zi。
english: A pavilion is halfway up the hill.

hanzi: 他把凳子推到桌子下面。
pinyin: tā bǎ dèng zǐ tuī dào zhuō zi xià mian。
english: He pushed the stool under the table.

hanzi: 干旱造成农作物歉收。
pinyin: gān hàn zào chéng nóng zuò wù qiàn shōu。
english: The crops failed because of the drought.

hanzi: 他被雨浇得全身湿透。
pinyin: tā bèi yǔ jiāo de quán shēn shī tòu。
english: He was wet from head to foot from the shower.

hanzi: 他性情温和, 讨厌暴力.
pinyin: tā xìng qing wēn hé,  tǎo yàn bào lì.
english: Violence is abhorrent to his gentle nature.

hanzi: 卫兵派驻在监狱四周。
pinyin: wèi bīng pài zhù zài jiān yù sì zhōu。
english: Guards were stationed around the prison.

hanzi: 编辑把整段全删掉了.
pinyin: biān jí bǎ zhěng duàn quán shān diào le.
english: The editor struck out the whole paragraph.

hanzi: 她逐渐对同伴心怀不满.
pinyin: tā zhú jiàn duì tóng bàn xīn huái bù mǎn.
english: She began to weary of her companions.

hanzi: 她的头发几乎垂到了腰部.
pinyin: tā de tóu fa jī hū chuí dào le yāo bù.
english: Her hair nearly reached down to her waist.

hanzi: 他双脚散发的气味让人恶心.
pinyin: tā shuāng jué sàn fā de qì wèi ràng rén è xīn.
english: His feet smelt revolting.

hanzi: 汽车驶离道路跌进沟中。
pinyin: qì chē shǐ lí dào lù diē jìn gōu zhòng。
english: The car ran off the road into a ditch.

hanzi: 波浪撞击著港口的墙基.
pinyin: bō làng zhuàng jī著 gǎng kǒu de qiáng jī.
english: Waves dashed against the harbour wall.

hanzi: 湖里有许多鸭子在游泳。
pinyin: hú lǐ yǒu xǔ duō yā zi zài yóu yǒng。
english: There are many ducks swimming in the lake.

hanzi: 原稿已失, 这是副本.
pinyin: yuán gǎo yǐ shī,  zhè shì fù běn.
english: The original manuscript has been lost; this is a copy.

hanzi: 看守在深夜仍在站岗。
pinyin: kān shǒu zài shēn yè réng zài zhàn gǎng。
english: The guards are still on watch at midnight.

hanzi: 这些争论彼此势均力敌。
pinyin: zhè xie zhēng lùn bǐ cǐ shì jūn lì dí。
english: These arguments cancel each other out.

hanzi: 他表示了振振有词的抗议。
pinyin: tā biǎo shì le zhèn zhèn yǒu cí de kàng yì。
english: He expressed voluble protests.

hanzi: 我对他的粗暴提出抗议。
pinyin: wǒ duì tā de cū bào tí chū kàng yì。
english: I made remonstrance against his rudeness.

hanzi: 那小队攀登山的北坡.
pinyin: nà xiǎo duì pān dēng shān de běi pō.
english: The team climbed the north face of the mountain.

hanzi: 我感觉像是个新生的婴儿。
pinyin: wǒ gǎn jué xiàng shì gè xīn shēng de yīng ér。
english: I feel like a newborn baby.

hanzi: 要求承认某些权利.
pinyin: yāo qiú chéng rèn mǒu xiē quán lì.
english: There is a call for the concession of certain rights.

hanzi: 他和妻子沿着海滩散步。
pinyin: tā huò qī zi yán zhe hǎi tān sàn bù。
english: He promenaded along the beach with his wife.

hanzi: 这颗炸弹是遥控引爆的。
pinyin: zhè kē zhà dàn shì yáo kòng yǐn bào de。
english: The bomb was exploded by remote control.

hanzi: 你没锁门，太粗心了。
pinyin: nǐ mò suǒ mén， tài cū xīn le。
english: It was careless of you to leave the door unlocked.

hanzi: 这艘船拆毁了当废铁用.
pinyin: zhè sōu chuán chāi huǐ le dàng fèi tiě yòng.
english: The ship was broken up for scrap metal.

hanzi: 她向他表示衷心的感谢。
pinyin: tā xiàng tā biǎo shì zhōng xīn de gǎn xiè。
english: She gave him her heartfelt thanks.

hanzi: 英国的货币单位是镑.
pinyin: Yīng guó de huò bì dān wèi shì bàng.
english: The monetary unit of Great Britain is the pound.

hanzi: 久旱使很多人陷入饥饿。
pinyin: jiǔ hàn shǐ hěn duō rén xiàn rù jī è。
english: The long drought famished many people.

hanzi: 你不应相信任何陌生人。
pinyin: nǐ bù yìng xiāng xìn rèn hé mò shēng rén。
english: You shouldn't trust anyone strange.

hanzi: 妈妈对我总是关怀备至。
pinyin: mā ma duì wǒ zǒng shì guān huái bèi zhì。
english: Mother always cares about my studies.

hanzi: 恐怖分子占领了大使馆.
pinyin: kǒng bù fèn zǐ zhàn lǐng le dà shǐ guǎn.
english: The terrorists have occupied the Embassy.

hanzi: 他的身体被工作压垮了.
pinyin: tā de shēn tǐ bèi gōng zuò yà kuǎ le.
english: His health collapsed under the pressure of work.

hanzi: 他们在墓旁脱帽默哀.
pinyin: tā men zài mù páng tuō mào mò āi.
english: They took off their hats by the grave in silent salute.

hanzi: 他打仗回来, 少了一条腿.
pinyin: tā dǎ zhàng huí lai,  shào le yī tiáo tuǐ.
english: He came back from the war minus a leg.

hanzi: 我们不妨买一只新煎锅。
pinyin: wǒ men bù fāng mǎi yī zhǐ xīn jiān guō。
english: We may just as well buy a new frying pan.

hanzi: 吃糖太多就要损坏牙齿.
pinyin: jí táng tài duō jiù yào sǔn huài yá chǐ.
english: Too much sugar will rot your teeth away.

hanzi: 紧密的物质上牢固的或致密的
pinyin: jǐn mì de wù zhì shàng láo gù de huò zhì mì de
english: Firm or compact in substance.

hanzi: 我们已租了一幢办公楼。
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ zū le yī chuáng bàn gōng lóu。
english: We've taken a lease on an office building.

hanzi: 锻炼身体能使肌肉结实。
pinyin: duàn liàn shēn tǐ néng shǐ jī ròu jiē shi。
english: Exercise will firm up your muscles.

hanzi: 财富并不一定带来快乐。
pinyin: cái fù bìng bù yī dìng dài lái kuài lè。
english: Money doesn't always bring happiness.

pinyin: tā bǎ yào shi chā rù suǒ lǐ zhuǎn dòng。
english: He put the key in the lock and turned it.

hanzi: 警方把暴乱镇压了下去.
pinyin: jǐng fāng bǎ bào luàn zhèn yā le xià qu.
english: The police succeeded in quelling the riot.

hanzi: 喂，服务员，这汤太咸了。
pinyin: wèi， fú wù yuán， zhè tāng tài xián le。
english: I say, waiter, the soup is too salty.

hanzi: 她现在隶属于国防部。
pinyin: tā xiàn zài lì shǔ yú guó fáng bù。
english: She's on attachment to the Ministry of Defense.

hanzi: 人群汇集在宫殿的四周。
pinyin: rén qún huì jí zài gōng diàn de sì zhōu。
english: The crowds concentrated round the palace.

pinyin: wǒ men zhù zài hěn fù yù de zhù zhái qū.
english: We live in a rather rich neighbourhood.

hanzi: 我沿着弯曲的山路回家。
pinyin: wǒ yán zhe wān qǔ de shān lù huí jiā。
english: I went home along a winding mountain path.

pinyin: tā shì dāng dài zuì yǒu cái zhì de rén.
english: He is one of the greatest minds of the age.

hanzi: 他过了一段悲惨的生活。
pinyin: tā guò le yī duàn bēi cǎn de shēng huó。
english: He has lived one section of miserable life.

hanzi: 他分别审查每一证据。
pinyin: tā fēn bié shěn chá měi yī zhèng jù。
english: He examined each piece of evidence in isolation.

hanzi: 那时他没暴露他的身份。
pinyin: nà shí tā mò bào lù tā de shēn fèn。
english: He didn't reveal his identity at that time.

pinyin: zhè chuáng lóu fáng de wū dǐng bù láo kào。
english: The roof of the building is unsound.

pinyin: dí rén de jūn jiàn fēng suǒ le gǎng kǒu。
english: The enemy's ships blockaded the harbor.

pinyin: shòu jīng de niú qún xiàng mù chǎng yǒng qù.
english: The cattle stampeded towards the farm.

pinyin: tā nà shí qià hǎo zòng nà li lù guò。
english: He happened to pass by there at that time.

hanzi: 湖里有许多鸭子在游泳。
pinyin: hú lǐ yǒu xǔ duō yā zi zài yóu yǒng。
english: There are many ducks swimming in the lake.

pinyin: shāo píng cè miàn yǒu kè dù biāo zhì.
english: The graduations are marked on the side of the flask.

pinyin: shí zi dǎ zhòng le wǒ tóu bù de cè miàn.
english: The stone struck me on the side of the head.

pinyin: wǒ ǒu ěr wǎn shang chū qù kàn kan xì.
english: I enjoy an occasional night out at the theatre.

pinyin: tā sì hu xiàn zài zhù zài zhè gè qū yù。
english: He lives seemingly now in this area.

hanzi: 我以零售方式买来这些牛奶。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ líng shòu fāng shì mǎi lái zhè xie niú nǎi。
english: I bought the milk retail.

pinyin: jūn shì zhǎng mìng lìng shì bīng kào lǒng.

english: Plants must have oxygen in order to live.

pinyin: tā yǐ huái yí de yǎn guāng zhù shì著 wǒ.

pinyin: bǎ nǐ de wài yī guà zài nèi gè guà gōu shàng.

pinyin: duì zì jǐ huái yǒu qí tè de yōu yuè gǎn
english: Fantastic ideas about her own superiority.

pinyin: wǒ de zhù shǒu jiàng cāo zòng lù yīn jī.

pinyin: nà guǎ fù huò hái zi men yī pín rú xǐ.
english: The widow and children are very poorly off.

pinyin: nǐ de zhè xiàng tí yì bù shèn qià dàng.

pinyin: wǒ de zhù shǒu jiàng cāo zòng lù yīn jī.
english: My assistant will operate the tape-recorder.

pinyin: tā shū qù gǒu de pí máo zhòng dì ní tǔ。

pinyin: huā bàn zài yáng guāng xià zhāng kāi le.
english: The petals of the flowers expanded in the sunshine.

pinyin: jǐn mì de wù zhì shàng láo gù de huò zhì mì de

pinyin: dà bù fen yǒu xué wèn de rén dōu hěn qiān xū。
english: Most learned men are modest.

pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ bǎ wài tào guà zài gōu zi shàng。

pinyin: jiāng jūn bèi shòu yǔ zuì gāo quán lì。
english: The general was girded with the supreme power.

pinyin: cí běi jí yù cí běi jí hù xiāng pái chì.

pinyin: dào guì zi nà r bǎ guǒ jiàng qǔ xia lai。
english: Go to the cupboard and get down the jam.

pinyin: tā shū tou de shí hou wǒ yī zhí kàn著 tā。

pinyin: tā zhòu著 méi tóu yòng xīn de sī kǎo.
english: His brow corrugated with the effort of thinking.

pinyin: rén tǐ de zǔ zhī shì yóu xì bāo gòu chéng de.
english: Human tissue is made up of cells.

pinyin: yì huì jué dìng fèi chú nà xiàng fǎ lìng。
english: The Congress decided to repeal the law.

pinyin: tā hěn qiān xū,  yuè yú jiē shòu yì jiàn。

english: The firework exploded in a shower of sparks.

pinyin: tā shòu dào shàng si de yán lì chì zé。

english: The wall declined slightly on account of the earthquake.

hanzi: 把你的外衣挂在那个挂钩上.
pinyin: bǎ nǐ de wài yī guà zài nèi gè guà gōu shàng.
english: Hang your coat (up) on that hook.

pinyin: yú fú dào shuǐ miàn shàng bǔ zhuō kūn chóng。

pinyin: shāo píng cè miàn yǒu kè dù biāo zhì.
english: The graduations are marked on the side of the flask.

english: Recite the poem (right) from the (very) beginning.

english: She put some noodles in the aluminum saucepan.

english: A small body or accumulation of ore.

pinyin: tā yǐ jīng chāo chū fǎ yuàn de quán xiàn。
english: It has beyond the competence of the court.

pinyin: pí fū shài de guò fèn jiù néng qǐ zhòu wén.

pinyin: huǎn chōng qì shǐ zhèn dòng jiǎn shǎo le xǔ duō.

pinyin: tā duì dí rén yǒu qiáng liè de chóu hèn。
english: He has a strong animosity against his enemy.

english: Steam condenses into water when cooling down.

english: Volumes of black smoke poured fromthe chimney.

pinyin: lǎo shī bù yīng gāi tǐ fá xué sheng。
english: A teacher should not give students corporal punishment.

hanzi: 她眼睛里闪烁著调皮的光辉.
pinyin: tā yǎn jīng lǐ shǎn shuò著 tiáo pí de guāng huī.
english: Her eyes twinkled with mischief.

hanzi: 你不能毫无根据地逮捕他。
pinyin: nǐ bù néng háo wú gēn jù dì dài bǔ tā。
english: You shouldn't arrest him without warrant.

hanzi: 请把绳子挂在那根钉子上。
pinyin: qǐng bǎ shéng zi guà zài nà gēn dīng zi shàng。
english: Please hook the rope over the nail.

hanzi: 她眼睛里闪烁著调皮的光辉.
pinyin: tā yǎn jīng lǐ shǎn shuò著 tiáo pí de guāng huī.
english: Her eyes twinkled with mischief.

hanzi: 我在这座陌生的城市迷路了。
pinyin: wǒ zài zhè zuò mò shēng de chéng shì mí lù le。

pinyin: wǎn shuāng néng dòng sǐ yuán zhòng dì zhí wù。
english: Late frosts are ruination for the garden.

pinyin: tā yī dìng qiān fāng bǎi jì zǔ zhǐ nǐ.
english: He'll use any trick in the book to stop you.

pinyin: rù qīn zhě bǎ cūn zhèn biàn wèi fèi xū。
english: The invader laid towns and villages in ruins.

pinyin: yǔ zhòu tàn suǒ réng chǔ yú chū jí jiē duàn

pinyin: nèi gè liú máng kào xìng piàn wéi shēng。
english: The rascal lives on the credulity of the people.

hanzi: 有些人睡觉时磨牙齿。
pinyin: yǒu xiē rén shuì jiào shí mò yá chǐ。
english: Some people grind their teeth while they are asleep.

english: The blind man was seen cross the street.

hanzi: 她加入了大学里的艺术协会。
pinyin: tā jiā rù le dà xué lǐ de yì shù xié huì。
english: She joined the university art society.

hanzi: 与其说她善良不如说她单纯。

english: She is not so kind as simple.

pinyin: tā tái qǐ tou， níng wàng zhuó tiān kōng。
english: He rose his head and stared at the firmament.

hanzi: 我的狗不在旁边我就很寂寞。
pinyin: wǒ de gǒu bù zài páng biān wǒ jiù hěn jì mò。
english: I feel very lonely without my dog.

hanzi: 我欣赏他那富有诗意的话语。
pinyin: wǒ xīn shǎng tā nà fù yǒu shī yì de huà yù。
english: I appreciate his poetic utterances.

pinyin: hóng shuǐ huǐ huài le dà liàng nóng zuò wù。
english: The flood did a lot of damage to the crops.
