pinyin: bà gōng zhě yóu xíng tōng guò shì zhōng xīn.
english: The strikers paraded through the city centre.

hanzi: 晚上大街上灯火辉煌.
pinyin: wǎn shang dà jiē shàng dēng huǒ huī huáng.
english: The high street is a blaze of lights in the evening.

hanzi: 烟从烟囱里一股一股地喷出来.
pinyin: yān zòng yān cōng lǐ yī gǔ yī gǔ de pèn chū lái.
english: Smoke puffed from the chimney.

hanzi: 太阳照耀着美丽的城市。
pinyin: tài yáng zhào yào zhuó měi lì de chéng shì。
english: The sun shine bright in the beautiful city.

hanzi: 皮肤晒得过分就能起皱纹.
pinyin: pí fū shài de guò fèn jiù néng qǐ zhòu wén.
english: Too much sunbathing will wrinkle your skin.

hanzi: 许多新税收都是有争议的。
pinyin: xǔ duō xīn shuì shōu dōu shì yǒu zhēng yì de。
english: Many of the new taxes are controversial.

hanzi: 她出于情感的缘故做了此事。
pinyin: tā chū yú qíng gǎn de yuán gù zuò le cǐ shì。
english: She did it for sentimental reasons.

hanzi: 我衷心希望他不会回来。
pinyin: wǒ zhōng xīn xī wàng tā bù huì huí lai。
english: It's my devout hope that he will not come back.

hanzi: 谨慎是那人性格的本质。
pinyin: jǐn shèn shì nà rén xìng gé de běn zhì。
english: Caution is the essence of that man's character.

hanzi: 他们订出了该城的防御计划.
pinyin: tā men dìng chū le gāi chéng de fáng yù jì huà.
english: They planned the defence of the town.

hanzi: 他被任命为驻美国大使。
pinyin: tā bèi rèn mìng wèi zhù Měi guó dà shǐ。
english: He was appointed ambassador to the United States.

hanzi: 这只母鹅比那只鸭子大多了。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ mǔ é bì nà zhǐ yā zi dà duō le。
english: This goose is much larger than the duck.

hanzi: 学校下个月上旬开始放假。
pinyin: xué xiào xià gè yuè shàng xún kāi shǐ fàng jià。
english: School will close early next month.

hanzi: 那水坝在水的压力下决口了.
pinyin: nà shuǐ bà zài shuǐ de yā lì xià jué kǒu le.
english: The dam burst under the weight of water.

hanzi: 她很高兴去掉了这个包袱。
pinyin: tā hěn gāo xìng qù diào le zhè gè bāo fu。
english: She was glad to be relieved of this burden.

hanzi: 我们的债务总计为五千美元。
pinyin: wǒ men de zhài wù zǒng jì wèi wǔ qiān měi yuán。
english: We have debts totaling 5000 dollars.

hanzi: 北方的大荒原地广人稀。
pinyin: běi fāng de dà huāng yuán de guǎng rén xī。
english: The wasteland of the north is scarcely populated.

hanzi: 她把葡萄放到一个大盘子上。
pinyin: tā bǎ pú tao fàng dào yī gè dà pán zi shàng。
english: She put the grapes onto the platter.

hanzi: 他狠命地抽打那头可怜的驴.
pinyin: tā hěn mìng de chōu dǎ nà tou kě lián de lu:2.
english: He gave the poor donkey a terrible lashing.

hanzi: 我靠父母扶养勉强过活.
pinyin: wǒ kào fù mǔ fú yǎng miǎn qiǎng guò huó.
english: I can just scrape along on what my parents give me.

hanzi: 她忍气吞声地继续进行下去。
pinyin: tā rěn qì tūn shēng de jì xù jìn xíng xià qu。
english: She swallowed her anger and carried on.

hanzi: 桌子上有一层薄薄的尘土。
pinyin: zhuō zi shàng yǒu yī céng bò bò de chén tǔ。
english: There is a fine layer of dust on the desk.

hanzi: 生理伤残会引起心理苦闷.
pinyin: shēng lǐ shāng cán kuài yǐn qǐ xīn lǐ kǔ mèn.
english: Physical disability causes mental anguish.

hanzi: 他用拳头猛击了一下桌子.
pinyin: tā yòng quán tou měng jī le yī xià zhuō zi.
english: He struck the table a heavy blow with his fist.

hanzi: 这艘船被敌人的鱼雷击沉了。
pinyin: zhè sōu chuán bèi dí rén de yú léi jī chén le。
english: The ship was sunk by an enemy torpedo.

hanzi: 机器安装在混凝土基座上.
pinyin: jī qì ān zhuāng zài hùn níng tǔ jī zuò shàng.
english: The machine rests on a bed of concrete.

hanzi: 气候潮湿，把书都霉坏了。
pinyin: qì hòu cháo shī， bǎ shū dōu méi huài le。
english: The dampness of the climate decayed the books.

hanzi: 治疗抑制了病情的发展。
pinyin: zhì liáo yì zhì le bìng qíng de fā zhǎn。
english: The treatment arrested the growth of the disease.

hanzi: 指明它的来处纯洁而珍贵。
pinyin: zhǐ míng tā de lái chù chún jié ér zhēn guì。
english: How pure, how dear their dwelling-place.

hanzi: 运兵船由两艘军舰护航。
pinyin: yùn bīng chuán yóu liǎng sōu jūn jiàn hù háng。
english: The troop ship was escorted by two warships.

hanzi: 植物的幼苗常因严寒而冻死.
pinyin: zhí wù de yòu miáo cháng yīn yán hán ér dòng sǐ.
english: Young plants are often killed by frost.

hanzi: 他就财产与他们进行商议。
pinyin: tā jiù cái chǎn yù tā men jìn xíng shāng yì。
english: He bargained with them for the property.

hanzi: 这条棍子灌了铅增加了分量.
pinyin: zhè tiáo gùn zi guàn le qiān zēng jiā le fèn liàng.
english: The stick had been weighted with lead.

hanzi: 许多语言都以拉丁语为基础。
pinyin: xǔ duō yǔ yán dōu yǐ Lā dīng yǔ wèi jī chǔ。
english: Many languages have Latin as their base.

hanzi: 她看样子随时都可能垮下来.
pinyin: tā kàn yàng zi suí shí dōu kě néng kuǎ xia lai.
english: She looked ready to collapse at any minute.

hanzi: 奇迹是与大自然的力量相对的.
pinyin: qí jì shì yù dà zì rán de lì liang xiāng duì de.
english: Miracles are contrary to nature.

hanzi: 别在快餐馆耽误太长时间。
pinyin: biè zài kuài cān guǎn dān wu tài cháng shí jiān。
english: Don't stay too long at the snack bar.

hanzi: 试图说服他未免太愚蠢了。
pinyin: shì tú shuō fú tā wèi miǎn tài yú chǔn le。
english: It is a great folly to try to persuade him.

hanzi: 他虽然如此年轻，却很慎重。
pinyin: tā suī rán rú cǐ nián qīng， què hěn shèn zhòng。
english: Young as he was, he was prudent.

hanzi: 新抹的泥灰在几个小时内能干
pinyin: xīn mò de nì huī zài jǐ ge xiǎo shí nèi néng gàn
english: Fresh plaster will fix in a few hours.

hanzi: 他剪下一串葡萄招待我们。
pinyin: tā jiǎn xià yī chuàn pú tao zhāo dài wǒ men。
english: He cut off a bunch of grapes to entertain us.

hanzi: 渡船摇摇晃晃, 他感到恶心.
pinyin: dù chuán yáo yáo huàng huàng,  tā gǎn dào è xīn.
english: The sway of the ferry made him feel sick.

hanzi: 一场示威游行将要发生。
pinyin: yī chǎng shì wēi yóu xíng jiāng yào fā shēng。
english: A disorderly demonstration will take place.

hanzi: 马听到爆炸声受了惊。
pinyin: mǎ tīng dào bào zhà shēng shòu le jīng。
english: The horse took a fright at the sound of the explosion.

hanzi: 攀登的人脚踩的地方要很牢固.
pinyin: pān dēng de rén jué cǎi de dì fang yào hěn láo gù.
english: A climber needs secure footholds.

hanzi: 我厌倦了你那没完没了的牢骚.
pinyin: wǒ yàn juàn le nǐ nà mò wán mò le de láo sāo.
english: I'm tired of your unending complaints.

hanzi: 你得雇个人监督这一工程.
pinyin: nǐ de gù gè rén jiān dū zhè yī gōng chéng.
english: You must employ someone to oversee the project.

hanzi: 灯塔在远处发出闪烁的光.
pinyin: dēng tǎ zài yuǎn chù fā chū shǎn shuò de guāng.
english: A lighthouse was flashing in the distance.

hanzi: 敌人冲破了我们的防御工事。
pinyin: dí rén chōng pò le wǒ men de fáng yù gōng shì。
english: The enemy brushed aside our defences.

hanzi: 解放使我们的生活有了保障。
pinyin: jiě fàng shǐ wǒ men de shēng huó yǒu le bǎo zhàng。
english: Liberation brought security to us.

hanzi: 搜索队在荒草地分散行动.
pinyin: sōu suǒ duì zài huāng cǎo dì fēn sàn xíng dòng.
english: The search party spread out over the moor.

hanzi: 政府打算削减军备开支。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ dǎ suàn xuē jiǎn jūn bèi kāi zhī。
english: The government intends to cut expenditure on arms.

hanzi: 他那专横的口气激怒了大家。
pinyin: tā nà zhuān hèng de kǒu qì jī nù le dà jiā。
english: His peremptory tone irritated everybody.

hanzi: 我方坦克突破了敌人的防线.
pinyin: wǒ fāng tǎn kè tū pò le dí rén de fáng xiàn.
english: Our tanks have breached the enemy defences.

hanzi: 愚蠢的尝试多半是要失败的。
pinyin: yú chǔn de cháng shì duō bàn shì yào shī bài de。
english: A feeble attempt is liable to fail.

hanzi: 他娶了一位非常美丽的姑娘。
pinyin: tā qǔ le yī wèi fēi cháng měi lì de gū niang。
english: He married a girl of extraordinary beauty.

hanzi: 那个幼儿园里的孩子很多。
pinyin: nèi gè yòu ér yuán lǐ de hái zi hěn duō。
english: There are many children in the kindergarten.

hanzi: 他们有一些标准纯银餐具。
pinyin: tā men yǒu yī xiē biāo zhǔn chún yín cān jù。
english: They have some sterling silver cutlery.

hanzi: 村子里的居民知道这件丑事。
pinyin: cūn zi lǐ de jū mín zhī dào zhè jiàn chǒu shì。
english: The villagers knew about the scandal.

hanzi: 她让我吃些药片以利睡眠.
pinyin: tā ràng wǒ jí xiē yào piàn yǐ lì shuì mián.
english: She prescribed some pills to help me to sleep.

hanzi: 我会给你一磅作为先付部分。
pinyin: wǒ kuài jǐ nǐ yī bàng zuò wéi xiān fù bù fen。
english: I will give you a pound in part payment.

hanzi: 我方坦克突破了敌人的防线.
pinyin: wǒ fāng tǎn kè tū pò le dí rén de fáng xiàn.
english: Our tanks have breached the enemy defences.

hanzi: 敌人袭击了我们的运货马车队。
pinyin: dí rén xí jī le wǒ men de yùn huò mǎ chē duì。
english: The enemy attacked our wagon train.

hanzi: 幸福和财富不能混为一谈。
pinyin: xìng fú huò cái fù bù néng hùn wèi yī tán。
english: One can not identify happiness with wealth.

hanzi: 这些药丸有镇静催眠作用.
pinyin: zhè xie yào wán yǒu zhèn jìng cuī mián zuò yòng.
english: These pills will relax you and make you sleep.

hanzi: 这个城镇煤气供应得很好。
pinyin: zhè gè chéng zhèn méi qì gōng yìng de hěn hào。
english: We are well served with gas in this town.

hanzi: 把绳子绑牢，免得它松脱。
pinyin: bǎ shéng zi bǎng láo， miǎn de tā sōng tuō。
english: Bind the rope fast lest it should come loose.

hanzi: 汽车冲出路面，陷进沟里。
pinyin: qì chē chòng chū lù miàn， xiàn jìn gōu lǐ。
english: The car careered off the road into a ditch.

hanzi: 我因为喉咙痛没有去上班。
pinyin: wǒ yīn wèi hóu lóng tòng méi yǒu qù shàng bān。
english: I was off work because of a sore throat.

hanzi: 我们开始探索宇宙的奥秘。
pinyin: wǒ men kāi shǐ tàn suǒ yǔ zhòu de ào mì。
english: We begin to plumb the mysteries of the universe.

hanzi: 有两个镜头被审查员剪掉了.
pinyin: yǒu liǎng gè jìng tóu bèi shěn chá yuán jiǎn diào le.
english: Two scenes were cut by the censor.

hanzi: 幸亏我当时系上了安全带。
pinyin: xìng kuī wǒ dāng shí xì shàng le ān quán dài。
english: Thanks to I had tied then the safety belt.

hanzi: 这个男孩表现出很高的智慧。
pinyin: zhè gè nán hái biǎo xiàn chū hěn gāo de zhì huì。
english: The boy evinces great intelligence.

hanzi: 桃儿容易碰伤--要轻拿轻放.
pinyin: táo er róng yì pèng shāng-- yào qīng ná qīng fàng.
english: Don't drop the peaches they bruise easily.

hanzi: 这条棍子灌了铅增加了分量.
pinyin: zhè tiáo gùn zi guàn le qiān zēng jiā le fèn liàng.
english: The stick had been weighted with lead.

hanzi: 火药易爆炸的混合物，如弹药
pinyin: huǒ yào yì bào zhà de hùn hé wù， rú dàn yào
english: An explosive mixture, such as gunpowder.

hanzi: 他们一再发牢骚把他惹火了.
pinyin: tā men yī zài fà láo sāo bǎ tā rě huǒ le.
english: He was irritated by their perpetual complaints.

hanzi: 她的眼里流露出受委屈的神情.
pinyin: tā de yǎn lǐ liú lù chū shòu wěi qū de shén qíng.
english: Her eyes took on a hurt expression.

hanzi: 裹在他伤口上的纱布脏了。
pinyin: guǒ zài tā shāng kǒu shàng de shā bù zàng le。
english: The gauze patch applied to his wound is dirty.

hanzi: 警方已编制了涉嫌者名单.
pinyin: jǐng fāng yǐ biān zhì le shè xián zhě míng dān.
english: The police have compiled a list of suspects.

hanzi: 老一辈的各类人都在那里.
pinyin: lǎo yī bèi de gè lèi rén dōu zài nà li.
english: Many representatives of the older generation were there.

hanzi: 信中夹钞票最好寄挂号.
pinyin: xìn zhòng jiá chāo piào zuì hǎo jì guà hào.
english: It's wise to register letters containing banknotes.

hanzi: 我们赞赏着壮丽的山景。
pinyin: wǒ men zàn shǎng zhuó zhuàng lì de shān jǐng。
english: We admired the splendor of the mountain scenery.

hanzi: 她匆匆忙忙向电报局去了。
pinyin: tā cōng cōng máng máng xiàng diàn bào jú qù le。
english: She went to the telegraph office in a hurry.

hanzi: 他突然在冰上摔了个屁股蹲儿。
pinyin: tā tū rán zài bīng shàng shuāi le gè pì gu dūn er。
english: Suddenly he sat down on the ice.

hanzi: 把你的游泳衣里的水拧出去.
pinyin: bǎ nǐ de yóu yǒng yì lǐ de shuǐ nìng chū qù.
english: Wring the water out of your wet bathing costume.

hanzi: 他一到就会来这里汇报的。
pinyin: tā yī dào jiù kuài lái zhè lǐ huì bào de。
english: He will report back here as soon as he arrives.

hanzi: 现在卖报纸利润很少。
pinyin: xiàn zài mài bào zhǐ lì rùn hěn shǎo。
english: There is very little profit in selling newspapers at present.

hanzi: 每一排瓦都搭在下面的一排上.
pinyin: měi yī pǎi wǎ dōu dā zài xià miàn de yī pái shàng.
english: Each row of tiles laps the one below.

hanzi: 早期的手稿保存下来的不多.
pinyin: zǎo qī de shǒu gǎo bǎo cún xia lai de bù duō.
english: Few of the early manuscripts have been preserved.

hanzi: 她很聪明, 倒也很谦虚.
pinyin: tā hěn cōng míng,  dào yě hěn qiān xū.
english: Though very intelligent, she is nevertheless rather modest.

hanzi: 这窗帘和你那块地毯不相配.
pinyin: zhè chuāng lián huò nǐ nà kuài dì tǎn bù xiāng pèi.
english: These curtains won't match your carpet.

hanzi: 这个词是一种野兽的名称。
pinyin: zhè gè cí shì yī zhòng yě shòu de míng chēng。
english: This word denotes a certain kind of animal.

hanzi: 确定，鉴定对效力的正式断言
pinyin: què dìng， jiàn dìng duì xiào lì de zhèng shì duàn yán
english: A formal assertion of validity.

hanzi: 那条鲸鱼不住地用尾巴击水.
pinyin: nà tiáo jīng yú bú zhù de yòng wěi ba jī shuǐ.
english: The whale thrashed the water with its tail.

hanzi: 这笔交易完全是一个奇迹。
pinyin: zhè bǐ jiāo yì wán quán shì yī gè qí jì。
english: This transaction is nothing less than a miracle.

hanzi: 我老婆有一般铁一般的任性脾气。
pinyin: wǒ lǎo pó yǒu yì bān tiě yì bān de rèn xìng pí qì。
english: My wife has a whim of iron.

hanzi: 六十岁时, 他开始学俄语。
pinyin: liù shí suì shí,  tā kāi shǐ xué é yǔ。
english: At the age of sixty he took up the study of Russian.

hanzi: 我的朋友在威尔士的农场种地。
pinyin: wǒ de péng you zài wēi ěr shì de nóng chǎng zhòng dì。
english: My friend is farming in Wales.

hanzi: 他尝尝汤, 看是否够咸.
pinyin: tā cháng cháng tāng,  kàn shì fǒu gòu xián.
english: He tasted the soup to see if he had put enough salt in it.

hanzi: 病人的情况在夜间恶化了.
pinyin: bìng rén de qíng kuàng zài yè jiān è huà le.
english: The patient's condition worsened during the night.

hanzi: 这笔交易完全是一个奇迹。
pinyin: zhè bǐ jiāo yì wán quán shì yī gè qí jì。
english: This transaction is nothing less than a miracle.

hanzi: 戴着的皇冠是王权的象征。
pinyin: dài zhuó de huáng guān shì wáng quán de xiàng zhēng。
english: A diadem was worn as sign of royal power.

hanzi: 他的急躁的脾气使他令人讨厌。
pinyin: tā de jí zào de pí qì shǐ tā lìng rén tǎo yàn。
english: His hasty temper made him offensive.

hanzi: 宇航员有特殊的呼吸装置。
pinyin: yǔ háng yuán yǒu tè shū de hū xī zhuāng zhì。
english: The astronauts have special breathing apparatus.

hanzi: 香烟在地毯上烧了一个窟窿.
pinyin: xiāng yān zài dì tǎn shàng shāo le yī gè kū long.
english: The cigarette burnt a hole in the carpet.

hanzi: 我老婆有一般铁一般的任性脾气。
pinyin: wǒ lǎo pó yǒu yì bān tiě yì bān de rèn xìng pí qì。
english: My wife has a whim of iron.

hanzi: 水在阳光下不久就蒸发了。
pinyin: shuǐ zài yáng guāng xià bù jiǔ jiù zhēng fā le。
english: The water soon evaporated in the sunshine.

hanzi: 云是由水蒸汽凝缩而成的。
pinyin: yún shì yóu shuǐ zhēng qì níng suō ér chéng de。
english: A cloud is a condensation of water vapour.

hanzi: 装备摄影室的开支很大.
pinyin: zhuāng bèi shè yǐng shì de kāi zhī hěn dà.
english: The equipment of the photographic studio was expensive.

hanzi: 超级市场销售各种货物。
pinyin: chāo jí shì chǎng xiāo shòu gè zhǒng huò wù。
english: The supermarket sells goods of all descriptions.

hanzi: 没有人能够阻止他去冒险。
pinyin: méi yǒu rén néng gòu zǔ zhǐ tā qù mào xiǎn。
english: Nobody can prevent him from running the risk.

hanzi: 我想要一些没有酒精的饮料。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng yào yī xiē méi yǒu jiǔ jīng de yǐn liào。
english: I would like some temperance drinks.

hanzi: 他的陈述促使他们去调查。
pinyin: tā de chén shù cù shǐ tā men qù diào chá。
english: His representation influenced them to investigate.

hanzi: 他侵吞了其他人应得的钱。
pinyin: tā qīn tūn le qí tā rén yīng dé de qián。
english: He screwed the others out of their share of the money.

hanzi: 他打开了灯，拍松了靠垫。
pinyin: tā dǎ kāi le dēng， pāi sōng le kào diàn。
english: He switched on the light and plumped up the cushions.

hanzi: 我宁可死，也不愿忍辱偷生。
pinyin: wǒ nìng kě sǐ， yě bù yuàn rěn rǔ tōu shēng。
english: I would rather die than live in disgrace.

hanzi: 我晕船, 恨不得立刻上岸.
pinyin: wǒ yùn chuán,  hèn bù dé lì kè shàng àn.
english: I'm no sailor and I couldn't wait to reach dry land.

hanzi: 日子久了, 你的悲哀是会消失的。
pinyin: rì zi jiǔ le,  nǐ de bēi āi shì kuài xiāo shī de。
english: Your sorrow will wear off in time.

hanzi: 在公共汽车上要谨防扒手。
pinyin: zài gōng gòng qì chē shàng yào jǐn fáng pá shǒu。
english: Please guard against pickpockets on the bus.

hanzi: 我将在圣诞节前后去拜访你。
pinyin: wǒ jiàng zài Shèng dàn jié qián hòu qù bài fǎng nǐ。
english: I will visit you around Christmas.

hanzi: 法国一度是占有殖民地的强国.
pinyin: fǎ guó yī dù shì zhàn yǒu zhí mín dì de qiáng guó.
english: France was once a colonial power.

hanzi: 警察和示威群众混战起来。
pinyin: jǐng chá huò shì wēi qún zhòng hùn zhàn qǐ lai。
english: The police scuffled with the demonstrators.

hanzi: 她把窗台漆上鲜艳的颜色。
pinyin: tā bǎ chuāng tái qī shàng xiān yàn de yán sè。
english: She painted the window sills a bright colour.

hanzi: 撞了个窟窿的油船正在喷油。
pinyin: zhuàng le gè kū long de yóu chuán zhèng zài pèn yóu。
english: The holed tanker was disgorging oil.

hanzi: 雇主解雇工人导致了罢工事件。
pinyin: gù zhǔ jiě gù gōng rén dǎo zhì le bà gōng shì jiàn。
english: The dismissals led to a strike.

hanzi: 一群人很快便聚集在他的周围。
pinyin: yī qún rén hěn kuài pián jù jí zài tā de zhōu wéi。
english: A crowd soon gathered round him.

hanzi: 他看著自己的孩子, 充满自豪.
pinyin: tā kàn著 zì jǐ de hái zi,  chōng mǎn zì háo.
english: He looked at his children with evident pride.

hanzi: 他打算把财产转让给儿子。
pinyin: tā dǎ suàn bǎ cái chǎn zhuǎn ràng jǐ ér zi。
english: He intends to transfer the property to his son.

hanzi: 做饭的味道顺着走廊飘过来。
pinyin: zuò fàn de wèi dao shùn zhuó zǒu láng piāo guò lai。
english: Cooking smells wafted along the hall.

hanzi: 彼得去年申请了英国国籍。
pinyin: Bǐ dé qù nián shēn qǐng le Yīng guó guó jí。
english: Peter applied for British citizenship last year.

hanzi: 那省的大部分地区地势平坦。
pinyin: nà xǐng de dà bù fen dì qū dì shì píng tǎn。
english: Most of the province is as flat as a pancake.

hanzi: 河水冲破堤岸, 淹没了山谷.
pinyin: hé shuǐ chōng pò dī àn,  yān mò le shān gǔ.
english: The river had burst its banks and flooded the valley.

hanzi: 她发觉地毯下面有许多尘土.
pinyin: tā fā jué dì tǎn xià mian yǒu xǔ duō chén tǔ.
english: She found a lot of dust underneath the carpet.

hanzi: 我怀疑，不，我肯定他错了。
pinyin: wǒ huái yí， bù， wǒ kěn dìng tā cuò le。
english: I suspect, nay, I am certain, that he is wrong.

hanzi: 截导管这种管子的一部分或一段
pinyin: jié dǎo guǎn zhè zhǒng guǎn zi de yī bù fen huò yī duàn
english: A section or piece of such a tube.

hanzi: 他们举起拳头向领袖致敬.
pinyin: tā men jǔ qǐ quán tou xiàng lǐng xiù zhì jìng.
english: They raised their fists in salute to their leader.

hanzi: 再向前展望到本世纪末....
pinyin: zài xiàng qián zhǎn wàng dào běn shì jì mò....
english: Looking farther forward to the end of the century...

hanzi: 这些柱子支撑著屋顶的重量.
pinyin: zhè xie zhù zi zhī chēng著 wū dǐng de zhòng liàng.
english: These pillars carry the weight of the roof.

hanzi: 病人因出现并发症而死亡。
pinyin: bìng rén yīn chū xiàn bìng fā zhèng ér sǐ wáng。
english: Complications set in, and the patient died.

hanzi: 声波是根据其振幅来测量的.
pinyin: shēng bō shì gēn jù qí zhèn fú lái cè liàng de.
english: Sound waves are measured by their amplitude.

hanzi: 这种液体天冷时凝结得快些.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yè tǐ tiān lěng shí níng jié de kuài xiē.
english: This liquid gels faster in cold weather.

hanzi: 珠母般的具有珍珠般的光泽的
pinyin: zhū mǔ bān de jù yǒu zhēn zhū bān de guāng zé de
english: Having a luster resembling that of pearls.

hanzi: 动物的粪便可以作为肥料使用。
pinyin: dòng wù de fèn biàn kě yǐ zuò wéi féi liào shǐ yòng。
english: Animal dung may be used as manure.

hanzi: 那车在高速公路上飞速行驶。
pinyin: nà jū zài gāo sù gōng lù shàng fēi sù xíng shǐ。
english: The car is whizzing along the motorway.

hanzi: 在英国，车辆必须靠左行驶。
pinyin: zài Yīng guó， chē liàng bì xū kào zuǒ xíng shǐ。
english: In England traffic must keep to the left.

hanzi: 他坐在摇椅里前后摇晃着。
pinyin: tā zuò zài yáo yǐ lǐ qián hòu yáo huàng zhuó。
english: He rocked back and forth in his rocking chair.

hanzi: 人应当倾听自己的内心感觉。
pinyin: rén yīng dāng qīng tīng zì jǐ de nèi xīn gǎn jué。
english: He should listen to his intimate feelings.

hanzi: 这条峡谷里的景色非常美丽。
pinyin: zhè tiáo xiá gǔ lǐ de jǐng sè fēi cháng měi lì。
english: The scene is very beautiful in this glen.

hanzi: 本图所示为木材的纵剖面.
pinyin: běn tú suǒ shì wèi mù cái de zòng pōu miàn.
english: This illustration shows a section through the timber.

hanzi: 他的名字成了残酷无情的别称.
pinyin: tā de míng zi chéng le cán kù wú qíng de bié chēng.
english: His name has becomea byword for cruelty.

hanzi: 那艺术家的罩衣上沾满了颜料.
pinyin: nà yì shù jiā de zhào yì shàng zhān mǎn le yán liào.
english: The artist's smock was covered in paint.

hanzi: 他在很亮的阳光下眯起了眼睛。
pinyin: tā zài hěn liàng de yáng guāng xià mǐ qǐ le yǎn jīng。
english: He squinted in the bright sunlight.

hanzi: 她是位眼光敏锐的艺术评论家.
pinyin: tā shì wèi yǎn guāng mǐn ruì de yì shù píng lùn jiā.
english: She is a very discerning art critic.

hanzi: 他们要制止富人掠夺穷人。
pinyin: tā men yào zhì zhǐ fù rén lu:è duó qióng rén。
english: They would stop the rich from robbing the poor.

hanzi: 那艺术家的罩衣上沾满了颜料.
pinyin: nà yì shù jiā de zhào yì shàng zhān mǎn le yán liào.
english: The artist's smock was covered in paint.

hanzi: 他们把火车的车厢连接好。
pinyin: tā men bǎ huǒ chē de chē xiāng lián jiē hào。
english: They coupled the carriages of the train together.

hanzi: 他因阻碍公路交通而受控告。
pinyin: tā yīn zǔ ài gōng lù jiāo tōng ér shòu kòng gào。
english: He was charged obstructing the highway.

hanzi: 他在自己的领域里已经出名了。
pinyin: tā zài zì jǐ de lǐng yù lǐ yǐ jīng chū míng le。
english: He has become famous in his own field.

hanzi: 她的声音中能听出有些颤抖.
pinyin: tā de shēng yīn zhòng néng tìng chū yǒu xiē chàn dǒu.
english: You could hear the quaver in her voice.

hanzi: 那棵植物开着鲜艳的小紫花。
pinyin: nà kē zhí wù kāi zhuó xiān yàn de xiǎo zǐ huā。
english: The plant has a brilliant purple floweret.

hanzi: 这部小说里的叙述比对话多.
pinyin: zhè bù xiǎo shuō lǐ de xù shù bì duì huà duō.
english: The novel contains more narrative than dialogue.

hanzi: 他不顾同事的劝告辞了职.
pinyin: tā bù gù tóng shì de quàn gào cí le zhí.
english: He went against the advice of his colleagues and resigned.

hanzi: 这一时期地主的势力削弱了.
pinyin: zhè yī shí qī dì zhǔ de shì li xuē ruò le.
english: The power of the landowners waned during this period.

hanzi: 镜头慢慢移动拍摄房间全景.
pinyin: jìng tóu màn màn yí dòng pāi shè fáng jiān quán jǐng.
english: The shot panned slowly across the room.

hanzi: 我推荐她代表我们出席会议。
pinyin: wǒ tuī jiàn tā dài biǎo wǒ men chū xí huì yì。
english: I nominate her to present us at the meeting.

hanzi: 那辆摩托车就会要了你的命。
pinyin: nà liàng mó tuō chē jiù kuài yào le nǐ de mìng。
english: That motorbike will be the death of you.

hanzi: 这种款式的脚踏车是最新式的。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng kuǎn shì de jué tà jū shì zuì xīn shì de。
english: This type of bicycle is up to date.

hanzi: 所有日报都刊登了这条消息.
pinyin: suǒ yǒu rì bào dōu kān dēng le zhè tiáo xiāo xi.
english: The news was blazed all over the daily papers.

hanzi: 柏枝作为悲哀象征的柏树枝
pinyin: bò zhī zuò wéi bēi āi xiàng zhēng de bǎi shù zhī
english: Cypress branches used as a symbol of mourning.

hanzi: 我们正在给房子的外墙涂漆。
pinyin: wǒ men zhèng zài jǐ fáng zi de wài qiáng tú qī。
english: We are painting the exterior wall of the house.

hanzi: 我们必须先测量电线的直径。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū xiān cè liàng diàn xiàn de zhí jìng。
english: We must gauge the diameter of wire first.

hanzi: 锁锈住了，我们得把门砸开。
pinyin: suǒ xiù zhù le， wǒ men de bǎ mén zá kāi。
english: The lock was rusty, so we had to smash the door open.

hanzi: 水从管道里通畅地流了出来。
pinyin: shuǐ zòng guǎn dào lǐ tōng chàng de liú le chū lai。
english: A free flow of water came from the pipe.

hanzi: 一大群人聚集起来听他布道.
pinyin: yī dà qún rén jù jí qǐ lai tìng tā bù dào.
english: A large multitude had assembled to hear him preach.

hanzi: 我觉得这虫子是蝴蝶的幼虫。
pinyin: wǒ jué de zhè chóng zi shì hú dié de yòu chóng。
english: I think this worm is a larva of a butterfly.

hanzi: 超载的装载过多的或负担过重的
pinyin: chāo zài de zhuāng zài guò duō de huò fù dān guò zhòng de
english: Loaded or burdened too heavily.

hanzi: 锁锈住了，我们得把门砸开。
pinyin: suǒ xiù zhù le， wǒ men de bǎ mén zá kāi。
english: The lock was rusty, so we had to smash the door open.

hanzi: 步兵黎明时开始进入战斗位置.
pinyin: bù bīng lí míng shí kāi shǐ jìn rù zhàn dòu wèi zhi.
english: The infantry began to deploy at dawn.

hanzi: 保险公司将赔偿他的损失。
pinyin: bǎo xiǎn gōng sī jiàng péi cháng tā de sǔn shī。
english: The insurance company will recompense his loss.

hanzi: 该房供出售并能立即占有。
pinyin: gāi fáng gòng chū shòu bìng néng lì jí zhàn yǒu。
english: The house is for sale with vacant possession.

hanzi: 这危险的事唤起了他的责任感。
pinyin: zhè wēi xiǎn de shì huàn qǐ le tā de zé rèn gǎn。
english: The danger recalled him to a sense of duty.

hanzi: 因为滥用权力，他被开除了。
pinyin: yīn wèi làn yòng quán lì， tā bèi kāi chú le。
english: Because of misuse of power, he was dismissed.

hanzi: 我们赤着脚在海滩上走来走去。
pinyin: wǒ men chì zhuó jué zài hǎi tān shàng zǒu lái zǒu qù。
english: We walked around the beach barefoot.

hanzi: 我监督工人把货物装上卡车.
pinyin: wǒ jiān dū gōng rén bǎ huò wù zhuāng shàng kǎ chē.
english: I supervised the workers loading the lorry.

hanzi: 这种植物不容易受病害侵袭。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng zhí wù bù róng yì shòu bìng hài qīn xí。
english: The plant is not susceptible to disease.

hanzi: 他被绑在一把椅子上, 就那样待著.
pinyin: tā bèi bǎng zài yī bǎ yǐ zi shàng,  jiù nà yàng dài著.
english: He was bound to a chair and left.

hanzi: 他的舌头被红辣椒辣得好难受。
pinyin: tā de shé tóu bèi hóng là jiāo là de hào nán shòu。
english: He burned his tongue with red pepper.

hanzi: 他打开了手电筒，寻找钥匙。
pinyin: tā dǎ kāi le shǒu diàn tǒng， xún zhǎo yào shi。
english: He turned on the torch to look for his keys.

hanzi: 他对文学领域特别感兴趣。
pinyin: tā duì wén xué lǐng yù tè bié gǎn xìng qu。
english: His special interest lies in the area of literature.

hanzi: 空气似乎随着亮光而颤动。
pinyin: kōng qì sì hu suí zhe liàng guāng ér zhàn dòng。
english: The air seemed to pulsate with the bright light.

hanzi: 警惕性是万万不可放松的.
pinyin: jǐng tì xìng shì wàn wàn bù kě fàng sōng de.
english: You cannot afford to relax your vigilance for a moment.

hanzi: 垂直线与水平线在此相交.
pinyin: chuí zhí xiàn yù shuǐ píng xiàn zài cǐ xiāng jiāo.
english: The vertical line meets the horizontal one here.

hanzi: 这堆书晃了几下，然后就倒了。
pinyin: zhè duī shū huàng le jǐ xià， rán hòu jiù dào le。
english: The piles of books tottered and then fell.

hanzi: 向悲观的人推销保险很容易.
pinyin: xiàng bēi guān de rén tuī xiāo bǎo xiǎn hěn róng yì.
english: It's easy to sell insurance to a pessimist.

hanzi: 他们把掠夺来的东西装进大车里.
pinyin: tā men bǎ lu:è duó lái de dōng xi zhuāng jìn dà jū lǐ.
english: They loaded the carts with plunder.

hanzi: 向顶峰攀登时身上都热起来了。
pinyin: xiàng dǐng fēng pān dēng shí shēn shàng dōu rè qǐ lai le。
english: It was a warm climb to the summit.

hanzi: 警惕性是万万不可放松的.
pinyin: jǐng tì xìng shì wàn wàn bù kě fàng sōng de.
english: You cannot afford to relax your vigilance for a moment.

hanzi: 他要他们加班工作, 真是残酷。
pinyin: tā yào tā men jiā bān gōng zuò,  zhēn shì cán kù。
english: He was cruel to make them work overtime.

hanzi: 把水引入一系列灌溉渠中.
pinyin: bǎ shuǐ yǐn rù yī xì liè guàn gài qú zhòng.
english: Water is channelled through a series of irrigation canals.

hanzi: 群众迅速聚集在出事现场.
pinyin: qún zhòng xùn sù jù jí zài chū shì xiàn chǎng.
english: A crowd soon collected at the scene of the accident.

hanzi: 警惕性是万万不可放松的.
pinyin: jǐng tì xìng shì wàn wàn bù kě fàng sōng de.
english: You cannot afford to relax your vigilance for a moment.

hanzi: 我们不顾恶劣的天气而去钓鱼。
pinyin: wǒ men bù gù è liè de tiān qì ér qù diào yú。
english: In spite of the bad weather, we went fishing.

hanzi: 报纸称颂了他们的英雄事迹。
pinyin: bào zhǐ chèng sòng le tā men de yīng xióng shì jī。
english: The newspapers glorified their heroic deeds.

hanzi: 我删除了这篇文章的一个段落。
pinyin: wǒ shān chú le zhè piān wén zhāng de yī gè duàn luò。
english: I cut out the paragraph in this article.

hanzi: 她竭力争取自己想要的东西。
pinyin: tā jié lì zhēng qǔ zì jǐ xiǎng yào de dōng xi。
english: She fought like a tiger to get what she wanted.

hanzi: 从军舰上向飞机发射导弹.
pinyin: zòng jūn jiàn shàng xiàng fēi jī fā shè dǎo dàn.
english: The missiles were shot at the aircraft from a ship.

hanzi: 我虽然很喜欢她，却不打算娶她。
pinyin: wǒ suī rán hěn xǐ huan tā， què bù dǎ suàn qǔ tā。
english: Much as I like her, I won't marry her.

hanzi: 我们不顾恶劣的天气而去钓鱼。
pinyin: wǒ men bù gù è liè de tiān qì ér qù diào yú。
english: In spite of the bad weather, we went fishing.

hanzi: 绝望之下，我向攻击者哀求。
pinyin: jué wàng zhī xià， wǒ xiàng gōng jī zhě āi qiú。
english: In desperation I pleaded with the attackers.

hanzi: 他们要求示威者和平解散.
pinyin: tā men yāo qiú shì wēi zhě hé píng jiě sàn.
english: They called for the peaceful dispersal of the demonstrators.

hanzi: 我设法弄来点材料搭个棚子.
pinyin: wǒ shè fǎ nòng lái diǎn cái liào dā gè péng zi.
english: I managed to scrounge the materials to build a shed.

hanzi: 他的患病给我们的计划带来灾难。
pinyin: tā de huàn bìng jǐ wǒ men de jì huà dài lái zāi nàn。
english: His illness was fatal to our plan.

hanzi: 那本旧书是我最珍贵的财产。
pinyin: nà běn jiù shū shì wǒ zuì zhēn guì de cái chǎn。
english: That old book is my most precious possession.

hanzi: 我疯狂地渴望去完成那件事。
pinyin: wǒ fēng kuáng de kě wàng qù wán chéng nà jiàn shì。
english: I have an insane desire to finish that thing.

hanzi: 去年癌症夺走了他姐姐的生命。
pinyin: qù nián ái zhèng duó zǒu le tā jiě jie de shēng mìng。
english: Cancer carried his sister off last year.

hanzi: 警方监视著他常去的酒吧.
pinyin: jǐng fāng jiān shì著 tā cháng qù de jiǔ bā.
english: The police watched the bars which he was known to resort.

hanzi: 真奇怪，她竟然会如此粗暴无礼。
pinyin: zhēn qí guài， tā jìng rán kuài rú cǐ cū bào wú lǐ。
english: It's strange for her to be so rude.

hanzi: 他总是叹息研究经费不足。
pinyin: tā zǒng shì tàn xí yán jiū jīng fèi bù zú。
english: He always bemoans the shortage of funds for research.

hanzi: 该剧经删去两场而缩短了.
pinyin: gāi jù jīng shān qù liǎng chǎng ér suō duǎn le.
english: The play was shortened by the omission of two scenes.

hanzi: 他们投机购买谷物是不合法的。
pinyin: tā men tóu jī gòu mǎi gǔ wù shì bù hé fǎ de。
english: Their speculative buying of grain is illegal.

hanzi: 这辆卡车最大载重量是一吨。
pinyin: zhè liàng kǎ chē zuì dà zài zhòng liàng shì yī dùn。
english: The maximum load for this lorry is one ton.

hanzi: 对我来说，价格太高是一个障碍。
pinyin: duì wǒ lái shuō， jià gé tài gāo shì yī gè zhàng ài。
english: The high price is a balk to me.

hanzi: 在动物园我看见了两只小骆驼。
pinyin: zài dòng wù yuán wǒ kàn jiàn le liǎng zhǐ xiǎo luò tuo。
english: I saw two small camels in the zoo.

hanzi: 他们应该设法阻止价钱上涨。
pinyin: tā men yīng gāi shè fǎ zǔ zhǐ jià qian shàng zhǎng。
english: They should try to keep prices from rising.

hanzi: 她的合伙人企图骗走她的股份。
pinyin: tā de hé huǒ rén qǐ tú piàn zǒu tā de gǔ fèn。
english: Her partner tried to trick her out of her share.

hanzi: 营地的生活条件甚为原始.
pinyin: yíng dì de shēng huó tiáo jiàn shèn wèi yuán shǐ.
english: Living conditions in the camp were pretty primitive.

hanzi: 她出于虚荣心而嫁给了那个富人。
pinyin: tā chū yú xū róng xīn ér jià jǐ le nèi gè fù rén。
english: She married the rich man out of vanity.

hanzi: 收缩物收缩的事物，尤指肌肉
pinyin: shōu suō wù shōu suō de shì wù， yóu zhǐ jī ròu
english: Something, especially a muscle, that contracts.

hanzi: 峡谷常常有河流经过其中。
pinyin: xiá gǔ cháng cháng yǒu hé liú jīng guò qí zhōng。
english: A canyon usually has a river flowing through it.

hanzi: 全城沉浸在节日的气氛中。
pinyin: quán chéng chén jìn zài jié rì de qì fēn zhòng。
english: The whole city was immersed in a festival atmosphere.

hanzi: 这个印刷错误造成很大的混淆。
pinyin: zhè gè yìn shuà cuò wù zào chéng hěn dà de hùn xiáo。
english: This misprint led to great confusion.

hanzi: 猪肉炼出的油可用来煎炸食物.
pinyin: zhū ròu liàn chū de yóu kě yòng lái jiān zhà shí wù.
english: The grease from pork can be used for frying.

hanzi: 有些金属容易焊，有的不容易焊。
pinyin: yǒu xiē jīn shǔ róng yì hàn， yǒu de bù róng yì hàn。
english: Some metals weld better than others.

hanzi: 猪肉炼出的油可用来煎炸食物.
pinyin: zhū ròu liàn chū de yóu kě yòng lái jiān zhà shí wù.
english: The grease from pork can be used for frying.

hanzi: 有些人宁可熬夜，而不早睡。
pinyin: yǒu xiē rén nìng kě áo yè， ér bù zǎo shuì。
english: Some people prefer sitting up to going to bed early.

hanzi: 你可以接通全国计算机网络。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ jiē tōng quán guó jì suàn jī wǎng luò。
english: You can plug into the national computer network.

hanzi: 做纵横字谜游戏能锻炼脑筋.
pinyin: zuò zòng héng zì mí yóu xì néng duàn liàn nǎo jīn.
english: Doing crosswords gives the mind some exercise.

hanzi: 他哈哈大笑以遮掩紧张的心情.
pinyin: tā hā hā dà xiào yǐ zhē yǎn jǐn zhāng de xīn qíng.
english: He laughed to cover (ie hide) his nervousness.

hanzi: 这个饭店要到七月中旬才营业。
pinyin: zhè gè fàn diàn yào dào qī yuè zhōng xún cái yíng yè。
english: The hotel is closed until mid- July.

hanzi: 牧师在船离港之前为其祝福。
pinyin: mù shī zài chuán lí gǎng zhī qián wèi qí zhù fú。
english: The priest blessed the ship before it left port.

hanzi: 她的懒丈夫成了她的一个包袱。
pinyin: tā de lǎn zhàng fu chéng le tā de yī gè bāo fu。
english: Her lazy husband is a millstone round her neck.

hanzi: 英国和中国签署了贸易协定.
pinyin: Yīng guó huò Zhōng guó qiān shǔ le mào yì xié dìng.
english: Britain concluded a trade agreement with China.

hanzi: 现在只有出现奇迹她才能得救。
pinyin: xiàn zài zhǐ yǒu chū xiàn qí jì tā cái néng de jiù。
english: Nothing but a miracle can save her now.

hanzi: 他精通世界上的神秘宗教。
pinyin: tā jīng tōng shì jiè shàng de shén mì zōng jiào。
english: He is an expert on the world's mystical religions.

hanzi: 我们走时车子扬起了一阵尘土。
pinyin: wǒ men zǒu shí jū zi yáng qǐ le yī zhèn chén tǔ。
english: The car raised quite a dust as we drove off.

hanzi: 他因品质高尚而被人怀念。
pinyin: tā yīn pǐn zhì gāo shàng ér bèi rén huái niàn。
english: He is remembered for the nobility of his character.

hanzi: 向顶峰攀登时身上都热起来了。
pinyin: xiàng dǐng fēng pān dēng shí shēn shàng dōu rè qǐ lai le。
english: It was a warm climb to the summit.

hanzi: 把水引入一系列灌溉渠中.
pinyin: bǎ shuǐ yǐn rù yī xì liè guàn gài qú zhòng.
english: Water is channelled through a series of irrigation canals.

hanzi: 这次爆炸把那个旧烟囱给炸倒了.
pinyin: zhè cì bào zhà bǎ nèi gè jiù yān cōng jǐ zhà dào le.
english: The explosion toppled the old chimney.

hanzi: 她自豪地看著自己的工作成果.
pinyin: tā zì háo de kàn著 zì jǐ de gōng zuò chéng guǒ.
english: She looked with pride at the result of her work.

hanzi: 我们班向学校赠送了一幅画。
pinyin: wǒ men bān xiàng xué xiào zèng sòng le yī fú huà。
english: Our class presented the school with a picture.

hanzi: 她的勤奋为其他人树立了榜样。
pinyin: tā de qín fèn wèi qí tā rén shù lì le bǎng yàng。
english: Her diligence has set an example to the others.

hanzi: 武士们冲进宫里保护国王。
pinyin: wǔ shì men chōng jìn gōng lǐ bǎo hù guó wáng。
english: The cavaliers rushed into the palace to protect the king.

hanzi: 一旦下了决心，他就毫不动摇。
pinyin: yī dàn xià le jué xīn， tā jiù háo bú dòng yáo。
english: Once he's made up his mind, he never budges.

hanzi: 人们可以从寓言里吸取经验教训。
pinyin: rén men kě yǐ zòng yù yán lǐ xī qǔ jīng yàn jiào xun。
english: People can draw a moral from tales.

hanzi: 武士们冲进宫里保护国王。
pinyin: wǔ shì men chōng jìn gōng lǐ bǎo hù guó wáng。
english: The cavaliers rushed into the palace to protect the king.

hanzi: 她听到这一悲惨消息, 脸都白了.
pinyin: tā tīng dào zhè yī bēi cǎn xiāo xi,  liǎn dōu bái le.
english: She listened to the tragic news ashen-faced.

hanzi: 这所房屋已处于荒废的状态。
pinyin: zhè suǒ fáng wū yǐ chǔ yú huāng fèi de zhuàng tài。
english: The house has fallen into a state of neglect.

hanzi: 武士们冲进宫里保护国王。
pinyin: wǔ shì men chōng jìn gōng lǐ bǎo hù guó wáng。
english: The cavaliers rushed into the palace to protect the king.

hanzi: 他们已经开始防止犯罪行为。
pinyin: tā men yǐ jīng kāi shǐ fáng zhǐ fàn zuì xíng wéi。
english: They have begun to do the prevention of crime.

hanzi: 我疯狂地渴望去完成那件事。
pinyin: wǒ fēng kuáng de kě wàng qù wán chéng nà jiàn shì。
english: I have an insane desire to finish that thing.

hanzi: 我一走近她的办公桌，她就瞪我。
pinyin: wǒ yī zǒu jìn tā de bàn gōng zhuō， tā jiù dèng wǒ。
english: She glares at me if I go near her desk.

hanzi: 这份手稿只有专家才看得懂.
pinyin: zhè fèn shǒu gǎo zhǐ yǒu zhuān jiā cái kàn de dǒng.
english: The manuscript requires an expert to understand it.

hanzi: 真奇怪，她竟然会如此粗暴无礼。
pinyin: zhēn qí guài， tā jìng rán kuài rú cǐ cū bào wú lǐ。
english: It's strange for her to be so rude.

hanzi: 第一乐章以缓慢的主旋律开始.
pinyin: dì yī yuè zhāng yǐ huǎn màn de zhǔ xuán lu:4 kāi shǐ.
english: A slow theme introduces the first movement.

hanzi: 他们已经开始防止犯罪行为。
pinyin: tā men yǐ jīng kāi shǐ fáng zhǐ fàn zuì xíng wéi。
english: They have begun to do the prevention of crime.

hanzi: 圣诞礼物都用薄纸裹起来了.
pinyin: Shèng dàn lǐ wù dōu yòng bó zhǐ guǒ qǐ lai le.
english: The Christmas presents were wrapped (up) in tissue paper.

hanzi: 候选人在辩论中唇枪舌箭。
pinyin: hòu xuǎn rén zài biàn lùn zhòng chún qiāng shé jiàn。
english: The candidates exchanged shafts in the debate.

hanzi: 警察大批出动，以制止骚乱。
pinyin: jǐng chá dà pī chū dòng， yǐ zhì zhǐ sāo luàn。
english: The police were out in force to stop any trouble.

hanzi: 他驾驶考试合格使大家很惊奇.
pinyin: tā jià shǐ kǎo shì hé gé shǐ dà jiā hěn jīng qí.
english: He amazed everyone by passing his driving test.

hanzi: 该计划的妙处在于简洁明了。
pinyin: gāi jì huà de miào chù zài yú jiǎn jié míng le。
english: The beauty of the plan consists in its simplicity.

hanzi: 他是当代医学奇迹的活证明.
pinyin: tā shì dāng dài yī xué qí jì de huó zhèng míng.
english: He is living proof of the wonders of modern medicine.

hanzi: 暴雨中出现了好多次闪电。
pinyin: bào yǔ zhòng chū xiàn le hǎo duō cì shǎn diàn。
english: There were many flashes of lightning during the storm.

hanzi: 全城沉浸在节日的气氛中。
pinyin: quán chéng chén jìn zài jié rì de qì fēn zhòng。
english: The whole city was immersed in a festival atmosphere.

hanzi: 新汽车是全家人引以自豪之物.
pinyin: xīn qì chē shì quán jiā rén yǐn yǐ zì háo zhī wù.
english: The new car was the pride of the whole family.

hanzi: 裁缝给我量做新西装的尺寸。
pinyin: cái féng jǐ wǒ liàng zuò xīn xī zhuāng de chǐ cun。
english: The tailor took my measurements for a new suit.

hanzi: 不久，解放军就把他们歼灭了。
pinyin: bù jiǔ， jiě fàng jūn jiù bǎ tā men jiān miè le。
english: Soon the Liberation Army knocked them out.

hanzi: 有人发现她趴在小屋的地板上.
pinyin: yǒu rén fā xiàn tā pā zài xiǎo wū de dì bǎn shàng.
english: She was found prostrate on the floor of the cell.

hanzi: 罢工者与雇主已达成协议。
pinyin: bà gōng zhě yù gù zhǔ yǐ dá chéng xié yì。
english: The strikers have reached a settlement with the employers.

hanzi: 他依法应得的遗产被人骗走了.
pinyin: tā yī fǎ yīng dé de yí chǎn bèi rén piàn zǒu le.
english: He was cheated (out) of his rightful inheritance.

hanzi: 那次失败是一次难以吞咽的苦果。
pinyin: nà cì shī bài shì yī cì nán yǐ tūn yè de kǔ guǒ。
english: The defeat was a bitter pill to swallow.

hanzi: 庆祝会的高潮是燃放烟火。
pinyin: qìng zhù kuài de gāo cháo shì rán fàng yān huǒ。
english: The climax of the celebration was a firework display.

hanzi: 把水引入一系列灌溉渠中.
pinyin: bǎ shuǐ yǐn rù yī xì liè guàn gài qú zhòng.
english: Water is channelled through a series of irrigation canals.

hanzi: 请您放心，还款是有保障的。
pinyin: qǐng nín fàng xīn， huán kuǎn shì yǒu bǎo zhàng de。
english: Please rest assured that repayment is ensured.

hanzi: 这孩子害怕那条外表凶恶的狗。
pinyin: zhè hái zi hài pà nà tiáo wài biǎo xiōng è de gǒu。
english: The child was scared of the fierce looking dog.

hanzi: 我喜欢在周末做些剧烈运动。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan zài zhōu mò zuò xiē jù liè yùn dòng。
english: I like to take some energetic exercise at weekend.

hanzi: 宪法授予总统宣战权。
pinyin: xiàn fǎ shòu yǔ zǒng tǒng xuān zhàn quán。
english: The constitution vests the president with the power to declare war.

hanzi: 会议遭示威者干扰而结束.
pinyin: huì yì zāo shì wēi zhě gān rǎo ér jié shù.
english: The meeting was closed after the demonstrators interrupted it.

hanzi: 他们想看看我们的彩色幻灯片.
pinyin: tā men xiǎng kàn kan wǒ men de cǎi sè huàn dēng piàn.
english: They want us to show some of our colour slides.

hanzi: 我们必须抹去对那次失败的记忆。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū mò qù duì nà cì shī bài de jì yì。
english: We have to extinguish the memory of the defeat.

hanzi: 无疑，她早早晚晚会抛弃你的。
pinyin: wú yí， tā zǎo zǎo wǎn wǎn huì pāo qì nǐ de。
english: Sure enough, she'll let you down sooner or later.

hanzi: 最强壮的人未必活得最久。
pinyin: zuì qiáng zhuàng de rén wèi bì huó de zuì jiǔ。
english: The strongest man does not necessarily live the longest.

hanzi: 村庄在水坝决堤时被冲走了。
pinyin: cūn zhuāng zài shuǐ bà jué dī shí bèi chòng zǒu le。
english: The village was swept away when the dam burst.

hanzi: 梳麻针排用来分开亚麻纤维的梳子
pinyin: shū má zhēn pǎi yòng lái fēn kāi yà má xiān wéi de shū zi
english: A comb for separating flax fibers.

hanzi: 我们接近她时, 她就挥棒乱打.
pinyin: wǒ men jiē jìn tā shí,  tā jiù huī bàng luàn dǎ.
english: As we approached her, she laid about her with a stick.

hanzi: 潮湿的日子里，食物很容易发霉。
pinyin: cháo shī de rì zi lǐ， shí wù hěn róng yì fà méi。
english: Foods are easily to be mouldy in humid days.

hanzi: 为了完成报告我打算熬夜不睡。
pinyin: wèi le wán chéng bào gào wǒ dǎ suàn áo yè bù shuì。
english: I am going to stay up late to finish my paper.

hanzi: 这张钞票是假的, 那张是真的.
pinyin: zhè zhāng chāo piào shì jiǎ de,  nà zhāng shì zhēn de.
english: This note is counterfeit, but that one's good.

hanzi: 科学家已经揭开了原子的秘密。
pinyin: kē xué jiā yǐ jīng jiē kāi le yuán zǐ de mì mì。
english: Scientists have unlocked the secret of the atom.

hanzi: 地震对这个城市造成了大破坏。
pinyin: dì zhèn duì zhè gè chéng shì zào chéng le dà pò huài。
english: The earthquake wreaked havoc on the city.

hanzi: 她兼做导师工作和研究工作.
pinyin: tā jiān zuò dǎo shī gōng zuò huò yán jiū gōng zuò.
english: Her work was divided between tutoring and research.

hanzi: 你可以在银行开立一个活期帐户。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ zài yín háng kāi lì yī gè huó qī zhàng hù。
english: You may open a current account at a bank.

hanzi: 我一想到他就忍不住颤抖。
pinyin: wǒ yī xiǎng dào tā jiù rěn bú zhù chàn dǒu。
english: I could not repress a shiver whenever I thought of him.

hanzi: 他从巴黎给我寄来几张明信片。
pinyin: tā zòng Bā lí jǐ wǒ jì lái jǐ zhāng míng xìn piàn。
english: He sent me some postal cards from Paris.

hanzi: 由于大旱四个月，水库干枯了。
pinyin: yóu yú dà hàn sì gè yuè， shuǐ kù gān kū le。
english: The reservoir dried up during the four-month drought.

hanzi: 她的勤奋为其他人树立了榜样。
pinyin: tā de qín fèn wèi qí tā rén shù lì le bǎng yàng。
english: Her diligence has set an example to the others.

hanzi: 小偷乘没人注意时溜了出去.
pinyin: xiǎo tōu chéng mò rén zhù yì shí liū le chū qù.
english: The thief slid out (of the door) while no one was looking.

hanzi: 我们在海滩上野餐，趣味无穷。
pinyin: wǒ men zài hǎi tān Shàng yě cān， qù wèi wú qióng。
english: We had a lot of fun at the picnic on the beach.

hanzi: 水池周围的树上悬挂著灯笼.
pinyin: shuǐ chí zhōu wéi de shù shàng xuán guà著 dēng lóng.
english: Lanterns were strung in the trees around the pool.

hanzi: 暴风雨猛烈地吹过陆地和海面。
pinyin: bào fēng yǔ měng liè de chuī guò lù dì huò hǎi miàn。
english: The storm blew fiercely over land and sea.

hanzi: 应该承认他的论据中有逻辑性.
pinyin: yīng gāi chéng rèn tā de lùn jù zhòng yǒu luó ji xìng.
english: You have to accept the logic of his argument.

hanzi: 政府将派军驻守沿海的城镇。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ jiàng pài jūn zhù shǒu yán hǎi de chéng zhèn。
english: The government will garrison the coastal towns.

hanzi: 那个顽固老头就是不肯进医院.
pinyin: nèi gè wán gù lǎo tóu jiù shì bù kěn jìn yī yuàn.
english: The obstinate old man refused to go to hospital.

hanzi: 你不可因一个人贫穷而轻视他。
pinyin: nǐ bù kě yīn yī gè rén pín qióng ér qīng shì tā。
english: You must not despise a man because he is poor.

hanzi: 我们只是在昨天才与她偶然相遇.
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ shì zài zuó tiān cái yù tā ǒu rán xiāng yù.
english: We met her only yesterday, as it happens.

hanzi: 元旦那天他们都感到宿醉头痛。
pinyin: yuán dàn nà tiān tā men dōu gǎn dào xiù zuì tóu tòng。
english: On New Year's Day they were all hung over.

hanzi: 这家剧院光顾者寡只好关闭。
pinyin: zhè jiā jù yuàn guāng gù zhě guǎ zhǐ hǎo guān bì。
english: The theatre has had to close for lack of support.

hanzi: 汽车的挡风玻璃在夜间结了霜.
pinyin: qì chē de dàng fēng bō li zài yè jiān jié le shuāng.
english: The car windscreen frosted over during the night.

hanzi: 这个画廊是中世纪艺术的宝库。
pinyin: zhè gè huà láng shì zhòng shì jì yì shù de bǎo kù。
english: The gallery is a treasure trove of medieval art.

hanzi: 摇滚乐声震屋宇，从客厅传来。
pinyin: yáo gǔn yuè shēng zhèn wū yǔ， zòng kè tīng zhuàn lái。
english: Rock music blasted full from the parlor.

hanzi: 我从来没听过像这样的长篇废话.
pinyin: wǒ cóng lái mò tìng guò xiàng zhè yàng de cháng piān fèi huà.
english: I've never heard such a rigmarole.

hanzi: 一群人聚拢起来看发生了什么事。
pinyin: yī qún rén jù lǒng qǐ lai kàn fā shēng le shén me shì。
english: A crowd gathered to see what had happened.

hanzi: 该政权是靠外国援助维持著的.
pinyin: gāi zhèng quán shì kào wài guó yuán zhù wéi chí著 de.
english: The regime had been propped up by foreign aid.

hanzi: 该政权是靠外国援助维持著的.
pinyin: gāi zhèng quán shì kào wài guó yuán zhù wéi chí著 de.
english: The regime had been propped up by foreign aid.

hanzi: 新生的婴儿唤起了她女性的特性.
pinyin: xīn shēng de yīng ér huàn qǐ le tā nu:3 xìng de tè xìng.
english: Newborn babies bring out the woman in her.

hanzi: 我用沾满油污的碎布擦我的自行车.
pinyin: wǒ yòng zhān mǎn yóu wū de suì bù cā wǒ de zì xíng chē.
english: I use an oily rag to clean my bike with.

hanzi: 固定物牢固地安放在一个地方的东西
pinyin: gù dìng wù láo gù de ān fàng zài yī gè dì fang de dōng xi
english: Something securely fixed in place.

hanzi: 我得听他那些没完没了的牢骚.
pinyin: wǒ de tìng tā nà xiē mò wán mò le de láo sāo.
english: I had to listen to a long recital of all his complaints.

hanzi: 他过去的经历笼罩着神秘气氛。
pinyin: tā guò qu de jīng lì lǒng zhào zhuó shén mì qì fēn。
english: His past is enveloped in a shroud of mystery.

hanzi: 她佩戴了一把小梳子作为装饰品。
pinyin: tā pèi dài le yī bǎ xiǎo shū zi zuò wéi zhuāng shì pǐn。
english: She wore a small comb as an ornament.

hanzi: 安全驾驶之规则适用于每个人。
pinyin: ān quán jià shǐ zhī guī zé shì yòng yú měi gè rén。
english: The rules of safe driving apply to everyone.

hanzi: 你可以接通全国计算机网络。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ jiē tōng quán guó jì suàn jī wǎng luò。
english: You can plug into the national computer network.

hanzi: 你不可因一个人贫穷而轻视他。
pinyin: nǐ bù kě yīn yī gè rén pín qióng ér qīng shì tā。
english: You must not despise a man because he is poor.

hanzi: 有时我们可以阻止云产生雨。
pinyin: yǒu shí wǒ men kě yǐ zǔ zhǐ yún chǎn shēng yǔ。
english: Sometimes we can prevent a cloud from producing rain.

hanzi: 委员会工作伊始即十分不利.
pinyin: wěi yuán huì gōng zuò yī shǐ jí shí fēn bù lì.
english: The committee began its work under unfavourable auspices.

hanzi: 使人发狂的官僚主义的混乱状况
pinyin: shǐ rén fā kuáng de guān liáo zhǔ yì de hùn luàn zhuàng kuàng
english: Maddening bureaucratic mix-ups.

hanzi: 他用蒸汽把信封上的邮票揭下来。
pinyin: tā yòng zhēng qì bǎ xìn fēng shàng de yóu piào jiē xia lai。
english: He steamed the stamp off the envelope.

hanzi: 山路要到春季末期才能通行.
pinyin: shān lù yào dào chūn jì mò qī cái néng tōng xíng.
english: The mountain roads are not passable until late spring.

hanzi: 一方面，他们可以保持水的清洁。
pinyin: yī fāng miàn， tā men kě yǐ bǎo chí shuǐ de qīng jié。
english: For one thing they keep the water clean.

hanzi: 那艘宇宙飞船溅落在太平洋中.
pinyin: nà sōu yǔ zhòu fēi chuán jiàn luò zài tài píng yáng zhòng.
english: The spacecraft splashed down in the Pacific.

hanzi: 我需要一个漏斗把汽油灌进油箱.
pinyin: wǒ xū yào yī gè lòu dǒu bǎ qì yóu guàn jìn yóu xiāng.
english: I need a funnel to pour petrol into the tank.

hanzi: 他猛力一拧, 将那把手拧了下来.
pinyin: tā měng lì yī nìng,  jiàng nà bǎ shǒu nìng le xia lai.
english: With a violent twist, he wrenched off the handle.

hanzi: 这片玻璃似乎是一盏灯的一部分。
pinyin: zhè piàn bō li sì hu shì yī zhǎn dēng de yī bù fen。
english: This piece of glass seems to be part of a lamp.

hanzi: 祖母逝世时他们开始服丧.
pinyin: zǔ mǔ shì shì shí tā men kāi shǐ fú sàng.
english: When grandmother died they went into (ie started to wear) mourning.

hanzi: 裁判判定他在第一回合被击败。
pinyin: cái pàn pàn dìng tā zài dì yī huí hé bèi jī bài。
english: The referee counted him out in the first round.

hanzi: 祖母逝世时他们开始服丧.
pinyin: zǔ mǔ shì shì shí tā men kāi shǐ fú sàng.
english: When grandmother died they went into (ie started to wear) mourning.

hanzi: 我们遗憾地把我们的决定通知她。
pinyin: wǒ men yí hàn de bǎ wǒ men de jué dìng tōng zhī tā。
english: We informed her with regret of our decision.

hanzi: 政府试图阻止资源的减少。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ shì tú zǔ zhǐ zī yuán de jiǎn shǎo。
english: The government tried to prevent the diminution of resources.

hanzi: 他撞车后驾驶执照被吊销了。
pinyin: tā zhuàng chē hòu jià shǐ zhí zhào bèi diào xiāo le。
english: His driving licence was revoked after the crash.

hanzi: 达成和平协定的概率是零。
pinyin: dá chéng hé píng xié dìng de gài lu:4 shì líng。
english: The probability of a peace agreement being reached is zero.

hanzi: 他不会说法语, 这使他很吃亏.
pinyin: tā bù huì shuō fa yù,  zhè shǐ tā hěn chī kuī.
english: His inability to speak French puts him at a disadvantage.

hanzi: 新帘幕与地毯的颜色非常协调.
pinyin: xīn lián mù yù dì tǎn de yán sè fēi cháng xié tiáo.
english: The new curtains tone in beautifully with the carpet.

hanzi: 你离家不归, 你母亲极为伤心.
pinyin: nǐ lí jiā bù guī,  nǐ mǔ qīn jí wéi shāng xīn.
english: Your mother is very grieved by your refusal to return home.

hanzi: 他研究犯罪心理有多年经验.
pinyin: tā yán jiū fàn zuì xīn lǐ yǒu duō nián jīng yàn.
english: He has many years' experience of the criminal mentality.

hanzi: 那位年轻的母亲把孩子抱在怀里。
pinyin: nà wèi nián qīng de mǔ qīn bǎ hái zi bào zài huái lǐ。
english: The young mother held the baby to her bosom.

hanzi: 法院将法定损害赔偿金判给了她.
pinyin: fǎ yuàn jiàng fǎ dìng sǔn hài péi cháng jīn pàn jǐ le tā.
english: The court adjudged legal damages to her.

hanzi: 这台机器由电子脉冲信号操纵.
pinyin: zhè tái jī qì yóu diàn zǐ mài chòng xìn hào cāo zòng.
english: The machine is operated by an electronic pulse.

hanzi: 用绳子穿著的旗子横悬在街道上.
pinyin: yòng shéng zi chuān著 de qí zi hèng xuán zài jiē dào shàng.
english: Flags had been strung up across the street.

hanzi: 由于大旱四个月，水库干枯了。
pinyin: yóu yú dà hàn sì gè yuè， shuǐ kù gān kū le。
english: The reservoir dried up during the four-month drought.

hanzi: 政府将派军驻守沿海的城镇。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ jiàng pài jūn zhù shǒu yán hǎi de chéng zhèn。
english: The government will garrison the coastal towns.

hanzi: 他的鞋子太重，脚上磨出了水泡。
pinyin: tā de xié zi tài zhòng， jué shàng mò chū le shuǐ pào。
english: His heavy shoes raised blisters on his feet.

hanzi: 他们用无线电跟总部联络上 了.
pinyin: tā men yòng wú xiàn diàn gēn zǒng bù lián luò shàng  le.
english: They made contact with headquarters by radio.

hanzi: 我们在海滩上野餐，趣味无穷。
pinyin: wǒ men zài hǎi tān Shàng yě cān， qù wèi wú qióng。
english: We had a lot of fun at the picnic on the beach.

hanzi: 边疆，边境位于或靠近边界的土地
pinyin: biān jiāng， biān jìng wèi yú huò kào jìn biān jiè de tǔ dì
english: Land located on or near a frontier.

hanzi: 警察逮捕了他和他的两个同谋。
pinyin: jǐng chá dài bǔ le tā huò tā de liǎng gè tóng móu。
english: The police arrested him and his two accomplices.

hanzi: 她把食物和饮料放在客人面前。
pinyin: tā bǎ shí wù huò yǐn liào fàng zài kè ren miàn qián。
english: She set the foods and drink before the guest.

hanzi: 我想把这些美元兑换成英镑。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng bǎ zhè xie měi yuán duì huàn chéng yīng bàng。
english: I should like to change these dollars to pounds.

hanzi: 他把那块石头凿成一个女人像。
pinyin: tā bǎ nà kuài shí tou zuò chéng yī gè nu:3 rén xiàng。
english: He chiseled that rock into the figure of a woman.

hanzi: 他们站立在她的墓的周围向她默哀.
pinyin: tā men zhàn lì zài tā de mù de zhōu wéi xiàng tā mò āi.
english: They stood in silent homage round her grave.

hanzi: 参加聚会的男子大都非常年轻。
pinyin: cān jiā jù huì de nán zǐ dà dōu fēi cháng nián qīng。
english: The men at the party were mostly fairly young.

hanzi: 帕台农神庙是一座宏伟的建筑物.
pinyin: pà tái nóng shén miào shì yī zuò hóng wěi de jiàn zhù wù.
english: The Parthenon is a magnificent structure.

hanzi: 兼职音乐教师定期到校授课.
pinyin: jiān zhí yīn yuè jiào shī dìng qī dào xiào shòu kè.
english: Peripatetic music teachers visit the school regularly.

hanzi: 谁也不怀疑她能胜任教师工作。
pinyin: shéi yě bù huái yí tā néng shèng rèn jiào shī gōng zuò。
english: No one doubts her competence as a teacher.

hanzi: 我们初次见面时相互打量了一番.
pinyin: wǒ men chū cì jiàn miàn shí xiāng hù dǎ liang le yī pān.
english: We sized each other up at our first meeting.

hanzi: 她挣扎著想摆脱那个侵犯她的人.
pinyin: tā zhēng zhá著 xiǎng bǎi tuō nèi gè qīn fàn tā de rén.
english: She struggled to get away from her attacker.

hanzi: 那个醉汉摇摇晃晃地穿过房间。
pinyin: nèi gè zuì hàn yáo yáo huàng huàng de chuān guò fáng jiān。
english: The drunk man staggered across the room.

hanzi: 跳舞的人旋转著, 裙子也不停地打转.
pinyin: tiào wǔ de rén xuán zhuǎn著,  qún zi yě bù tíng de dǎ zhuàn.
english: Dancers spun in a swirl of skirts.

hanzi: 那狗扑向我时, 我用棍子自卫.
pinyin: nà gǒu pū xiàng wǒ shí,  wǒ yòng gùn zi zì wèi.
english: When the dog attacked me, I defended myself with a stick.

hanzi: 海港的灯火在水平线上闪烁著.
pinyin: hǎi gǎng de dēng huǒ zài shuǐ píng xiàn shàng shǎn shuò著.
english: Harbour lights were blinking on the horizon.

hanzi: 她的智慧比我们猜想的要高。
pinyin: tā de zhì huì bì wǒ men cāi xiǎng de yào gāo。
english: She has more intelligence than we suspected her to possess.

hanzi: 参加聚会的男子大都非常年轻。
pinyin: cān jiā jù huì de nán zǐ dà dōu fēi cháng nián qīng。
english: The men at the party were mostly fairly young.

hanzi: 政府对这次罢工的镇压失败了。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ duì zhè cì bà gōng de zhèn yā shī bài le。
english: The government's repression of the strike failed.

hanzi: 在旧社会老百姓的生活是贫苦的
pinyin: zài jiù shè huì lǎo bǎi xìng de shēng huó shì pín kǔ de
english: The husbandmen's life in old society is poor.

hanzi: 海港的灯火在水平线上闪烁著.
pinyin: hǎi gǎng de dēng huǒ zài shuǐ píng xiàn shàng shǎn shuò著.
english: Harbour lights were blinking on the horizon.

hanzi: 一名新教徒向人群发表了演说。
pinyin: yī míng xīn jiào tú xiàng rén qún fā biǎo le yǎn shuō。
english: A Protestant delivered a speech to the crowd.

hanzi: 他像是想要人尽心尽力伺候他.
pinyin: tā xiàng shì xiǎng yào rén jìn xīn jìn lì cì hòu tā.
english: He seemed to expect to be waited on hand and foot.

hanzi: 不知什么缘故，我觉得不能信任他。
pinyin: bù zhī shén me yuán gù， wǒ jué de bù néng xìn rèn tā。
english: Somehow, I don't feel I can trust him.

hanzi: 圣诞节我们度过了一个狂欢之夜。
pinyin: Shèng dàn jié wǒ men dù guò le yī gè kuáng huān zhī yè。
english: We spent a riotous night at Christmas.

hanzi: 他在事故中大脑受伤无法治愈.
pinyin: tā zài shì gù zhòng dà nǎo shòu shāng wú fǎ zhì yù.
english: He suffered irreversible brain damage in the crash.

hanzi: 这些照片中的人物姿势都挺好.
pinyin: zhè xie zhào piàn zhòng dì rén wù zī shì dōu tǐng hǎo.
english: The subjects are well posed in these photographs.

hanzi: 脚下一滑就可能从悬崖上跌下去.
pinyin: jué xià yī huá jiù kě néng zòng xuán yá shàng diē xià qu.
english: One slip and you could fall off the cliff.

hanzi: 操纵这台机器要转动这个把手.
pinyin: cāo zòng zhè tái jī qì yào zhuǎn dòng zhè gè bǎ shǒu.
english: You operate the mechanism by winding this handle.

hanzi: 这座建筑的外墙被漆成了蓝色。
pinyin: zhè zuò jiàn zhù de wài qiáng bèi qī chéng le lán sè。
english: The outer walls of the building were painted blue.

hanzi: 水从冷凝器流出，流入灰浆室。
pinyin: shuǐ zòng lěng níng qì liú chū， liú rù huī jiàng shì。
english: Water flows from the condenser to the ash room.

hanzi: 雪从屋顶上的裂缝飘进屋里。
pinyin: xuě zòng wū dǐng shàng de liè fèng piāo jìn wū lǐ。
english: Snow sifted through the crack in the roof into the room.

hanzi: 英国政府对这些报道不予证实.
pinyin: Yīng guó zhèng fǔ duì zhè xie bào dào bù yú zhèng shí.
english: Whitehall is/are refusing to confirm the reports.

hanzi: 他心脏停止了跳动, 随即死亡.
pinyin: tā xīn zàng tíng zhǐ le tiào dòng,  suí jí sǐ wáng.
english: His heart stopped beating and he died soon afterwards.

hanzi: 他的辩论因被打断而显得不完整。
pinyin: tā de biàn lùn yīn bèi dǎ duàn ér xiǎn de bù wán zhěng。
english: The interruption fragmented his argument.

hanzi: 我们设法达成了某种临时的妥协.
pinyin: wǒ men shè fǎ dá chéng le mǒu zhǒng lín shí de tuǒ xié.
english: We managed to achieve a kind of modus vivendi.

hanzi: 他像是想要人尽心尽力伺候他。
pinyin: tā xiàng shì xiǎng yào rén jìn xīn jìn lì cì hòu tā。
english: He seems to expect to be wait on hand and foot.

hanzi: 她姿色迷人，因而评委都偏向她。
pinyin: tā zī sè mí rén， yīn ér píng wěi dōu piān xiàng tā。
english: Her charm prejudiced the judges in her favour.

hanzi: 她喘著气好不容易才说出了几个字来.
pinyin: tā chuǎn著 qì hào bù róng yì cái shuō chū le jǐ ge zì lái.
english: She managed to gasp (out) a few words.

hanzi: 我们的部队仅受到表面上的抵抗.
pinyin: wǒ men de bù duì jǐn shòu dào biǎo miàn shàng de dǐ kàng.
english: Our troops encountered only token resistance.

hanzi: 报馆老板没能挽救该报的失败。
pinyin: bào guǎn lǎo bǎn mò néng wǎn jiù gāi bào de shī bài。
english: The newspaper owner failed to pull the paper round.

hanzi: 窗帘同房间的气氛不协调。
pinyin: chuāng lián tóng fáng jiān de qì fēn bù xié tiáo。
english: The curtain is not in tune with the atmosphere of the room.

hanzi: 港口附近的兵站被敌人炸毁了。
pinyin: gǎng kǒu fù jìn de bīng zhàn bèi dí rén zhà huǐ le。
english: The depot near the harbor was bombed by the enemy.

hanzi: 园丁向我要一台旋转式割草机。
pinyin: yuán dīng xiàng wǒ yào yī tái xuán zhuǎn shì gē cǎo jī。
english: The gardener asked me for a rotatory lawn mower.

hanzi: 服下这些药丸可保你睡一宿好觉.
pinyin: fú xià zhè xie yào wán kě bǎo nǐ shuì yī xiù hào jué.
english: These pills should ensure you a good night's sleep.

hanzi: 他对旅行作了十分生动的叙述。
pinyin: tā duì lu:3 xíng zuò le shí fēn shēng dòng de xù shù。
english: He told a very descriptive account of his journey.

hanzi: 他没完没了的谈话妨碍了我的学习。
pinyin: tā mò wán mò le de tán huà fáng ài le wǒ de xué xí。
english: His endless talking hinders me from my study.

hanzi: 他惊讶得眼珠子差一点跳出来。
pinyin: tā jīng yà de yǎn zhū zi cī yī diǎn tiào chū lai。
english: His eyes nearly jumped from their sockets in surprise.

hanzi: 农夫拿著大棒追赶闯进来的人。
pinyin: nóng fū ná著 dà bàng zhuī gǎn chuǎng jìn lái de rén。
english: The farmer came after the intruder with a big stick.

hanzi: 一盏小灯笼在黑暗中微微闪光。
pinyin: yī zhǎn xiǎo dēng lóng zài hēi àn zhòng wēi wēi shǎn guāng。
english: A little lantern blinked in the darkness.

hanzi: 我们星期六的午饭总有一道油煎菜.
pinyin: wǒ men xīng qī liù de wǔ fàn zǒng yǒu yī dào yóu jiān cài.
english: We always have a fry-up for Saturday lunch.

hanzi: 凶恶的女人被认为胆大或凶狠的妇女
pinyin: xiōng è de nu:3 rén bèi rèn wéi dǎn dà huò xiōng hěn de fù nu:3
english: A woman regarded as daring or fierce.

hanzi: 腐败的原因传布腐败或腐朽的根源
pinyin: fǔ bài de yuán yīn chuán bù fǔ bài huò fǔ xiǔ de gēn yuán
english: A source of spreading corruption or decay.

hanzi: 我们把这座旧房子的窗户都钉死了。
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ zhè zuò jiù fáng zi de chuāng hu dōu dìng sǐ le。
english: We nailed up the windows of the old house.

hanzi: 他这样做时，指头微微颤动了一下。
pinyin: tā zhè yàng zuò shí， zhǐ tou wēi wēi zhàn dòng le yī xià。
english: His fingers trembled while doing so.

hanzi: 他不只是拳击手, 还是世界冠军呢.
pinyin: tā bù zhǐ shì quán jī shǒu,  hái shì shì jiè guàn jūn ne.
english: He's not a mere boxer: he's world champion.

hanzi: 她无法掩盖她身为作家的不足之处.
pinyin: tā wú fǎ yǎn gài tā shēn wèi zuò jiā de bù zú zhī chù.
english: She can't hide her deficiencies as a writer.

hanzi: 那次事故使他毁容，终生无法恢复。
pinyin: nà cì shì gù shǐ tā huǐ róng， zhōng shēng wú fǎ huī fù。
english: The accident disfigured him for life.

hanzi: 肌肉的收缩是人体的一种反应。
pinyin: jī ròu de shōu suō shì rén tǐ de yī zhòng fǎn yìng。
english: The contraction of muscle is a reaction of the body.

hanzi: 侵犯的就要侵入或侵犯，如隐私的
pinyin: qīn fàn de jiù yào qīn rù huò qīn fàn， rú yǐn sī de
english: Tending to intrude or encroach, as upon privacy.

hanzi: 他关上了灯，室内一片漆黑。
pinyin: tā guān shàng le dēng， shì nèi yī piàn qī hēi。
english: He turned off the light and the room was in complete darkness.

hanzi: 圣诞节和复活节是基督教的节日.
pinyin: Shèng dàn jié huò Fù huó jié shì Jī dū jiào de jié rì.
english: Christmas and Easter are Christian festivals.

hanzi: 骑士们冲向宫殿去保护国王。
pinyin: qí shì men chòng xiàng gōng diàn qù bǎo hù guó wáng。
english: The knights rushed into the palace to protect their king.

hanzi: 那种织物陈列在金属制的架子上。
pinyin: nà zhòng zhī wù chén liè zài jīn shǔ zhì de jià zi shàng。
english: The fabric was displayed on a wired stand.

hanzi: 别把档案弄乱了, 我刚整理好.
pinyin: biè bǎ dàng àn nòng luàn le,  wǒ gāng zhěng lǐ hào.
english: Don't mess the files around, I've just put them in order.

hanzi: 她擦 去浴室地面上一滩滩的水.
pinyin: tā cā  qù yù shì dì miàn shàng yī tān tān de shuǐ.
english: She mopped up the pools of water on the bathroom floor.

hanzi: 你的胶卷后天就可以冲洗出来。
pinyin: nǐ de jiāo juān hòu tiān jiù kě yǐ chōng xǐ chū lai。
english: Your film will be processed the day after tomorrow.

hanzi: 影片结尾的暴力场面太过分了.
pinyin: yǐng piàn jié wěi de bào lì chǎng miàn tài guò fèn le.
english: The film's violent ending is completely over the top.

hanzi: 领袖的逝世对党是巨大的损失。
pinyin: lǐng xiù de shì shì duì dǎng shì jù dà de sǔn shī。
english: The death of its leader was a body-blow to the party.

hanzi: 交通拥挤是许多旧城镇的难题。
pinyin: jiāo tōng yōng jǐ shì xǔ duō jiù chéng zhèn de nán tí。
english: Heavy traffic poses a problem in many old towns.

hanzi: 公司冒险将产品削价出售。
pinyin: gōng sī mào xiǎn jiàng chǎn pǐn xuē jie chū shòu。
english: The company took a gamble by cutting the price of their products.

hanzi: 摆在他面前的是继续吃苦受罪。
pinyin: bǎi zài tā miàn qián de shì jì xù chī kǔ shòu zuì。
english: Ahead of him lay the prospect of continuing hardship.

hanzi: 编成一本字典是一个缓慢的过程。
pinyin: biān chéng yī běn zì diǎn shì yī gè huǎn màn de guò chéng。
english: Producing a dictionary is a slow process.

hanzi: 我会寂寞，若非有鸟也有花。
pinyin: wǒ kuài jì mò， ruò fēi yǒu niǎo yě yǒu huā。
english: I should be lonely, were it not for the birds and the flowers.

hanzi: 一般而言，女性寿命较男性长。
pinyin: yì bān ér yán， nu:3 xìng shòu mìng jiào nán xìng zhǎng。
english: Generally speaking, women live longer than men.

hanzi: 放松运动可以松缓身体的紧张.
pinyin: fàng sōng yùn dòng kě yǐ sōng huǎn shēn tǐ de jǐn zhāng.
english: Relaxation exercises can free your body of tension.

hanzi: 她是个聪明的姑娘，但缺少毅力。
pinyin: tā shì gè cōng míng de gū niang， dàn quē shǎo yì lì。
english: She is a clever girl, but fails I perseverance.

hanzi: 我母亲上星期没有给花园里浇水。
pinyin: wǒ mǔ qīn shàng xīng qī méi yǒu jǐ huā yuán lǐ jiāo shuǐ。
english: My mother didn't water the garden last week.

hanzi: 在一些热带国家，眼疾很流行。
pinyin: zài yī xiē rè dài guó jiā， yǎn jí hěn liú xíng。
english: Eye diseases are prevalent in some tropical countries.

hanzi: 电力供应已在电源处截断.
pinyin: diàn lì gōng yìng yǐ zài diàn yuán chù jié duàn.
english: The electricity supply has been cut off/disconnected at the mains.

hanzi: 编成一本字典是一个缓慢的过程。
pinyin: biān chéng yī běn zì diǎn shì yī gè huǎn màn de guò chéng。
english: Producing a dictionary is a slow process.

hanzi: 他们订婚的事成了镇上谈论的话题.
pinyin: tā men dìng hūn de shì chéng le zhèn shàng tán lùn de huà tí.
english: Their engagement is the talk of the town.

hanzi: 去年这个镇已有十起破产事件。
pinyin: qù nián zhè gè zhèn yǐ yǒu shí qǐ pò chǎn shì jiàn。
english: Ten bankruptcies were recorded in this town last year.

hanzi: 炸弹爆炸时, 他们觉得地都震动了.
pinyin: zhà dàn bào zhà shí,  tā men jué de de dōu zhèn dòng le.
english: They felt the ground quake as the bomb exploded.

hanzi: 他们管著三家工厂和一个大仓库.
pinyin: tā men guǎn著 sān jiā gōng chǎng huò yī gè dà cāng kù.
english: They operate three factories and a huge warehouse.

hanzi: 两个村子合作修建了这座水库。
pinyin: liǎng gè cūn zi hé zuò xiū jiàn le zhè zuò shuǐ kù。
english: The tow villages joined forces to build the reservoir.

hanzi: 凶恶的女人被认为胆大或凶狠的妇女
pinyin: xiōng è de nu:3 rén bèi rèn wéi dǎn dà huò xiōng hěn de fù nu:3
english: A woman regarded as daring or fierce.

hanzi: 反核武器组织要求禁止使用核武器.
pinyin: fǎn hé wǔ qì zǔ zhī yāo qiú jìn zhǐ shǐ yòng hé wǔ qì.
english: Anti-nuclear organizations want to ban the bomb.

hanzi: 风从门的裂缝中呼呼地刮了进来。
pinyin: fēng zòng mén de liè fèng zhòng hū hū de guā le jìn lái。
english: The wind whistled through a crack in the door.

hanzi: 火车上挤得我都喘不过气来。
pinyin: huǒ chē shàng jǐ de wǒ dōu chuǎn bù guò qì lái。
english: There was such a crush on the train that I could hardly breathe.

hanzi: 在翻地时应把肥料均匀地混入土壤中.
pinyin: zài fān de shí yìng bǎ féi liào jūn yún de hùn rù tǔ rǎng zhòng.
english: The manure should be well dug in.

hanzi: 你最好给电线裹上绝缘胶布。
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo jǐ diàn xiàn guǒ shàng jué yuán jiāo bù。
english: You'd better put some insulating tape on electric wires.

hanzi: 在翻地时应把肥料均匀地混入土壤中.
pinyin: zài fān de shí yìng bǎ féi liào jūn yún de hùn rù tǔ rǎng zhòng.
english: The manure should be well dug in.

hanzi: 她用金属铲抹平了蛋糕配料.
pinyin: tā yòng jīn shǔ chǎn mò píng le dàn gāo pèi liào.
english: She levelled the surface of the cake mixture with a metal spatula.

hanzi: 闭幕式将于三月二十五日举行。
pinyin: bì mù shì jiàng yú sān yuè èr shí wǔ rì jǔ xíng。
english: The closing ceremony is going to be held on March 25th.

hanzi: 保障社会的安全是警察的职责.
pinyin: bǎo zhàng shè huì de ān quán shì jǐng chá de zhí zé.
english: It is the business of the police to protect the community.

hanzi: 假若你拿不准怎样做, 就来问我好了.
pinyin: jiǎ ruò nǐ ná bù zhǔn zěn yàng zuò,  jiù lái wèn wǒ hào le.
english: If you're not sure how to do it, ask me.

hanzi: 裁判员判定决赛双方分数相同.
pinyin: cái pàn yuán pàn dìng jué sài shuāng fāng fēn shù xiāng tóng.
english: The judges awarded both finalists equal points.

hanzi: 我们必须力求把记帐方法制度化.
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū lì qiú bǎ jì zhàng fāng fǎ zhì dù huà.
english: We must try to systematize the way we do the accounts.

hanzi: 那位大使预期他下次派驻巴黎.
pinyin: nà wèi dà shǐ yù qī tā xià cì pài zhù Bā lí.
english: The ambassador expects that his next posting will be (to) Paris.

hanzi: 骑士们冲向宫殿去保护国王。
pinyin: qí shì men chòng xiàng gōng diàn qù bǎo hù guó wáng。
english: The knights rushed into the palace to protect their king.

hanzi: 幼稚的，天真的不世故的，天真的
pinyin: yòu zhì de， tiān zhēn de bù shì gù de， tiān zhēn de
english: Lacking sophistication or worldly experience; naive.

hanzi: 统治权一国对于他国之支配权力
pinyin: tǒng zhì quán yī guó duì yú tā guó zhī zhī pèi quán lì
english: The predominant influence of one state over others.

hanzi: 他没有被人看见就溜入了那间屋子。
pinyin: tā méi yǒu bèi rén kàn jiàn jiù liū rù le nà jiàn wū zi。
english: He slipped into the house without being seen.

hanzi: 他继承了那片庄园及其一切特权.
pinyin: tā jí chéng le nà piàn zhuāng yuán jí qí yī qiè tè quán.
english: He inherited the manor and all its appurtenances.

hanzi: 他因袭击警察而遭两年监禁.
pinyin: tā yīn xí jī jǐng chá ér zāo liǎng nián jiān jìn.
english: He got two years' imprisonment for assaulting a police officer.

hanzi: 我极想看看那国王诞生的房子。
pinyin: wǒ jí xiǎng kàn kan nà guó wáng dàn shēng de fáng zi。
english: I am curious to see the house where the king was born.

hanzi: 展览会上陈列著所有的新产品。
pinyin: zhǎn lǎn huì shàng chén liè著 suǒ yǒu de xīn chǎn pǐn。
english: All the new products are on show at the exhibition.

hanzi: 人民不惜付出任何代价也要争取和平.
pinyin: rén mín bù xī fù chū rèn hé dài jià yě yào zhēng qǔ hé píng.
english: The people wanted peace at any price.

hanzi: 你应该对长辈和上级尊重些.
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi duì zhǎng bèi huò shàng jí zūn zhòng xiē.
english: You should show greater respect for your elders and betters.

hanzi: 我觉得有人扯我的袖子, 便转过身来.
pinyin: wǒ jué de yǒu rén chě wǒ de xiù zi,  pián zhuàn guò shēn lái.
english: I felt a pull at my sleeve and turned round.

hanzi: 这一问题此刻使我们很伤脑筋.
pinyin: zhè yī wèn tí cǐ kè shǐ wǒ men hěn shāng nǎo jīn.
english: This problem is exercising our minds very much at the moment.

hanzi: 空中爆炸炸弹或炮弹的空中爆炸
pinyin: kōng zhōng bào zhà zhà dàn huò pào dàn de kōng zhōng bào zhà
english: Explosion of a bomb or shell in the atmosphere.

hanzi: 他们甚至没有试图去阻止他得到它。
pinyin: tā men shèn zhì méi yǒu shì tú qù zǔ zhǐ tā dé dào tā。
english: They didn't even try to stop him getting it.

hanzi: 我的祖母是我们家史的资料库.
pinyin: wǒ de zǔ mǔ shì wǒ men jiā shǐ de zī liào kù.
english: My grandmother is a mine of information about our family's history.

hanzi: 经济衰退的威胁笼罩着世界。
pinyin: jīng jì shuāi tuì de wēi xié lǒng zhào zhuó shì jiè。
english: The threat of an economic depression hangs over the world.

hanzi: 他把诗中记得住的都背诵出来了。
pinyin: tā bǎ shī zhòng jì de zhù de dōu bèi sòng chū lai le。
english: He recited as much of the poem as he could remember.

hanzi: 这一问题此刻使我们很伤脑筋.
pinyin: zhè yī wèn tí cǐ kè shǐ wǒ men hěn shāng nǎo jīn.
english: This problem is exercising our minds very much at the moment.

hanzi: 但大垄断资本家不愿意要和平。
pinyin: dàn dà lǒng duàn zī běn jiā bù yuàn yì yào hé píng。
english: But the big monopoly capitalists do not want peace.

hanzi: 指挥部命令宇宙飞船返回地球.
pinyin: zhǐ huī bù mìng lìng yǔ zhòu fēi chuán fǎn huí dì qiú.
english: Mission control ordered the spacecraft to return to earth.

hanzi: 讲演的人俯视著下面无数的面孔.
pinyin: jiǎng yǎn de rén fǔ shì著 xià mian wú shù de miàn kǒng.
english: The lecturer looked down at the sea of faces beneath him.

hanzi: 部队恰恰在这时准备开进城去.
pinyin: bù duì qià qià zài zhè shí zhǔn bèi kāi jìn chéng qù.
english: The troops are even now preparing to march into the city.

hanzi: 他为了忍住痛楚而紧紧捏住拳关。
pinyin: tā wèi le rěn zhù tòng chǔ ér jǐn jǐn niē zhù quán guān。
english: He clenched his fingers firmly to endure the pain.

hanzi: 炮火掩护步兵前进.
pinyin: pào huǒ yǎn hù bù bīng qián jìn.
english: Artillery gave cover (ie fired at the enemy to stop them firing back) while the infantry advanced.

hanzi: 做田径服需要用弹性强的料子。
pinyin: zuò tián jìng fú xū yào yòng tán xìng qiáng de liào zi。
english: For tracksuits you need material with plenty of stretch.

hanzi: 图上交错的树枝看起来很有诗意。
pinyin: tú shàng jiāo cuò de shù zhī kàn qǐ lai hěn yǒu shī yì。
english: The interlacing branches on the picture look poetic.

hanzi: 我们测量了这辆汽车的汽油消耗量.
pinyin: wǒ men cè liàng le zhè liàng qì chē de qì yóu xiāo hào liàng.
english: We have measured the car's fuel consumption.

hanzi: 我们测量了这辆汽车的汽油消耗量.
pinyin: wǒ men cè liàng le zhè liàng qì chē de qì yóu xiāo hào liàng.
english: We have measured the car's fuel consumption.

hanzi: 经理收到了二十份求职申请书。
pinyin: jīng lǐ shōu dào le èr shí fèn qiú zhí shēn qǐng shū。
english: The manager received twenty applications for the post.

hanzi: 对程序进行修改是徒劳无功的.
pinyin: duì chéng xù jìn xíng xiū gǎi shì tú láo wú gōng de.
english: Revising the procedure was an entirely profitless exercise.

hanzi: 我们在高速公路上行驶时汽油用完了.
pinyin: wǒ men zài gāo sù gōng lù shàng xíng shǐ shí qì yóu yòng wán le.
english: We ran out of juice on the motorway.

hanzi: 我们在兰开斯特转弯离开了高速公路.
pinyin: wǒ men zài lán kāi sī tè zhuǎn wān lí kāi le gāo sù gōng lù.
english: We turned off the motorway at Lancaster.

hanzi: 我认为我和我女儿之间没有隔阂。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi wǒ huò wǒ nu:3 ér zhī jiān méi yǒu gé hé。
english: I think there is no gulf between my daughter and I.

hanzi: 我怀疑他们是否真有足够的人力。
pinyin: wǒ huái yí tā men shì fǒu zhēn yǒu zú gòu de rén lì。
english: I doubt whether they really have sufficient manpower.

hanzi: 这个博物馆里不准使用闪光灯。
pinyin: zhè gè bó wù guǎn lǐ bù zhǔn shǐ yòng shǎn guāng dēng。
english: Flashes are not allowed to be used in this museum.

hanzi: 她的儿子死去时，她悲伤得几乎疯了。
pinyin: tā de ér zi sǐ qù shí， tā bēi shāng de jī hū fēng le。
english: She was almost mad with grief when her son died.

hanzi: 耐心结合勤奋是成功所必需的。
pinyin: nài xīn jié hé qín fèn shì chéng gōng suǒ bì xū de。
english: Patience combined with diligence is necessary to success.

hanzi: 他是那样急躁，我简直拉他不住。
pinyin: tā shì nà yàng jí zào， wǒ jiǎn zhí lā tā bú zhù。
english: He was so impatient that I could hardly hold him back.

hanzi: 申请这份工作的人数多得惊人.
pinyin: shēn qǐng zhè fèn gōng zuò de rén shù duō de jīng rén.
english: There were an astonishing number of applicants for the job.

hanzi: 她恢复得那么快，我们都有些惊讶。
pinyin: tā huī fù de nà me kuài， wǒ men dōu yǒu xiē jīng yà。
english: We are surprised by the rapidity of her recovery.

hanzi: 总统的汽车由摩托车警卫护行.
pinyin: zǒng tǒng de qì chē yóu mó tuō chē jǐng wèi hù xìng.
english: The President's car was flanked by motor-cycle outriders.

hanzi: 这条路曲折地沿山坡通往上面。
pinyin: zhè tiáo lù qū zhé de yàn shān pō tōng wàng shàng mian。
english: The road twists and turns up the side of the mountain.

hanzi: 这个村庄在洪水泛滥时被淹没了。
pinyin: zhè gè cūn zhuāng zài hóng shuǐ fàn làn shí bèi yān mò le。
english: The village was overwhelmed when the floods came.

hanzi: 隔壁房间里突然爆发出一阵笑声。
pinyin: gé bì fáng jiān lǐ tū rán bào fā chū yī zhèn xiào shēng。
english: There was a burst of laughter in the next room.

hanzi: 他想到要在冬天游泳就有些犹豫.
pinyin: tā xiǎng dào yào zài dōng tiān yóu yǒng jiù yǒu xiē yóu yù.
english: He boggled at the thought of swimming in winter.

hanzi: 随着病情加重，她的身体日渐衰弱。
pinyin: suí zhe bìng qíng jiā zhòng， tā de shēn tǐ rì jiàn shuāi ruò。
english: She weakened as the illness grew worse.

hanzi: 文书组长负责监督该部门的工作.
pinyin: wén shū zǔ zhǎng fù zé jiān dū gāi bù mén de gōng zuò.
english: The chief clerk supervises the work of the department.

hanzi: 文书组长负责监督该部门的工作.
pinyin: wén shū zǔ zhǎng fù zé jiān dū gāi bù mén de gōng zuò.
english: The chief clerk supervises the work of the department.

hanzi: 公司发给她奖金以酬谢她工作努力。
pinyin: gōng sī fà jǐ tā jiǎng jīn yǐ chóu xiè tā gōng zuò nǔ lì。
english: The firm repaid her hard work with a bonus.

hanzi: 听到这个坏消息，他心里充满恐怖。
pinyin: tīng dào zhè gè huài xiāo xi， tā xīn lǐ chōng mǎn kǒng bù。
english: He was filled with horror at the bad news.

hanzi: 把狗放开，它已被拴了几个钟头了。
pinyin: bǎ gǒu fàng kāi， tā yǐ bèi shuān le jǐ ge zhōng tóu le。
english: Release the dog. He has been chained up for hours.

hanzi: 向议员游说的反核群众声势渐强。
pinyin: xiàng yì yuán yóu shuì de fǎn hé qún zhòng shēng shì jiàn qiáng。
english: The anti-nuclear lobby is becoming stronger.

hanzi: 我们把钱用在兴建灌溉工程上了.
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ qián yòng zài xīng jiàn guàn gài gōng chéng shàng le.
english: We used the money to set up an irrigation project.

hanzi: 他们的工资勉强够维持生活的.
pinyin: tā men de gōng zī miǎn qiǎng gòu wéi chí shēng huó de.
english: Their wages are barely enough to keep the wolf from the door.

hanzi: 我们要动动脑筋找出解决的办法来.
pinyin: wǒ men yào dòng dòng nǎo jīn zhǎo chū jiě jué de bàn fǎ lái.
english: We must apply our minds to finding a solution.

hanzi: 母亲设法培养儿子对音乐的兴趣。
pinyin: mǔ qīn shè fǎ péi yǎng ér zi duì yīn yuè de xìng qu。
english: The mother tried to foster her son's interest in music.

hanzi: 影响发展的主要障碍是缺乏资本.
pinyin: yǐng xiǎng fā zhǎn de zhǔ yào zhàng ài shì quē fá zī běn.
english: The main impediment to growth was a lack of capital.

hanzi: 我们很遗憾无法再考虑你的情况。
pinyin: wǒ men hěn yí hàn wú fǎ zài kǎo lu:4 nǐ de qíng kuàng。
english: We regret that we are unable to reconsider your case.

hanzi: 他们接受该计画时心怀不满.
pinyin: tā men jiē shòu gāi jì huà shí xīn huái bù mǎn.
english: Therewas an undercurrent of resentment in their acceptance of the plan.

hanzi: 路警吹响了哨子，火车就开动了。
pinyin: lù jǐng chuī xiǎng le shào zi， huǒ chē jiù kāi dòng le。
english: The guard blew his whistle, and the train moved off.

hanzi: 敌军推进时, 士兵都撤出了那地区.
pinyin: dí jūn tuī jìn shí,  shì bīng dōu chè chū le nà dì qū.
english: The soldiers evacuated the area as the enemy advanced.

hanzi: 我是在教堂的门廊处遇到那个人的。
pinyin: wǒ shì zài jiào táng de mén láng chù yù dào nèi gè rén de。
english: I met that person at the porch of the church.

hanzi: 我很欣赏他对工作的极端专注。
pinyin: wǒ hěn xīn shǎng tā duì gōng zuò de jí duān zhuān zhù。
english: I really appreciate his complete absorption in his work.

hanzi: 那位猎人同意明天带我们去打猎。
pinyin: nà wèi liè rén tóng yì míng tiān dài wǒ men qù dǎ liè。
english: The hunter agreed to take us to go hunting tomorrow.

hanzi: 他赛前量体重比规定限度少几磅。
pinyin: tā sài qián liàng tǐ zhòng bì guī dìng xiàn dù shào jǐ bàng。
english: He weighed in at several pounds below the limit.

hanzi: 手电筒的光束扫遍屋内各个角落.
pinyin: shǒu diàn tǒng de guāng shù sào biàn wū nèi gè ge jiǎo luò.
english: The flashlight's beam scanned every corner of the room.

hanzi: 在夜空的映衬下显出大树的轮廓。
pinyin: zài yè kòng de yìng chèn xià xiǎn chū dà shù de lún kuò。
english: The huge trees were profiled against the night sky.

hanzi: 我丢掉钥匙之后，真正遇到了麻烦。
pinyin: wǒ diū diào yào shi zhī hòu， zhēn zhèng yù dào le má fan。
english: I was really up the creek when I lost my keys.

hanzi: 铸铁是一种比钢便宜得多的材料。
pinyin: zhù tiě shì yī zhòng bì gāng pián yi de duō de cái liào。
english: Cast-iron is a much less expensive material than steel.

pinyin: jiǎng yǎn de rén fǔ shì著 xià mian wú shù de miàn kǒng.
english: The lecturer looked down at the sea of faces beneath him.

hanzi: 把嘴张大，让我看一下你的喉咙。
pinyin: bǎ zuǐ zhāng dà， ràng wǒ kàn yī xià nǐ de hóu lóng。
english: Open your mouth wide so that I can look at your throat.

hanzi: 他和他的舞伴带头跳一种快步舞。
pinyin: tā huò tā de wǔ bàn dài tóu tiào yī zhòng kuài bù wǔ。
english: He led off with his companion in a sort of quick-step.

hanzi: 暴风雨使燃料的缺乏状况更加恶化。
pinyin: bào fēng yǔ shǐ rán liào de quē fá zhuàng kuàng gèng jiā è huà。
english: Heavy storms worsened the fuel shortage.

hanzi: 你的意见必须通过正当途径投诉.
pinyin: nǐ de yì jiàn bì xū tōng guò zhèng dāng tú jìng tóu sù.
english: Your complaint must be made through the proper channels.

hanzi: 这个村庄在洪水泛滥时被淹没了。
pinyin: zhè gè cūn zhuāng zài hóng shuǐ fàn làn shí bèi yān mò le。
english: The village was overwhelmed when the floods came.

hanzi: 示威群众企图突破警察的封锁线.
pinyin: shì wēi qún zhòng qǐ tú tū pò jǐng chá de fēng suǒ xiàn.
english: Demonstrators tried to break through the police cordon.

hanzi: 小舱室，厨房船上的小舱室或厨房
pinyin: xiǎo cāng shì， chú fáng chuán shàng de xiǎo cāng shì huò chú fáng
english: A small cabin or the cook's galley on a ship.

hanzi: 暴风雨过后，航行者们迷失了方向。
pinyin: bào fēng yǔ guò hòu， háng xíng zhě men mí shī le fāng xiàng。
english: These voyagers lost their way after the storm.

hanzi: 你的意见必须通过正当途径投诉.
pinyin: nǐ de yì jiàn bì xū tōng guò zhèng dāng tú jìng tóu sù.
english: Your complaint must be made through the proper channels.

hanzi: 我们的狗别看样子凶，其实很温顺。
pinyin: wǒ men de gǒu biè kàn yàng zi xiōng， qí shí hěn wēn shùn。
english: Our dog may look fierce but he wouldn't hurt a fly.

pinyin: nà xiē bù zhōng fèn zǐ tuō dǎng lìng zǔ le yī gè Xīn dǎng.
english: Disaffected members have left to form a new party.

pinyin: dà qún rén jù jí zài zhǎn lǎn dà tīng de mén kǒu。
english: A multitude of people gathered at the gate of the exhibition hall.

pinyin: zhè zuò shān xiàng běi de yī miàn jī hū shì chuí zhí de。
english: The northern face of the mountain is almost vertical.

hanzi: 奴隶制在许多国家已经被废除。
pinyin: nú lì zhì zài xǔ duō guó jiā yǐ jīng bèi fèi chú。
english: The abolition of slavery had been exercised in many countries.

hanzi: 对不起，您的汇款还没有到我们这儿。
pinyin: duì bù qǐ， nín de huì kuǎn huán méi yǒu dào wǒ men zhèr。
english: Sorry, your remittance have not reach us yet.

hanzi: 我们把钱用在兴建灌溉工程上了.
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ qián yòng zài xīng jiàn guàn gài gōng chéng shàng le.
english: We used the money to set up an irrigation project.

hanzi: 一个男人对妻子隐瞒事情是不对的。
pinyin: yī gè nán rén duì qī zi yǐn mán shì qing shì bù duì de。
english: It is wrong for a man to conceal things from his wife.

pinyin: tā yǒu cái gàn néng zài běn háng yè zhòng shǒu qū yī zhǐ。
english: His ability carried him to the top of his profession.

pinyin: tā yīn wèi dòng zuò fàn guī ér bèi cái pàn jì xià xìng míng。
english: He was booked by the referee for foul play.

pinyin: tā de xiǎo shuō shì miáo xiě shì lì xiǎo rén de fèng cì zuò pǐn.
english: Her novel is a satire on social snobbery.

pinyin: jǐng fāng zài jìng xuǎn zhī yè zhì zhǐ le jǐ chù sāo luàn。
english: The police stopped several riots on election night.

pinyin: zhuō zi jiē chù qiáng bì de dì fang qī pí yǐ bō luò。
english: The paint has chipped off where the table touches the wall.

pinyin: wǒ men kuài bǎ jué dìng jí zǎo tōng zhī shēn qǐng zhě。
english: Applicants will be notified of our decision in good season.

pinyin: tā pí juàn de shí yè zhòng fàn le shí gè cuò wù。
english: He was tired enough to make ten errors in as many (=in ten) pages.

pinyin: yǒu yī zhǐ lǎo hǔ pǎo chū,  zhèng zài chéng lǐ dōng táo xī cuàn.
english: An escaped tiger is roaming free in the town.

hanzi: 根据规定, 申请者一律需经笔试.
pinyin: gēn jù guī dìng,  shēn qǐng zhě yī lu:4 xū jīng bǐ shì.
english: It is laid down that all applicants must sit a written exam.

hanzi: 手电筒的光束扫遍屋内各个角落.
pinyin: shǒu diàn tǒng de guāng shù sào biàn wū nèi gè ge jiǎo luò.
english: The flashlight's beam scanned every corner of the room.

hanzi: 他写了一本描写边疆各省的专著。
pinyin: tā xiě le yī běn miáo xiě biān jiāng gè xǐng de zhuān著。
english: He wrote a book descriptive of the frontier provinces.

pinyin: hán lěng de tiān qì shǐ chā yāng tuī chí liǎng gè xīng qī。
english: The cold weather set back the planting by two weeks.

pinyin: tā zài zhù zi shàng tú shàng le qǐ bǎo hù zuò yòng de yè tǐ.
english: He painted the posts with a preservative liquid.

hanzi: 警方正在查阅类似案件的档案.
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài chá yuè lèi sì àn jiàn de dàng àn.
english: The police are trawling (through) their files for similar cases.

hanzi: 飞机著陆时, 乘客感到猛烈的冲撞.
pinyin: fēi jī著 lù shí,  chéng kè gǎn dào měng liè de chōng chuáng.
english: The passengers felt a violent bump as the plane landed.

hanzi: 这个漂亮的窗帘是用零头布做的。
pinyin: zhè gè piào liang de chuāng lián shì yòng líng tóu bù zuò de。
english: The beautiful curtain is made of remnant materials.

hanzi: 警方正在查阅类似案件的档案.
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài chá yuè lèi sì àn jiàn de dàng àn.
english: The police are trawling (through) their files for similar cases.

hanzi: 暴风雨过后，航行者们迷失了方向。
pinyin: bào fēng yǔ guò hòu， háng xíng zhě men mí shī le fāng xiàng。
english: These voyagers lost their way after the storm.

hanzi: 公司记载了另一个销售额增长年。
pinyin: gōng sī jì zǎi le lìng yī gè xiāo shòu é zēng zhǎng nián。
english: The company had record another year of increase sale.

hanzi: 一想到叫孩子遭罪我心里就难受。
pinyin: yī xiǎng dào jiào hái zi zāo zuì wǒ xīn lǐ jiù nán shòu。
english: It turns me up to think of children being made to suffer.

hanzi: 她面临可能早逝而手足无措.
pinyin: tā miàn lín kě néng zǎo shì ér shǒu zú wú cuò.
english: She's finding it difficult to face up to the possibility of an early death.
