pinyin: zǎo chén bā jiǔ diǎn zhōng shì jiāo tōng de gāo fēng shí kè.
english: Traffic reaches a peak between 8 and 9 in the morning.

hanzi: 他们是彼此争夺第一名的老对手。
pinyin: tā men shì bǐ cǐ zhēng duó dì yī míng de lǎo duì shǒu。
english: They are old rivals vying with each other for first place.

hanzi: 开车的人在快要转弯时按响了喇叭.
pinyin: kāi chē de rén zài kuài yào zhuǎn wān shí àn xiǎng le lǎ ba.
english: The driver tooted his horn as he approached the bend.

hanzi: 这个少先队员扶着盲人过了马路。
pinyin: zhè gè shào xiān duì yuán fú zhuó máng rén guò le mǎ lù。
english: The Young Pioneer saw the blind man across the road.

hanzi: 承蒙足下推荐, 我已获得这份工作.
pinyin: chéng měng zú xià tuī jiàn,  wǒ yǐ huò dé zhè fèn gōng zuò.
english: I got the job on the strength of your recommendation.

hanzi: 在暴风中屋顶的瓦片哗啦啦地落了下来.
pinyin: zài bào fēng zhòng wū dǐng de wǎ piàn huá la la de luò le xia lai.
english: During the gale roof tiles came hurtling down.

hanzi: 今天上午她买了一个烤面包片的电炉。
pinyin: jīn tiān shàng wǔ tā mǎi le yī gè kǎo miàn bāo piàn de diàn lú。
english: She buy an electric toaster this morning.

hanzi: 示威者挥舞着旗帜，呼喊着口号。
pinyin: shì wēi zhě huī wǔ zhuó qí zhì， hū hǎn zhuó kǒu hào。
english: The demonstrators brandished banners and shouted slogans.

hanzi: 我正打算出去一会儿，可我舅舅来了。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng dǎ suàn chū qù yī huìr， kě wǒ jiù jiu lái le。
english: I was just going out for a bit when my uncle came.

hanzi: 海关人员问我是否有要报税的东西。
pinyin: hǎi guān rén yuán wèn wǒ shì fǒu yǒu yào bào shuì de dōng xi。
english: The customs asked me if I had anything to declare.

hanzi: 这位政治家被任命为财政部长。
pinyin: zhè wèi zhèng zhì jiā bèi rèn mìng wèi cái zhèng bù zhǎng。
english: The politician was appointed as the Minister of Finance.

hanzi: 她教起书来就像鸭子下水般轻而易举.
pinyin: tā jiào qǐ shū lái jiù xiàng yā zi xià shuǐ bān qīng ér yì jǔ.
english: She's taken to teaching like a duck to water.

hanzi: 抄袭者，起码也有保存文物的功劳。
pinyin: chāo xí zhě， qǐ mǎ yě yǒu bǎo cún wén wù de gōng láo。
english: Plagiarists, at least, have the merit of preservation.

hanzi: 教授因他可爱的单纯而上了圈套。
pinyin: jiào shòu yīn tā kě ài de dān chún ér shàng le juān tào。
english: The professor rose to the fly with a charming simplicity.

hanzi: 探照灯发出强光, 照亮监狱场地.
pinyin: tàn zhào dēng fā chū qiáng guāng,  zhào liàng jiān yù chǎng dì.
english: The searchlights glared, illuminating the prison yard.

hanzi: 我刚才把你的一个瓷器装饰品弄掉了。
pinyin: wǒ gāng cái bǎ nǐ de yī gè cí qì zhuāng shì pǐn nòng diào le。
english: I've just dropped one of your china ornamental.

hanzi: 根据规定，申请者一律需经笔试。
pinyin: gēn jù guī dìng， shēn qǐng zhě yī lu:4 xū jīng bǐ shì。
english: It is laid down that all applicant must sit a write exam.

hanzi: 争论的焦点是这个行业总的前景.
pinyin: zhēng lùn de jiāo diǎn shì zhè gè háng yè zǒng de qián jǐng.
english: What's at issue here is the whole future of the industry.

hanzi: 那个推销员试图说服她买他的东西。
pinyin: nèi gè tuī xiāo yuán shì tú shuō fú tā mǎi tā de dōng xi。
english: The salesman tried to persuade her to buy his goods.

hanzi: 该航天器在绕月球轨道上飞行.
pinyin: gāi háng tiān qì zài rào yuè qiú guǐ dào shàng fēi xíng.
english: The spacecraft is in orbit (ie moving in orbit) round the moon.

hanzi: 这个政治家在他的同胞中不得人心。
pinyin: zhè gè zhèng zhì jiā zài tā de tóng bāo zhòng bù dé rén xīn。
english: The politician was unpopular with his countryman.

hanzi: 这个政治家在他的同胞中不得人心。
pinyin: zhè gè zhèng zhì jiā zài tā de tóng bāo zhòng bù dé rén xīn。
english: The politician was unpopular with his countryman.

hanzi: 他不仅强壮健康，而且还很聪明。
pinyin: tā bù jǐn qiáng zhuàng jiàn kāng， ér qiě huán hěn cōng míng。
english: He is not only strong and healthy but also very smart.

hanzi: 她终于嫁给了最执着追求她的人。
pinyin: tā zhōng yú jià jǐ le zuì zhí zhuó zhuī qiú tā de rén。
english: She eventually married the most persistent one of her admirers.

hanzi: 通往这座城市的所有道路都被封锁了。
pinyin: tōng wàng zhè zuò chéng shì de suǒ yǒu dào lù dōu bèi fēng suǒ le。
english: All approaches to the city were blocked.

hanzi: 别惦记我们--我们不久就和你们在一起了.
pinyin: biè diàn jì wǒ men-- wǒ men bù jiǔ jiù huò nǐ men zài yī qǐ le.
english: Don't bother about us we'll join you later.

hanzi: 倘若外援枯竭，形势将极为严重。
pinyin: tǎng ruò wài yuán kū jié， xíng shì jiàng jí wéi yán zhòng。
english: If foreign aid dries up the situation will be desperate.

hanzi: 那个女孩穿着婚纱格外美丽动人。
pinyin: nèi gè nu:3 hái chuān zhuó hūn shā gé wài měi lì dòng rén。
english: The girl is all the more beautiful in her wedding gown.

hanzi: 彩旗给这次盛会增添了欢乐的气氛.
pinyin: cǎi qí jǐ zhè cì shèng huì zēng tiān le huān lè de qì fēn.
english: The colourful flags added to the gaiety of the occasion.

hanzi: 他给我们读了一首歌颂爱情的十四行诗。
pinyin: tā jǐ wǒ men dú le yī shǒu gē sòng ài qíng de shí sì xìng shī。
english: He read us a sonnet that celebrates love.

hanzi: 他在密西西比河流域拥有一个大农场。
pinyin: tā zài mì xī xī bì hé liú yù yōng yǒu yī gè dà nóng chǎng。
english: He has a large farm in the Mississippi Valley.

hanzi: 飞机著陆时, 乘客感到猛烈的冲撞.
pinyin: fēi jī著 lù shí,  chéng kè gǎn dào měng liè de chōng chuáng.
english: The passengers felt a violent bump as the plane landed.

hanzi: 他终生献身于珍稀动物的保护。
pinyin: tā zhōng shēng xiàn shēn yú zhēn xī dòng wù de bǎo hù。
english: He's devoted his whole life to the protection of the rare animals.

hanzi: 对您给予的丰厚礼物，我们不胜感激。
pinyin: duì nín gěi yǔ de fēng hòu lǐ wù， wǒ men bù shèng gǎn jī。
english: We are grateful to you for your bounteous gifts.

hanzi: 总的说来, 这本书是讽刺性的.
pinyin: zǒng de shuō lái,  zhè běn shū shì fèng cì xìng de.
english: Overall, the tone of the book is satirical/the book is satirical in tone.

hanzi: 列车在约克又挂上了两节车厢.
pinyin: liè chē zài Yuē kè yòu guà shàng le liǎng jié chē xiāng.
english: Two extra carriages were joined onto the train/joined on at York.

hanzi: 在死者胃中找到了少量的毒药。
pinyin: zài sǐ zhě wèi zhòng zhǎo dào le shǎo liàng de dú yào。
english: Small quantities of poison were detected in the dead man's stomach.

hanzi: 共和国的未来性质尚在未定之天。
pinyin: gòng hé guó de wèi lái xìng zhì shàng zài wèi dìng zhī tiān。
english: The future character of the Republic is in the air.

hanzi: 当时我有些忘乎所以，疯狂地吻著他。
pinyin: dāng shí wǒ yǒu xiē wàng hū suǒ yǐ， fēng kuáng de wěn著 tā。
english: I'm afraid I forgot myself and kissed him wildly.

hanzi: 警方把建筑物的所有出口都封锁住了.
pinyin: jǐng fāng bǎ jiàn zhù wù de suǒ yǒu chū kǒu dōu fēng suǒ zhù le.
english: Police sealed off all the exits from the building.

hanzi: 集市的景象光怪陆离, 纷然杂陈.
pinyin: jí shì de jǐng xiàng guāng guài lù lí,  fēn rán zá chén.
english: The bazaar was a kaleidoscope of strange sights and impressions.

hanzi: 我送给她一条编织的披肩作圣诞礼物。
pinyin: wǒ sòng jǐ tā yī tiáo biān zhī de pī jiān zuò Shèng dàn lǐ wù。
english: I gave her a knitted shawl as a Christmas gift.

hanzi: 从右边驶来的车辆享有优先通行权.
pinyin: zòng yòu biān shǐ lái de chē liàng xiǎng yǒu yōu xiān tōng xíng quán.
english: Vehicles coming from the right have priority.

hanzi: 火箭绕地球运行一周后返回基地。
pinyin: huǒ jiàn rào dì qiú yùn xíng yī zhōu hòu fǎn huí jī dì。
english: The rocket did one circuit of the earth and returned to base.

hanzi: 他争论着，他的声音由于生气而颤抖。
pinyin: tā zhēng lùn zhuó， tā de shēng yīn yóu yú shēng qì ér chàn dǒu。
english: He argued, his voice trembling with anger.

hanzi: 决不只是瞎子才犯这样愚蠢的错误。
pinyin: jué bù zhǐ shì xiā zi cái fàn zhè yàng yú chǔn de cuò wù。
english: It is not only blind men who make such stupid mistakes.

hanzi: 世代居住在城市里使他们磨练了才智。
pinyin: shì dài jū zhù zài chéng shì lǐ shǐ tā men mò liàn le cái zhì。
english: Generations of urban living sharpened their wits.

hanzi: 雨水从屋顶的破洞处哗哗往下流。
pinyin: yǔ shuǐ zòng wū dǐng de pò dòng chù huā huā wàng xià liú。
english: The rainwater is splashing down from the hole of the roof.

hanzi: 这所学校培养出了一些第一流的学者.
pinyin: zhè suǒ xué xiào péi yǎng chū le yī xiē dì yī liú de xué zhě.
english: The school has turned out some first-rate scholars.

hanzi: 她讨厌在宴会上为应酬而和人交谈。
pinyin: tā tǎo yàn zài yàn huì shàng wèi yìng chou ér huò rén jiāo tán。
english: She detests having to talk to people at parties.

hanzi: 我想用我搜集的邮票换你的模型船.
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng yòng wǒ sōu jí de yóu piào huàn nǐ de mó xíng chuán.
english: I'll trade you my stamp collection for your model boat.

hanzi: 我想用我搜集的邮票换你的模型船.
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng yòng wǒ sōu jí de yóu piào huàn nǐ de mó xíng chuán.
english: I'll trade you my stamp collection for your model boat.

hanzi: 我们将对他带来的矿石做实验鉴定。
pinyin: wǒ men jiàng duì tā dài lái de kuàng shí zuò shí yàn jiàn dìng。
english: We will make an assay of the ore that he brought.

hanzi: 这两种类型的狗可以杂交繁殖.
pinyin: zhè liǎng zhǒng lèi xíng de gǒu kě yǐ zá jiāo fán zhí.
english: These two types of dog can interbreed/be interbred (with each other).

hanzi: 他病了很久，因此耽误了功课。
pinyin: tā bìng le hěn jiǔ， yīn cǐ dān wu le gōng kè。
english: He had been ill for a long time and consequently he was behind in his work.

hanzi: 在紧急情况下保持镇静是很重要的.
pinyin: zài jǐn jí qíng kuàng xià bǎo chí zhèn jìng shì hěn zhòng yào de.
english: It is important to keep/stay calm in an emergency.

hanzi: 这座城市被占领使国人大为震惊。
pinyin: zhè zuò chéng shì bèi zhàn lǐng shǐ guó rén dà wèi zhèn jīng。
english: The capture of the city shocked everyone in the country.

hanzi: 她会说法语, 德语, 还会说一点儿俄语.
pinyin: tā kuài shuō fa yù,  dé yǔ,  huán kuài shuō yī diǎnr é yǔ.
english: She speaks French and German and also a little Russian.

hanzi: 议会对议案的数份修正案进行了辩论.
pinyin: yì huì duì yì àn de shuò fèn xiū zhèng àn jìn xíng le biàn lùn.
english: Parliament debated several amendments to the bill.

hanzi: 倘若外援枯竭，形势将极为严重。
pinyin: tǎng ruò wài yuán kū jié， xíng shì jiàng jí wéi yán zhòng。
english: If foreign aid dries up the situation will be desperate.

hanzi: 异卵黄的卵子中卵黄分布不均匀的
pinyin: yì luǎn huáng de luǎn zǐ zhòng luǎn huáng fēn bù bù jūn yún de
english: Having the yolk unevenly distributed throughout the egg.

hanzi: 向大门走去的人受到了哨兵的查问.
pinyin: xiàng dà mén zǒu qù de rén shòu dào le shào bīng de zhā wèn.
english: People approaching the gate were challenged by the sentry.

hanzi: 做广告的根本目的是要多出售货物.
pinyin: zuò guǎng gào de gēn běn mù dì shì yào duō chū shòu huò wù.
english: The primary reason for advertising is to sell more goods.

hanzi: 谷物轮种使土壤保持了肥力和高质。
pinyin: gǔ wù lún zhòng shǐ tǔ rǎng bǎo chí le féi lì huò gāo zhì。
english: The rotation of crops keeps the soil healthy and fertile.

hanzi: 在无人岛上夸耀富有也是白费力气。
pinyin: zài wú rén dǎo shàng kuā yào fù yǒu yě shì bái fèi lì qi。
english: It is of no use boasting of being rich on a desert island.

hanzi: 他们用很多时间探讨生命的奥秘.
pinyin: tā men yòng hěn duō shí jiān tàn tǎo shēng mìng de ào mì.
english: They spend their time philosophizingabout the mysteries of life.

hanzi: 我挣的每一便士都是辛苦工作得来的。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng de měi yī biàn shì dōu shì xīn kǔ gōng zuò de lái de。
english: I have had to work for every single penny I earned.

hanzi: 他给我们搭的花园棚屋很没水平.
pinyin: tā jǐ wǒ men dā de huā yuán péng wū hěn mò shuǐ píng.
english: He made a very unprofessional job of putting up the garden shed for us.

hanzi: 他在沟里和草堆里露宿了一个星期。
pinyin: tā zài gōu lǐ huò cǎo duī lǐ lù xiù le yī gè xīng qī。
english: He'd been sleeping rough for a week, in ditches and haystacks.

hanzi: 英国来的燕子飞到南非那样远的地方。
pinyin: Yīng guó lái de yàn zi fēi dào nán fēi nà yàng yuǎn de dì fang。
english: Swallows from England go as far as South Africa.

hanzi: 所有的申请者一个接着一个参加面试。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de shēn qǐng zhě yī gè jiē zhe yī gè cān jiā miàn shì。
english: All the applicants were interviewed one by one.

hanzi: 盲目崇拜对某件事情的盲目或过分投入
pinyin: máng mù chóng bài duì mǒu jiàn shì qing de máng mù huò guò fèn tóu rù
english: Blind or excessive devotion to something.

hanzi: 为了赚到足够的钱, 他工作到深夜。
pinyin: wèi le zuàn dào zú gòu de qián,  tā gōng zuò dào shēn yè。
english: In order to earn enough money, he worked late into the night.

hanzi: 走廊的某处响起轻柔悦耳的铃声。
pinyin: zǒu láng de mǒu chù xiǎng qǐ qīng róu yuè ěr de líng shēng。
english: A musical bell softly sounded somewhere in the passageway.

hanzi: 他搜集的邮票是我的三倍还不止。
pinyin: tā sōu jí de yóu piào shì wǒ de sān bèi huán bù zhǐ。
english: He has collected more than three times as many stamps as I (have).

hanzi: 他们出国时把家具送到仓库保管起来.
pinyin: tā men chū guó shí bǎ jiā jù sòng dào cāng kù bǎo guǎn qǐ lai.
english: They've stored their furniture while they go abroad.

hanzi: 邮筒为存放外寄信件而设的公用盒箱
pinyin: yóu tǒng wèi cún fàng wài jì xìn jiàn ér shè de gōng yòng hé xiāng
english: A public container for deposit of outgoing mail.

hanzi: 法律界人士对变革总是加以抵制.
pinyin: fǎ lu:4 jiè rén shì duì biàn gé zǒng shì jiā yǐ dǐ zhì.
english: The legal profession (ie lawyers) has/have always resisted change.

hanzi: 通往宫殿的所有道路都有部队把守。
pinyin: tōng wàng gōng diàn de suǒ yǒu dào lù dōu yǒu bù duì bǎ shǒu。
english: All the approaches to the palace are guarded by troops.

hanzi: 我对宗教问题和道德问题不感兴趣。
pinyin: wǒ duì zōng jiào wèn tí huò dào dé wèn tí bù gǎn xìng qu。
english: I am unconcerned with questions of religion or morality.

hanzi: 警方把建筑物的所有出口都封锁住了.
pinyin: jǐng fāng bǎ jiàn zhù wù de suǒ yǒu chū kǒu dōu fēng suǒ zhù le.
english: Police sealed off all the exits from the building.

hanzi: 废除农奴制度后，农奴们获得了解放。
pinyin: fèi chú nóng nú zhì dù hòu， nóng nú men huò dé liǎo jiě fàng。
english: The serfs were liberated after abolishing serfdom.

hanzi: 恶劣的天气阻止了我们准时到达那里。
pinyin: è liè de tiān qì zǔ zhǐ le wǒ men zhǔn shí dào dá nà li。
english: The bad weather prevented us from getting there on time.

hanzi: 科学家仍在寻求治疗感冒的方法。
pinyin: kē xué jiā réng zài xún qiú zhì liáo gǎn mào de fāng fǎ。
english: Scientists are still searching for a cure to the common cold.

hanzi: 驾驶员把失灵的飞机降落在田地里。
pinyin: jià shǐ yuán bǎ shī líng de fēi jī jiàng luò zài tián dì lǐ。
english: The pilot brought his crippled plane down in a field.

hanzi: 敌人的炮弹在士兵行列中炸成大洞。
pinyin: dí rén de pào dàn zài shì bīng háng liè zhòng zhà chéng dà dòng。
english: The enemy's shells made great holes in the ranks.

hanzi: 他在执行职务中遇到许多阻力.
pinyin: tā zài zhí xíng zhí wù zhòng yù dào xǔ duō zǔ lì.
english: In the prosecution of his duties he had met with a good deal of resistance.

hanzi: 以丧失独立来换取和平是极高的代价.
pinyin: yǐ sàng shī dú lì lái huàn qǔ hé píng shì jí gāo de dài jià.
english: Loss of independencewas a high price to pay for peace.

hanzi: 每周六琴在村里的公用草地上骑马。
pinyin: měi zhōu liù qín zài cūn lǐ de gōng yòng cǎo dì shàng qí mǎ。
english: Every Saturday Jean went riding on the village common.

hanzi: 他们不停地射击, 耗尽了所有的弹药.
pinyin: tā men bù tíng de shè jī,  hào jìn le suǒ yǒu de dàn yào.
english: They went on firing until they had spent all their ammunition.

hanzi: 报纸的报道往往不尊重私人权利.
pinyin: bào zhǐ de bào dào wǎng wǎng bù zūn zhòng sī rén quán lì.
english: Newspapers often don't respect the individual's right to privacy.

hanzi: 他们因对手权柄在握, 反抗也没用.
pinyin: tā men yīn duì shǒu quán bǐng zài wò,  fǎn kàng yě méi yòng.
english: Their opponents had the whip hand and it was useless to resist.

hanzi: 护士在缝合伤口前先清洁一下伤口。
pinyin: hù shi zài fèng hé shāng kǒu qián xiān qīng jié yī xià shāng kǒu。
english: The nurse cleansed the wound before stitching it.

hanzi: 在阳光照射下能看见架子上有灰尘。
pinyin: zài yáng guāng zhào shè xià néng kàn jiàn jià zi shàng yǒu huī chén。
english: The dust on the shelf show up in the sunlight.

hanzi: 他发疯了，开始把这块地方砸得粉碎。
pinyin: tā fā fēng le， kāi shǐ bǎ zhè kuài dì fang zá de fěn suì。
english: He went stark raving mad and began smashing the place up.

hanzi: 这样的程序是从旧制度那里沿袭下来的.
pinyin: zhè yàng de chéng xù shì zòng jiù zhì dù nà li yán xí xia lai de.
english: This procedure is a hangover from the old system.

hanzi: 他要想当选就得把观点改得缓和些.
pinyin: tā yào xiǎng dāng xuǎn jiù de bǎ guān diǎn gǎi de huǎn hé xiē.
english: He'll have to modify his views if he wants to be elected.

hanzi: 他白费力气想抓住停在花上的蝴蝶。
pinyin: tā bái fèi lì qi xiǎng zhuā zhù tíng zài huā shàng de hú dié。
english: He tried in vain to catch the butterfly on the flower.

hanzi: 他白费力气想抓住停在花上的蝴蝶。
pinyin: tā bái fèi lì qi xiǎng zhuā zhù tíng zài huā shàng de hú dié。
english: He tried in vain to catch the butterfly on the flower.

hanzi: 在旧社会工人农民是被剥削的阶级。
pinyin: zài jiù shè huì gōng rén nóng mín shì bèi bō xuē de jiē jí。
english: Is the old society worker and farmer is exploited class.

hanzi: 华侨们非常高兴地踏上祖国的土地。
pinyin: huá qiáo men fēi cháng gāo xìng de tà shàng zǔ guó de tǔ dì。
english: The overseas are very glad to set foot on their homeland.

hanzi: 愿新年为你带来快乐，友爱和宁静。
pinyin: yuàn xīn nián wèi nǐ dài lái kuài lè， yǒu ài huò níng jìng。
english: May the coming New Year bring you joy, love and peace.

hanzi: 瘦肉上可加咸肉片烤制以保持水分。
pinyin: shòu ròu shàng kě jiā xián ròu piàn kǎo zhì yǐ bǎo chí shuǐ fèn。
english: Lean meat can be larded to keep it moist in the oven.

hanzi: 他使劲儿把食物咽下去, 嘴唇都扭曲起来.
pinyin: tā shǐ jìn er bǎ shí wù yè xià qu,  zuǐ chún dōu niǔ qū qǐ lai.
english: His lips worked as he tried to swallow the food.

hanzi: 林先生明天早晨将擦洗他的摩托车。
pinyin: lín xiān sheng míng tiān zǎo chén jiàng cā xǐ tā de mó tuō chē。
english: Mr. Lin will wash his motorcycle tomorrow morning.

hanzi: 大使馆是恐怖分子攻击的明显目标。
pinyin: dà shǐ guǎn shì kǒng bù fèn zǐ gōng jī de míng xiǎn mù biāo。
english: The embassy is an obvious target for terrorist attacks.

hanzi: 我们的最终目标是消除所有核武器。
pinyin: wǒ men de zuì zhōng mù biāo shì xiāo chú suǒ yǒu hé wǔ qì。
english: Our ultimate objective is the removal of all nuclear weapons.

hanzi: 从前的人把监犯的头钉在尖桩上.
pinyin: cóng qián de rén bǎ jiàn fàn de tou dīng zài jiān zhuāng shàng.
english: In former times, prisoners' heads were impaled on pointed stakes.

hanzi: 为了赚到足够的钱, 他工作到深夜。
pinyin: wèi le zuàn dào zú gòu de qián,  tā gōng zuò dào shēn yè。
english: In order to earn enough money, he worked late into the night.

hanzi: 别瞎动电线线路, 你又不是电工.
pinyin: biè xiā dòng diàn xiàn xiàn lù,  nǐ yòu bú shì diàn gōng.
english: Don't meddle with the electrical wiring: you're not an electrician.

hanzi: 我们的最终目标是消除所有核武器。
pinyin: wǒ men de zuì zhōng mù biāo shì xiāo chú suǒ yǒu hé wǔ qì。
english: Our ultimate objective is the removal of all nuclear weapons.

hanzi: 在圣诞节期间, 广告战已达到高潮.
pinyin: zài Shèng dàn jié qī jiān,  guǎng gào zhàn yǐ dá dào gāo cháo.
english: The advertising campaign reached a crescendo at Christmas.

hanzi: 一位老人坐在公园的长凳上喂鸽子。
pinyin: yī wèi lǎo rén zuò zài gōng yuán de zhǎng dèng shàng wèi gē zǐ。
english: An old man sat on the park bench and fed the pigeon.

hanzi: 一连串的意外事件把店里弄得乱七八糟。
pinyin: yī lián chuàn de yì wài shì jiàn bǎ diàn lǐ nòng de luàn qī bā zāo。
english: A series of accidents disordered the shop.

hanzi: 雕刻家把大理石块凿成优美的雕像.
pinyin: diāo kè jiā bǎ dà lǐ shí kuài zuò chéng yōu měi de diāo xiàng.
english: The sculptor chiselled the lump of marble into a fine statue.

hanzi: 我很匆忙, 所以随便地把衣服穿上了。
pinyin: wǒ hěn cōng máng,  suǒ yǐ suí biàn de bǎ yī fu chuān shàng le。
english: I was in such a hurry that I put my clothes on anyhow.

hanzi: 该协会致力于推动世界和平事业。
pinyin: gāi xié huì zhì lì yú tuī dòng shì jiè hé píng shì yè。
english: The society was dedicated to furthering the cause of world peace.

hanzi: 那辆货车遭罢工者抵制而无法卸货.
pinyin: nà liàng huò chē zāo bà gōng zhě dǐ zhì ér wú fǎ xiè huò.
english: The lorry had been blacked by strikers and could not be unloaded.

hanzi: 我已嘱咐过你离那些粗野的男孩远点儿。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ zhǔ fù guò nǐ lí nà xiē cū yě de nán hái yuǎn diǎn er。
english: I've told you to stop away from those rough boys.

hanzi: 通往宫殿的所有道路都有部队把守。
pinyin: tōng wàng gōng diàn de suǒ yǒu dào lù dōu yǒu bù duì bǎ shǒu。
english: All the approaches to the palace are guarded by troops.

hanzi: 宗教是一个必须慎重处理的问题。
pinyin: zōng jiào shì yī gè bì xū shèn zhòng chǔ lǐ de wèn tí。
english: Religion is a subject that must be approached with great delicacy.

hanzi: 她在攀登过程中表现出极大的耐力。
pinyin: tā zài pān dēng guò chéng zhòng biǎo xiàn chū jí dà de nài lì。
english: She exhibited great powers of endurance during the climb.

hanzi: 我们焦急万分地等候医生做出诊断。
pinyin: wǒ men jiāo jí wàn fēn de děng hòu yī shēng zuò chū zhěn duàn。
english: We waited in great suspense for the doctor's diagnosis.

hanzi: 她的细致工作使得其余所有的人自愧不如。
pinyin: tā de xì zhì gōng zuò shǐ de qí yú suǒ yǒu de rén zì kuì bù rú。
english: Her careful work put all the rest to shame.

hanzi: 编辑迅速将失事消息编入晚间新闻.
pinyin: biān jí xùn sù jiàng shī shì xiāo xi biān rù wǎn jiān xīn wén.
english: Editors rushed out a piece on the crash for the late news.

hanzi: 这些女孩在溜冰，而这些男孩在观看。
pinyin: zhè xie nu:3 hái zài liū bīng， ér zhè xie nán hái zài guān kàn。
english: The girls are skating and the boys (are) watching.

hanzi: 大会议程首先 是向来宾致欢迎辞.
pinyin: dà huì yì chéng shǒu xiān  shì xiàng lái bīn zhì huān yíng cí.
english: The proceedings will begin with a speech to welcome the guests.

hanzi: 我其实是个教师，写作只是我的兼职。
pinyin: wǒ qí shí shì gè jiào shī， xiě zuò zhǐ shì wǒ de jiān zhí。
english: Actually I'm a teacher, my writing is just a sideline.

hanzi: 他吓得直哆嗦，就好像看见了鬼一样。
pinyin: tā xià de zhí duō suo， jiù hǎo xiàng kàn jiàn le guǐ yí yàng。
english: He was shaking with fright as if he had seen a ghost.

hanzi: 进屋前先在门口擦鞋垫上擦一擦鞋子。
pinyin: jìn wū qián xiān zài mén kǒu cā xié diàn shàng cā yī cā xié zi。
english: Scrape your shoes on the door mat before you come in.

hanzi: 他们攀登那座山的一切尝试都失败了.
pinyin: tā men pān dēng nà zuò shān de yī qiè cháng shì dōu shī bài le.
english: They failed in all their attempts to climb the mountain.

hanzi: 他因违犯绝密条例, 成了处罚对象.
pinyin: tā yīn wéi fàn jué mì tiáo lì,  chéng le chǔ fá duì xiàng.
english: By breaking the rule of absolute secrecy, he became a marked man.

hanzi: 它常被用作治疗蛇咬伤的民间药物。
pinyin: tā cháng bèi yòng zuò zhì liáo shé yǎo shāng de mín jiān yào wù。
english: It is often used as folk medicine to cure snake bite.

hanzi: 爆炸的时间定在飞机起飞的时刻。
pinyin: bào zhà de shí jiān dìng zài fēi jī qǐ fēi de shí kè。
english: The explosion was timed to be simultaneous with the plane's take-off.

hanzi: 女子在体力上而不是智力上比男子弱。
pinyin: nu:3 zǐ zài tǐ lì shàng ér bú shì zhì lì shàng bì nán zǐ ruò。
english: Woman is physically but not mentally weaker than man.

hanzi: 在这个国家里，元旦是全国性的假日。
pinyin: zài zhè gè guó jiā lǐ， yuán dàn shì quán guó xìng de jià rì。
english: In this country New Year's Day is a national holiday.

hanzi: 女子在体力上而不是智力上比男子弱。
pinyin: nu:3 zǐ zài tǐ lì shàng ér bú shì zhì lì shàng bì nán zǐ ruò。
english: Woman is physically but not mentally weaker than man.

hanzi: 干旱地区需要灌溉才能使作物生长。
pinyin: gān hàn dì qū xū yào guàn gài cái néng shǐ zuò wù shēng zhǎng。
english: Irrigation is needed to make crops grow in dry regions.

hanzi: 整顿饭都很好, 尤其是葡萄酒更好.
pinyin: zhěng dùn fàn dōu hěn hǎo,  yóu qí shì pú tao jiǔ gèng hǎo.
english: The whole meal was good but the wine in particular was excellent.

hanzi: 她尽管受了伤却没有失去生存的毅力.
pinyin: tā jǐn guǎn shòu le shāng què méi yǒu shī qù shēng cún de yì lì.
english: Despite her injuries, she hasn't lost the will to live.

hanzi: 他无法从岩石危险的位置上下来。
pinyin: tā wú fǎ zòng yán shí wēi xiǎn de wèi zhi shàng xià lái。
english: He was unable to get down from his precarious position on the rocks.

hanzi: 除了英语以外, 我们还学俄语及西班牙语。
pinyin: chú le Yīng yǔ yǐ wài,  wǒ men huán xué é yǔ jí xī bān yá yù。
english: Apart from English, we study Russian and Spanish.

hanzi: 原子弹爆炸总是伴随着巨大的火球。
pinyin: yuán zǐ dàn bào zhà zǒng shì bàn suí zhuó jù dà de huǒ qiú。
english: The atomic explosion is always accompanied by huge fireball.

hanzi: 宪法规定治理国家的方式方法。
pinyin: xiàn fǎ guī dìng zhì lǐ guó jiā de fāng shì fāng fǎ。
english: A constitution lays down the manner and means by which a state is governed.

hanzi: 他无法从岩石危险的位置上下来。
pinyin: tā wú fǎ zòng yán shí wēi xiǎn de wèi zhi shàng xià lái。
english: He was unable to get down from his precarious position on the rocks.

hanzi: 他预知自己的旅程会被恶劣天气耽搁。
pinyin: tā yù zhī zì jǐ de lu:3 chéng kuài bèi è liè tiān qì dān ge。
english: He foresaw that his journey would be delayed by bad weather.

hanzi: 大会议程首先 是向来宾致欢迎辞.
pinyin: dà huì yì chéng shǒu xiān  shì xiàng lái bīn zhì huān yíng cí.
english: The proceedings will begin with a speech to welcome the guests.

hanzi: 父亲终于与大陆上的弟弟联络上了。
pinyin: fù qīn zhōng yú yù dà lù shàng de dì di lián luò shàng le。
english: Father finally got in touch with his brother in mainland China.

hanzi: 你若是规规矩矩的，老板就可能提拔你。
pinyin: nǐ ruò shì guī guī ju jǔ de， lǎo bǎn jiù kě néng tí bá nǐ。
english: If you keep your nose clean, the boss might promote you.

hanzi: 我们等有空再对这题目展开辩论。
pinyin: wǒ men děng yǒu kòng zài duì zhè tí mù zhǎn kāi biàn lùn。
english: We will debate the subject at length later when we are at leisure.

hanzi: 她是出色的作家, 你不妨学学她的写作风格.
pinyin: tā shì chū sè de zuò jiā,  nǐ bù fāng xué xué tā de xiě zuò fēng gé.
english: She's a good writer: try to copy her style.

hanzi: 让咱们用响亮的音乐使聚会欢快起来。
pinyin: ràng zán men yòng xiǎng liàng de yīn yuè shǐ jù huì huān kuài qǐ lai。
english: Let's brighten up the party with some loud music.

hanzi: 培养儿童用餐时举止得体是很困难的。
pinyin: péi yǎng ér tóng yòng cān shí jǔ zhǐ de tǐ shì hěn kùn nan de。
english: It's hard to train children to behave well at the table.

hanzi: 电影审查员坚持剪去影片的这一段.
pinyin: diàn yǐng shěn chá yuán jiān chí jiǎn qù yǐng piàn de zhè yī duàn.
english: The censor insisted on excising the passage from the film.

hanzi: 电影审查员坚持剪去影片的这一段。
pinyin: diàn yǐng shěn chá yuán jiān chí jiǎn qù yǐng piàn de zhè yī duàn。
english: The censor insist on excise the passage from the film.

hanzi: 他写诗歌颂我们伟大的社会主义祖国。
pinyin: tā xiě shī gē sòng wǒ men wěi dà de shè huì zhǔ yì zǔ guó。
english: He wrote poems in praise of our great socialist motherland.

hanzi: 狂风暴雨中那房子的屋顶倒塌了下来。
pinyin: kuáng fēng bào yǔ zhòng nà fáng zi de wū dǐng dǎo tā le xia lai。
english: The roof of that house caved in during the severe storm.

hanzi: 敌机在地面滑行时机首着地翻身撞毁了。
pinyin: dí jī zài dì miàn huá xíng shí jī shǒu zhuó de fān shēn zhuàng huǐ le。
english: The enemy plane nosed over and was damaged.

hanzi: 我享受医疗待遇，每年才交一块钱。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng shòu yī liáo dài yù， měi nián cái jiāo yī kuài qián。
english: I only pay one yuan a year for all the medical care I get.

hanzi: 我们必须为子孙后代保护森林资源。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū wèi zǐ sūn hòu dài bǎo hù sēn lín zī yuán。
english: We must conserve our forests and woodlands for future generations.

hanzi: 她不但是摄影师还是个天才的音乐家.
pinyin: tā bù dàn shì shè yǐng shī hái shì gè tiān cái de yīn yuè jiā.
english: She is a talented musician as well as being a photographer.

hanzi: 在比尔家里，真正当家的是她的老婆。
pinyin: zài Bǐ ěr jiā lǐ， zhēn zhèng dāng jiā de shì tā de lǎo pó。
english: It's Bill's wife who really rules the roost in that family.

hanzi: 他们旅游到了一个被山影笼罩的村庄。
pinyin: tā men lu:3 yóu dào le yī gè bèi shān yǐng lǒng zhào de cūn zhuāng。
english: They traveled to a village overshadowed by mountains.

hanzi: 包装瓷器时在周围多放些包装材料。
pinyin: bāo zhuāng cí qì shí zài zhōu wéi duō fàng xiē bāo zhuāng cái liào。
english: Put plenty of wrapping round the china when you pack it.

hanzi: 这种植物必须遮起来，免受阳光直射。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng zhí wù bì xū zhē qǐ lai， miǎn shòu yáng guāng zhí shè。
english: These plants must be sheltered from direct sunlight.

hanzi: 她今天在街上竟能屈尊跟我打招呼。
pinyin: tā jīn tiān zài jiē shàng jìng néng qū zūn gēn wǒ dǎ zhāo hu。
english: She actually condescend to say hello to me in the street today.

hanzi: 他在紧急关头十分镇静为此感到骄傲。
pinyin: tā zài jǐn jí guān tóu shí fēn zhèn jìng wèi cǐ gǎn dào jiāo ào。
english: He prides himself on remaining calm in an emergency.

hanzi: 水加热则成为蒸汽，冷却则成为冰。
pinyin: shuǐ jiā rè zé chéng wéi zhēng qì， lěng què zé chéng wéi bīng。
english: Water is changed into steam by heat and into ice by cold.

hanzi: 他在热带医学这一领域里广获赞扬。
pinyin: tā zài rè dài yī xué zhè yī lǐng yù lǐ guǎng huò zàn yáng。
english: He has won wide recognition in the field of tropical medicine.

hanzi: 政府对每包香烟额外提价十便士.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ duì měi bāo xiāng yān é wài tí jie shí biàn shì.
english: The Government has clapped an extra ten pence on a packet of cigarettes.

hanzi: 他提高售价以补偿材料增加的成本。
pinyin: tā tí gāo shòu jià yǐ bǔ cháng cái liào zēng jiā de chéng běn。
english: He raised his prices to offset the increased cost of materials.

hanzi: 他行事专横, 我们大家都讨厌他这种作风.
pinyin: tā xìng shì zhuān hèng,  wǒ men dà jiā dōu tǎo yàn tā zhè zhǒng zuò fēng.
english: He domineered, and the rest of us hated it.

hanzi: 巨浪将那艘失事的船只冲击得支离破碎.
pinyin: jù làng jiàng nà sōu shī shì de chuán zhī chōng jī de zhī lí pò suì.
english: The huge waves battered the wrecked ship to pieces.

hanzi: 原子弹爆炸总是伴随着巨大的火球。
pinyin: yuán zǐ dàn bào zhà zǒng shì bàn suí zhuó jù dà de huǒ qiú。
english: The atomic explosion is always accompanied by huge fireball.

hanzi: 机智在于知道自己可以过分到什么程度。
pinyin: jī zhì zài yú zhī dào zì jǐ kě yǐ guò fèn dào shén me chéng dù。
english: Tact consists in knowing how far we may go too far.

hanzi: 身体同侧的处于或影响着身体的同侧的
pinyin: shēn tǐ tóng zhāi de chǔ yú huò yǐng xiǎng zhuó shēn tǐ de tóng zhāi de
english: Located on or affecting the same side of the body.

hanzi: 北京为和台北建立联系展示善意姿态。
pinyin: Běi jīng wèi huò Tái běi jiàn lì lián xì zhǎn shì shàn yì zī tài。
english: Beijing offers goodwill gesture to Taipei for links.

hanzi: 他的孤立使他对别人的感情木然无知。
pinyin: tā de gū lì shǐ tā duì bié rén de gǎn qíng mù rán wú zhī。
english: His isolation has made him blunt about the feelings of others.

hanzi: 他们已经到了必须彼此分手的地步。
pinyin: tā men yǐ jīng dào le bì xū bǐ cǐ fēn shǒu de dì bù。
english: They have reached the point where they have to separate with each other.

hanzi: 问起他收入的来源, 他就有些吞吞吐吐.
pinyin: wèn qǐ tā shōu rù de lái yuán,  tā jiù yǒu xiē tūn tūn tǔ tù.
english: He was a bit coy when asked about the source of his income.

hanzi: 她透过雾眯着眼看，想找出正确的路。
pinyin: tā tòu guò wù mǐ zhuó yǎn kàn， xiǎng zhǎo chū zhèng què de lù。
english: She peers through the mist, trying to find the right path.

hanzi: 这是我们的房间，你们的在走廊的那一头。
pinyin: zhè shì wǒ men de fáng jiān， nǐ men de zài zǒu láng de nà yī tóu。
english: This is our room, and yours is down the passage.

hanzi: 我已经足够大了，有权去做我喜欢做的事。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng zú gòu dà le， yǒu quán qù zuò wǒ xǐ huan zuò de shì。
english: I'm old enough to have the freedom to do as I like.

hanzi: 第二天一早小船就沿河向下游驶去了。
pinyin: dì èr tiān yī zǎo xiǎo chuán jiù yàn hé xiàng xià yóu shǐ qù le。
english: The boat dropped down the river early the next morning.

hanzi: 这个学生总是问他老师一连串的问题。
pinyin: zhè gè xué sheng zǒng shì wèn tā lǎo shī yī lián chuàn de wèn tí。
english: The student always asks his teacher a series of questions.

hanzi: 兰花和报春花之类的野花越来越少了.
pinyin: lán huā huò bào chūn huā zhī lèi de yě huā yuè lái yuè shào le.
english: Wild flowers such as orchids and primroses are becoming rare.

hanzi: 这些防御工事都是上次战争时修筑的.
pinyin: zhè xie fáng yù gōng shì dōu shì shàng cì zhàn zhēng shí xiū zhù de.
english: These fortifications were all built during the last war.

hanzi: 我们已经找到几个人自愿协助打扫大厅.
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ jīng zhǎo dào jǐ ge rén zì yuàn xié zhù dǎ sǎo dà tīng.
english: We've enlisted a few volunteers to help clean the hall.

hanzi: 在重要的节日, 人们把国旗悬挂在门外。
pinyin: zài zhòng yào de jié rì,  rén men bǎ guó qí xuán guà zài mén wài。
english: People hang national flags out on important holidays.

hanzi: 盛有核废料的密封容器被丢在海里。
pinyin: shèng yǒu hé fèi liào de mì fēng róng qì bèi diū zài hǎi lǐ。
english: Sealed containers of nuclear waste have been dumped in the sea.

hanzi: 双拍子的每小节含有两拍或偶数拍的
pinyin: shuāng pāi zi de měi xiǎo jié hán yǒu liǎng pāi huò ǒu shuò pāi de
english: Consisting of two or a multiple of two beats to the measure.

hanzi: 我们本可以收割完, 但却遇上了暴风雨.
pinyin: wǒ men běn kě yǐ shōu gē wán,  dàn què yù shàng le bào fēng yǔ.
english: We should have finished harvesting, but a storm intervened.

hanzi: 警方企图把他的话歪曲成承认有罪.
pinyin: jǐng fāng qǐ tú bǎ tā de huà wāi qū chéng chéng rèn yǒu zuì.
english: The police tried to twist his statement into an admission of guilt.

hanzi: 他们跟她开玩笑, 把她往游泳池里浸了一下.
pinyin: tā men gēn tā kāi wán xiào,  bǎ tā wàng yóu yǒng chí lǐ jìn le yī xià.
english: They dunked her in the swimming-pool as a joke.

hanzi: 无论如何, 医疗物资会在一周内到达。
pinyin: wú lùn rú hé,  yī liáo wù zī kuài zài yī zhōu nèi dào dá。
english: At any rate, the medical supplies will reach you within a week.

hanzi: 甚至在日落之后，气温也不见降低。
pinyin: shèn zhì zài rì luò zhī hòu， qì wēn yě bù xiàn jiàng dī。
english: Even after sunset there was little moderation in the temperature.

hanzi: 我们已经找到几个人自愿协助打扫大厅.
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ jīng zhǎo dào jǐ ge rén zì yuàn xié zhù dǎ sǎo dà tīng.
english: We've enlisted a few volunteers to help clean the hall.

hanzi: 有一男子遭人毒打, 路人只在一旁观看.
pinyin: yǒu yī nán zǐ zāo rén dú dǎ,  lù rén zhǐ zài yī páng guān kàn.
english: Passers-by just looked on as a man was viciously attacked.

hanzi: 他的论点的核心是资本主义不能成功.
pinyin: tā de lùn diǎn de hé xīn shì zī běn zhǔ yì bù néng chéng gōng.
english: The essence of his argument is that capitalism cannot succeed.

hanzi: 这家公司必须克服对采用新技术的阻力.
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī bì xū kè fú duì cǎi yòng xīn jì shù de zǔ lì.
english: The firm has to overcome its resistance to new technology.

hanzi: 你今晚不能和我们一起去看戏, 真可惜.
pinyin: nǐ jīn wǎn bù néng huò wǒ men yī qǐ qù kàn xì,  zhēn kě xī.
english: What a pity that you can't come to the theatre with us tonight.

hanzi: 那些奴隶艰难地把沉重的石块拖上山。
pinyin: nà xiē nú lì jiān nán de bǎ chén zhòng de shí kuài tuō shàng shān。
english: The slaves toiled up the hill pulling the heavy blocks.

hanzi: 别耽误了，现在就去索取一份免费的目录吧。
pinyin: biè dān wu le， xiàn zài jiù qù suǒ qǔ yī fèn miǎn fèi de mù lù ba。
english: Don't delay. Write now for a free catalogue.

hanzi: 该党可能与工党重新组成新的联盟.
pinyin: gāi dǎng kě néng yù gōng dǎng chóng xīn zǔ chéng xīn de lián méng.
english: The party may realign (itself) with Labour in a new coalition.

hanzi: 冷凝将气体或蒸汽转化成液体的过程
pinyin: lěng níng jiàng qì tǐ huò zhēng qì zhuǎn huà chéng yè tǐ de guò chéng
english: The process by which a gas or vapor changes to a liquid.

hanzi: 他隐隐约约地觉得以前曾经见过她.
pinyin: tā yǐn yǐn yuē yuē de jué de yǐ qián céng jīng xiàn guò tā.
english: At the back of his mind was the vague idea that he had met her before.

hanzi: 这种图案的钞票是十年前首次发行的。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng tú àn de chāo piào shì shí nián qián shǒu cì fā xíng de。
english: Banknotes of this design were first issued 10 years ago.

hanzi: 与其说成功在于运气不如说是辛勤努力。
pinyin: yǔ qí shuō chéng gōng zài yú yùn qi bù rú shuō shì xīn qín nǔ lì。
english: Success lies not so much as in luck as in hard work.

hanzi: 他眼看著他们行将失败, 快乐得直搓手.
pinyin: tā yǎn kàn著 tā men xíng jiāng shī bài,  kuài lè de zhí cuō shǒu.
english: He rubbed his hands with glee at the prospect of their defeat.

hanzi: 他被家庭束缚，不能再到处去旅游了。
pinyin: tā bèi jiā tíng shù fù， bù néng zài dào chù qù lu:3 yóu le。
english: He was fettered by his family and could not travel any longer.

hanzi: 你如果老是这样下去，早晚要倒霉的。
pinyin: nǐ rú guǒ lǎo shi zhè yàng xià qu， zǎo wǎn yào dǎo méi de。
english: If you carry on like this you'll come in for it sooner or later.

hanzi: 诗人们赞颂国王，歌颂他的英勇业绩。
pinyin: shī rén men zàn sòng guó wáng， gē sòng tā de yīng yǒng yè jī。
english: Poets sang the king's praises; they sang of his brave deeds.

hanzi: 时装新潮很快就在全世界流行起来。
pinyin: shí zhuāng xīn cháo hěn kuài jiù zài quán shì jiè liú xíng qǐ lai。
english: Fashion trends diffuse themselves rapidly around the globe.

hanzi: 我们决不辜负我们的父母对我们的期望。
pinyin: wǒ men jué bù gū fù wǒ men de fù mǔ duì wǒ men de qī wàng。
english: We will never fail to live up to what our parents expect of us.

hanzi: 这个学生用半小时草草拼凑了一篇文章.
pinyin: zhè gè xué sheng yòng bàn xiǎo shí cǎo cǎo pīn còu le yī piān wén zhāng.
english: The student cobbled together an essay in half an hour.

hanzi: 那姑娘站在门前的台阶上冷得直打哆嗦。
pinyin: nà gū niang zhàn zài mén qián de tái jiē shàng lěng de zhí dǎ duō suo。
english: The girl stood shivering with cold on the doorstep.

hanzi: 王宫发言人刚宣布了一项声明.
pinyin: wáng gōng fā yán rén gāng xuān bù le yí xiàng shēng míng.
english: The palace (ie A spokesman for the king, queen, etc) has just issued a statement.

hanzi: 那座巨大的岛屿隐隐约约浮现在地平线上。
pinyin: nà zuò jù dà de dǎo yǔ yǐn yǐn yuē yuē fú xiàn zài de píng xiàn shàng。
english: The mountainous island loomed on the horizon.

hanzi: 她算是当代最有才华的一位作曲家.
pinyin: tā suàn shì dāng dài zuì yǒu cái huá de yī wèi zuò qǔ jiā.
english: She counts among the most gifted of the current generation of composers.

hanzi: 政府为修建医院拨出了大笔款项。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ wèi xiū jiàn yī yuàn bō chū le dà bǐ kuǎn xiàng。
english: The government has appropriated a large sum of money for building hospitals.

hanzi: 对乡村的掠夺给他们造成严重创伤。
pinyin: duì xiāng cūn de lu:è duó jǐ tā men zào chéng yán zhòng chuāng shāng。
english: The rape of the countryside had a profound ravage on them.

hanzi: 我牙疼，因为我的一颗牙齿上有个洞。
pinyin: wǒ yá téng， yīn wèi wǒ de yī kē yá chǐ shàng yǒu gè dòng。
english: I have a toothache because there is a cavity in one of my teeth.

hanzi: 她的手指肿胀是手指内有异物引起的。
pinyin: tā de shǒu zhǐ zhǒng zhàng shì shǒu zhǐ nèi yǒu yì wù yǐn qǐ de。
english: The swelling on her finger was caused by a foreign body in it.

hanzi: 凡是飞机驾驶员均应对乘客的安全负责.
pinyin: fán shì fēi jī jià shǐ yuán jūn yìng duì chéng kè de ān quán fù zé.
english: All pilots are responsible for their passengers' safety.

hanzi: 他用长辈的口气劝告年轻的同事.
pinyin: tā yòng zhǎng bèi de kǒu qì quàn gào nián qīng de tóng shì.
english: He adopts an avuncular tone of voice when giving advice to junior colleagues.

hanzi: 多亏你来帮忙--不然我们真没法办.
pinyin: duō kuī nǐ lái bāng máng-- bù rán wǒ men zhēn méi fǎ bàn.
english: It's a good job you were there to help we couldn't have managed without you.

hanzi: 宇宙慢慢地向科学家展现了自己的秘密.
pinyin: yǔ zhòu màn màn de xiàng kē xué jiā zhǎn xiàn le zì jǐ de mì mì.
english: The universe is slowly yielding up its secrets to scientists.

hanzi: 他那不光彩历史的揭露导致了他的辞职。
pinyin: tā nà bù guāng cǎi lì shǐ de jiē lù dǎo zhì le tā de cí zhí。
english: The revelation of his scandalous past led to his resignation.

hanzi: 他那不光彩历史的揭露导致了他的辞职。
pinyin: tā nà bù guāng cǎi lì shǐ de jiē lù dǎo zhì le tā de cí zhí。
english: The revelation of his scandalous past led to his resignation.

hanzi: 他送我这么珍贵的礼物使我深受感动。
pinyin: tā sòng wǒ zhè me zhēn guì de lǐ wù shǐ wǒ shēn shòu gǎn dòng。
english: Such a precious gift did he give me that I was deeply touched.

hanzi: 博物馆里有些很好的岩石和矿石标本.
pinyin: bó wù guǎn lǐ yǒu xiē hěn hǎo de yán shí huò kuàng shí biāo běn.
english: There were some fine specimens of rocks and ores in the museum.

hanzi: 我们必须对那个神秘的陌生人严加注意。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū duì nèi gè shén mì de mò shēng rén yán jiā zhù yì。
english: We must pay special attention to the mysterious stranger.

hanzi: 我这一代人和我父辈及祖辈表现不同.
pinyin: wǒ zhè yī dài rén huò wǒ fù bèi jí zǔ bèi biǎo xiàn bù tóng.
english: My generation behaves differently from my father's and grandfather's.

hanzi: 去年是作曲家一生中创作丰收的时期。
pinyin: qù nián shì zuò qǔ jiā yī shēng zhòng chuàng zuò fēng shōu de shí qī。
english: Last year was a prolific period in the composer's life.

hanzi: 她的英雄事迹和她的先进思想是一致的。
pinyin: tā de yīng xióng shì jī huò tā de xiān jìn sī xiǎng shì yī zhì de。
english: Her heroic deeds sorted well with her advanced thinking.

hanzi: 士兵的勇敢事迹为他带来了荣耀和赞美。
pinyin: shì bīng de yǒng gǎn shì jī wèi tā dài lái le róng yào huò zàn měi。
english: The soldier's brave deeds brought him honor and glory.

hanzi: 为了获得他们的支持，任何代价均在所不惜。
pinyin: wèi le huò dé tā men de zhī chí， rèn hé dài jià jūn zài suǒ bù xī。
english: No price is too high for winning their support.

hanzi: 新的住宅区一直延伸到游乐场的那一边.
pinyin: xīn de zhù zhái qū yī zhí yán shēn dào yóu lè chǎng de nà yī biān.
english: The new housing estate stretches beyond the playing-fields.

hanzi: 他奔跑了一两条街，然后放慢步子走起来。
pinyin: tā bēn pǎo le yī liǎng tiáo jiē， rán hòu fàng màn bù zi zǒu qǐ lai。
english: He ran a street or two, and then fell into a walk.

hanzi: 她是个很好的妇人，冷酷不是她的本性。
pinyin: tā shì gè hěn hǎo de fù rén， lěng kù bú shì tā de běn xìng。
english: She's a very good woman; unkindness is foreign to her nature.

hanzi: 城镇的那部分对游客完全没有吸引力。
pinyin: chéng zhèn de nà bù fen duì yóu kè wán quán méi yǒu xī yǐn lì。
english: That part of the town is completely void of interest for visitors.

hanzi: 我呆在那个办公室里感觉真像在笼子里一样.
pinyin: wǒ dāi zài nèi gè bàn gōng shì lǐ gǎn jué zhēn xiàng zài lóng zi lǐ yí yàng.
english: I felt terribly caged in in that office.

hanzi: 通过管道把热水从锅炉输送到散热器里.
pinyin: tōng guò guǎn dào bǎ rè shuǐ zòng guō lú shū sòng dào sàn rè qì lǐ.
english: Pipes convey hot water from the boiler to the radiators.

hanzi: 至于那男孩的才智, 多得他都用不完。
pinyin: zhì yú nà nán hái de cái zhì,  duō de tā dōu yòng bù wán。
english: As to intelligence, the boy has more than he can possibly make use of.

hanzi: 有一只蝴蝶正在花丛里忽上忽下地飞着。
pinyin: yǒu yī zhǐ hú dié zhèng zài huā cóng lǐ hū shàng hū xià de fēi zhuó。
english: A butterfly is flying up and down among the flowers.

hanzi: 那老人去世时留下二百万美元的遗产。
pinyin: nà lǎo rén qù shì shí liú xià èr bǎi wàn měi yuán de yí chǎn。
english: The old man left an estate of two million dollars when he died.

hanzi: 通过管道把热水从锅炉输送到散热器里.
pinyin: tōng guò guǎn dào bǎ rè shuǐ zòng guō lú shū sòng dào sàn rè qì lǐ.
english: Pipes convey hot water from the boiler to the radiators.

hanzi: 他那高尚的榜样激发我们大家更加努力.
pinyin: tā nà gāo shàng de bǎng yàng jī fā wǒ men dà jiā gèng jiā nǔ lì.
english: His noble example inspired the rest of us to greater efforts.

hanzi: 我们只要给他稍加点分, 他就能勉强及格.
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ yào jǐ tā shāo jiā diǎn fèn,  tā jiù néng miǎn qiǎng jí gé.
english: If we mark him up a tiny bit, he'll just get through.

hanzi: 警察怀疑银行职员与强盗有勾结。
pinyin: jǐng chá huái yí yín háng zhí yuán yù qiáng dào yǒu gōu jié。
english: The police suspected that the bank clerk was in league with the rubbers.

hanzi: 旧金山地震是世纪性的灾难之一。
pinyin: jiù Jīn shān dì zhèn shì shì jì xìng de zāi nàn zhī yī。
english: The San Francisco earthquake was one of the worst catastrophes of the century.

hanzi: 该公司对法国酒的进口有绝对的垄断。
pinyin: gāi gōng sī duì fǎ guó jiǔ de jìn kǒu yǒu jué duì de lǒng duàn。
english: The company had the absolute monopoly of import of french wine.

hanzi: 警察怀疑银行职员与强盗有勾结。
pinyin: jǐng chá huái yí yín háng zhí yuán yù qiáng dào yǒu gōu jié。
english: The police suspected that the bank clerk was in league with the rubbers.

hanzi: 现在向您表达我们对您的感激最为恰当。
pinyin: xiàn zài xiàng nín biǎo dá wǒ men duì nín de gǎn jī zuì wéi qià dàng。
english: It's the appropriate time for showing you our thanks.

hanzi: 以前的许多殖民地现已成为独立的国家.
pinyin: yǐ qián de xǔ duō zhí mín dì xiàn yǐ chéng wéi dú lì de guó jiā.
english: The former colonial possessions are now independent states.

hanzi: 他的论点的核心是资本主义不能成功.
pinyin: tā de lùn diǎn de hé xīn shì zī běn zhǔ yì bù néng chéng gōng.
english: The essence of his argument is that capitalism cannot succeed.

hanzi: 在进入喷嘴之前，蒸汽处于高压状态。
pinyin: zài jìn rù pèn zuǐ zhī qián， zhēng qì chǔ yú gāo yā zhuàng tài。
english: Prior to entering the nozzle, the steam is at high pressure.

hanzi: 警方一直严密监视著可疑分子的活动.
pinyin: jǐng fāng yī zhí yán mì jiān shì著 kě yí fèn zǐ de huó dòng.
english: The police have been keeping a close watch on the suspects' movements.

hanzi: 我把一切东西都锁在保险箱里以防万一。
pinyin: wǒ bǎ yī qiè dōng xi dōu suǒ zài bǎo xiǎn xiāng lǐ yǐ fáng wàn yī。
english: I took the precaution of locking everything in the safe.

hanzi: 所有的居民都被可怕的疾病夺去了生命。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de jū mín dōu bèi kě pà de jí bìng duó qù le shēng mìng。
english: The entire population was wiped out by the terrible disease.

hanzi: 人类采用一切手段保持生态平衡。
pinyin: rén lèi cǎi yòng yī qiè shǒu duàn bǎo chí shēng tài píng héng。
english: Mankind have been trying every means to maintain the balance of nature.

hanzi: 报刊杂志刊登了许多名家的文章。
pinyin: bào kān zá zhì kān dēng le xǔ duō míng jiā de wén zhāng。
english: The newspapers and magazines carry a lot of articles written by famous experts.

hanzi: 把锅从炉子上端开时, 汤就不再沸腾了.
pinyin: bǎ guō zòng lú zi shàng duān kāi shí,  tāng jiù bù zài fèi téng le.
english: The boiling soup subsided when the pot was taken off the heat.

hanzi: 合同中规定屋顶要用红瓦而不用石板瓦.
pinyin: hé tong zhòng guī dìng wū dǐng yào yòng hóng wǎ ér bù yòng shí bǎn wǎ.
english: The contract specifies red tiles, not slates, for the roof.

hanzi: 警方一直严密监视著可疑分子的活动.
pinyin: jǐng fāng yī zhí yán mì jiān shì著 kě yí fèn zǐ de huó dòng.
english: The police have been keeping a close watch on the suspects' movements.

hanzi: 他们恰在发洪水之前离开, 走得真是时候.
pinyin: tā men qià zài fà hóng shuǐ zhī qián lí kāi,  zǒu de zhēn shì shí hou.
english: Their departure just before the floods was providential.

hanzi: 我们如果要增加教育经费就必须加税。
pinyin: wǒ men rú guǒ yào zēng jiā jiào yù jīng fèi jiù bì xū jiā shuì。
english: We must increase taxation if we are to spend more on education.

hanzi: 你若预先通知我, 我就能给您准备好了.
pinyin: nǐ ruò yù xiān tōng zhī wǒ,  wǒ jiù néng jǐ nín zhǔn bèi hào le.
english: If you warn me in advance, I will have your order ready for you.

hanzi: 干这一行必须心狠, 谁顾别人谁吃亏.
pinyin: gàn zhè yī xíng bì xū xīn hěn,  shéi gù bié rén shéi chī kuī.
english: In this business you have to be tough, and the devil take the hindmost.

hanzi: 断层地形上的显著变化，如断层，深谷
pinyin: duàn céng dì xíng shàng de xiǎn著 biàn huà， rú duàn céng， shēn gǔ
english: A marked change in topography such as a fault or deep valley.

hanzi: 他连温饱都无法解决, 就更不用说娱乐了。
pinyin: tā lián wēn bǎo dōu wú fǎ jiě jué,  jiù gèng bù yòng shuō yú lè le。
english: He hasn't enough money for food, let alone amusements.

hanzi: 通过勤查字典，他掌握了这些单词。
pinyin: tōng guò qín zhā zì diǎn， tā zhǎng wò le zhè xie dān cí。
english: He mastered these words through the arduous consultation of the dictionary.

hanzi: 我觉得它并不丑, 恰恰相反, 它挺美.
pinyin: wǒ jué de tā bìng bù chǒu,  qià qià xiāng fǎn,  tā tǐng měi.
english: It doesn't seem ugly to me; on the contrary, I think it's rather beautiful.

hanzi: 抗真菌的，杀真菌的破坏或抑制真菌生长的
pinyin: kàng zhēn jūn de， shā zhēn jūn de pò huài huò yì zhì zhēn jūn shēng zhǎng de
english: Destroying or inhibiting the growth of fungi.

hanzi: 人民受著凶恶而专制的军政权的压迫.
pinyin: rén mín shòu著 xiōng è ér zhuān zhì de jūn zhèng quán de yā pò.
english: The people are held down by a vicious and repressive military regime.

hanzi: 我祖母不惜花费地让她儿子念完了大学。
pinyin: wǒ zǔ mǔ bù xī huā fèi de ràng tā ér zi niàn wán le dà xué。
english: My grandmother at all price strove to get her son through college.

hanzi: 进出口的高关税是国际贸易的障碍。
pinyin: jìn chū kǒu de gāo guān shuì shì guó jì mào yì de zhàng ài。
english: Heavy duties on imports and exports are a barrier to international trade.

hanzi: 我们如果想增加利润，就必须削减开支。
pinyin: wǒ men rú guǒ xiǎng zēng jiā lì rùn， jiù bì xū xuē jiǎn kāi zhī。
english: We have to trim our cost if we want to increase our profit.

hanzi: 她在协会中借助图片讲述其印度之行.
pinyin: tā zài xié huì zhòng jiè zhù tú piàn jiǎng shù qí Yìn dù zhī xìng.
english: She gave the society an illustrated talk on her travels in India.

hanzi: 因为气温很高，有大量空调售出。
pinyin: yīn wèi qì wēn hěn gāo， yǒu dà liàng kōng tiáo shòu chū。
english: A large quantity of air-conditioners has been sold since the temperature is high.

hanzi: 圣诞节是个快乐的日子，尤其是对孩子们。
pinyin: Shèng dàn jié shì gè kuài lè de rì zi， yóu qí shì duì hái zi men。
english: Christmas is a time of mirth, especially for children.

hanzi: 除了他的孙子之外, 这个老人谁也不想见。
pinyin: chú le tā de sūn zi zhī wài,  zhè gè lǎo rén shéi yě bù xiǎng xiàn。
english: The old man wanted to see nobody other than his grandson.

hanzi: 母亲在白天把她的孩子交托给幼儿园。
pinyin: mǔ qīn zài bái tiān bǎ tā de hái zi jiāo tuō jǐ yòu ér yuán。
english: The mother gave her child over to the kindergarten during the day.

hanzi: 一连串的谋杀迫使警方不得不采取行动。
pinyin: yī lián chuàn de móu shā pò shǐ jǐng fāng bù dé bù cǎi qǔ xíng dòng。
english: A sequence of murders had prompted the police to actions.

hanzi: 一声吼叫，呼地从林子里冲出一只老虎来。
pinyin: yī shēng hǒu jiào， hū de zòng lín zi lǐ chòng chū yī zhǐ lǎo hǔ lái。
english: Following the roar, out rushed a tiger among the bushes.

hanzi: 我准备做一次咽喉细菌培养，以便确诊。
pinyin: wǒ zhǔn bèi zuò yī cì yān hóu xì jūn péi yǎng， yǐ biàn què zhěn。
english: I am going to take a throat culture so we'll know for sure.

hanzi: 今天，人们已经摆脱了一些习俗的束缚。
pinyin: jīn tiān， rén men yǐ jīng bǎi tuō le yī xiē xí sú de shù fù。
english: Nowadays, people have shaken off the shackles of some conventions.

hanzi: 这一发现标志著治疗癌症的 一大突破.
pinyin: zhè yī fā xiàn biāo zhì著 zhì liáo ái zhèng de  yī dà tū pò.
english: This discovery marks a quantum leap forward in the fight against cancer.

hanzi: 那有一张王室的公告，宣告王子诞生了。
pinyin: nà yǒu yī zhāng wáng shì de gōng gào， xuān gào wáng zǐ dàn shēng le。
english: There is a royal proclamation of the birth of the prince.

hanzi: 老师删去这个学生文章中的多余内容。
pinyin: lǎo shī shān qù zhè gè xué sheng wén zhāng zhòng dì duō yú nèi róng。
english: The teacher pruned the student's article of its superfluities.

hanzi: 他们正在激烈争论这个事件的是非曲直。
pinyin: tā men zhèng zài jī liè zhēng lùn zhè gè shì jiàn de shì fēi qǔ zhí。
english: They are disputing about the rights and wrongs of the case.

hanzi: 今天报纸上登载了总统访问的详尽报道.
pinyin: jīn tiān bào zhǐ shàng dēng zài le zǒng tǒng fǎng wèn de xiáng jìn bào dào.
english: Today's papers carry full reports of the President's visit.

hanzi: 你若不希望我们的代理人去造访，请告之。
pinyin: nǐ ruò bù xī wàng wǒ men de dài lǐ rén qù zào fǎng， qǐng gào zhī。
english: Should you not wish our agent to call, please let us know.

hanzi: 英国在第一次世界大战中是美国的同盟国。
pinyin: Yīng guó zài dì yī cì shì jiè dà zhàn zhòng shì Měi guó de tóng méng guó。
english: Britain was an ally of America in the World War I.

hanzi: 他近来一直诉说自己患了失眠和头痛症。
pinyin: tā jìn lái yī zhí sù shuō zì jǐ huàn le shī mián huò tóu tòng zhèng。
english: Lately he has been moaning about his insomnia and headache.

hanzi: 她忙著温习美国宪法, 准备明天的考试.
pinyin: tā máng著 wēn xí Měi guó xiàn fǎ,  zhǔn bèi míng tiān de kǎo shì.
english: She's busy getting up the American constitution for tomorrow's exam.

hanzi: 她友好的开幕词确定了整个会议的基调。
pinyin: tā yǒu hǎo de kāi mù cí què dìng le zhěng gè huì yì de jī diào。
english: Her friendly opening speech set the tone for the whole conference.

hanzi: 世界上大多数大城市都交通堵塞为患。
pinyin: shì jiè shàng dà duō shù dà chéng shì dōu jiāo tōng dǔ sè wèi huàn。
english: Most of the important cities of the world suffer from traffic jam.

hanzi: 这所学院接待了一批来访的俄国科学家.
pinyin: zhè suǒ xué yuàn jiē dài le yī pī lái fǎng de E2 guó kē xué jiā.
english: The college is (playing) host to a group of visiting Russian scientists.

hanzi: 遵照你的要求我们已将建议撤销.
pinyin: zūn zhào nǐ de yāo qiú wǒ men yǐ jiàng jiàn yì chè xiāo.
english: In compliance with your wishes (ie As you have requested) we have withdrawn our suggestion.

hanzi: 海洋测深学，海洋测深术测量大水域的深度
pinyin: hǎi yáng cè shēn xué， hǎi yáng cè shēn zhú cè liàng dà shuǐ yù de shēn dù
english: Measurement of the depth of large bodies of water.

hanzi: 这出戏里有若干典型的斯托帕特式的场景.
pinyin: zhè chū xì lǐ yǒu ruò gān diǎn xíng de sī tuō pà tè shì de chǎng jǐng.
english: The play contains a number of typical Stoppard set pieces.

hanzi: 对有些人来说, 吸毒是一种逃避现实的手段.
pinyin: duì yǒu xiē rén lái shuō,  xī dú shì yī zhòng táo bì xiàn shí de shǒu duàn.
english: Drug-taking is a form of escapism for some people.

hanzi: 天亮之后，他们军队的部署就会显露出来。
pinyin: tiān liàng zhī hòu， tā men jūn duì de bù shǔ jiù kuài xiǎn lù chū lái。
english: Daylight will reveal the disposition of their troops.

hanzi: 威尔非常专心读书, 以至于没有吃晚餐。
pinyin: wēi ěr fēi cháng zhuān xīn dú shū,  yǐ zhì yú méi yǒu jí wǎn cān。
english: Will was so absorbed in reading that he went without his dinner.

hanzi: 那座大楼倒塌时把下面的很多人都砸死了.
pinyin: nà zuò dà lóu dǎo tā shí bǎ xià mian de hěn duō rén dōu zá sǐ le.
english: Many people were crushed when the building collapsed on top of them.

hanzi: 露头砖垂直而不是平行于墙根放置的砖块
pinyin: lù tou zhuān chuí zhí ér bú shì píng xíng yú qiáng gēn fàng zhì de zhuān kuài
english: A brick laid across rather than parallel with a wall.

hanzi: 他设法抓住悬崖表面向外伸出的岩石.
pinyin: tā shè fǎ zhuā zhù xuán yá biǎo miàn xiàng wài shēn chū de yán shí.
english: He managed to hang on to a piece of rock protruding from the cliff face.

hanzi: 在柜台可以买到供自动售烟机使用的代币.
pinyin: zài guì tái kě yǐ mǎi dào gòng zì dòng shòu yān jī shǐ yòng de dài bì.
english: Tokens for the cigarette machine are available at the bar.

hanzi: 有些地方仍使用在太阳下晒干砖块的方法。
pinyin: yǒu xiē dì fang réng shǐ yòng zài tài yáng xià shài gàn zhuān kuài de fāng fǎ。
english: In some places, bricks are still baked in the sun.

hanzi: 威尔非常专心读书, 以至于没有吃晚餐。
pinyin: wēi ěr fēi cháng zhuān xīn dú shū,  yǐ zhì yú méi yǒu jí wǎn cān。
english: Will was so absorbed in reading that he went without his dinner.

hanzi: 商人决定用骆驼载运货物穿过沙漠。
pinyin: shāng rén jué dìng yòng luò tuo zài yùn huò wù chuān guò shā mò。
english: The merchant decided to use camels to carry his goods across the desert.

hanzi: 作为清教徒，他的道德和宗教观念都很严格。
pinyin: zuò wéi qīng jiào tú， tā de dào dé huò zōng jiào guān niàn dōu hěn yán gé。
english: As a Puritan, he is strict in moral and religion.

hanzi: 委员会的事务因程序上有困难而耽搁了.
pinyin: wěi yuán huì de shì wù yīn chéng xù shàng yǒu kùn nan ér dān ge le.
english: The business of the committee was delayed by procedural difficulties.

hanzi: 舞台灯光暗了下去, 这出戏的第一幕结束了.
pinyin: wǔ tái dēng guāng àn le xià qu,  zhè chū xì de dì yī mù jié shù le.
english: The stage lights (were) dimmed, and the play's first act was over.

hanzi: 我们的处境已不容我们对盟友再存多少幻想了.
pinyin: wǒ men de chǔ jìng yǐ bù róng wǒ men duì méng yǒu zài cún duō shao huàn xiǎng le.
english: We're left with few illusions about ourally.

hanzi: 欢叫声表示愉悦或欢喜的口齿不清的声音
pinyin: huān jiào shēng biǎo shì yú yuè huò huān xǐ de kǒu chǐ bù qīng de shēng yīn
english: An inarticulate sound expressive of pleasure or delight.

hanzi: 她洁白的脸和她黑色的衣服形成强烈的对比。
pinyin: tā jié bái de liǎn huò tā hēi sè de yī fu xíng chéng qiáng liè de duì bǐ。
english: Her white face and her dark dress contrast sharply.

hanzi: 电力供应中断，城市陷于混乱之中。
pinyin: diàn lì gōng yìng zhōng duàn， chéng shì xiàn yú hùn luàn zhī zhōng。
english: After the failure of the electricity supplies the city was in chaos.

hanzi: 在实验室能够繁殖细菌和其他生物.
pinyin: zài shí yàn shì néng gòu fán zhí xì jūn huò qí tā shēng wù.
english: It is possible to multiply bacteria and other living organisms in the laboratory.

hanzi: 我们已经把今年拨给我们的全部经费都花光了.
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ jīng bǎ jīn nián bō jǐ wǒ men de quán bù jīng fèi dōu huā guāng le.
english: We've spent our entire allocation for the year.

hanzi: 手绣的丝制手帕在西方市场销路很好。
pinyin: shǒu xiù de sī zhì shǒu pà zài xī fāng shì chǎng xiāo lù hěn hǎo。
english: Silk handkerchiefs embroidered by hand sell well in the Western market.

hanzi: 部长拒绝就他辞职一事的传闻发表评论。
pinyin: bù zhǎng jù jué jiù tā cí zhí yī shì de chuán wén fā biǎo píng lùn。
english: The minister refused to comment on the rumors of his resignation.

hanzi: 我部队在临河高地上占据了防御阵地.
pinyin: wǒ bù duì zài Lín hé gāo dì shàng zhàn jù le fáng yù zhèn dì.
english: Our troops took up defensive positions on high ground overlooking the river.

hanzi: 朋友偶尔相聚畅谈上学时的大好时光.
pinyin: péng you ǒu ěr xiàng jù chàng tán shàng xué shí de dà hào shí guāng.
english: The friends met occasionally to chat about the good old days at school.

hanzi: 他的儿子已成长为一个健壮勤劳的小伙子。
pinyin: tā de ér zi yǐ chéng zhǎng wèi yī gè jiàn zhuàng qín láo de xiǎo huǒ zi。
english: His son has grown up into a sturdy hardworking young man.

hanzi: 敌人掠夺了这个地区，并且杀害了许多村民。
pinyin: dí rén lu:è duó le zhè gè dì qū， bìng qiě shā hài le xǔ duō cūn mín。
english: The enemy raped the country and killed many villagers.

hanzi: 喜庆时节，欢庆盛会欢庆活动的时节或盛会
pinyin: xǐ qìng shí jié， huān qìng shèng huì huān qìng huó dòng de shí jié huò shèng huì
english: A season or an occasion of joyful celebration.

hanzi: 警察向来往车辆打信号，示意缓慢前行。
pinyin: jǐng chá xiàng lái wàng chē liàng dǎ xìn hào， shì yì huǎn màn qián xìng。
english: The police signalled the traffic to move forward slowly.

hanzi: 根据解剖结果，此人死于心脏病发作。
pinyin: gēn jù jiě pōu jié guǒ， cǐ rén sǐ yú xīn zàng bìng fā zuò。
english: According to the result of the dissection, the man died from heart attack.

hanzi: 根据解剖结果，此人死于心脏病发作。
pinyin: gēn jù jiě pōu jié guǒ， cǐ rén sǐ yú xīn zàng bìng fā zuò。
english: According to the result of the dissection, the man died from heart attack.

hanzi: 我只是问你一个问题。你何必对我这么凶。
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ shì wèn nǐ yī gè wèn tí。 nǐ hé bì duì wǒ zhè me xiōng。
english: I only asked you a question. There's no need to bite my head off.

hanzi: 所有这些都使他充满了对剥削阶级的仇恨。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu zhè xie dōu shǐ tā chōng mǎn le duì bō xuē jiē jí de chóu hèn。
english: All this filled him with hatred for the exploiting classes.

hanzi: 一个衣着华丽的女人走近了草地上的哨兵。
pinyin: yī gè yī zhuó huá lì de nu:3 rén zǒu jìn le cǎo dì shàng de shào bīng。
english: A lady in full feather approached the sentinel on the sward.

hanzi: 我躺在床上回想王大爷给我讲的那番话。
pinyin: wǒ tǎng zài chuáng shàng huí xiǎng wáng dà ye jǐ wǒ jiǎng de nà pān huà。
english: I lay in bed and recalled the things Uncle Wang had told me.

hanzi: 他设法抓住悬崖表面向外伸出的岩石.
pinyin: tā shè fǎ zhuā zhù xuán yá biǎo miàn xiàng wài shēn chū de yán shí.
english: He managed to hang on to a piece of rock protruding from the cliff face.

hanzi: 听到新生儿的哭叫声，倦极了的母亲笑了。
pinyin: tīng dào xīn shēng ér de kū jiào shēng， juàn jí le de mǔ qīn xiào le。
english: The exhausted mother smiled at the wail of her newborn baby.

hanzi: 他朝那特务的下巴一拳打去，把他打昏在地。
pinyin: tā cháo nà tè wu de xià ba yī quán dǎ qù， bǎ tā dǎ hūn zài de。
english: He hit the secret agent on the jaw and completely laid him out.

hanzi: 我不喜欢吃菠菜，虽然我知道它对我有好处。
pinyin: wǒ bù xǐ huan jí bō cài， suī rán wǒ zhī dào tā duì wǒ yǒu hǎo chu。
english: I don't like spinach even though I know it's good for me.

pinyin: tā hěn gāo xìng de tìng zhuó chuāng wài niǎo er de míng jiào shēng。
english: She was delighted to hear the twitter of the birds somewhere near her window.

hanzi: 灾难中丧失亲人的幸存者很值得同情.
pinyin: zāi nàn zhòng sàng shī qīn rén de xìng cún zhě hěn zhí de tóng qíng.
english: Survivors of the disaster who lost their relatives are much to be pitied.

hanzi: 他不顾父母的反对决心举办这桩婚事.
pinyin: tā bù gù fù mǔ de fǎn duì jué xīn jǔ bàn zhè zhuāng hūn shì.
english: He's determined to go through with the marriage despite his parents' opposition.

hanzi: 灾难中丧失亲人的幸存者很值得同情.
pinyin: zāi nàn zhòng sàng shī qīn rén de xìng cún zhě hěn zhí de tóng qíng.
english: Survivors of the disaster who lost their relatives are much to be pitied.

hanzi: 您可以将您的贵重物品放在旅馆的保险柜里。
pinyin: nín kě yǐ jiàng nín de guì zhòng wù pǐn fàng zài lu:3 guǎn de bǎo xiǎn jǔ lǐ。
english: You may deposit your valuables in the hotel safe.

hanzi: 警方根据所获情报, 突然搜查了那个俱乐部.
pinyin: jǐng fāng gēn jù suǒ huò qíng bào,  tū rán sōu chá le nèi gè jù yuè bù.
english: Acting on information received, the police raided the club.

hanzi: 我会让你分享我所搜集的仅有的一些资料。
pinyin: wǒ kuài ràng nǐ fēn xiǎng wǒ suǒ sōu jí de jǐn yǒu de yī xiē zī liào。
english: I'll let you share what little information I have collected.

hanzi: 事后剖析，事后检讨对已结束事件的分析和回顾
pinyin: shì hòu pōu xī， shì hòu jiǎn tǎo duì yǐ jié shù shì jiàn de fēn xī huò huí gù
english: An analysis or review of a completed event.

hanzi: 流行歌曲一被接受, 追星族就大量涌现。
pinyin: liú xíng gē qǔ yī bèi jiē shòu,  zhuī xīng zú jiù dà liàng yǒng xiàn。
english: As soon as popular songs were accepted, fans appeared in a rash.

hanzi: 我见她打扮得像个小丑，把我笑得直不起腰来。
pinyin: wǒ xiàn tā dǎ bàn de xiàng gè xiǎo chǒu， bǎ wǒ xiào de zhí bù qǐ yāo lái。
english: I just curled up when I saw her dressed as a clown.

hanzi: 这些批评意见已修改得缓和些以免得罪人.
pinyin: zhè xie pī píng yì jiàn yǐ xiū gǎi de huǎn hé xiē yǐ miǎn dé zuì rén.
english: The criticisms had been watered down so as not to offend anybody.

hanzi: 那座山在东方天空的衬托下显得轮廓分明.
pinyin: nà zuò shān zài dōng fāng tiān kōng de chèn tuō xià xiǎn de lún kuò fēn míng.
english: The mountain was sharply defined against the eastern sky.

hanzi: 我需要加强锻炼和改变饮食来增强休质。
pinyin: wǒ xū yào jiā qiáng duàn liàn huò gǎi biàn yǐn shí lái zēng qiáng xiū zhì。
english: I need to tone up with more exercise and a change of diet.

hanzi: 我要是你就不参加了，他的计划似乎不妥当。
pinyin: wǒ yào shì nǐ jiù bù cān jiā le， tā de jì huà sì hu bù tuǒ dàng。
english: I should lie off if I were you, his scheme doesn't seem sound.

hanzi: 现在是向您表达感激之情最为恰当的时刻。
pinyin: xiàn zài shì xiàng nín biǎo dá gǎn jī zhī qíng zuì wéi qià dàng de shí kè。
english: It is the most appropriate time to show you our thanks.

hanzi: 若不立即签署合同我就撤回我提出的条件.
pinyin: ruò bù lì jí qiān shǔ hé tong wǒ jiù chè huí wǒ tí chū de tiáo jiàn.
english: Unless the contract is signed immediately, I shall withdraw my offer.

hanzi: 他在青年时代曾经有过想当钢琴家的雄心。
pinyin: tā zài qīng nián shí dài céng jīng yǒu guò xiǎng dàng gāng qín jiā de xióng xīn。
english: In his youth he had the ambition of being a pianist.

hanzi: 我每天打壁球，一个星期体重减轻了十磅。
pinyin: wǒ měi tiān dǎ bì qiú， yī gè xīng qī tǐ zhòng jiǎn qīng le shí bàng。
english: I sweated off ten pounds in a week by playing squash every day.

hanzi: 我们经济的决定性因素是控制通货膨胀。
pinyin: wǒ men jīng jì de jué dìng xìng yīn sù shì kòng zhì tōng huò péng zhàng。
english: The determinate factor of our economy is to control inflation.

hanzi: 他亲自露面使传说他死亡的谣言不攻自灭.
pinyin: tā qīn zì lòu miàn shǐ chuán shuō tā sǐ wáng de yáo yán bù gōng zì miè.
english: His appearance in the flesh ended the rumours about his death.

hanzi: 他亲自露面使传说他死亡的谣言不攻自灭.
pinyin: tā qīn zì lòu miàn shǐ chuán shuō tā sǐ wáng de yáo yán bù gōng zì miè.
english: His appearance in the flesh ended the rumours about his death.

hanzi: 我挑选壁纸和帘子用了好几天的时间.
pinyin: wǒ tiāo xuǎn bì zhǐ huò lián zi yòng le hǎo jǐ tiān de shí jiān.
english: I spent days picking and choosing before deciding on the wallpaper and curtains.

hanzi: 我们不能从那里穿过草地, 因为河水泛滥了.
pinyin: wǒ men bù néng zòng nà li chuān guò cǎo dì,  yīn wèi hé shuǐ fàn làn le.
english: We can't cross the meadow there because the river is in flood.

hanzi: 我买汽车时总要把燃油消耗量考虑在内.
pinyin: wǒ mǎi qì chē shí zǒng yào bǎ rán yóu xiāo hào liàng kǎo lu:4 zài nèi.
english: I always take fuel consumption into consideration when buying a car.

hanzi: 政府的私有化计画遇到了很大的阻力.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ de sī yǒu huà jì huà yù dào le hěn dà de zǔ lì.
english: The government is running up against considerable opposition to its privatization plans.

hanzi: 要是你花的比我们挣的还多，我们就要欠债了。
pinyin: yào shì nǐ huā de bì wǒ men zhèng de huán duō， wǒ men jiù yào qiàn zhài le。
english: We'll run into debt if you spend more than our income.

hanzi: 在以后的岁月中，他一直记着她临别时的一吻。
pinyin: zài yǐ hòu de suì yuè zhòng， tā yī zhí jì zhuó tā lín biè shí de yī wěn。
english: He remembered her parting kiss in the following years.

hanzi: 多亏您们的帮助，我们才成功完成了工作。
pinyin: duō kuī nín men de bāng zhù， wǒ men cái chéng gōng wán chéng le gōng zuò。
english: Owing to you help, we have just successfully completed work.

hanzi: 这个旅馆为住客提供了各种各样的娱乐活动。
pinyin: zhè gè lu:3 guǎn wèi zhù kè tí gōng le gè zhǒng gè yàng de yú lè huó dòng。
english: The hotel offers its guest a wide variety of amusement.

hanzi: 这一新裁定使特别委员会的推荐生效.
pinyin: zhè yī xīn cái dìng shǐ tè bié wěi yuán huì de tuī jiàn shēng xiào.
english: The new ruling gives effect to the recommendations of the special committee.

hanzi: 这件丑闻可以说明这个党在整体上不健康.
pinyin: zhè jiàn chǒu wén kě yǐ shuō míng zhè gè dǎng zài zhěng tǐ shàng bù jiàn kāng.
english: This scandal will reflect badly on the Party as a whole.

hanzi: 要照出清晰的照片，就要把焦点对准物体。
pinyin: yào zhào chū qīng xī de zhào piàn， jiù yào bǎ jiāo diǎn duì zhǔn wù tǐ。
english: Bring the object into focus if you want a sharp photograph.

hanzi: 要照出清晰的照片，就要把焦点对准物体。
pinyin: yào zhào chū qīng xī de zhào piàn， jiù yào bǎ jiāo diǎn duì zhǔn wù tǐ。
english: Bring the object into focus if you want a sharp photograph.

hanzi: 从新娘的花束上垂下来的丝带打成了一个结。
pinyin: zòng xīn niáng de huā shù shàng chuí xià lái de sī dài dǎ chéng le yī gè jié。
english: Ribbon hung from the bride's bouquet was tied in a bow.

hanzi: 新娘的男亲属们聚集在一起为婚礼做准备。
pinyin: xīn niáng de nán qīn shǔ men jù jí zài yī qǐ wèi hūn lǐ zuò zhǔn bèi。
english: The bride's kinsman gathered to make preparations for the wedding.

hanzi: 她虽然非常害怕, 但表面上还是显得很镇静.
pinyin: tā suī rán fēi cháng hài pà,  dàn biǎo miàn shàng hái shì xiǎn de hěn zhèn jìng.
english: Though badly frightened, she appeared outwardly calm.

hanzi: 还没有装订成册的论文稿件堆放在桌子上。
pinyin: huán méi yǒu zhuāng dìng chéng cè de lùn wén gǎo jiàn duī fàng zài zhuō zi shàng。
english: The unbound sheets of paper were piled up on the table.

hanzi: 我打开了邮件，惊讶地发现了一个打碎的花瓶。
pinyin: wǒ dǎ kāi le yóu jiàn， jīng yà de fā xiàn le yī gè dǎ suì de huā píng。
english: I opened my mail and was surprised to see a broken vase.

hanzi: 他有个主意，以纯白为背景给他们拍摄。
pinyin: tā yǒu gè zhǔ yi， yǐ chún bái wèi bèi jǐng jǐ tā men pāi shè。
english: He had the idea of shooting them against a complete plain white background.

hanzi: 在演讲开始时，他总是先分发一份提纲。
pinyin: zài yǎn jiǎng kāi shǐ shí， tā zǒng shì xiān fēn fā yī fèn tí gāng。
english: At the beginning he would always hand out an outline of the lecture.

hanzi: 我不太懂得瓷器，估计不出这些盘子的价钱。
pinyin: wǒ bù tài dǒng de cí qì， gū jì bù chū zhè xie pán zi de jià qian。
english: I don't know enough about porcelain to be able to price these plates.

hanzi: 再往里走，坑道缩小成了一条窄窄的通道。
pinyin: zài wàng lǐ zǒu， kēng dào suō xiǎo chéng le yī tiáo zhǎi zhǎi de tōng dào。
english: The tunnel contract to a narrow passageway as you go deep.

hanzi: 我读了两遍这首诗，这个小女孩就会背诵了。
pinyin: wǒ dú le liǎng biàn zhè shǒu shī， zhè gè xiǎo nu:3 hái jiù kuài bèi sòng le。
english: The girl repeated the poem after I had read it twice.

hanzi: 要写出好文章, 必须先从逻辑上理顺思绪.
pinyin: yào xiě chū hào wén zhāng,  bì xū xiān zòng luó ji shàng lǐ shùn sī xù.
english: To write a good essay you must first organize your ideas logically.

hanzi: 这样的行为与她情操高尚的原则是矛盾的。
pinyin: zhè yàng de xíng wéi yù tā qíng cāo gāo shàng de yuán zé shì máo dùn de。
english: Such behavior is inconsistent with her high-minded principles.

hanzi: 采取残酷镇压的方式，他们只会火上浇油。
pinyin: cǎi qǔ cán kù zhèn yā de fāng shì， tā men zhǐ kuài huǒ shàng jiāo yóu。
english: By brutally suppressing them, they simply poured oil on the flame.

hanzi: 如果我们不把价格压低，就甭想拿到订单。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ men bù bǎ jià gé yā dī， jiù béng xiǎng ná dào dìng dān。
english: If we do not keep the price down, go bang our chance of get the order.

hanzi: 英镑对美元保持稳定，但对日元则疲软。
pinyin: yīng bàng duì měi yuán bǎo chí wěn dìng， dàn duì rì yuán zé pí ruǎn。
english: The pound remain firm against the dollar, but fall against the yen.

hanzi: 在火上一下子添上很多煤, 反而能把火闷死.
pinyin: zài huǒ shàng yí xià zi tiān shàng hěn duō méi,  fǎn ér néng bǎ huǒ mèn sǐ.
english: If you put too much coal on the fire at once you'll smother it.

hanzi: 国会拨款两百万英镑作为防治水灾之用。
pinyin: guó huì bō kuǎn liǎng bǎi wàn yīng bàng zuò wéi fáng zhì shuǐ zāi zhī yòng。
english: Parliament appropriated two million pounds for flood control.

hanzi: 华侨像孤儿的那种日子已经一去不复返了。
pinyin: huá qiáo xiàng gū ér de nà zhòng rì zi yǐ jīng yī qù bù fù fǎn le。
english: The days when the overseas Chinese were like orphans are gone forever.

hanzi: 参谋人员在地图上把这个地区精确地标了出来。
pinyin: cān móu rén yuán zài dì tú shàng bǎ zhè gè dì qū jīng què dì biāo le chū lai。
english: The staff officers mapped out the area thoroughly.

hanzi: 如果我们不打扫房间，灰尘很快就会堆积起来。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ men bù dǎ sǎo fáng jiān， huī chén hěn kuài jiù kuài duī jī qǐ lai。
english: Dust soon accumulates if we don't sweep our rooms.

hanzi: 只有在王室成员在场的时候才升起这面旗帜。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu zài wáng shì chéng yuán zài chǎng de shí hou cái shēng qǐ zhè miàn qí zhì。
english: The flag is only raised when royalty are present.

hanzi: 对应该采取怎样的步骤这一点还不太明确.
pinyin: duì yìng gāi cǎi qǔ zěn yàng de bù zhòu zhè yī diǎn huán bù tài míng què.
english: There is some confusion about what the right procedure should be.

hanzi: 你工作得愈久，你愈会疲倦，那必然是真的。
pinyin: nǐ gōng zuò de yù jiǔ， nǐ yù kuài pí juàn， nà bì rán shì zhēn de。
english: It follows that the longer you work, the more tired you will be.

hanzi: 我一定是瞎了眼, 连我们身临险境也看不出来.
pinyin: wǒ yī dìng shì xiā le yǎn,  lián wǒ men shēn lín xiǎn jìng yě kàn bù chū lai.
english: I must have been blind not to realize the danger we were in.

hanzi: 她泪眼蒙蒙，几乎不能认出自己的儿子。
pinyin: tā lèi yǎn měng měng， jī hū bù néng rèn chū zì jǐ de ér zi。
english: She could hardly recognize her son through the mist of tears that filled her eyes.

hanzi: 商店答应, 倘若我付定金就给我保留这批货.
pinyin: shāng diàn dā ying,  tǎng ruò wǒ fù dìng jīn jiù jǐ wǒ bǎo liú zhè pī huò.
english: The shop promised to keep the goods for me if I paid a deposit.

hanzi: 我们的厂长以将来销售量为他行动的准绳。
pinyin: wǒ men de chǎng zhǎng yǐ jiāng lái xiāo shòu liàng wèi tā xíng dòng de zhǔn shéng。
english: Our factory director hinged his action on future sales.

hanzi: 我们应该努力消除目前的这股反政府情绪.
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi nǔ lì xiāo chú mù qián de zhè gǔ fǎn zhèng fǔ qíng xù.
english: We must try to counteract the present current of anti-government feeling.

hanzi: 我不愿意牵扯到这场学制改革的争论之中。
pinyin: wǒ bù yuàn yì qiān chě dào zhè chǎng xué zhì gǎi gé de zhēng lùn zhī zhōng。
english: I don't want to get sucked into the row about school reform.

hanzi: 这些宏伟的宫殿给外宾们留下了深刻的印象。
pinyin: zhè xie hóng wěi de gōng diàn jǐ wài bīn men liú xià le shēn kè de yìn xiàng。
english: These magnificent palaces impressed the foreigners deeply.

hanzi: 边缘地带刚刚超出或恰好在某特定地区的地带
pinyin: biān yuán dì dài gāng gang chāo chū huò qià hǎo zài mǒu tè dìng dì qū de dì dài
english: A region just beyond or at the edge of a settled area.

hanzi: 他们极力装出情愿的样子撤回了反对意见.
pinyin: tā men jí lì zhuāng chū qíng yuàn de yàng zi chè huí le fǎn duì yì jiàn.
english: They withdrew their objections with as good a grace as they could manage.

hanzi: 他无法消除自己的疑心, 总觉得妻子不忠.
pinyin: tā wú fǎ xiāo chú zì jǐ de yí xīn,  zǒng jué de qī zi bù zhōng.
english: He could not divest himself of the suspicion that his wife was being unfaithful.

hanzi: 装甲部队部署装甲车辆的战斗部队，如坦克
pinyin: zhuāng jiǎ bù duì bù shǔ zhuāng jiǎ chē liàng de zhàn dòu bù duì， rú tǎn kè
english: The combat arm that deploys armored vehicles, such as tanks.

hanzi: 我们送些酬劳，对您的大力协助聊表谢意。
pinyin: wǒ men sòng xiē chóu láo， duì nín de dà lì xié zhù liáo biǎo xiè yì。
english: We are sending you some money in acknowledgement of your valuable help.

hanzi: 老太婆一个个地数出三十便士给了售货员.
pinyin: lǎo tài pó yī gè gè de shuò chū sān shí biàn shì jǐ le shòu huò yuán.
english: The old lady counted out thirty pence and gave it to the shop assistant.

hanzi: 我宁可安于贫穷，也不愿用不当手段赚钱。
pinyin: wǒ nìng kě ān yú pín qióng， yě bù yuàn yòng bù dàng shǒu duàn zhuàn qián。
english: I would rather remain poor than get money by dishonest means.

hanzi: 我们只好匆忙找套房子--没有时间挑选了.
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ hǎo cōng máng zhǎo tào fáng zi-- méi yǒu shí jiān tiāo xuǎn le.
english: We had to find a flat in a hurry there was no time to pick and choose.

hanzi: 若时机不当, 一言不慎, 可能毁掉整个计画.
pinyin: ruò shí jī bù dàng,  yī yán bù shèn,  kě néng huǐ diào zhěng gè jì huà.
english: One indiscreet remark at the wrong moment could ruin the whole plan.

hanzi: 保母抱著个孩子进来, 孩子身上裹著暖暖的毯子.
pinyin: bǎo mǔ bào著 gè hái zi jìn lái,  hái zi shēn shàng guǒ著 nuǎn nuǎn de tǎn zi.
english: The nurse carried in a baby wrapped (up) in a warm blanket.

hanzi: 她自从患病以来第一次公开露面.
pinyin: tā zì cóng huàn bìng yǐ lái dì yī cì gōng kāi lòu miàn.
english: She was appearing in public (ie in front of people in general) for the first time since her illness.

hanzi: 他把名单给我再念一遍，我一一进行核对。
pinyin: tā bǎ míng dān jǐ wǒ zài niàn yī biàn， wǒ yī yī jìn xíng hé duì。
english: He read back the list of name to me, and I checked them off one by one.

hanzi: 那狗正在睡觉, 听到有人唤它, 猛地惊醒过来.
pinyin: nà gǒu zhèng zài shuì jiào,  tīng dào yǒu rén huàn tā,  měng de jīng xǐng guò lai.
english: On hearing his name called the sleeping dog sprang to life.

hanzi: 恐怖分子用炸弹袭击了警察局报复逮捕行动.
pinyin: kǒng bù fèn zǐ yòng zhà dàn xí jī le jǐng chá jú bào fù dài bǔ xíng dòng.
english: Terrorists bombed the police station in revenge for the arrests.

hanzi: 各党形成联盟时, 共产党人被排斥在外.
pinyin: gè dǎng xíng chéng lián méng shí,  gòng chǎn dǎng rén bèi pái chì zài wài.
english: When the coalition was formed, the Communists were left out in the cold.

hanzi: 当局对绑架者的要求丝毫没有让步的迹象.
pinyin: dāng jú duì bǎng jià zhě de yāo qiú sī háo méi yǒu ràng bù de jī xiàng.
english: The authorities showed no signs of giving in to the kidnapper's demands.

hanzi: 争辩在讨论或辩论中据理力争的行为或实例
pinyin: zhēng biàn zài tǎo lùn huò biàn lùn zhòng jù lǐ lì zhēng de xíng wéi huò shí lì
english: The act or an instance of striving in controversy or debate.

hanzi: 让我们永远怀念为世界和平献身的勇士们。
pinyin: ràng wǒ men yǒng yuǎn huái niàn wèi shì jiè hé píng xiàn shēn de yǒng shì men。
english: Let us remember the brave who died for the peace of the world.

hanzi: 在丛林中, 他们为了生存被迫采取极端行动.
pinyin: zài cóng lín zhòng,  tā men wèi le shēng cún bèi pò cǎi qǔ jí duān xíng dòng.
english: In the jungle, they were driven to extremes in order to survive.

hanzi: 警方正在调查他卷入那桩罪行的可能性。
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài diào chá tā juǎn rù nà zhuāng zuì xíng de kě néng xìng。
english: The police are investigating his possible involvement in the crime.

hanzi: 一个人的第一个印象是，每个人都是匆忙的。
pinyin: yī gè rén de dì yī gè yìn xiàng shì， měi gè rén dōu shì cōng máng de。
english: One's first impression is likely to be that everyone is in a rush.

hanzi: 天文学是一门严谨的科学, 与占星术完全不同.
pinyin: tiān wén xué shì yī mén yán jǐn de kē xué,  yù zhàn xīng zhú wán quán bù tóng.
english: Astronomy, as distinct from astrology, is an exact science.

hanzi: 那艘损坏的船只在海岛沿岸航行以寻找港口。
pinyin: nà sōu sǔn huài de chuán zhī zài hǎi dǎo yán àn háng xíng yǐ xún zhǎo gǎng kǒu。
english: The disabled ship coasted the island, looking for a harbor.

hanzi: 对通货膨胀似乎有一种日渐增长的不满情绪。
pinyin: duì tōng huò péng zhàng sì hu yǒu yī zhòng rì jiàn zēng zhǎng de bù mǎn qíng xù。
english: There appears to be a growing discontent about inflation.

hanzi: 今日发射宇宙飞船的计画, 因天气恶劣而落空.
pinyin: jīn rì fā shè yǔ zhòu fēi chuán de jì huà,  yīn tiān qì è liè ér luò kòng.
english: Bad weather has frustrated plans to launch the spacecraft today.

hanzi: 问题之一是申请人不得不面对的官僚主义。
pinyin: wèn tí zhī yī shì shēn qǐng rén bù dé bù miàn duì de guān liáo zhǔ yì。
english: One of the problems is the bureaucracy the claimant has to face.

hanzi: 那个编辑在一篇社论中恶毒地攻击了反对派。
pinyin: nèi gè biān jí zài yī piān shè lùn zhòng è dú de gōng jī le fǎn duì pài。
english: The editor got his claws into the opposition in a vicious editorial.

hanzi: 经过慎重的考虑，我们决定接受他们的提议。
pinyin: jīng guò shèn zhòng de kǎo lu:4， wǒ men jué dìng jiē shòu tā men de tí yì。
english: After careful consideration, we've decided to accept their offer.

hanzi: 头一天下过一场暴雨，这时空气仍然很清新。
pinyin: tou yī tiān xià guò yī chǎng bào yǔ， zhè shí kōng qì réng rán hěn qīng xīn。
english: The air was still fresh following a downpour the day before.

hanzi: 自从我学会下国际象棋以来，这是我第一次赢。
pinyin: zì cóng wǒ xué huì xià guó jì xiàng qí yǐ lái， zhè shì wǒ dì yī cì yíng。
english: It was the first time I'd won since I'd learnt to play chess.

hanzi: 烈士们的英勇事迹在广大群众中传颂着。
pinyin: liè shì men de yīng yǒng shì jī zài guǎng dà qún zhòng zhòng zhuàn sòng zhuó。
english: The heroic deeds of the martyrs are on the lips of the broad masses.

hanzi: 就在我们犹豫不决的时候, 别人把那所房子买下了.
pinyin: jiù zài wǒ men yóu yù bù jué de shí hou,  bié rén bǎ nà suǒ fáng zi mǎi xià le.
english: While we were wavering, somebody else bought the house.

hanzi: 你可以用热水把菜盘上凝结的油污冲洗掉。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ yòng rè shuǐ bǎ cài pán shàng níng jié de yóu wū chōng xǐ diào。
english: You may use hot water to rinse the congealed fat off the dinner plates.

hanzi: 他向警方隐瞒实情而并未感到十分不妥.
pinyin: tā xiàng jǐng fāng yǐn mán shí qíng ér bìng wèi gǎn dào shí fēn bù tuǒ.
english: He had/felt no serious qualms about concealing the information from the police.

hanzi: 山山峰或丘陵，尤其用在山名的正式名字中
pinyin: shān shān fēng huò qiū líng， yóu qí yòng zài shān míng de zhèng shì míng zi zhòng
english: A mountain or hill. Used especially as part of a proper name.

hanzi: 这棵树看起来又高又壮，实际上树干是空的。
pinyin: zhè kē shù kàn qǐ lai yòu gāo yòu zhuàng， shí jì shàng shù gàn shì kòng de。
english: This tree looks high and strong but actually its trunk is hollow.

hanzi: 将军高度赞扬了他在那次战争中的英勇事迹。
pinyin: jiāng jūn gāo dù zàn yáng le tā zài nà cì zhàn zhēng zhòng dì yīng yǒng shì jī。
english: His heroism in that war was highly praised by the general.

hanzi: 在南美的一些风险投机中他损失了所有钱财。
pinyin: zài Nán měi de yī xiē fēng xiǎn tóu jī zhòng tā sǔn shī le suǒ yǒu qián cái。
english: He loses all his money in some risky venture in South America.

hanzi: 我们的建议帮助他们消除了相互关系中的障碍。
pinyin: wǒ men de jiàn yì bāng zhù tā men xiāo chú le xiāng hù guān xi zhòng dì zhàng ài。
english: Our advice helped them to smooth out their relationship.

hanzi: 猛然间我想起了先前曾在那里见到这个男孩。
pinyin: měng rán jiàn wǒ xiǎng qǐ le xiān qián zēng zài nà li xiàn dào zhè gè nán hái。
english: It suddenly came back to me where I had seen the boy before.

hanzi: 将军高度赞扬了他在那次战争中的英勇事迹。
pinyin: jiāng jūn gāo dù zàn yáng le tā zài nà cì zhàn zhēng zhòng dì yīng yǒng shì jī。
english: His heroism in that war was highly praised by the general.

hanzi: 该旅行团将由一名受过专门培训过的护士陪同。
pinyin: gāi lu:3 xíng tuán jiàng yóu yī míng shòu guò zhuān mén péi xùn guò de hù shi péi tóng。
english: The tour will be accompanied by a trained nurse.

hanzi: 政府正采取措施，控制不断上升的犯罪率。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ zhèng cǎi qǔ cuò shī， kòng zhì bù duàn shàng shēng de fàn zuì shuài。
english: The government is taking steps to control the rising crime rate.

hanzi: 油轮需求量的下降使很多工作职位受到威胁。
pinyin: yóu lún xū qiú liàng de xià jiàng shǐ hěn duō gōng zuò zhí wèi shòu dào wēi xié。
english: A fall in demand for oil tankers has put jobs in jeopardy.

hanzi: 警方封锁了这个区域直至拆除炸弹的引信为止。
pinyin: jǐng fāng fēng suǒ le zhè gè qū yù zhí zhì chāi chú zhà dàn de yǐn xìn wéi zhǐ。
english: Police cordoned off the area until the bomb was defused.

hanzi: 在前进的道路上，他们是一定会碰到曲折的。
pinyin: zài qián jìn de dào lù shàng， tā men shì yī dìng kuài pèng dào qū zhé de。
english: On their way forward, they are bound to run into twists and turns.

hanzi: 那艘损坏的船只在海岛沿岸航行以寻找港口。
pinyin: nà sōu sǔn huài de chuán zhī zài hǎi dǎo yán àn háng xíng yǐ xún zhǎo gǎng kǒu。
english: The disabled ship coasted the island, looking for a harbor.

hanzi: 因为暴风雪，经常去做礼拜的人没有去教堂。
pinyin: yīn wèi bào fēng xuě， jīng cháng qù zuò lǐ bài de rén méi yǒu qù jiào táng。
english: Because of the snowstorm, the churchgoer did not go to church.

hanzi: 在这些孩子的眼里, 父亲的书房是最神圣的地方.
pinyin: zài zhè xie hái zi de yǎn lǐ,  fù qīn de shū fáng shì zuì shén shèng de dì fang.
english: To the children, their father's study was the holy of holies.

hanzi: 法院已经发布了禁止他们罢工一个月的禁令。
pinyin: fǎ yuàn yǐ jīng fā bù le jìn zhǐ tā men bà gōng yī gè yuè de jìn lìng。
english: The court has issued an injunction forbidding them to strike for a month.

hanzi: 一家美国的大联合企业持有该公司的大部分股份。
pinyin: yī jiā Měi guó de dà lián hé qǐ yè chí yǒu gāi gōng sī de dà bù fen gǔ fèn。
english: An American conglomerate holds a major share in the company.

hanzi: 影片捕捉到了医院里沉著而自信的气氛.
pinyin: yǐng piàn bǔ zhuō dào le yī yuàn lǐ chén著 ér zì xìn de qì fēn.
english: The film captured (ie described very well) the mood of quiet confidence at the hospital.

hanzi: 小集团的倾向于联成一个群体并排斥外来者的
pinyin: xiǎo jí tuán de qīng xiàng yú lián chéng yī gè qún tǐ bìng pái chì wài lái zhě de
english: Inclined to cling together as a group and exclude outsiders.

hanzi: 他本来答应跟我们同往，但后来一直借故推辞了。
pinyin: tā běn lái dā ying gēn wǒ men tóng wàng， dàn hòu lái yī zhí jiè gù tuī cí le。
english: He promised to go with us, but he has since begged off.

hanzi: 我们到该校拍摄影片时，获得校方的大力协助。
pinyin: wǒ men dào gāi xiào pāi shè yǐng piàn shí， huò dé xiào fāng de dà lì xié zhù。
english: The school was very cooperative when we made a film there.

hanzi: 那套梳子非常漂亮，非常特别，但是太贵了。
pinyin: nà tào shū zi fēi cháng piào liang， fēi cháng tè bié， dàn shì tài guì le。
english: That set of comb is very beautiful and special, but it costs much.

hanzi: 工厂主们使用血汗劳动为自己挣得大量财产。
pinyin: gōng chǎng zhǔ men shǐ yòng xuè hàn láo dòng wèi zì jǐ zhèng de dà liàng cái chǎn。
english: The mill owners used sweated labour to earn them fortunes.

hanzi: 这种有倾向性 的说法可能招致强烈的反对.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yǒu qīng xiàng xìng  de shuō fa kě néng zhāo zhì qiáng liè de fǎn duì.
english: Such tendentious statements are likely to provoke strong opposition.

hanzi: 一旦你养成了一个坏习惯，绝不容易改正。
pinyin: yī dàn nǐ yǎng chéng le yī gè huài xí guàn， jué bù róng yì gǎi zhèng。
english: Once you have formed a bad habit, it is by no means easy to get rid of it.

hanzi: 这个分裂出去的派别受到其他宗教团体的蔑视。
pinyin: zhè gè fēn liè chū qù de pài bié shòu dào qí tā zōng jiào tuán tǐ de miè shì。
english: The break-away sect was contemned by other religious groups.

hanzi: 化工厂发生爆炸引起了害怕污染的巨大恐慌.
pinyin: huà gōng chǎng fā shēng bào zhà yǐn qǐ le hài pà wū rǎn de jù dà kǒng huāng.
english: The explosion at the chemical factory caused a major pollution scare.

hanzi: 这个分裂出去的派别受到其他宗教团体的蔑视。
pinyin: zhè gè fēn liè chū qù de pài bié shòu dào qí tā zōng jiào tuán tǐ de miè shì。
english: The break-away sect was contemned by other religious groups.

hanzi: 天气干旱了这么久，这场雨成了农民的救星。
pinyin: tiān qì gān hàn le zhè me jiǔ， zhè chǎng yǔ chéng le nóng mín de jiù xīng。
english: After so much dry weather, the rain has been the farmer's salvation.

hanzi: 你在良心上总不能认为那样的报酬算是合理的吧.
pinyin: nǐ zài liáng xīn shàng zǒng bù néng rèn wéi nà yàng de bào chóu suàn shì hé lǐ de ba.
english: You cannot in all conscience regard that as fair pay.

hanzi: 科学家利用计算机计算了火箭可能运行的轨道。
pinyin: kē xué jiā lì yòng jì suàn jī jì suàn le huǒ jiàn kě néng yùn xíng de guǐ dào。
english: Scientists have computed the probable course of the rocket.

hanzi: 在她患病期间, 她的律师一直代理她的业务.
pinyin: zài tā huàn bìng qī jiān,  tā de lu:4 shī yī zhí dài lǐ tā de yè wù.
english: During her illness her solicitor has been acting for her in her business affairs.

hanzi: 建筑物建筑物，尤指大规模且外观宏伟的建筑物
