hanzi: 黄铜片黄铜或类似黄铜的合金，用锤子锤成片状，过去用于制造教堂中的器具
pinyin: huáng tóng piàn huáng tóng huò lèi sì huáng tóng de hé jīn， yòng chuí zi chuí chéng piàn zhuàng， guò qu yòng yú zhì zào jiào táng zhòng dì qì jù
english: Brass or an alloy resembling brass, hammered thin and formerly used in the manufacture of church vessels.

hanzi: 只要有更短而又直接通往灭亡的大道，这世上就可省却不少悲哀与忧愁的吧。
pinyin: zhǐ yào yǒu gèng duǎn ér yòu zhí jiē tōng wàng miè wáng de dà dào， zhè shì shàng jiù kě xǐng què bù shǎo bēi āi yù yōu chóu de ba。
english: If there only some shorter and more direct route to the devil, it would save an awful lot of sorrow and anxiety in this world.

hanzi: 在荷兰，人们拦海造田已开垦了成千上万公顷的土地并将它们变成可耕地和牧场。
pinyin: zài hé lán， rén men lán hǎi zào tián yǐ kāi kěn le chéng qiān shàng wàn gōng qǐng de tǔ dì bìng jiàng tā men biàn chéng kě gēng dì huò mù chǎng。
english: In Holland thousands of hectares have been reclaimed from the sea and turned over to arable land and pasture.

hanzi: 在荷兰，人们拦海造田已开垦了成千上万公顷的土地并将它们变成可耕地和牧场。
pinyin: zài hé lán， rén men lán hǎi zào tián yǐ kāi kěn le chéng qiān shàng wàn gōng qǐng de tǔ dì bìng jiàng tā men biàn chéng kě gēng dì huò mù chǎng。
english: In Holland thousands of hectares have been reclaimed from the sea and turned over to arable land and pasture.

hanzi: 山自然形成的高出于地面的一块高地，占地广大，通常外侧陡峻且比丘陵要高
pinyin: shān zì rán xíng chéng de gāo chū yú dì miàn de yī kuài gāo dì， zhàn de guǎng dà， tōng cháng wài zhāi dǒu jùn qiě bì qiū líng yào gāo
english: A natural elevation of the earth's surface having considerable mass, generally steep sides, and a height greater than that of a hill.

hanzi: 苏珊将珍珠项链送给了孙女。她觉得，珍珠配在孙女年轻脖子上会显得更加漂亮。
pinyin: sū shān jiàng zhēn zhū xiàng liàn sòng jǐ le sūn nu:3。 tā jué de， zhēn zhū pèi zài sūn nu:3 nián qīng bó zi shàng kuài xiǎn de gèng jiā piào liang。
english: Susan gave her pearls to her granddaughter, round whose young throat she felt they would be displayed to greater advantage.

hanzi: 角帖书一种早期初级读物，即为一张盖有透明角片作为保护的书页，以前供儿童认字用
pinyin: jué tiè shū yī zhòng zǎo qī chū jí dú wù， jí wèi yī zhāng gě yǒu tòu míng jué piàn zuò wéi bǎo hù de shū yè， yǐ qián gòng ér tóng rèn zì yòng
english: An early primer consisting of a single page protected by a transparent sheet of horn, formerly used in teaching children to read.

hanzi: 餐车饭店一种小型的通常具有柜台和座位的廉价的餐馆，并设计在类似于餐车的屋子中
pinyin: cān chē fàn diàn yī zhòng xiǎo xíng de tōng cháng jù yǒu guì tái huò zuò wèi de lián jià de cān guǎn， bìng shè jì zài lèi sì yú cān chē de wū zi zhòng
english: A small, usually inexpensive restaurant with a long counter and booths and housed in a building designed to resemble a dining car.

hanzi: 针灸，针刺疗法，针刺麻醉以细针扎入身体特定部位以减轻疼痛或诱导局部麻醉的方法
pinyin: zhēn jiǔ， zhēn cì liáo fǎ， zhēn cì má zuì yǐ xì zhēn zhá rù shēn tǐ tè dìng bù wèi yǐ jiǎn qīng téng tòng huò yòu dǎo jú bù má zuì de fāng fǎ
english: A technique, as for relieving pain or inducing regional anesthesia, in which thin needles are inserted into the body at specific points.

hanzi: 水晶一种具有晶体结构的矿石，尤指石英的一种透明形态，通常其晶面在同一平面上
pinyin: shuǐ jīng yī zhòng jù yǒu jīng tǐ jié gòu de kuàng shí， yóu zhǐ shí yīng de yī zhòng tòu míng xíng tài， tōng cháng qí jīng miàn zài tóng yī píng miàn shàng
english: A mineral, especially a transparent form of quartz, having a crystalline structure, often characterized by external planar faces.

hanzi: 总而言之，这是一个妙极了的激动人心的凯尔特故事，中间穿插着一些闪烁着智慧与机智的片断。
pinyin: zǒng ér yán zhī， zhè shì yī gè miào jí le de jī dòng rén xīn de kǎi ěr tè gù shì， zhōng jiān chuān chā zhuó yī xiē shǎn shuò zhuó zhì huì yù jī zhì de piàn duàn。
english: All in all then, it is a rattling good Celtic yearn with a few fragments of wit-and-wisdom thrown in.

hanzi: 我展望前头，纽约的高楼大厦在我前面升起，似乎是从童话故事的篇章中出现的一座城市。
pinyin: wǒ zhǎn wàng qián tou， Niǔ Yuē de gāo lóu dà shà zài wǒ qián mian shēng qǐ， sì hu shì zòng tóng huà gù shì de piān zhāng zhòng chū xiàn de yī zuò chéng shì。
english: I look ahead, and before me rise the fantastic towers of New York, a city that seems to have stepped from the pages of a fairy story.

hanzi: 侵蚀，风化，风蚀受日晒雨淋的岩石发生特征的变化甚至崩溃的过程中的任何一化学或物理变化
pinyin: qīn shí， Fēng huà， fēng shí shòu rì shài yǔ lìn de yán shí fā shēng tè zhēng de biàn huà shèn zhì bēng kuì de guò chéng zhòng dì rèn hé yī huà xué huò wù lǐ biàn huà
english: Any of the chemical or mechanical processes by which rocks exposed to the weather undergo changes in character and break down.

hanzi: 我还没有告诉我的太太她买衣服花钱太多，她先下手为强反问我为什么花那么多钱去买新钓鱼竿。
pinyin: wǒ huán méi yǒu gào su wǒ de tài tai tā mǎi yī fu huā qián tài duō， tā xiān xià shǒu wèi qiáng fǎn wèn wǒ wèi shén me huā nà me duō qián qù mǎi xīn diào yú gān。
english: Before I could tell my wife she had spent too much for the dress, she stole my thunder by asking why I spent so much for the new fishing rod.

hanzi: 数据媒体的初始化，使某一特定计算机系统能将数据存在媒体中，随后又可从该媒体中检索出来。
pinyin: shù jù méi tǐ de chū shǐ huà， shǐ mǒu yī tè dìng jì suàn jī xì tǒng néng jiàng shù jù cún zài méi tǐ zhòng， suí hòu yòu kě zòng gāi méi tǐ zhòng jiǎn suǒ chū lai。
english: The initialization of a data medium such that a particular computer system can store data in and subsequently retrieve data from the medium.

hanzi: 阿克巴湾红海的一个海湾，在西奈半岛及沙特阿拉伯西北部之间。它长期以来在中东具有重要的战略性
pinyin: ē kè bā wān hóng hǎi de yī gè hǎi wān， zài xī nài bàn dǎo jí shā tè ē lā bó xī běi bù zhī jiān。 tā cháng qī yǐ lái zài Zhōng dōng jù yǒu zhòng yào de zhàn lu:è xìng
english: An arm of the Red Sea between the Sinai Peninsula and northwest Saudi Arabia. It has long been of strategic importance in the Middle East.

hanzi: 敌人就在背后，而前面横跨在深谷之上的桥已经腐朽不堪，摇摇晃晃。他处在两难之中，犹豫了起来。
pinyin: dí rén jiù zài bèi hòu， ér qián mian héng kuà zài shēn gǔ zhī shàng de qiáo yǐ jīng fǔ xiǔ bù kān， yáo yáo huàng huàng。 tā chù zài liǎng nàn zhī zhōng， yóu yù le qǐ lai。
english: His enemy was close behind him, and the bridge over the ravine was rotten and swaying. Caught between the devil and the deep blue sea, he hesitated.

hanzi: 抗荷衣宇航员或喷气机飞行员穿的飞行服，在快速垂直加速中增加身体下部的压力以保持脑部血液供应
pinyin: kàng hè yì yǔ háng yuán huò pèn qì jī fēi xíng yuán chuān de fēi xíng fú， zài kuài sù chuí zhí jiā sù zhòng zēng jiā shēn tǐ xià bù de yā lì yǐ bǎo chí nǎo bù xuè yè gōng yìng
english: A flight garment worn by astronauts and jet pilots that presses on the lower body to maintain the blood supply to the brain during rapid vertical acceleration.

hanzi: 就模拟输入而言，使模数转换器不能区别其变化的超范围的绝对电压值。超载值对于正输入和负输入可能不同。
pinyin: jiù mó nǐ shū rù ér yán， shǐ mó shuò zhuǎn huàn qì bù néng qū bié qí biàn huà de chāo fàn wéi de jué duì diàn yā zhí。 chāo zài zhí duì yú zhèng shū rù huò fù shū rù kě néng bù tóng。
english: For analog inputs, any absolute voltage value above which the analog-to- digital converter cannot distinguish a change. The overload value can be different for plus and minus inputs.

hanzi: 古董由于年代久远而具有特殊价值的物体，尤指由于工艺，美观和兴起时期等方面受到重视的土产，家具或手工艺品
pinyin: gǔ dǒng yóu yú nián dài jiǔ yuǎn ér jù yǒu tè shū jià zhí de wù tǐ， yóu zhǐ yóu yú gōng yì， měi guān huò xīng qǐ shí qī děng fāng miàn shòu dào zhòng shì de tǔ chǎn， jiā jù huò shǒu gōng yì pǐn
english: An object having special value because of its age, especially a domestic item or piece of furniture or handicraft esteemed for its artistry, beauty, or period of origin.

hanzi: 祝福夫君生日快乐，你给流逝的岁月增添了醉人的情意，你让平凡的事情发出耀眼的光芒，感谢你已成为我生命中特别重要的一部分。
pinyin: zhù fú fū jūn shēng rì kuài lè， nǐ jǐ liú shì de suì yuè zēng tiān le zuì rén de qíng yì， nǐ ràng píng fán de shì qing fā chū yào yǎn de guāng máng， gǎn xiè nǐ yǐ chéng wéi wǒ shēng mìng zhòng tè bié zhòng yào de yī bù fen。
english: Happy birthday to my dear husband. You add a special happiness to days that come and go. You give an extra sparkle to the ordinary things. It's so nice to have you being a special part of my life.

hanzi: 犁一种农具，由在一根横梁端部的厚重的刃构成，通常系在一组牵引它的牲畜或机动车上，用来破碎土块并耕出槽沟从而为播种做好准备
pinyin: lí yī zhòng nóng jù， yóu zài yī gēn héng liáng duān bù de hòu zhòng de rèn gòu chéng， tōng cháng xì zài yī zǔ qiān yǐn tā de shēng chù huò jī dòng chē shàng， yòng lái pò suì tǔ kuài bìng gēng chū cáo gōu cóng ér wèi bō zhǒng zuò hào zhǔn bèi
english: A farm implement consisting of a heavy blade at the end of a beam, usually hitched to a draft team or motor vehicle and used for breaking up soil and cutting furrows in preparation for sowing.

hanzi: 如果请费尔南德斯走路，教育局可以付钱马上终止合约，或是让他做满任期。费尔南德斯按规定可以在十九万五的年薪之外，还可以领未用病假和其他福利折合现金四十万元。
pinyin: rú guǒ qǐng fèi ěr nán dé sī zǒu lù， jiào yù jú kě yǐ fù qián mǎ shàng zhōng zhǐ hé yuē， huò shì ràng tā zuò mǎn rèn qī。 fèi ěr nán dé sī àn guī dìng kě yǐ zài shí jiǔ wàn wǔ de nián xīn zhī wài， huán kě yǐ lǐng wèi yòng bìng jià huò qí tā fú lì zhé hé xiàn jīn sì shí wàn yuán。
english: If Fernandez is shown the door, the board could either buy out his contract immediately or allow him to serve out his term. Fernandez is set to collect$400, 000 in past sick pay and other benefits on top of his$195, 000 salary.

hanzi: 你疯了吗?
pinyin: nǐ fēng le ma?
english: Are you mad?

hanzi: 倒霉死了!
pinyin: dǎo méi sǐ le!
english: What deuced bad luck!

hanzi: 你明白了吗？
pinyin: nǐ míng bai le ma？
english: Do you understand?

hanzi: 轮子安正了吗?
pinyin: lún zi ān zhèng le ma?
english: Is the wheel true?

hanzi: 愿上帝保佑你！
pinyin: yuàn shàng dì bǎo yòu nǐ！
english: God bless you!

hanzi: 你觉得恶心吗？
pinyin: nǐ jué de è xīn ma？
english: Be you feeling nausea?

hanzi: 你真让我恶心！
pinyin: nǐ zhēn ràng wǒ è xīn！
english: You make me sick!

hanzi: 他拷打犯人。
pinyin: tā kǎo dǎ fàn rén。
english: He tortured his prisoners.

hanzi: 你要吃点瓜吗?
pinyin: nǐ yào jí diǎn guā ma?
english: Would you like some melon?

hanzi: 他竟然拒绝了！
pinyin: tā jìng rán jù jué le！
english: He actually refused!

hanzi: 我看上去怎么样？
pinyin: wǒ kàn shàng qù zěn me yàng？
english: How do I look?

hanzi: 难怪你来晚了!
pinyin: nán guài nǐ lái wǎn le!
english: No wonder you were late!

hanzi: 动物能思考吗?
pinyin: dòng wù néng sī kǎo ma?
english: Are animals able to think?

hanzi: 你愿意帮忙吗？
pinyin: nǐ yuàn yì bāng máng ma？
english: Are you willing to help?

hanzi: 自来水接通了吗?
pinyin: zì lái shuǐ jiē tōng le ma?
english: Is the water on?

hanzi: 你在追求什么?
pinyin: nǐ zài zhuī qiú shén me?
english: What are you going after?

hanzi: 他是理科硕士。
pinyin: tā shì lǐ kē shuò shì。
english: He is a Master of Science.

hanzi: 飞快地；迅速地
pinyin: fēi kuài de； xùn sù de
english: At a rapid pace; swiftly.

hanzi: 侏儒身材矮的人
pinyin: zhū rú shēn cái ǎi de rén
english: A man short in stature.

hanzi: 我能试穿一下吗？
pinyin: wǒ néng shì chuān yī xià ma？
english: May I try it on?

hanzi: 她的功课行吗?
pinyin: tā de gōng kè xìng ma?
english: Is her schoolwork up to scratch?

hanzi: 黑夜转瞬而至.
pinyin: hēi yè zhuàn shùn ér zhì.
english: Night was fast approaching.

hanzi: 用用你的常识吧!
pinyin: yòng yòng nǐ de cháng shí ba!
english: Use your common sense!

hanzi: 基本特征；本性
pinyin: jī běn tè zhēng； běn xìng
english: Basic character; mettle.

hanzi: 他遗留下多少钱?
pinyin: tā yí liú xià duō shao qián?
english: How much did he leave?

hanzi: 有坑洼的，有坑洞的
pinyin: yǒu kēng wā de， yǒu kēng dòng de
english: Marked by pits.

hanzi: 这墙是垂直的吗？
pinyin: zhè qiáng shì chuí zhí de ma？
english: Is this wall plumb?

hanzi: 祝您一路平安！
pinyin: zhù nín yī lù píng ān！
english: A happy journey to you!

hanzi: 船触礁沉没。
pinyin: chuán chù jiāo chén mò。
english: The ship struck on a rock and sank.

hanzi: 请问我搞对了吗?
pinyin: qǐng wèn wǒ gǎo duì le ma?
english: Have I got it right, please?

hanzi: 他完全是胡说！
pinyin: tā wán quán shì hú shuō！
english: What utter rubbish he talks!

hanzi: 你想怎样兑换？
pinyin: nǐ xiǎng zěn yàng duì huàn？
english: How do you want to change?

hanzi: 耶稣以比喻教导。
pinyin: Yē sū yǐ bǐ yù jiào dǎo。
english: Jesus taught in parables.

hanzi: 这个箱子有多重？
pinyin: zhè gè xiāng zǐ yǒu duō zhòng？
english: How heavy is this box?

hanzi: 太阳和煦地照耀着
pinyin: tài yáng huò煦 de zhào yào zhuó
english: The sun shone kindly.

hanzi: 我这样设想对吗?
pinyin: wǒ zhè yàng shè xiǎng duì ma?
english: Am I correct in supposing so?

hanzi: 祝你一路顺风！
pinyin: zhù nǐ yī lù shùn fēng！
english: A pleasant journey to you!

hanzi: 如此痛切而清晰！
pinyin: rú cǐ tòng qiè ér qīng xī！
english: Burst agonized and clear!

hanzi: 我肺都快要气炸了！
pinyin: wǒ fèi dōu kuài yào qì zhà le！
english: I'm about to explode!

hanzi: 难怪他这麽累!
pinyin: nán guài tā zhè mó lèi!
english: Small wonder (that) he was so tired!

hanzi: 处于…境地；位于
pinyin: chǔ yú… jìng dì； wèi yú
english: Having been placed; located.

hanzi: 哦，你真是太好了!
pinyin: ó， nǐ zhēn shì tài hào le!
english: Oh, you're just wonderful!

hanzi: 孩子们, 规矩些!
pinyin: hái zi men,  guī ju xiē!
english: Children, please behave (yourselves)!

hanzi: 新汽车性能如何?
pinyin: xīn qì chē xìng néng rú hé?
english: How is the new car performing?

hanzi: 是什么使他生病？
pinyin: shì shén me shǐ tā shēng bìng？
english: What caused his illness?

hanzi: 兹答覆您的询问...
pinyin: zī dá fù nín de xún wèn...
english: In response to your inquiry...

hanzi: 她舔湿了嘴唇.
pinyin: tā tiǎn shī le zuǐ chún.
english: She moistened her lips with her tongue.

hanzi: 杰克和安妮订婚了。
pinyin: jié kè huò ān nī dìng hūn le。
english: Jack and Anne are engaged.

hanzi: 迪克摊开了一幅地图。
pinyin: Dí kè tān kāi le yī fú dì tú。
english: Dick spread out a map.

hanzi: 果树；果树栽培者
pinyin: guǒ shù； guǒ shù zāi péi zhě
english: Fruit trees; fruit growers.

hanzi: 也无须柏树来荫覆。
pinyin: yě wú xū bǎi shù lái yìn fù。
english: Nor shady cypress tree.

hanzi: 皮疹搔後会恶化.
pinyin: pí zhěn sāo後 kuài è huà.
english: Scratching exacerbates a skin rash.

hanzi: 设法抑制你的怒火！
pinyin: shè fǎ yì zhì nǐ de nù huǒ！
english: Try to contain your anger!

hanzi: 谁把牛奶泼出来了?
pinyin: shéi bǎ niú nǎi pō chū lai le?
english: Who has spilt/spilled the milk?

hanzi: 你的牛排要几分熟？
pinyin: nǐ de niú pái yào jǐ fèn shú？
english: How do you want your steak?

hanzi: 设法抑制你的怒火！
pinyin: shè fǎ yì zhì nǐ de nù huǒ！
english: Try to contain your anger!

hanzi: 他把黏土捏成形。
pinyin: tā bǎ nián tǔ niē chéng xíng。
english: He pinched the clay into shape.

hanzi: 池塘里有些芦苇。
pinyin: chí táng lǐ yǒu xiē lú wěi。
english: There are some reeds in the pond.

hanzi: 常汲之井涌甘泉。
pinyin: cháng jí zhī jǐng yǒng Gān quán。
english: Draw wells have sweet water.

hanzi: 极距；两极的直径
pinyin: jí jù； liǎng jí de zhí jìng
english: Polar distance; polar diameter.

hanzi: 酸能刺激胃黏膜.
pinyin: suān néng cì jī wèi nián mó.
english: Acid irritates the stomach lining.

hanzi: 应该废除死刑吗?
pinyin: yīng gāi fèi chú sǐ xíng ma?
english: Should the death penalty be abolished?

hanzi: 人生的初期；青春
pinyin: rén shēng de chū qī； qīng chūn
english: The springtime of life; youth.

hanzi: 【谚】改过不嫌晚。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 gǎi guò bù xián wǎn。
english: It is never too late to mend.

hanzi: 我不是猜想--我知道!
pinyin: wǒ bú shì cāi xiǎng-- wǒ zhī dào!
english: I'm not guessing I know!

hanzi: 绕过前方的礁石。
pinyin: rào guò qián fāng de jiāo shí。
english: Steer clear of the rocks ahead.

hanzi: 【谚】学习不嫌老。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 xué xí bù xián lǎo。
english: You are never too old to learn.

hanzi: 你把结果算对了吗？
pinyin: nǐ bǎ jié guǒ suàn duì le ma？
english: Did you get the answer right?

hanzi: 儿童都很富於幻想.
pinyin: ér tóng dōu hěn fù yū huàn xiǎng.
english: Children are very fanciful.

hanzi: 塔矗立在废墟中。
pinyin: tǎ chù lì zài fèi xū zhòng。
english: The tower stood amidst the ruins.

hanzi: 他用手枪瞄准我。
pinyin: tā yòng shǒu qiāng miáo zhǔn wǒ。
english: He covered me with a pistol.

hanzi: 终于播出相声了！
pinyin: zhōng yú bō chū xiàng shēng le！
english: The cross- talk is on at last!

hanzi: 她不可能如此迟钝.
pinyin: tā bù kě néng rú cǐ chí dùn.
english: She cannot possibly be so obtuse.

hanzi: 我猜得对不是不对？
pinyin: wǒ cāi de duì bú shì bù duì？
english: Have I guessed right or wrong?

hanzi: 荒芜或边远的农田
pinyin: huāng wú huò biān yuǎn de nóng tián
english: Barren or marginal farmland.

hanzi: 导演喊了一声: 停!
pinyin: dǎo yǎn hǎn le yī shēng:  tíng!
english: The director shouted `Cut!'

hanzi: 应该废除死刑吗?
pinyin: yīng gāi fèi chú sǐ xíng ma?
english: Should the death penalty be abolished?

hanzi: 你已把头发梳到後面.
pinyin: nǐ yǐ bǎ tóu fà shū dào後 miàn.
english: You've combed your hair back.

hanzi: 牛奶沸腾得溢出来了.
pinyin: niú nǎi fèi téng de yì chū lái le.
english: The milk is boiling over.

hanzi: 请饶了我（一命）吧!
pinyin: qǐng ráo le wǒ（ yī mìng） ba!
english: Please spare (ie don't kill) me!

hanzi: 山谷中薄雾袅袅.
pinyin: shān gǔ zhòng bó wù niǎo niǎo.
english: Eddies of mist rose from the valley.

hanzi: 辣椒的味道是怎样的？
pinyin: là jiāo de wèi dao shì zěn yàng de？
english: How does chilli taste?

hanzi: 英语是必修科目吗？
pinyin: Yīng yǔ shì bì xiū kē mù ma？
english: Is English a compulsory subject?

hanzi: 你有绘画的才能吗?
pinyin: nǐ yǒu huì huà de cái néng ma?
english: Have you got a talent for painting?

hanzi: "洁白如雪"是明喻。
pinyin: " jié bái rú xuě" shì míng yù。
english: "As white as snow" is a simile.

hanzi: 怎麽了? 你脸色不好.
pinyin: zěn mó le?  nǐ liǎn sè bù hǎo.
english: Is anything wrong? You look ill.

hanzi: 想要点黑莓酱吗？

english: This is what comes of being over-confident.

hanzi: 她写了一本关於舞蹈的书.
pinyin: tā xiě le yī běn guān yū wǔ dǎo de shū.
english: She has written a book on (the) dance.

hanzi: 给狗起这个名字多可笑！
pinyin: jǐ gǒu qǐ zhè gè míng zi duō kě xiào！
english: It is how laughable to this name of dog!

hanzi: 她的姨妈埃菲真是个怪人.
pinyin: tā de yí mā āi fēi zhēn shì gè guài rén.
english: Her Aunt Effie is certainly an original.

hanzi: 这小巷有车胎轧出的凹痕.
pinyin: zhè xiǎo xiàng yǒu jū tāi yà chū de āo hén.
english: The lane was rutted with tyre tracks.

hanzi: 山脚下有几排帐篷。
pinyin: shān jiǎo xià yǒu jǐ pǎi zhàng peng。
english: There are rows of tents at the foot of the mountain.

hanzi: 骤雨这种水的下降；暴雨
pinyin: zhòu yǔ zhè zhǒng shuǐ de xià jiàng； bào yǔ
english: A fall of such water; a rainstorm.

hanzi: 她把帆布背包转到身後.
pinyin: tā bǎ fán bù bēi bāo zhuàn dào shēn後.
english: She swung the rucksack (up) onto her back.

hanzi: 伦巴舞是拉丁美洲的舞蹈.
pinyin: lún bā wǔ shì Lā dīng měi zhōu de wǔ dǎo.
english: The rumba is a Latin-American dance.

hanzi: 谁是昨晚节目的主持人?
pinyin: shéi shì zuó wǎn jié mù de zhǔ chí rén?
english: Who was (the) emcee of the show last night?

hanzi: 用这把尺子能量得准吗?
pinyin: yòng zhè bǎ chǐ zi néng liàng de zhǔn ma?
english: Can you measure accurately with this ruler?

hanzi: 他的新著将於春季问世.
pinyin: tā de xīn著 jiàng yū chūn jì wèn shì.
english: His new book will be appearing in the spring.

hanzi: 礁石外深色水域分界线
pinyin: jiāo shí wài shēn shǎi shuǐ yù fèn jiè xiàn
english: A line of darker water beyond the reef.

hanzi: 肠绞痛肠内痉挛性剧痛
pinyin: cháng jiǎo tòng cháng nèi jìng luán xìng jù tòng
english: Sharp, spasmodic pains in the bowels.

hanzi: 有人在灌木丛里窥视动静.
pinyin: yǒu rén zài guàn mù cóng lǐ kuī shì dòng jìng.
english: Somebody'slurking in the bushes.

hanzi: 她觉得（自己）有点委屈.
pinyin: tā jué de（ zì jǐ） yǒu diǎn wěi qū.
english: She feels (she's been) rather hard done by.

hanzi: 这条河流蜿蜒穿过山谷。
pinyin: zhè tiáo hé liú wān yán chuān guò shān gǔ。
english: The river twines through the valley.

hanzi: 这张纸湿的地方起皱褶了.
pinyin: zhè zhāng zhǐ shī de dì fang qǐ zhòu zhě le.
english: The paper has wrinkled where it got wet.

hanzi: 你能换开五英镑的票子吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng huàn kāi wǔ yīng bàng de piào zi ma？
english: Can you change a five-pound note?

hanzi: 青蛙和蝾螈都是两栖动物.
pinyin: qīng wā huò róng yuán dōu shì liǎng qī dòng wù.
english: Frogs and newts are amphibians.

hanzi: 蝌蚪是青蛙的幼年形态。
pinyin: kē dǒu shì qīng wā de yòu nián xíng tài。
english: Tadpoles are the infancy form of frogs.

hanzi: 你瞧那戴怪帽子的家伙!
pinyin: nǐ qiáo nà dài guài mào zi de jiā huo!
english: Get a load of that old bloke with the funny hat!

hanzi: 国家元首被军队废黜了。
pinyin: guó jiā yuán shǒu bèi jūn duì fèi chù le。
english: The head of state was deposed by the army.

hanzi: 他对自己的愚蠢行为而懊恼。
pinyin: tā duì zì jǐ de yú chǔn xíng wéi ér ào nǎo。
english: He is repentant of his folly.

hanzi: 你们公司的机构是怎样的?
pinyin: nǐ men gōng sī de jī gòu shì zěn yàng de?
english: What's the set-up (like) in your company?

hanzi: 我宁可挨饿也不吃那种东西!
pinyin: wǒ nìng kě ái è yě bù jí nà zhòng dōng xi!
english: I'd rather go hungry than eat that!

hanzi: 公爵用一根羽毛笔写信。
pinyin: gōng jué yòng yī gēn yǔ máo bǐ xiě xìn。
english: The duke wrote a letter with a quill pen.

hanzi: 他是个感情细腻的男子。
pinyin: tā shì gè gǎn qíng xì nì de nán zǐ。
english: He is a man of subtle and refined sensibility.

hanzi: 【谚】与其锈坏，不如用坏。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 yǔ qí xiù huài， bù rú yòng huài。
english: Better to wear out than rust out.

hanzi: 我们（彼此）相遇纯属偶然.
pinyin: wǒ men（ bǐ cǐ） xiāng yù chún shǔ ǒu rán.
english: We met (each other) quite by chance.

hanzi: 螺栓折了, 轮子脱了出来.
pinyin: luó shuān zhé le,  lún zi tuō le chū lai.
english: The bolt sheared (off) and the wheel came off.

hanzi: 国家元首被陆军废黜了。
pinyin: guó jiā yuán shǒu bèi lù jūn fèi chù le。
english: The head of state was deposed by the army.

hanzi: 米开朗琪罗在大理石上雕刻.
pinyin: mǐ kāi lǎng qí luó zài dà lǐ shí shàng diāo kè.
english: Michelangelo carved in marble.

hanzi: 可以中途在贝鲁特停留吗？
pinyin: kě yǐ zhōng tú zài bèi lǔ tè tíng liú ma？
english: Be it possible to stop over at beirut?

hanzi: 他们最後相互亲吻而分离.
pinyin: tā men zuì後 xiāng hù qīn wěn ér fēn lí.
english: They exchanged a final kiss before parting.

hanzi: 宫殿的门由金箔做成。
pinyin: gōng diàn de mén yóu jīn bó zuò chéng。
english: The doors of the palace were made of beaten gold.

hanzi: 她的散文过於矫揉造作.
pinyin: tā de sǎn wén guò yū jiǎo róu zào zuò.
english: Her prose is far too mannered and self-conscious.

hanzi: 你方是否已收到我方汇款？
pinyin: nǐ fāng shì fǒu yǐ shōu dào wǒ fāng huì kuǎn？
english: Have you received our remittance?

hanzi: 这些罪犯都是社会的渣滓。
pinyin: zhè xie zuì fàn dōu shì shè huì de zhā zǐ。
english: These criminals are the dregs of society.

hanzi: 【谚】涓滴之水汇成洋。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 juān dī zhī shuǐ huì chéng yáng。
english: Little drops of water make the mighty ocean.

hanzi: 这列火车是否直达伦敦？
pinyin: zhè liè huǒ chē shì fǒu zhí dá lún dūn？
english: Does this train go right through to London?

hanzi: 早餐的食谱上有燕麦粥吗?
pinyin: zǎo cān de shí pǔ shàng yǒu yàn mài zhōu ma?
english: Is/Are porridge oats on the breakfast menu?

hanzi: 她叔叔死後她继承了财产.
pinyin: tā shū shu sǐ後 tā jí chéng le cái chǎn.
english: She came into a fortune when her uncle died.

hanzi: 你能为这些要求提供证件吗?
pinyin: nǐ néng wèi zhè xie yāo qiú tí gōng zhèng jiàn ma?
english: Can you document these claims?

hanzi: 玛丽没有申请助学金的资格.
pinyin: Mǎ lì méi yǒu shēn qǐng zhù xué jīn de zī gé.
english: Mary is not eligible for an award.

hanzi: 牛奶瓶盖是用锡箔制成的。
pinyin: niú nǎi píng gě shì yòng xí bó zhì chéng de。
english: Milk bottle tops are made of tin foil.

hanzi: 我们向着陡峭山顶攀登。
pinyin: wǒ men xiàng zhuó dǒu qiào shān dǐng pān dēng。
english: We have a precipitous climb to the peak.

hanzi: 他顽固不化把我气得火冒三丈!
pinyin: tā wán gù bù huà bǎ wǒ qì de huǒ mào sān zhàng!
english: His obstinacy drives me mad!

hanzi: 我们是听任命运摆布的傀儡吗？
pinyin: wǒ men shì tìng rèn mìng yùn bǎi bù de kuǐ lěi ma？
english: Are we the puppets of fate?

hanzi: 大雨使场地变得坑坑洼洼。
pinyin: dà yǔ shǐ chǎng dì biàn de kēng kēng wā wā。
english: The ground was pitted by the heavy rain.

hanzi: 今天下午你读的什么书?
pinyin: jīn tiān xià wǔ nǐ dú de shén me shū?
english: What is the book you are poring over this afternoon?

hanzi: 监狱的大门哐当一声关上了。
pinyin: jiān yù de dà mén哐 dàng yī shēng guān shàng le。
english: The prison gate clanged shut.

hanzi: 这孩子已经喝了三盘粥了!
pinyin: zhè hái zi yǐ jīng hè le sān pán zhōu le!
english: The child has eaten three platefuls of porridge!

hanzi: 她病後显得苍白、 清瘦.
pinyin: tā bìng後 xiǎn de cāng bái、  qīng shòu.
english: Her illness had left her looking pale and thin.

hanzi: 你的驾驶执照何时到期？
pinyin: nǐ de jià shǐ zhí zhào hé shí dào qī？
english: When is the expiration of your driving license?

hanzi: 他被很多债务弄得焦灼不安。
pinyin: tā bèi hěn duō zhài wù nòng de jiāo zhuó bù ān。
english: He was embarrassed by many debts.

hanzi: 杜鹃在别的鸟巢中产卵.
pinyin: dù juān zài bié de niǎo cháo zhōng chǎn luǎn.
english: The cuckoo lays its eggs in other birds' nests.

hanzi: 你的大便里有血或粘液吗？
pinyin: nǐ de dà biàn lǐ yǒu xuè huò zhān yè ma？
english: Be there any blood or mucus in your stool?

hanzi: 他拚命奔跑去追赶公共汽车.
pinyin: tā pīn mìng bēn pǎo qù zhuī gǎn gōng gòng qì chē.
english: He ran like fury to catch the bus.

hanzi: 安得猛士兮守四方？
pinyin: ān de měng shì xī shǒu sì fāng？
english: Where will I find brave men to guard the four corners of my land?

hanzi: 我们正处於一种全新的局面.
pinyin: wǒ men zhèng chù yū yī zhòng quán xīn de jú miàn.
english: We're into a whole new ball game.

hanzi: 你打算挑选谁参加这个队?
pinyin: nǐ dǎ suàn tiāo xuǎn shéi cān jiā zhè gè duì?
english: Who are you going to pick for the team?

hanzi: 我的套头毛衣遇热水後收缩了.
pinyin: wǒ de tào tou máo yī yù rè shuǐ後 shōu suō le.
english: The hot water shrank my pullover.

hanzi: 他们用美味佳肴款待客人.
pinyin: tā men yòng měi wèi jiā yáo kuǎn dài kè ren.
english: They feasted their guests with delicacies.

hanzi: 火焰（从喷嘴中）喷出来了.
pinyin: huǒ yán（ zòng pèn zuǐ zhòng） pèn chū lái le.
english: Flames jetted out (of the nozzles).

hanzi: 你脸色很难看, 是不舒服了吗?
pinyin: nǐ liǎn sè hěn nán kàn,  shì bù shū fu le ma?
english: You look ghastly; are you all right?

hanzi: 那网球裁判戴著遮光帽檐。
pinyin: nà wǎng qiú cái pàn dài著 zhē guāng mào yán。
english: The tennis umpire wore an eye-shade.

hanzi: 胭脂红一种强烈到鲜明的红色
pinyin: yān zhī hóng yī zhòng qiáng liè dào xiān míng de hóng sè
english: A strong to vivid red.

hanzi: 这剧的滑稽场面太夸张了.
pinyin: zhè jù de huá ji chǎng miàn tài kuā zhāng le.
english: The comic scenes in the play were overdone.

hanzi: 【谚】篱笆有眼，墙壁长耳。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 lí bā yǒu yǎn， qiáng bì zhǎng ěr。
english: Hedges have eyes and walls have ears.

hanzi: 这样严竣的法令不易实施.
pinyin: zhè yàng yán jùn de fǎ lìng bú yì shí shī.
english: Such a strict law is not easily enforceable.

hanzi: 假装昏迷只不过是个诡计.
pinyin: jiǎ zhuāng hūn mí zhǐ bù guò shì gè guǐ jì.
english: Pretending to faint was merely (an) artifice.

hanzi: 我们的食物储备已消耗殆尽.
pinyin: wǒ men de shí wù chǔ bèi yǐ xiāo hào dài jìn.
english: Our stock of food is greatly depleted.

hanzi: 王子自始至终忠贞不渝。
pinyin: wáng zǐ zì shǐ zhì zhōng zhōng zhēn bù yú。
english: The prince remained loyal throughout.

hanzi: 这热辣辣的太阳快把我烤焦了！
pinyin: zhè rè là là de tài yáng kuài bǎ wǒ kǎo jiāo le！
english: I am broiling in this hot sun!

hanzi: 这座像是（用石头）雕刻的.
pinyin: zhè zuò xiàng shì（ yòng shí tou） diāo kè de.
english: The statue was carved (out of stone).

hanzi: 今晚的女主持之一是玛丽。
pinyin: jīn wǎn de nu:3 zhǔ chí zhī yī shì Mǎ lì。
english: One of hostesses on tonight's show is Mary.

hanzi: 女王在仪式过後脱去了王袍.
pinyin: nu:3 wáng zài yí shì guò後 tuō qù le wáng páo.
english: The Queen disrobed after the ceremony.

hanzi: 这本参考书对我有用处吗？
pinyin: zhè běn cān kǎo shū duì wǒ yǒu yòng chù ma？
english: Is this reference book of any use to me?

hanzi: 羚羊跑起来有时速度惊人.
pinyin: líng yáng pǎo qǐ lai yǒu shí sù dù jīng rén.
english: Gazelles can movewith astonishing velocity.

hanzi: 至於你, 你应该感到惭愧.
pinyin: zhì yū nǐ,  nǐ yīng gāi gǎn dào cán kuì.
english: As for you, you ought to be ashamed of yourself.

hanzi: 炸弹把那座建筑夷为平地。
pinyin: zhà dàn bǎ nà zuò jiàn zhù yí wèi píng dì。
english: The bombs razed the building to the ground.

hanzi: 农民们在地里收割（作物）.
pinyin: nóng mín men zài de lǐ shōu gē（ zuò wù）.
english: The farmers are out harvesting (the corn).

hanzi: 头大是不是表示智慧高？
pinyin: tou dà shì bú shì biǎo shì zhì huì gāo？
english: Is a large head indicative of high intelligence?

hanzi: 模型飞机失控坠落下来。
pinyin: mó xíng fēi jī shī kòng zhuì luò xia lai。
english: The model plane got out of control and crashed.

hanzi: 他拚命奔跑去追赶公共汽车.
pinyin: tā pīn mìng bēn pǎo qù zhuī gǎn gōng gòng qì chē.
english: He ran like fury to catch the bus.

hanzi: 他们盖著毯子（在一起）搂著.
pinyin: tā men gě著 tǎn zi（ zài yī qǐ） lǒu著.
english: They cuddled up (together) under the blanket.

hanzi: 你用的胶卷感光度是多少?
pinyin: nǐ yòng de jiāo juān gǎn guāng dù shì duō shao?
english: What's the speed of the film you're using?

hanzi: 讲课时不要岔开（主题）.
pinyin: jiǎng kè shí bù yào chà kāi（ zhǔ tí）.
english: Don't digress (from the subject) when lecturing.

hanzi: 军人应视荣誉重於生命吗?
pinyin: jūn rén yìng shì róng yù zhòng yū shēng mìng ma?
english: Should a soldier value honour above life?

hanzi: 他是流浪汉，惯於风餐雨卧。
pinyin: tā shì liú làng hàn， guàn yū fēng cān yǔ wò。
english: He's a tramp and used to living rough.

hanzi: 这盘欧防风做的菜味道很怪。
pinyin: zhè pán ōu fáng fēng zuò de cài wèi dao hěn guài。
english: This dish of parsnip tastes strange.

hanzi: 拱形的具有弓的形式的；弯曲的
pinyin: gǒng xíng de jù yǒu gōng de xíng shì de； wān qǔ de
english: Having the form of a bow; curved.

hanzi: 我浏览了一遍书架上的书。
pinyin: wǒ liú lǎn le yī biàn shū jià shàng de shū。
english: I had a browse through the books on the shelf.

hanzi: 一片欢呼声欢迎女王莅临.
pinyin: yī piàn huān hū shēng huān yíng nu:3 wáng lì lín.
english: Cheers greeted the arrival of the Queen.

hanzi: 那孩子（怀里）抱著玩具娃娃.
pinyin: nà hái zi（ huái lǐ） bào著 wán jù wá wa.
english: The child cuddled her doll (to her chest).

hanzi: 比利时被称作欧洲战场。
pinyin: bǐ lì shí bèi chèng zuò ōu zhōu zhàn chǎng。
english: Belgium has been called the cockpit of Europe.

hanzi: 村民们撑起摇摇欲坠的茅棚。
pinyin: cūn mín men chēng qǐ yáo yáo yù zhuì de máo péng。
english: The villagers shored up sagging huts.

hanzi: 水（从贮水池）缓缓流出.
pinyin: shuǐ（ zòng zhù shuǐ chí） huǎn huǎn liú chū.
english: The water slowly emptied (from the cistern).

hanzi: 他得悉噩耗: 父亲突然去世.
pinyin: tā de xī è hào:  fù qīn tū rán qù shì.
english: He's had some bad news: his father has died suddenly.

hanzi: 我希望用些虾子酱蘸着吃。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng yòng xiē xiā zi jiàng zhàn zhuó jí。
english: I'd like some shrimp-roe soy sauce with it.

hanzi: 你能不能别再说那种闲话?
pinyin: nǐ néng bù néng biè zài shuō nà zhòng xián huà?
english: Can you put an end to that kind of gossip?

hanzi: 我们买了一些书籍、衣服等等。
pinyin: wǒ men mǎi le yī xiē shū jí、 yī fu děng děng。
english: We bought some books, clothes, etc.

hanzi: 孩子们在花园里嬉戏奔跑。
pinyin: hái zi men zài huā yuán lǐ xī xì bēn pǎo。
english: The children were scampering around the garden.

hanzi: （你）假期得病真倒霉.
pinyin: （ nǐ） jià qī dé bìng zhēn dǎo méi.
english: It was very hard luck (on you) to get ill on your holiday.

hanzi: 靠毅力这跛童学会了游泳。
pinyin: kào yì lì zhè bǒ tóng xué huì le yóu yǒng。
english: By perseverance the lame boy learned to swim.

hanzi: 我闻到煤气味了--烤箱开著呢吧?
pinyin: wǒ wén dào méi qì wèi le-- kǎo xiāng kāi著 ne ba?
english: I can smell gas -- is the oven on?

hanzi: 你看得见牌子上写的是什麽吗?
pinyin: nǐ kàn de xiàn pái zi shàng xiě de shì shí mó ma?
english: Can you make out what that sign says?

hanzi: 许多政客都是狡猾的诡辩家.
pinyin: xǔ duō zhèng kè dōu shì jiǎo huá de guǐ biàn jiā.
english: Many politicians are cunning sophists.

hanzi: 人们有权通过这些田地吗？
pinyin: rén men yǒu quán tōng guò zhè xie tián dì ma？
english: Is there a right of way across these fields?

hanzi: 把鸟关在笼子里残忍不残忍?
pinyin: bǎ niǎo guān zài lóng zi lǐ cán rěn bù cán rěn?
english: Is it cruel to confine a bird in a cage?

hanzi: 这胶卷是彩色的还是黑白的?
pinyin: zhè jiāo juān shì cǎi sè de hái shì hēi bái de?
english: Is the film in colour or black and white?

hanzi: 我对计算机硬件一窍不通。
pinyin: wǒ duì jì suàn jī yìng jiàn yī qiào bù tōng。
english: I know nothing about computer hardware.

hanzi: 他说日落是多麽的辉煌灿烂。
pinyin: tā shuō rì luò shì duō mó de huī huáng càn làn。
english: He said how glorious the sunset was.

hanzi: 他们是战後富裕生活的产物.
pinyin: tā men shì zhàn後 fù yù shēng huó de chǎn wù.
english: They are the products of post-war affluence.

hanzi: 是什麽原因使得他如此 大方呢?
pinyin: shì shí mó yuán yīn shǐ de tā rú cǐ  dà fāng ne?
english: What prompted him to be so generous?

hanzi: 他们是战後富裕生活的产物.
pinyin: tā men shì zhàn後 fù yù shēng huó de chǎn wù.
english: They are the products of post-war affluence.

hanzi: 他们燃起篝火防止野兽接近.
pinyin: tā men rán qǐ gōu huǒ fáng zhǐ yě shòu jiē jìn.
english: They lit a fire to keep wild animals off.

hanzi: 斯珀尔斯队会降为丙级队吗?
pinyin: sī pò ěr sī duì kuài xiáng wèi bǐng jí duì ma?
english: Will Spurs be relegated to the third division?

hanzi: 哟，大人，你想找我茬，是吗？
pinyin: yo， dà ren， nǐ xiǎng zhǎo wǒ chá， shì ma？
english: Oh, Lord, are you going to get on my back?

hanzi: 你知道是谁发明的指南针吗？
pinyin: nǐ zhī dào shì shéi fā míng de zhǐ nán zhēn ma？
english: Do you know who invents the compass?

hanzi: 月光（通过窗户）照了进来.
pinyin: yuè guāng（ tōng guò chuāng hu） zhào le jìn lái.
english: The moon is shining (through the window).

hanzi: 湍急的水道这样一股水流的渠道
pinyin: tuān jí de shuǐ dào zhè yàng yī gǔ shuǐ liú de qú dào
english: The channel of such a current.

hanzi: 她脸上显出严厉、 木然的神情.
pinyin: tā liǎn shàng xiǎn chū yán lì、  mù rán de shén qíng.
english: Her face wore a grim, set look.

hanzi: 大雨过後有几片耕地被淹.
pinyin: dà yǔ guò後 yǒu jǐ piàn gēng dì bèi yān.
english: Several fields are under water after the heavy rain.

hanzi: 一颗子弹嗖的一声从我耳边飞过。
pinyin: yī kē zǐ dàn嗖 de yī shēng zòng wǒ ěr biān fēi guò。
english: A bullet whizzed past my ear.

hanzi: 她的体温高於[低於]正常标准.
pinyin: tā de tǐ wēn gāo yū[ dī yū] zhèng cháng biāo zhǔn.
english: Her temperature is above/below normal.

hanzi: 轻信的有信赖倾向的；信任的
pinyin: qīng xìn de yǒu xìn lài qīng xiàng de； xìn rèn de
english: Having a tendency to confide; trusting.

hanzi: 鱼离开水後活得时间很短.
pinyin: yú lí kāi shuǐ後 huó de shí jiān hěn duǎn.
english: Fish can survive for only a short time out of water.

hanzi: 在…之内在或进入里面；在内部
pinyin: zài… zhī nèi zài huò jìn rù lǐ miàn； zài nèi bù
english: In or into the inner part; inside.

hanzi: 他在品德[名誉]上毫无瑕疵.
pinyin: tā zài pǐn dé[ míng yù] shàng háo wú xiá cī.
english: His character/reputation is without (a) blemish.

pinyin: ｀ xiǎo biàn＇ shì｀ pǎi suī＇ de wěi wǎn yǔ.
english: `Pass water' is a euphemism for `urinate'.

pinyin: sà mǔ tìng le zhè xiāo xi hòu jǐn zhòu méi tóu。
english: Sam bent his brows upon hearing the news.

hanzi: 黑檀树是一种黑色而坚硬的树木。
pinyin: hēi tán shù shì yī zhòng hēi sè ér jiān yìng de shù mù。
english: Ebony is a hard black wood.

hanzi: 你认为砂糖可以替代蜂蜜吗？
pinyin: nǐ rèn wéi shā táng kě yǐ tì dài fēng mì ma？
english: Can you think sugar will substitute for honey?

hanzi: 衰弱的缺乏力气或活力的；虚弱的
pinyin: shuāi ruò de quē fá lì qi huò huó lì de； xū ruò de
english: Lacking strength or vigor; weak.

hanzi: 她的长发披在後背直垂到腰间.
pinyin: tā de zhǎng fà pī zài後 bèi zhí chuí dào yāo jiàn.
english: Her hair hung down her back to her waist.

hanzi: 有些印地安人仍然住在帐篷里。
pinyin: yǒu xiē yìn de ān rén réng rán zhù zài zhàng peng lǐ。
english: Some Indians still live in wigwams.

hanzi: 我对他知识的渊博感到惊奇。
pinyin: wǒ duì tā zhī shi de yuān bó gǎn dào jīng qí。
english: I was amazed at the extent of his knowledge.

pinyin: “ tā jiù xiàng yī bǎ dà shān zi”， tā shuō。
english: He said."He's exactly like a huge fan."

hanzi: 这些警察戴着头盔保护自己。
pinyin: zhè xie jǐng chá dài zhuó tou kuī bǎo hù zì jǐ。
english: These policemen wear helmets to protect them.

pinyin: guó jì xiàng qí de gè zhǒng zǒu fǎ nǐ dū huì ma?
english: Do you know all the possible moves in chess?

hanzi: 次要的第二位的事；较次要的问题
pinyin: cì yào de dì èr wèi de shì； jiào cì yào de wèn tí
english: A secondary matter; a side issue.

hanzi: 这样无聊的读物你怎能看得下去!
pinyin: zhè yàng wú liáo de dú wù nǐ zěn néng kàn de xià qu!
english: How can you bear to read such pap!

hanzi: 陷阱捕捉或诱捕的方式；圈套
pinyin: xiàn jǐng bǔ zhuō huò yòu bǔ de fāng shì； juān tào
english: A means of catching or ensnaring; a trap.

pinyin: jīng yú bèi yú chǎ shè zhòng後 qián rù shuǐ zhòng.
english: The whale dived as the harpoon struck it.

pinyin: 噍， nà tíng zi gāo gāo dì lì zài kōng zhōng ne。
english: Look, the pavilion is high in the sky.

hanzi: 他当初刚到伦敦时很孤单.
pinyin: tā dāng chū gāng dào lún dūn shí hěn gū dān.
english: He was very lonely at first when he moved to London.

pinyin: wǒ huán le dǐ yá jiè kuǎn,  rú shì zhòng fù!
english: Paying my mortgage was an enormous weight off my mind!

pinyin: wǒ men néng pǐ jiàng lì rùn huì jì dào guó wài？
english: Can we remit our profit to foreign countries?

hanzi: 你能告诉我你一个月赚多少吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng gào su wǒ nǐ yī gè yuè zuàn duō shao ma？
english: Can you tell me how much you earn a month?

pinyin: qì qiú kōng qì wài yì ér huǎn huǎn xià jiàng.
english: The balloon descended gradually as the air came out.

pinyin: qīng chè de shuǐ zhòng yìng chū wèi lán de tiān kōng。
english: The clear water mirrored the blue sky.

pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī de zhàng mù shōu zhī shì fǒu píng héng？
english: Do the firm's accounts balance?

pinyin: jí zào de cāng cù ér bù jiā sī suǒ de； chōng dòng de
english: Hasty and unthinking; impetuous.

pinyin: tā xué sǎ qiè ěr fū ren de yàng zi dào tǐng xiàng li。
english: She does Mrs. Thatcher rather well.

hanzi: 桦树有光滑的皮和细长的枝。
pinyin: huà shù yǒu guāng hua de pí huò xì cháng de zhī。
english: The birch has smooth bark and slender branches.

pinyin: nèi gè zéi tōu tōu（ zòng後 mén） liū chū qù le.
english: The thief slipped out (by the back door).

hanzi: 你知道不列颠群岛的位置吗？
pinyin: nǐ zhī dào bù liè diān qún dǎo de wèi zhi ma？
english: Do you know the locations of the British Isles?

hanzi: 鲸鱼和马一样都是哺乳动物。
pinyin: jīng yú huò mǎ yí yàng dōu shì bǔ rǔ dòng wù。
english: A whale is no less a mammal than a horse is.

pinyin: mìng yùn de niǔ zhuǎn； diē dàng qǐ fú de gù shì
english: A twist of fate; a story with a quirky twist.

pinyin: wǒ men de lu:3 chéng（後 lái） yī lù píng ān.
english: Our journey ended without (further) mishap.

pinyin: wǒ bǎ duō yú de fáng jiān chū zū（ jǐ fáng kè）.
english: I let (out) my spare rooms (to lodgers).

pinyin: wǒ zhěng tiān máng gè bù tíng， pí yū bēn mìng。
english: I've been on the run all day and I'm exhausted.

pinyin: tā shì fǒu bǎ zhè tái tuō lā jī qī chéng le hóng sè？
english: Do he paint this tractor red?

hanzi: 夏威夷群岛是美国的属地吗？
pinyin: xià wēi yí qún dǎo shì Měi guó de shǔ dì ma？
english: Are the Hawaiian Islands a dependence of the USA?

hanzi: 你在咖喱食品中放了多少辣椒?
pinyin: nǐ zài gā lí shí pǐn zhòng fàng le duō shao là jiāo?
english: How much chilli did you put in the curry?

pinyin: tài wù shì hé fà yuán yū kē cí wò ěr dé qiū líng.
english: The Thames rises in the Cotswold Hills.

hanzi: 桦树有光滑的皮和细长的枝。
pinyin: huà shù yǒu guāng hua de pí huò xì cháng de zhī。
english: The birch has smooth bark and slender branches.

pinyin: běn zhì shì wù de běn zhì、 gōng néng huò xìng zhì
english: The essential function or nature of a thing.

pinyin: tā bù dàn bù chéng rèn， fǎn ér zhī wú qí cí。
english: Instead of admit his guilt, he prevaricate.

pinyin: nǐ men gōng sī yǒu gù dìng de bàn gōng shí jiān ma?
english: Are there set hours of work in your company?

pinyin: nà shāng rén duì yī xiē bǎo shí chuí xián yù dī.
english: The dealer was slavering over some precious stones.

pinyin: bù gào pái shàng xiě著｀ wù tà cǎo dì＇.
english: The notice said Keep off (ie Do not walk on) the grass'.

hanzi: 他是个笨手笨脚的[古里古怪的]家伙.
pinyin: tā shì gè bèn shǒu bèn jué de[ gǔ lǐ gǔ guài de] jiā huo.
english: He's an awkward/queer old cuss.

hanzi: 克林伊斯威特的特徵是他眯眯眼。
pinyin: kè lín yī sī wēi tè de tè zhǐ shì tā mǐ mǐ yǎn。
english: Clint Eastwood's trademark is his squint.

hanzi: 这部小说以战前的伦敦为背景。
pinyin: zhè bù xiǎo shuō yǐ zhàn qián de lún dūn wèi bèi jǐng。
english: The novel is set in pre-war London.

hanzi: 公共汽车艰难地爬上陡峭的山岗.
pinyin: gōng gòng qì chē jiān nán de pá shàng dǒu qiào de shān gǎng.
english: The bus toiled up the steep hill.

hanzi: 餐车已挂（在末节车厢）上.
pinyin: cān chē yǐ guà（ zài mò jié chē xiāng） shàng.
english: The dining-car was coupled on (to the last coach).

pinyin: tā nán yǐ shuō míng tā wèi shí mó bù jiàn le.
english: He was hard put (to it) to explain her disappearance.
