pinyin: lún bó lǎng de huì huà shì tiān cái de xiàng zhēng.
english: Rembrandt's paintings show the cachet of genius.

hanzi: 她用连珠炮似的谩骂来攻击他。
pinyin: tā yòng lián zhū pào sì de màn mà lái gōng jī tā。
english: She attacked him with a torrent of abuse.

hanzi: 石头上长着一些柔软的苔藓。
pinyin: shí tou shàng zhǎng zhuó yī xiē róu ruǎn de tái xiǎn。
english: There grows some spongy moss on the stone.

hanzi: 这块布哪一面是正面?
pinyin: zhè kuài bù něi yī miàn shì zhèng miàn?
english: Which is the right side of the cloth (ie the one intended to be seen)?

hanzi: 我怎样才能把墙上的污垢去掉呢?
pinyin: wǒ zěn yàng cái néng bǎ qiáng shàng de wū gòu qù diào ne?
english: How can I get the dirt off the walls?

hanzi: 幕后的，秘密的隐瞒公众的；私下的
pinyin: mù hòu de， mì mì de yǐn mán gōng zhòng de； sī xià de
english: Concealed from the public; private.

hanzi: 过分关注某事的；心不在焉的
pinyin: guò fèn guān zhù mǒu shì de； xīn bù zài yān de
english: Excessively concerned with something; distracted.

hanzi: 蝙蝠在夜间飞行，以昆虫为食。
pinyin: biān fú zài yè jiān fēi xíng， yǐ kūn chóng wèi sì。
english: Bats fly at night and feed on insects.

hanzi: 他从利兹远道而来寻找工作.
pinyin: tā zòng lì zī yuǎn dào ér lái xún zhǎo gōng zuò.
english: He has come all the way from Leeds to look for a job.

hanzi: 他有点迟钝, 但毕竟还能理解.
pinyin: tā yǒu diǎn chí dùn,  dàn bì jìng huán néng lǐ jiě.
english: He's a bit slow but in the end he latches on.

hanzi: 预防胜于治疗（治病不如防病）。
pinyin: yù fáng shèng yú zhì liáo（ zhì bìng bù rú fáng bìng）。
english: Prevention is better than cure.

hanzi: 那个理论的精髓是为人民服务。
pinyin: nèi gè lǐ lùn de jīng suǐ shì wèi rén mín fú wù。
english: The pith of that theory is serving for people.

hanzi: 耳後的一击使他趴倒在地板上。
pinyin: ěr後 de yī jī shǐ tā pā dào zài dì bǎn shàng。
english: A blow behind the ear stretched him on the floor.

hanzi: 金属铸模金属锭在其中被铸的模子
pinyin: jīn shǔ zhù mó jīn shǔ dìng zài qí zhōng bèi zhù de mó zi
english: A mold in which such metal is cast.

hanzi: 夏季的水塘中，芙蓉盛开。
pinyin: xià jì de shuǐ táng zhòng， fú róng shèng kāi。
english: Lotus flowers are in full bloom in the pond in summer.

hanzi: 那商人对一些宝石垂涎欲滴.
pinyin: nà shāng rén duì yī xiē bǎo shí chuí xián yù dī.
english: The dealer was slavering over some precious stones.

hanzi: 他是个笨手笨脚的[古里古怪的]家伙.
pinyin: tā shì gè bèn shǒu bèn jué de[ gǔ lǐ gǔ guài de] jiā huo.
english: He's an awkward/queer old cuss.

hanzi: 他发财之後把老朋友都抛弃了.
pinyin: tā fā cái zhī後 bǎ lǎo péng you dōu pāo qì le.
english: When he became rich he threw over all his old friends.

hanzi: 到时候树就落叶、 花就掉瓣.
pinyin: dào shí hòu shù jiù luò yè、  huā jiù diào bàn.
english: Trees shed their leaves and flowers shed their petals.

hanzi: 你能瞪着看多长时间不眨眼?
pinyin: nǐ néng dèng zhuó kàn duō zhǎng shí jiān bù zhǎ yǎn?
english: How long can you stare without blinking your eyes?

hanzi: 我们的汽车在山顶陡坡处抛锚了.
pinyin: wǒ men de qì chē zài shān dǐng dǒu pō chù pāo máo le.
english: Our car stalled on the brow of a steep hill.

hanzi: 该商行於八月份公布会计帐目.
pinyin: gāi shāng xìng yū bā yuè fèn gōng bù kuài jì zhàng mù.
english: The firm publishes its accounts in August.

hanzi: 刘厂长主持会议，宣布开会。
pinyin: liú chǎng zhǎng zhǔ chí huì yì， xuān bù kāi huì。
english: Director Liu, in the chair, opened the meeting.

hanzi: 我总算把你看透了，你这个骗子！
pinyin: wǒ zǒng suàn bǎ nǐ kàn tòu le， nǐ zhè gè piàn zi！
english: I have found you out at last, you cheat!

hanzi: 一切优秀战略的精髓是简单。
pinyin: yī qiè yōu xiù zhàn lu:è de jīng suǐ shì jiǎn dān。
english: The essence of all good strategy is simplicity.

hanzi: 现在分娩时常用硬膜外注射.
pinyin: xiàn zài fēn miǎn shí cháng yòng yìng mó wài zhù shè.
english: Epidurals are now often used during childbirth.

hanzi: 很多种类的松鼠都很容易驯养。
pinyin: hěn duō zhǒng lèi de sōng shǔ dōu hěn róng yì xún yǎng。
english: Many kinds of squirrels are easy to tame.

hanzi: 他们在黑黝黝的洪水中随波逐流。
pinyin: tā men zài hēi yǒu yǒu de hóng shuǐ zhòng suí bō zhú liú。
english: Down the sable flood they glided.

hanzi: 她很厌烦那些没完没了的嘈杂声。
pinyin: tā hěn yàn fán nà xiē mò wán mò le de cáo zá shēng。
english: She feels wearisome by the constant noise.

hanzi: ＜大学英语词汇综合测试题＞。
pinyin: ＜ dà xué Yīng yǔ cí huì zōng hé cè shì tí＞。
english: "Practice Tests For College English Vocabulary"

hanzi: 路灯在黄昏时开, 拂晓时关.
pinyin: lù dēng zài huáng hūn shí kāi,  fú xiǎo shí guān.
english: The street lights come on at dusk and go off at dawn.

hanzi: 她的皮肤仍然十分柔软、 光滑.
pinyin: tā de pí fū réng rán shí fēn róu ruǎn、  guāng hua.
english: Her skin is still as smooth as a baby's bottom.

hanzi: 用手够到你的脚趾, 膝盖别弯曲.
pinyin: yòng shǒu gòu dào nǐ de jiǎo zhǐ,  xī gài biè wān qǔ.
english: Touch your toes without bending your knees.

hanzi: 古罗马帝国征服了欧洲大部分.
pinyin: gǔ Luó mǎ dì guó zhēng fú le ōu zhōu dà bù fen.
english: Ancient Rome subjected most of Europe (to its rule).

hanzi: 他们为海军徵募了四百名新兵.
pinyin: tā men wèi hǎi jūn zhǐ mù le sì bǎi míng xīn bīng.
english: They enlisted four hundred recruits for the navy.

hanzi: 致命的；致死的易引起死亡的；致命的
pinyin: zhì mìng de； zhì sǐ de yì yǐn qǐ sǐ wáng de； zhì mìng de
english: Tending to cause death; deadly.

hanzi: 圣诞节是为了纪念耶酥的诞生。
pinyin: Shèng dàn jié shì wèi le jì niàn yē sū de dàn shēng。
english: Christmas commemorates the birth of Christ.

hanzi: 这种借口（让我）实在无法相信.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng jiè kǒu（ ràng wǒ） shí zài wú fǎ xiāng xìn.
english: That excuse simply won't wash (with me).

hanzi: 抑制物限制、阻止或压制的东西
pinyin: yì zhì wù xiàn zhì、 zǔ zhǐ huò yā zhì de dōng xi
english: Something that restrains, blocks, or suppresses.

hanzi: 河岸决堤後, 田地遭洪水淹没.
pinyin: hé àn jué dī後,  tián dì zāo hóng shuǐ yān mò.
english: When the river burst its banks the fields were inundated.

hanzi: 你知道她为什么对他如此冷淡吗？
pinyin: nǐ zhī dào tā wèi shén me duì tā rú cǐ lěng dàn ma？
english: Do you know why she is so strange to him?

hanzi: 那攀登者不得不紧扒着悬崖峭壁。
pinyin: nà pān dēng zhě bù dé bù jǐn pá zhuó xuán yá qiào bì。
english: The climber had to cling onto the cliff.

hanzi: 麝香是一种有强烈气味的物质。
pinyin: shè xiāng shì yī zhòng yǒu qiáng liè qì wèi de wù zhì。
english: Musk is a kind of strong-smelling substance.

hanzi: 漂浮物漂浮的物品或材料；漂浮物
pinyin: piāo fú wù piāo fú de wù pǐn huò cái liào； piāo fú wù
english: Floating objects or material; flotsam.

hanzi: 一辆直达的公共汽车；一张直通票
pinyin: yī liàng zhí dá de gōng gòng qì chē； yī zhāng zhí tōng piào
english: A through bus; a through ticket.

hanzi: 该装置将於年底投入生产.
pinyin: gāi zhuāng zhì jiàng yū nián dǐ tóu rù shēng chǎn.
english: The device will be in production by the end of the year.

hanzi: 空袭几乎把这座城镇夷为平地。
pinyin: kōng xí jī hū bǎ zhè zuò chéng zhèn yí wèi píng dì。
english: The bombing raid practically leveled the town.

hanzi: 人们齐声欢呼: ｀国王万岁!＇
pinyin: rén men qí shēng huān hū: ｀ guó wáng wàn suì!＇
english: The whole crowd took up the cry: `Long live the King!'

hanzi: 健全的身体比金冕更有价值。
pinyin: jiàn quán de shēn tǐ bì jīn miǎn gèng yǒu jià zhí。
english: A good healthy body is worth more a crown in gold.

hanzi: 脑猝变智力的突然的、剧烈的病变
pinyin: nǎo cù biàn zhì lì de tū rán de、 jù liè de bìng biàn
english: A sudden, violent disturbance of the mind.

hanzi: 桶的摇晃使一些牛奶溢了出来。
pinyin: tǒng de yáo huàng shǐ yī xiē niú nǎi yì le chū lai。
english: The sway of the pail cause some milk to spill out.

hanzi: 懦夫一生要经过许多次死的痛苦。
pinyin: nuò fū yī shēng yào jīng guò xǔ duō cì sǐ de tòng kǔ。
english: Cowards die many times before their death.

hanzi: 不要把奥地利跟澳大利亚弄混淆了.
pinyin: bù yào bǎ ào de lì gēn ào dà lì yà nòng hùn xiáo le.
english: Don't confuse Austria and/with Australia.

hanzi: 许多花的花瓣在阳光中绽放。
pinyin: xǔ duō huā de huā bàn zài yáng guāng zhòng zhàn fàng。
english: The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine.

hanzi: 给主教写信应该怎样称呼?
pinyin: jǐ zhǔ jiào xiě xìn yīng gāi zěn yàng chēng hu?
english: What form of address should one use when writing to a bishop?

hanzi: 别支支吾吾，给我一个明确的答复。
pinyin: biè zhī zhī wú wú， jǐ wǒ yī gè míng què de dá fù。
english: Don't shuffle, give me a clear answer.

hanzi: 他们不得不赎回被绑架的外交官。
pinyin: tā men bù dé bù shú huí bèi bǎng jià de wài jiāo guān。
english: They had to ransom the kidnapped diplomat.

hanzi: 伊丽莎白女王时代的英国流行风气
pinyin: yī lì suō bái nu:3 wáng shí dài de Yīng guó liú xíng fēng qì
english: The genius of Elizabethan England.

hanzi: 食物吞下去之前先要细细咀嚼。
pinyin: shí wù tūn xià qu zhī qián xiān yào xì xì jǔ jué。
english: You must chew your food well before you swallow it.

hanzi: 是什麽促使你做出这等蠢事来的?
pinyin: shì shí mó cù shǐ nǐ zuò chū zhè děng chǔn shì lái de?
english: What induced you to do such a stupid thing?

hanzi: 聚会之後我们回到各自的房间.
pinyin: jù huì zhī後 wǒ men huí dào gè zi de fáng jiān.
english: After the party we all went off to our respective rooms.

hanzi: 我们从山上俯瞰下面的山谷。
pinyin: wǒ men zòng shān shàng fǔ kàn xià mian de shān gǔ。
english: We looked down from the mountain to the valley below.

hanzi: 产生这问题的根源在於缺乏信任.
pinyin: chǎn shēng zhè wèn tí de gēn yuán zài yū quē fá xìn rèn.
english: The root of the problem is lack of trust.

hanzi: 那老人的脸上布满皱纹和褶子.
pinyin: nà lǎo rén de liǎn shàng bù mǎn zhòu wén huò zhě zi.
english: The old man's face was covered in lines and wrinkles.

hanzi: 应该称呼他｀先生＇还是｀牧师＇?
pinyin: yīng gāi chēng hu tā｀ xiān sheng＇ hái shì｀ mù shī＇?
english: Should he be styled `Mr' or `Reverend'?

hanzi: 基督降世拯救我们摆脱罪恶.
pinyin: Jī dū jiàng shì zhěng jiù wǒ men bǎi tuō zuì è.
english: Jesus Christ came into the world to save us from our sins.

hanzi: 《茶馆》正在首都剧场上演。
pinyin: 《 chá guǎn》 zhèng zài shǒu dū jù chǎng shàng yǎn。
english: "The Teahouse" is playing at the Capital Theater.

hanzi: 圆盘的边缘已用机器磨平[光].
pinyin: yuán pán de biān yuán yǐ yòng jī qì mò píng[ guāng].
english: The edge of the disc had been machined flat/smooth.

hanzi: 假若便秘就应该多吃粗糙食物.
pinyin: jiǎ ruò biàn mì jiù yīng gāi duō jí cū cāo shí wù.
english: If you're constipated you should eat more roughage.

hanzi: 这个周末我们将去杭州旅行。
pinyin: zhè gè zhōu mò wǒ men jiàng qù háng zhōu lu:3 xíng。
english: We shall make an excursion to Hangzhou this weekend.

hanzi: 市长的权杖是权威的象征。
pinyin: shì zhǎng de quán zhàng shì quán wēi de xiàng zhēng。
english: The mayor has a mace which is held as a sign of authority.

hanzi: 用餐时洋溢著热情友好的气氛。
pinyin: yòng cān shí yáng yì著 rè qíng yǒu hǎo de qì fēn。
english: The atmosphere over dinner was warm and friendly.

hanzi: 我不明白电脑游戏是怎麽设计的.
pinyin: wǒ bù míng bái diàn nǎo yóu xì shì zěn mó shè jì de.
english: How people design computer games is beyond me.

hanzi: 缝纫时，她在手上戴一枚顶针。
pinyin: fèng rèn shí， tā zài shǒu shàng dài yī méi dǐng zhēn。
english: She put a thimble over the finger when sewing.

hanzi: 这轮胎太硬，要减少一点压力。
pinyin: zhè lún tāi tài yìng， yào jiǎn shǎo yī diǎn yā lì。
english: The tyre is too hard reduce the pressure a bit.

hanzi: 人类与大自然进行不懈的斗争.
pinyin: rén lèi yù dà zì rán jìn xíng bù xiè de dòu zhēng.
english: Man is engaged in a constant struggle with Nature.

hanzi: 该国正进行备战[准备打仗].
pinyin: gāi guó zhèng jìn xíng bèi zhàn[ zhǔn bèi dǎ zhàng].
english: The country is making preparations for war/to go to war.

hanzi: 那架飞机的残骸散布范围很大.
pinyin: nà jià fēi jī de cán hái sàn bù fàn wéi hěn dà.
english: Wreckage of the aircraft was scattered over a wide area.

hanzi: 一盎司糖可以供给多少卡热量？
pinyin: yī àng sī táng kě yǐ gōng gěi duō shao qiǎ rè liàng？
english: How many calories can an ounce of sugar supply?

hanzi: 他猛烈地抨击政府的政策.
pinyin: tā měng liè de pēng jī zhèng fǔ de zhèng cè.
english: He launched into a fierce polemic against the government's policies.

hanzi: 玛丽和我热切盼望晚会的举行。
pinyin: Mǎ lì huò wǒ rè qiè pàn wàng wǎn huì de jǔ xíng。
english: Mary and I are looking forward very much to the party.

hanzi: 你有没有绳子来把这些箱子捆好？
pinyin: nǐ yǒu méi yǒu shéng zi lái bǎ zhè xie xiāng zǐ kǔn hào？
english: Have you got some twine to tie this box up?

hanzi: 有个名叫弗雷德的陌生人来找我.
pinyin: yǒu gè míng jiào Fú léi dé de mò shēng rén lái zhǎo wǒ.
english: A strange man, Fred by name, came to see me.

hanzi: 你看见那边的一丛树林了吗?
pinyin: nǐ kàn jiàn nà bian de yī cóng shù lín le ma?
english: Do you see yonder clump of trees (ie that clump of trees over there)?

hanzi: 请允许我（向你）介绍我的新助手.
pinyin: qǐng yǔn xǔ wǒ（ xiàng nǐ） jiè shào wǒ de xīn zhù shǒu.
english: May I present my new assistant (to you).

hanzi: 哎哟！沙子这么烫！会烫伤脚的。
pinyin: āi yōu！ shā zi zhè me tàng！ kuài tàng shāng jué de。
english: Ouch! The sand is so hot! I can burn my feet.

hanzi: 下雨前，请将帐篷的绳索放松。
pinyin: xià yǔ qián， qǐng jiàng zhàng peng de shéng suǒ fàng sōng。
english: Please slacken the tent rope before it rains.

hanzi: 忽视银行经理来函, 後果堪虑.
pinyin: hū shì yín háng jīng lǐ lái hán, 後 guǒ kān lu:4.
english: One ignores letters from the bank manager at one's peril.

hanzi: 我们把马拴在桩上，走进了客栈。
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ mǎ shuān zài zhuāng shàng， zǒu jìn le kè zhàn。
english: I hung up my horse and walked into the inn.

hanzi: 桥牌、 扑克和惠斯特都是纸牌游戏.
pinyin: qiáo pái、  pū kè huò huì sī tè dōu shì zhǐ pái yóu xì.
english: Bridge, poker and whist are card-games.

hanzi: 那老人的脸上布满皱纹和褶子.
pinyin: nà lǎo rén de liǎn shàng bù mǎn zhòu wén huò zhě zi.
english: The old man's face was covered in lines and wrinkles.

hanzi: 警察通过无线电（互相）联络.
pinyin: jǐng chá tōng guò wú xiàn diàn（ hù xiāng） lián luò.
english: The police communicate (with each other) by radio.

hanzi: 发动攻击的谣传後来得到了证实.
pinyin: fā dòng gōng jī de yáo chuán後 lái dé dào le zhèng shí.
english: The rumours of an attack were later confirmed.

hanzi: 怪念头奇怪的、奇异的或顽固的想法
pinyin: guài niàn tou qí guài de、 qí yì de huò wán gù de xiǎng fǎ
english: An odd, whimsical, or stubborn notion.

hanzi: 五彩缤纷的旗子在屋顶上飘扬。
pinyin: wǔ cǎi bīn fēn de qí zi zài wū dǐng shàng piāo yáng。
english: Multi-colored flags were flying over the rooftop.

hanzi: 动物生态的高级形式；高等数学
pinyin: dòng wù shēng tài de gāo jí xíng shì； gāo děng shù xué
english: High forms of animal life; higher mathematics.

hanzi: 对於我们凡人来说，生活依旧。
pinyin: duì yū wǒ men fán rén lái shuō， shēng huó yī jiù。
english: Life goes on for those of us who remain here below.

hanzi: 那两个罪犯（彼此）勾结在一起.
pinyin: nà liǎng gè zuì fàn（ bǐ cǐ） gōu jié zài yī qǐ.
english: The two criminals were in cahoots (with each other).

hanzi: 这只小动物有一双淡褐色的眼睛。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ xiǎo dòng wù yǒu yī shuāng dàn hè sè de yǎn jīng。
english: This small animal has a pair of hazel eyes.

hanzi: 别靠近! 那建筑物随时可能倒塌.
pinyin: biè kào jìn!  nà jiàn zhù wù suí shí kě néng dǎo tā.
english: Keep back! The building could collapse at any moment.

hanzi: 物理学研究作用於物体上的力.
pinyin: wù lǐ xué yán jiū zuò yòng yū wù tǐ shàng de lì.
english: Physics deals with the forces acting on concrete objects.

hanzi: 她竭力把自己的想法强加於全组的人.
pinyin: tā jié lì bǎ zì jǐ de xiǎng fǎ qiáng jiā yū quán zǔ de rén.
english: She imposed her ideas on the group.

hanzi: 随后的，后来的时间上较后的；随后的
pinyin: suí hòu de， hòu lái de shí jiān shàng jiào hòu de； suí hòu de
english: Following in time; subsequent.

hanzi: 一只鸽子栖息在我们门廊的栏杆上。
pinyin: yī zhǐ gē zǐ qī xī zài wǒ men mén láng de lán gān shàng。
english: A pigeon perched on our porch railing.

hanzi: 不知道这附近有没有便利商店？
pinyin: bù zhī dào zhè fù jìn yǒu méi yǒu biàn lì shāng diàn？
english: I wonder if there is a convenience store nearby.

hanzi: 唾液是由口腔的唾液腺分泌出来的.
pinyin: tuò yè shì yóu kǒu qiāng de tuò yè xiàn fēn mì chū lai de.
english: Saliva is secreted by glands in the mouth.

hanzi: 冰、雪和蒸汽是水的不同形态。
pinyin: bīng、 xuě huò zhēng qì shì shuǐ de bù tóng xíng tài。
english: Ice, snow and steam are different forms of water.

hanzi: 松树、 雪松、 云杉都是常绿的树.
pinyin: sōng shù、  xuě sōng、  yún shān dōu shì cháng lu:4 de shù.
english: The pine, cedar and spruce are evergreens.

hanzi: 把那棵植物（在水里）浸泡几分钟.
pinyin: bǎ nà kē zhí wù（ zài shuǐ lǐ） jìn pào jǐ fēn zhōng.
english: Immerse the plant (in water) for a few minutes.

hanzi: 胡说，废话愚蠢的，鲁莽的言谈，胡说
pinyin: hú shuō， fèi huà yú chǔn de， lǔ mǎng de yán tán， hú shuō
english: Foolish, insolent talk; nonsense.

hanzi: 【谚】人若无希望，心碎肝肠断。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 rén ruò wú xī wàng， xīn suì gān cháng duàn。
english: If it were not for hope, the heart would break.

hanzi: 飞机起飞推迟了（两个小时）.
pinyin: fēi jī qǐ fēi tuī chí le（ liǎng gè xiǎo shí）.
english: There was a delay (of two hours) before the plane took off.

hanzi: 我要再婚了，可要保密呀，行吗？
pinyin: wǒ yào zài hūn le， kě yào bǎo mì ya， xìng ma？
english: I'm getting married again, but keep it dark, will you?

hanzi: 这些分数远在一般水平以上[以下].
pinyin: zhè xie fēn shù yuǎn zài yì bān shuǐ píng yǐ shàng[ yǐ xià].
english: These marks are well above/below average.

hanzi: ｀这门是这样开的.＇｀噢, 我明白了.＇
pinyin: ｀ zhè mén shì zhè yàng kāi de.＇｀ ō,  wǒ míng bai le.＇
english: `The door opens like this.' `Oh, I see.'

hanzi: 水坝在水的压力下终於决口.
pinyin: shuǐ bà zài shuǐ de yā lì xià zhōng yū jué kǒu.
english: The dam eventually yielded and collapsed under the weight of water.

hanzi: 太阳看起来在天空以弧线运行。
pinyin: tài yáng kàn qǐ lai zài tiān kōng yǐ hú xiàn yùn xíng。
english: The sun appears to move in an arc across the sky.

hanzi: 她并不像人们说的那麽富有.
pinyin: tā bìng bù xiàng rén men shuō de nà mó fù yǒu.
english: She's not as rich as people make out/as people make her out to be.

hanzi: 他把衣服拧乾後晾到绳子上.
pinyin: tā bǎ yī fu nìng qián後 liàng dào shéng zi shàng.
english: He wrung the clothes (out) before putting them on the line to dry.

hanzi: 无产者无产阶级的一员；产业工人
pinyin: wú chǎn zhě wú chǎn jiē jí de yī yuán； chǎn yè gōng rén
english: A member of the proletariat; a worker.

hanzi: 犯罪行为的根源是否始自幼时?
pinyin: fàn zuì xíng wéi de gēn yuán shì fǒu shǐ zì yòu shí?
english: Are the seeds of criminal behaviour sown early in life?

hanzi: 你们有适合我穿的现成的衣服吗？
pinyin: nǐ men yǒu shì hé wǒ chuān de xiàn chéng de yī fu ma？
english: Do you have anything ready- make that will fit me?

hanzi: 编辑删除了（文章的）最後一段.
pinyin: biān jí shān chú le（ wén zhāng de） zuì後 yī duàn.
english: The editor deleted the last paragraph (from the article).

hanzi: 该气体在压缩状态下贮存於罐中.
pinyin: gāi qì tǐ zài yā suō zhuàng tài xià zhù cún yū guàn zhòng.
english: The gas is stored under pressure in the tank.

hanzi: 那麽多食物都浪费了, 看著觉得可惜.
pinyin: nà mó duō shí wù dōu làng fèi le,  kàn著 jué de kě xī.
english: What a pity to see all that food go to waste.

hanzi: 该气体在压缩状态下贮存於罐中.
pinyin: gāi qì tǐ zài yā suō zhuàng tài xià zhù cún yū guàn zhòng.
english: The gas is stored under pressure in the tank.

hanzi: 他们一点一点地攀上那座陡峭的山.
pinyin: tā men yī diǎn yī diǎn de pān shàng nà zuò dǒu qiào de shān.
english: They climbed the steep mountain inch by inch.

hanzi: 他们在崎岖不平的乡村小路上走着。
pinyin: tā men zài qī qū bù píng de xiāng cūn xiǎo lù shàng zǒu zhuó。
english: They walk on the rugged country road.

hanzi: 喝一杯茶吧－－除非你想喝冷饮。
pinyin: hè yī bēi chá ba－－ chú fēi nǐ xiǎng hè lěng yǐn。
english: Have a cup of tea unless you'd prefer a cold drink.

hanzi: 【谚】把握一个今天，胜似两个明天。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 bǎ wò yī gè jīn tiān， shèng sì liǎng gè míng tiān。
english: One today is worth two tomorrow.

hanzi: 他踢那个男孩的脚踝骨作为报复。
pinyin: tā tī nèi gè nán hái de jiǎo huái gǔ zuò wéi bào fù。
english: He retaliated on the boy by kicking on his ankle.

hanzi: 因为腮腺炎她接连卧床好几星期
pinyin: yīn wèi sāi xiàn yán tā jiē lián wò chuáng hǎo jǐ xīng qī
english: She is bed- ride with the mumps for week on end.

hanzi: 在权力斗争中我们只是一批小卒。
pinyin: zài quán lì dòu zhēng zhòng wǒ men zhǐ shì yī pī xiǎo zú。
english: We are mere pawns in the struggle for power.

hanzi: 我用普通油还是黄油来炒洋葱呢?
pinyin: wǒ yòng pǔ tōng yóu hái shì huáng yóu lái chǎo yáng cōng ne?
english: Shall I use oil or butter for frying the onions?

hanzi: 我经常到海滩去捉小虾和螃蟹。
pinyin: wǒ jīng cháng dào hǎi tān qù zhuō xiǎo xiā huò páng xiè。
english: I often go to the beach to catch shrimps and crabs.

hanzi: 第一次测量声速是在什么时候？
pinyin: dì yī cì cè liàng shēng sù shì zài shén me shí hou？
english: When did the first measurement of the speed of sound take?

hanzi: 那鱼轻咬[浮向/咬著了/吞下了]鱼饵.
pinyin: nà yú qīng yǎo[ fú xiàng/ yǎo著 le/ tūn xià le] yú ěr.
english: The fish nibbled at/rose to/took/swallowed the bait.

hanzi: 该学说已受到怀疑；该理论已过推翻。
pinyin: gāi xué shuō yǐ shòu dào huái yí； gāi lǐ lùn yǐ guò tuī fān。
english: The theory has been discredited.

hanzi: 【谚】知识是宝库，实践是钥匙。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 zhī shi shì bǎo kù， shí jiàn shì yào shi。
english: Knowledge is a treasure, but practice is the key to it.

hanzi: 我们把讨论的要点归纳一下好吗?
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ tǎo lùn de yào diǎn guī nà yī xià hào ma?
english: Could we have a run-through of the main points discussed?

hanzi: 这种建筑风格起源於古希腊.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng jiàn zhù fēng gé qǐ yuán yū gǔ xī là.
english: The style of architecture originated from/with the ancient Greeks.

hanzi: 这条路在经过教堂之後向左转弯.
pinyin: zhè tiáo lù zài jīng guò jiào táng zhī後 xiàng zuǒ zhuǎn wān.
english: The road turns to the left after the church.

hanzi: 朦胧中她只看见树木的轮廓.
pinyin: méng lóng zhòng tā zhǐ kàn jiàn shù mù de lún kuò.
english: She could see only the outline(s) of the trees in the dim light.

hanzi: 他们把事故归咎于驾驶员的疏忽。
pinyin: tā men bǎ shì gù guī jiù yú jià shǐ yuán de shū hū。
english: They imputed the accident to the driver's carelessness.

hanzi: 【谚】与其夸夸其谈，不如埋头苦干。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 yǔ qí kuā kuā qí tán， bù rú mái tóu kǔ gàn。
english: It is better to do well than to say well.

hanzi: 眼泪由上眼睑下面的器官分泌。
pinyin: yǎn lèi yóu shàng yǎn jiǎn xià mian de qì guān fēn mì。
english: Tears are secreted by an organ under the upper eyelid.

hanzi: 眼泪由上眼睑下面的器官分泌。
pinyin: yǎn lèi yóu shàng yǎn jiǎn xià mian de qì guān fēn mì。
english: Tears are secreted by an organ under the upper eyelid.

hanzi: 编辑删除了（文章的）最後一段.
pinyin: biān jí shān chú le（ wén zhāng de） zuì後 yī duàn.
english: The editor deleted the last paragraph (from the article).

hanzi: 您能为我们考察一下市场前景吗？
pinyin: nín néng wèi wǒ men kǎo chá yī xià shì chǎng qián jǐng ma？
english: Can you explore the market possibility for us?

hanzi: 约翰感到难以为一家大小置备衣着。
pinyin: Yuē hàn gǎn dào nán yǐ wèi yī jiā dà xiǎo zhì bèi yī zhuó。
english: John felt it hard to rig out his family.

hanzi: 这个老先生的财产值多少钱?
pinyin: zhè gè lǎo xiān sheng de cái chǎn zhí duō shao qián?
english: What's the old man worth? ie What is the value of his possessions?

hanzi: 良好的书藉是使人生变得充实之物。
pinyin: liáng hǎo de shū jiè shì shǐ rén shēng biàn de chōng shí zhī wù。
english: Good books are an enrichment of life.

hanzi: 你是怎样庆祝结婚周年纪念日的？
pinyin: nǐ shì zěn yàng qìng zhù jié hūn zhōu nián jì niàn rì de？
english: How did you celebrate your wedding anniversary?

hanzi: 该建议获得一个响亮的“反对”票。
pinyin: gāi jiàn yì huò dé yī gè xiǎng liàng de“ fǎn duì” piào。
english: The proposal receive a resounding"no" vote.

hanzi: 诺曼人征服了英格兰成了统治者。
pinyin: nuò màn rén zhēng fú le yīng gé lán chéng le tǒng zhì zhē。
english: The Normans ruled England by right of conquest.

hanzi: 自该村望去, 群山之巅清晰可见.
pinyin: zì gāi cūn wàng qù,  qún shān zhī diān qīng xī kě jiàn.
english: The mountain tops are plainly visible from the village.

hanzi: 分析显示溶液中有几格令的砷.
pinyin: fēn xī xiǎn shì róng yè zhòng yǒu jǐ gé lìng de shēn.
english: The analysis showed a few grains of arsenic in the solution.

hanzi: 飞机猛然俯冲致使驾驶员昏厥。
pinyin: fēi jī měng rán fǔ chòng zhì shǐ jià shǐ yuán hūn jué。
english: The plane dive suddenly, cause the pilot to black out.

hanzi: 老年疾病通长都不是起於外因的。
pinyin: lǎo nián jí bìng tōng zhǎng dōu bú shì qǐ yū wài yīn de。
english: Disorders of old age are generally not exogenous.

hanzi: 他母亲去世的噩耗使他非常震惊.
pinyin: tā mǔ qīn qù shì de è hào shǐ tā fēi cháng zhèn jīng.
english: The news of his mother's death was a terrible shock to him.

hanzi: 这颗钻石在阳光下显得色彩斑斓。
pinyin: zhè kē zuàn shí zài yáng guāng xià xiǎn de sè cǎi bān lán。
english: The diamond shone with every hue under the sun.

hanzi: 星期六的下午象闪电一样转瞬即逝!
pinyin: xīng qī liù de xià wǔ xiàng shǎn diàn yí yàng zhuàn shùn jí shì!
english: Saturday afternoons go by like lightning!

hanzi: 他只有一个心思--想的都是性事!
pinyin: tā zhǐ yǒu yī gè xīn si-- xiǎng de dōu shì xìng shì!
english: He's got a one-track mind -- all he ever thinks about is sex!

hanzi: 我常怀念早晨你给我送茶的情景!
pinyin: wǒ cháng huái niàn zǎo chén nǐ jǐ wǒ sòng chá de qíng jǐng!
english: I miss you bringing me cups of tea in the mornings!

hanzi: 在拜访岳父之前，他把鞋子擦黑。
pinyin: zài bài fǎng yuè fù zhī qián， tā bǎ xié zi cā hēi。
english: He blacked his shoes before visiting his father-in-law.

hanzi: 我们梦想在乡间买一所小别墅。
pinyin: wǒ men mèng xiǎng zài xiāng jiàn mǎi yī suǒ xiǎo bié shù。
english: We dreamed of buying a little cottage in the country.

hanzi: 层次字节、元素、渠道或一行信息
pinyin: céng cì zì jié、 yuán sù、 qú dào huò yī xíng xìn xī
english: A bit, an element, a channel, or a row of information.

hanzi: 她把炒锅当啷一声掉在石头地板上。
pinyin: tā bǎ chǎo guō dàng啷 yī shēng diào zài shí tou dì bǎn shàng。
english: She clashed the pan down on the stone floor.

hanzi: 夏威夷群岛已不再是美国的属地.
pinyin: xià wēi yí qún dǎo yǐ bù zài shì Měi guó de shǔ dì.
english: The Hawaiian Islands are no longer a dependency of the USA.

hanzi: 我们难以招募到素质好的职员。
pinyin: wǒ men nán yǐ zhāo mù dào sù zhì hǎo de zhí yuán。
english: We are having difficulties in recruiting well-qualified staff.

hanzi: 我舍不得把这麽多钱花在穿衣服上.
pinyin: wǒ shè bù dé bǎ zhè mó duō qián huā zài chuān yī fu shàng.
english: I hesitate to spend so much money on clothes.

hanzi: 玛丽的母亲去世了, 她父亲依然健在.
pinyin: Mǎ lì de mǔ qīn qù shì le,  tā fù qīn yī rán jiàn zài.
english: Mary's mother is dead but her father is still alive.

hanzi: 你熟悉关于侵入私人领地的法律吗？
pinyin: nǐ shú xī guān yú qīn rù sī rén lǐng de de fǎ lu:4 ma？
english: Are you familiar with the laws relating to trespass?

hanzi: 他是一位很有能力的业务员，可不是吗？
pinyin: tā shì yī wèi hěn yǒu néng lì de yè wù yuán， kě bú shì ma？
english: He's a capable businessman, is he?

hanzi: 这两种学说之间没有什麽关联.
pinyin: zhè liǎng zhòng xué shuō zhī jiān méi yǒu shí mó guān lián.
english: There is a distant connection between the two theories.

hanzi: 我对这些废话烦透了，叫他直说吧！
pinyin: wǒ duì zhè xie fèi huà fán tòu le， jiào tā zhí shuō ba！
english: I'm tired of this nonsense. Make him talk turkey.

hanzi: 地点某物所在或可在的地方：地点
pinyin: dì diǎn mǒu wù suǒ zài huò kě zài de dì fang： dì diǎn
english: A place where something is or could be located; a site.

hanzi: 粪污毛块一撮蓬乱或有粪污覆盖的养毛
pinyin: fèn wū máo kuài yī cuō péng luàn huò yǒu fèn wū fù gài de yǎng máo
english: A lock of matted or dung-coated wool.

hanzi: 我喜欢约翰，他是我非常要好的朋友。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan Yuē hàn， tā shì wǒ fēi cháng yào hǎo de péng you。
english: I like John, a very good friend of mine.

hanzi: 她受伤後获得保险公司的赔偿.
pinyin: tā shòu shāng後 huò dé bǎo xiǎn gōng sī de péi cháng.
english: She was compensated by the insurance company for her injuries.

hanzi: 【谚】与其补救于已然，不如防止于未然。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 yǔ qí bǔ jiù yú yǐ rán， bù rú fáng zhǐ yú wèi rán。
english: Prevention is better than cure.

hanzi: 这个婴儿打开书本彷佛他会念书。
pinyin: zhè gè yīng ér dǎ kāi shū běn páng fú tā kuài niàn shū。
english: The baby opened the book as if he were able to read.

hanzi: 这位不是别人，正是我的老朋友约翰。
pinyin: zhè wèi bú shì bié rén， zhèng shì wǒ de lǎo péng you Yuē hàn。
english: This is no other than my old friend, John.

hanzi: 四条林荫大道从那广场向四方延伸。
pinyin: sì tiáo lín yìn dà dào zòng nà guǎng chǎng xiàng sì fāng yán shēn。
english: Four avenues radiate from the square.

hanzi: 原先那片荒山如今已是果树成荫。
pinyin: yuán xiān nà piàn huāng shān rú jīn yǐ shì guǒ shù chéng yìn。
english: The barren hills are crowned with fruit trees.

hanzi: 难民苦於缺少食物和医药用品.
pinyin: nàn mín kǔ yū quē shǎo shí wù huò yī yào yòng pǐn.
english: The refugees are suffering for want of food and medical supplies.

hanzi: 请你把这颗纽扣缝到我的衬衫上好吗？
pinyin: qǐng nǐ bǎ zhè kē niǔ kòu fèng dào wǒ de chèn shān shàng hào ma？
english: Would you sew this button onto my shirt?

hanzi: 女同胞从自己国家来的女人；女同胞
pinyin: nu:3 tóng bāo zòng zì jǐ guó jiā lái de nu:3 rén； nu:3 tóng bāo
english: A woman from one's own country; a compatriot.

hanzi: 平凡，琐屑平凡、琐屑的性质或状态
pinyin: píng fán， suǒ xiè píng fán、 suǒ xiè de xìng zhì huò zhuàng tài
english: The quality or condition of being trivial.

hanzi: 你显然有心事, 何不一吐为快?
pinyin: nǐ xiǎn ran yǒu xīn shì,  hé bù yī tù wèi kuài?
english: You're obviously worried about something; why not get it off your chest?

hanzi: 无忧无虑的无忧无虑的和不关心的；快活的
pinyin: wú yōu wú lu:4 de wú yōu wú lu:4 de huò bù guān xīn de； kuài huo de
english: Carefree and nonchalant; jaunty.

hanzi: 骑自行车横越美国? 听起来有些冒险.
pinyin: qí zì xíng chē hèng yuè Měi guó?  tìng qǐ lai yǒu xiē mào xiǎn.
english: Cycle across America? Sounds a bit dodgy to me.

hanzi: 一声惊雷过後, 狂风暴雨突然袭来.
pinyin: yī shēng jīng léi guò後,  kuáng fēng bào yǔ tū rán xí lái.
english: There was a crash of thunder, then the storm struck.

hanzi: 假使一个人健康什麽事都能率得到。
pinyin: jiǎ shǐ yī gè rén jiàn kāng shí mó shì dōu néng shuài dé dào。
english: Given good health, one can achieve anything.

hanzi: 宽阔，广阔宽阔的状态、特点或事实
pinyin: kuān kuò， guǎng kuò kuān kuò de zhuàng tài、 tè diǎn huò shì shí
english: The state, quality, or fact of being wide.

hanzi: 整体大於其任何一部分是公理.
pinyin: zhěng tǐ dà yū qí rèn hé yī bù fen shì gōng lǐ.
english: It is axiomatic (to say) that a whole is greater than any of its parts.

hanzi: 那个腐朽的傀儡政权正在土崩瓦解。
pinyin: nèi gè fǔ xiǔ de kuǐ lěi zhèng quán zhèng zài tǔ bēng wǎ jiě。
english: The decadent puppet regime was falling apart.

hanzi: 我想请你下星期日去参加舞会好吗？
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ xià xīng qī rì qù cān jiā wǔ huì hào ma？
english: I would like to invite you to a ball next Sunday.

hanzi: 旭日从这个角度看起来特别美。
pinyin: xù rì zòng zhè gè jiǎo dù kàn qǐ lai tè bié měi。
english: The rising sun is especially beautiful to look at from this angle.

hanzi: 这些症状（照你看来）像是什麽病?
pinyin: zhè xie zhèng zhuàng（ zhào nǐ kàn lai） xiàng shì shí mó bìng?
english: Which illness do these symptoms suggest (to you)?

hanzi: 【谚】一根筷子易折断，十根筷子硬如铁。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 yī gēn kuài zi yì zhé duàn， shí gēn kuài zi yìng rú tiě。
english: Weak things united become strong.

hanzi: 你是否从经营业务的新方法中获益?
pinyin: nǐ shì fǒu zòng jīng yíng yè wù de xīn fāng fǎ zhòng huò yì?
english: Did you benefit from the new way of doing business?

hanzi: 他们在海上十天之後首次看到陆地.
pinyin: tā men zài hǎi shàng shí tiān zhī後 shǒu cì kàn dào lù dì.
english: Their first sight of land came after ten days at sea.

hanzi: 这可不是一般的旧床--是莎士比亚的.
pinyin: zhè kě bú shì yì bān de jiù chuáng-- shì suō shì Bǐ yà de.
english: This isn't any old bed it belonged to Shakespeare.

hanzi: 我们（在财务上）受到一些严重挫折.
pinyin: wǒ men（ zài cái wù shàng） shòu dào yī xiē yán zhòng cuò zhé.
english: We suffered some serious (financial) reverses.

hanzi: 我对此混乱情况负有全部[部分]责任.
pinyin: wǒ duì cǐ hùn luàn qíng kuàng fù yǒu quán bù[ bù fen] zé rèn.
english: I am wholly/partly responsible for the confusion.

hanzi: 他无动於衷使她心中的怨恨火上加油.
pinyin: tā wú dòng yū zhōng shǐ tā xīn zhōng de yuàn hèn huǒ shàng jiā yóu.
english: His indifference was a fuel to her hatred.

hanzi: 土壤施用杀虫剂後肥力大增.
pinyin: tǔ rǎng shī yòng shā chóng jì後 féi lì dà zēng.
english: The fertility of the soil has been greatly improved by the use of pesticides.

hanzi: 她的祈祷应验了，儿子平安地回到了家。
pinyin: tā de qí dǎo yìng yàn le， ér zi píng ān de huí dào le jiā。
english: Her prayer answered and her son came home safely.

hanzi: 公爵命令仆人把一封信送给国王。
pinyin: gōng jué mìng lìng pú rén bǎ yī fēng xìn sòng jǐ guó wáng。
english: The duke ordered the servant to send a letter to the king.

hanzi: 他喜欢在周末看滑稽剧来放松自己。
pinyin: tā xǐ huan zài zhōu mò kàn huá ji jù lái fàng sōng zì jǐ。
english: He likes to watch farces at weekends to relax himself.

hanzi: 他窥探著四周，直至见到警察走开。
pinyin: tā kuī tàn著 sì zhōu， zhí zhì xiàn dào jǐng chá zǒu kāi。
english: He skulked around outside until the police had gone.

hanzi: 你要是不在，这世界不知将有多寂寞！
pinyin: nǐ yào shì bù zài， zhè shì jiè bù zhī jiàng yǒu duō jì mò！
english: What a lonely world it would be with you away!

hanzi: 咒语将青蛙和老鼠又变回成了人。
pinyin: zhòu yǔ jiàng qīng wā huò lǎo shǔ yòu biàn huí chéng le rén。
english: The magic spell changed the frogs and rats back into men.

hanzi: 自己运动的；自己推进的或自己驱动的
pinyin: zì jǐ yùn dòng de； zì jǐ tuī jìn de huò zì jǐ qū dòng de
english: Moving by itself; self-propelling or self-propelled.

hanzi: 敏捷；灵活敏捷的状态或品质；灵活
pinyin: mǐn jié； líng huó mǐn jié de zhuàng tài huò pǐn zhì； líng huó
english: The state or quality of being agile; nimbleness.

hanzi: 长期的乾旱之后有雨是一大慰藉。
pinyin: cháng qī de qián hàn zhī hòu yǒu yǔ shì yī dà wèi jiè。
english: It is a great relief to have rain after a long time of drought.

hanzi: 古罗马人在整个欧洲建立了殖民地.
pinyin: gǔ Luó mǎ rén zài zhěng gè ōu zhōu jiàn lì le zhí mín dì.
english: The ancient Romans founded colonies throughout Europe.

hanzi: 从他的说法中得出这种结论恰当吗?
pinyin: zòng tā de shuō fa zhòng dé chū zhè zhǒng jié lùn qià dàng ma?
english: Is that a fair inference (to draw) from his statement?

hanzi: 他在想那些日子现在已显得多麽遥远.
pinyin: tā zài xiǎng nà xiē rì zi xiàn zài yǐ xiǎn de duō mó yáo yuǎn.
english: How distant those times seemed now, he reflected.

hanzi: 那囚犯在黎明时被（行刑队）处决.
pinyin: nà qiú fàn zài lí míng shí bèi（ xìng xíng duì） chǔ jué.
english: The prisoner was put to death (by firing squad) at dawn.

hanzi: 那种做法是她的特色；那就是她的作风。
pinyin: nà zhòng zuò fǎ shì tā de tè sè； nà jiù shì tā de zuò fēng。
english: It is characteristic of her to act that way.

hanzi: 你可曾想到被你最好的朋友出卖？
pinyin: nǐ kě zēng xiǎng dào bèi nǐ zuì hǎo de péng you chū mài？
english: Did it ever occur to you to be betrayed by your best friend?

hanzi: 我们看见他在为屋子四周的草坪浇水。
pinyin: wǒ men kàn jiàn tā zài wèi wū zi sì zhōu de cǎo píng jiāo shuǐ。
english: We saw him watering the lawn around the house.

hanzi: 像这样与你在此相逢真好比一场梦!
pinyin: xiàng zhè yàng yù nǐ zài cǐ xiàng féng zhēn hǎo bǐ yī chǎng mèng!
english: Meeting you here like this is positively surreal!

hanzi: ｀黑寡妇＇马下一场比赛赢定了.
pinyin: ｀ hēi guǎ fù＇ mǎ xià yī chǎng bǐ sài yíng dìng le.
english: Black Widow is a (dead) cert for (ie is sure to win) the next race.

hanzi: 小矿车，柳条箩矿井中用的车、盆或筐
pinyin: xiǎo kuàng jū， liǔ tiáo luó kuàng jǐng zhòng yòng de jū、 pén huò kuāng
english: A truck, tub, or basket used in a mine.

hanzi: 他用一只手臂围住她做出保护的姿势。
pinyin: tā yòng yī zhǐ shǒu bei wéi zhù tā zuò chū bǎo hù de zī shì。
english: He put his arm round her in a protective gesture.

hanzi: 他们把麦麸和玉米粉混合起来喂猪。
pinyin: tā men bǎ mài fū huò yù mǐ fěn hùn hé qǐ lai wèi zhū。
english: They mix the bran and corn powder together to feed the pigs.

hanzi: 清晨；在前几个回合中就得了两分
pinyin: qīng chén； zài qián jǐ ge huí hé zhòng jiù dé le liǎng fèn
english: In the early morning; scored two runs in the early innings.

hanzi: 这种新型设计能提高速度、 节约燃料.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xīn xíng shè jì néng tí gāo sù dù、  jié yuē rán liào.
english: The new model delivers speed and fuel economy.

hanzi: 请萨姆写那篇社论好了，他能胜任。
pinyin: qǐng sà mǔ xiě nà piān shè lùn hào le， tā néng shèng rèn。
english: Get Sam to write that editorial. He haw what it takes.

hanzi: 玛丽写信时，孩子们在外面玩耍。
pinyin: Mǎ lì xiě xìn shí， hái zi men zài wài miàn wàn shuǎ。
english: While Mary was writing a letter, the children were playing outside.

hanzi: 肢体语言一个从容的、有力的动作或手势
pinyin: zhī tǐ yǔ yán yī gè cōng róng de、 yǒu lì de dòng zuò huò shǒu shì
english: A deliberate, vigorous motion or gesture.

hanzi: 别看种菜没啥，其实大有学问。
pinyin: biè kàn zhòng cài mò shá， qí shí dà yǒu xué wèn。
english: Growing vegetables looks easy, but actually it takes a lot of learning.

hanzi: 抑制物用来压制、控制或消除的事物
pinyin: yì zhì wù yòng lái yā zhì、 kòng zhì huò xiāo chú de shì wù
english: Something that serves to suppress, check, or eliminate.

hanzi: 衣、 食、 住所是生活的基本必需品.
pinyin: yì、  sì、  zhù suǒ shì shēng huó de jī běn bì xū pǐn.
english: Food, clothing and shelter are all basic necessities of life.

hanzi: 悬挂式滑翔机藉著暖气流在高空飞行.
pinyin: xuán guà shì huá xiáng jī jiè著 nuǎn qì liú zài gāo kōng fēi xíng.
english: Currents of warm air keep the hang-gliders aloft.

hanzi: 他的文章昨天发表于“中国日报”上。
pinyin: tā de wén zhāng zuó tiān fā biǎo yú“ Zhōng guó rì bào” shàng。
english: His article appeared in China Daily yesterday.

hanzi: 你的大衣需要刷乾净, 上面满是灰尘.
pinyin: nǐ de dà yī xū yào shuà qián jìng,  shàng mian mǎn shì huī chén.
english: Your coat needs brushing down. It's covered in dust.

hanzi: 一篮子一篮子摘下来的棉花；退了毛的火鸡
pinyin: yī lán zi yī lán zi zhāi xia lai de mián hua； tuì le máo de huǒ jī
english: Baskets of picked cotton; a picked turkey.

hanzi: 一剂乙醚几秒钟后就会使你失去知觉。
pinyin: yī jì yǐ mí jǐ miǎo zhōng hòu jiù kuài shǐ nǐ shī qù zhī jué。
english: A whiff of ether will put you out in a few seconds.

hanzi: 有多少人在争夺理事会的这一席位？
pinyin: yǒu duō shao rén zài zhēng duó lǐ shì huì de zhè yī xí wèi？
english: How many people are contesting this seat on the council?

hanzi: 人类是否会受到完全灭绝的威胁呢？
pinyin: rén lèi shì fǒu kuài shòu dào wán quán miè jué de wēi xié ne？
english: Is the human race threatened with complete extinction?

hanzi: 挡道地处在阻碍、阻挡或干涉的位置上
pinyin: dàng dào dì chù zài zǔ ài、 zǔ dǎng huò gān shè de wèi zhi shàng
english: In a position to obstruct, hinder, or interfere.

hanzi: 他的内疚使得他把一切和盘托出。
pinyin: tā de nèi jiù shǐ de tā bǎ yī qiè huò pán tuō chū。
english: His guilty conscience forced him to make a clean breast of everything.

hanzi: 凶恶，残忍凶恶的状态或特点；凶猛
pinyin: xiōng è， cán rěn xiōng è de zhuàng tài huò tè diǎn； xiōng měng
english: The state or quality of being ferocious; fierceness.

hanzi: 休息之後我们继续排练合唱节目.
pinyin: xiū xi zhī後 wǒ men jì xù pái liàn hé chàng jié mù.
english: We continued to rehearse/continued rehearsing the chorus after the break.

hanzi: 天花板坍塌了, 碎砖破瓦掉落到了屋里.
pinyin: tiān huā bǎn tān tā le,  suì zhuān pò wǎ diào luò dào le wū lǐ.
english: The ceiling collapsed and rubble poured into the room.

hanzi: 她连给最穷的乞丐一个便士都舍不得。
pinyin: tā lián jǐ zuì qióng de qǐ gài yī gè biàn shì dōu shè bù dé。
english: She will grudge a penny even to the poor beggar.

hanzi: 我准备到汉普敦的苗圃去买些花草.
pinyin: wǒ zhǔn bèi dào hàn pǔ dūn de miáo pǔ qù mǎi xiē huā cǎo.
english: I'm going to the nursery/nurseries in Hampton to buy some plants.

hanzi: 你别找茬儿闹事, 要不然我就叫警察了!
pinyin: nǐ biè zhǎo chá er nào shì,  yào bu rán wǒ jiù jiào jǐng chá le!
english: Don't give me any aggro or I'll call the police!

hanzi: 这寥寥数语充分显示了她的高贵品质。
pinyin: zhè liáo liáo shuò yù chōng fèn xiǎn shì le tā de gāo guì pǐn zhì。
english: These few words fully revealed her noble quality.

hanzi: 都在说萨拉的闲话--她耳朵一定发烧了!
pinyin: dōu zài shuō sà lā de xián huà-- tā ěr duo yī dìng fā shāo le!
english: All this gossip about Sarah her ears must be burning!

hanzi: 音乐和绘画是他生活中的两大嗜好。
pinyin: yīn yuè huò huì huà shì tā shēng huó zhòng dì liǎng dà shì hào。
english: His two great interests in life are music and painting.

hanzi: 他将管子里的最後一点牙膏挤了出来。
pinyin: tā jiàng guǎn zi lǐ de zuì後 yī diǎn yá gāo jǐ le chū lai。
english: He squeezed out the last bit of toothpaste from the tube.

hanzi: 我们能做什么来防止这种疾病蔓延呢？
pinyin: wǒ men néng zuò shén me lái fáng zhǐ zhè zhǒng jí bìng màn yán ne？
english: What can we do to prevent the disease spreading?

hanzi: 薄衫一种柔软而轻薄的织物、纱或衣服
pinyin: bò shān yī zhòng róu ruǎn ér qīng bò de zhī wù、 shā huò yī fu
english: Any of various soft, light fabrics, yarns, or garments.

hanzi: 我再说一遍: 跑道尚未畅通, 不能起飞.
pinyin: wǒ zài shuō yī biàn:  pǎo dào shàng wèi chàng tōng,  bù néng qǐ fēi.
english: I repeat: the runway is not clear for take-off.

hanzi: 这  的空气很闷--咱们能把窗户打开吗?
pinyin: zhè   de kōng qì hěn mèn-- zán men néng bǎ chuāng hu dǎ kāi ma?
english: The atmosphere is very stuffy in here can we open a window?

hanzi: 他装作若无其事, 藉以掩饰内心的不安.
pinyin: tā zhuāng zuò ruò wú qí shì,  jiè yǐ yǎn shì nèi xīn de bù ān.
english: He conceals his worries behind a mask of nonchalance.

hanzi: 这项目尚处於初期阶段时就取消了.
pinyin: zhè xiàng mù shàng chù yū chū qī jiē duàn shí jiù qǔ xiāo le.
english: The project was cancelled while it was still in its infancy.

hanzi: 去伦敦之前，我必须好好温习一下英文。
pinyin: qù lún dūn zhī qián， wǒ bì xū hǎo hǎo wēn xí yī xià Yīng wén。
english: I must brush up my English before I go to London.

hanzi: 当时公司的编制正处於不稳定状态.
pinyin: dāng shí gōng sī de biān zhì zhèng chù yū bù wěn dìng zhuàng tài.
english: Organization of the company was then in a state of flux.

hanzi: 我听到你父亲去世的噩耗, 十分难过.
pinyin: wǒ tīng dào nǐ fù qīn qù shì de è hào,  shí fēn nán guò.
english: I was most distressed to hear the sad news of your father's death.

hanzi: 经理敦促年纪较大的职员提前退休。
pinyin: jīng lǐ dūn cù nián jì jiào dà de zhí yuán tí qián tuì xiū。
english: The manager urged older staff to take up early retirement.

hanzi: 你见过热带鸟类色彩斑斓的羽毛吗？
pinyin: nǐ xiàn guò rè dài niǎo lèi sè cǎi bān lán de yǔ máo ma？
english: Have you seen the brightly-coloured plumage of tropical birds?

hanzi: 经理敦促年纪较大的职员提前退休。
pinyin: jīng lǐ dūn cù nián jì jiào dà de zhí yuán tí qián tuì xiū。
english: The manager urged older staff to take up early retirement.

hanzi: 他们[他]写信表示感谢我们赠送礼物.
pinyin: tā men[ tā] xiě xìn biǎo shì gǎn xiè wǒ men zèng sòng lǐ wù.
english: They wrote to thank us/he wrote thanking us for the present.

hanzi: 去伦敦之前，我必须好好温习一下英文。
pinyin: qù lún dūn zhī qián， wǒ bì xū hǎo hǎo wēn xí yī xià Yīng wén。
english: I must brush up my English before I go to London.

hanzi: 他朝著树枝（不停地）砍, 直到砍下为止.
pinyin: tā cháo著 shù zhī（ bù tíng de） kǎn,  zhí dào kǎn xià wéi zhǐ.
english: He hacked (away) at the branch until it fell off.

hanzi: 这使我想起那句俗话，“三思而后行”。
pinyin: zhè shǐ wǒ xiǎng qǐ nà jù sú huà，“ sān sī ér hòu xìng”。
english: Remind me of the old saying,"look before you leap".

hanzi: 请挪过去点，你占了大半张凳子啦！
pinyin: qǐng nuó guò qu diǎn， nǐ zhàn le dà bàn zhāng dèng zǐ la！
english: Move over, please: you are taking up more than half the bench!

hanzi: 我在攻读民用建筑专业的硕士学位。
pinyin: wǒ zài gōng dú mín yòng jiàn zhù zhuān yè de shuò shì xué wèi。
english: I am working on a master's degree in civil architecture.

hanzi: 茶馆里有个人在非常自负地侃政治。
pinyin: chá guǎn lǐ yǒu gè rén zài fēi cháng zì fù de kǎn zhèng zhì。
english: A man in the teahouse was laying the law down on politics.

hanzi: 日记簿用来保存个人经历记载的本子
pinyin: rì jì bù yòng lái bǎo cún gè rén jīng lì jì zǎi de běn zi
english: A book for use in keeping a personal record, as of experiences.

hanzi: 不同身份的、形形色色的人都出席了。
pinyin: bù tóng shēn fèn de、 xíng xíng shǎi shǎi de rén dōu chū xí le。
english: Divers persons were present, of all stations in life.

hanzi: 哈罗德百货公司的陈列品是伦敦一景.
pinyin: hǎ luó dé bǎi huò gōng sī de chén liè pǐn shì lún dūn yī jǐng.
english: The displays in Harrods are one of the sights in London.

hanzi: 这只鸟的头顶上有一小簇红色的羽毛。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ niǎo de tou dǐng shàng yǒu yī xiǎo cù hóng sè de yǔ máo。
english: The bird has a tuft of red feathers on top of its head.

hanzi: 被严密监视的这些囚犯昨夜越狱了。
pinyin: bèi yán mì jiān shì de zhè xie qiú fàn zuó yè yuè yù le。
english: The prisoners closely guarded escaped from the prison last night.

hanzi: 你对合唱团毫无益处--你简直唱不成调!
pinyin: nǐ duì hé chàng tuán háo wú yì chu-- nǐ jiǎn zhí chàng bù chéng tiáo!
english: You're no use in the choir you cant sing a note!

hanzi: 在困难的时候，她祈祷神谕来指引她。
pinyin: zài kùn nan de shí hou， tā qí dǎo shén yù lái zhǐ yǐn tā。
english: In times of difficulty, she pray for an oracle to guide her

hanzi: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心。
pinyin: tā rì yè qí qiú shàng dì fù yǔ tā qián jìng de xīn。
english: He prayed to God night and day to endue him with the spirit of holiness.

hanzi: 他挥霍掉了大部分钱财, 濒于破产。
pinyin: tā huī huò diào le dà bù fen qián cái,  bīn yú pò chǎn。
english: He dissipated most of his money and was on the brink of bankruptcy.

hanzi: 那农民耕地时挖出一个人类的头颅骨。
pinyin: nà nóng mín gēng dì shí wā chū yī gè rén lèi de tou lú gǔ。
english: The farmer turns up a human skull while ploughs the field.

hanzi: 炮轰敌军阵地之後, 我步兵开始进攻.
pinyin: pào hōng dí jūn zhèn dì zhī後,  wǒ bù bīng kāi shǐ jìn gōng.
english: Enemy positions were bombarded before our infantry attacked.

hanzi: 那些孩子们喋喋不休的说话声使人心烦。
pinyin: nà xiē hái zi men dié dié bù xiū de shuō huà shēng shǐ rén xīn fán。
english: The children's constant chatter was irritating.

hanzi: 分解（作用）分解或分裂为部分或要素
pinyin: fēn jiě（ zuò yòng） fēn jiě huò fēn liè wèi bù fen huò yào sù
english: Disintegration or decomposition into parts or elements.

hanzi: 比尔先唱独唱部分, 然後大家一起合唱.
pinyin: Bǐ ěr xiān chàng dú chàng bù fen,  rán後 dà jiā yī qǐ hé chàng.
english: Bill sang the verses and everyone joined in the chorus.

hanzi: 这间老房子的地板发出吱吱嘎嘎的响声。
pinyin: zhè jiàn lǎo fáng zi de dì bǎn fā chū zī zī gá gá de xiǎng shēng。
english: The floorboards in the old house creaked noisily.

hanzi: 大队花了６０００元钱买了一台磨面机。
pinyin: dà duì huā le６０００ yuán qián mǎi le yī tái mò miàn jī。
english: The brigade bought a flour-milling machine for6000 yuan.

hanzi: 值得嘉奖的值得奖励或称赞的；具有价值的
pinyin: zhí de jiā jiǎng de zhí de jiǎng lì huò chēng zàn de； jù yǒu jià zhí de
english: Deserving reward or praise; having merit.

hanzi: 当被介绍给全班同学时，玛丽很害羞。
pinyin: dàng bèi jiè shào jǐ quán bān tóng xué shí， Mǎ lì hěn hài xiū。
english: Mary was shy at her introduction to the whole class.

hanzi: 玛丽因工作得不到赏识而灰心丧气.
pinyin: Mǎ lì yīn gōng zuò de bù dào shǎng shí ér huī xīn sàng qì.
english: Mary was frustrated by the lack of appreciation shown of her work.

hanzi: 约翰甚至于不说一声“谢谢”就离开了。
pinyin: Yuē hàn shèn zhì yú bù shuō yī shēng“ xiè xie” jiù lí kāi le。
english: John left without so much as saying"Thank you."

hanzi: 海伦在快餐店里点了炸鸡和色拉。
pinyin: Hǎi lún zài kuài cān diàn lǐ diǎn le zhà jī huò sè lā。
english: Helen ordered both fried chicken and salad in the fast-food restaurant.

hanzi: 刻板的由严格的提纲或概念规定的；刻板的
pinyin: kè bǎn de yóu yán gé de tí gāng huò gài niàn guī dìng de； kè bǎn de
english: Marked by sharp outline or definition; stark.

hanzi: 他讲完话後请听众提问题和意见.
pinyin: tā jiǎng wán huà後 qǐng tīng zhòng tí wèn tí huò yì jiàn.
english: After his speech he invited questions and comments (from the audience).

hanzi: 别让那些大孩子欺负你, 要保护你自己!
pinyin: biè ràng nà xiē dà hái zi qī fu nǐ,  yào bǎo hù nǐ zì jǐ!
english: Don't allow those big boys to bully you; stick up for yourself!

hanzi: 我父亲总是对我做事的方式百般挑剔。
pinyin: wǒ fù qīn zǒng shì duì wǒ zuò shì de fāng shì bǎi bān tiāo ti。
english: My father is always finding fault with the way I do things.

hanzi: 他终於起来反抗那种严厉管教他的方式.
pinyin: tā zhōng yū qǐ lai fǎn kàng nà zhòng yán lì guǎn jiào tā de fāng shì.
english: He finally rebelled against his strict upbringing.

hanzi: 我可以用铆钉把这些金属板固定在一起吗？
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ yòng mǎo dīng bǎ zhè xie jīn shǔ bǎn gù dìng zài yī qǐ ma？
english: Can I fasten these metal plates with rivets?

hanzi: 她尽管遇到许多挫折，却仍然不气馁。
pinyin: tā jǐn guǎn yù dào xǔ duō cuò zhé， què réng rán bù qì něi。
english: Despite all these discouragements, she refused to give up.

hanzi: 我们初次见面的情形时常浮现於我的脑海.
pinyin: wǒ men chū cì jiàn miàn de qíng xing shí cháng fú xiàn yū wǒ de nǎo hǎi.
english: Our first meeting often recurs to me/my mind.

hanzi: 吴先生正在对他的汇报作最后的润色。
pinyin: wú xiān sheng zhèng zài duì tā de huì bào zuò zuì hòu de rùn shǎi。
english: Mr.Wu was putting the finishing touches to his report.

hanzi: 街道布满了花朵以迎接王室成员莅临.
pinyin: jiē dào bù mǎn le huā duǒ yǐ yíng jiē wáng shì chéng yuán lì lín.
english: The streets were strewn with flowers for the royal visit.

hanzi: 你有很多供火车旅行时阅读的读物吗?
pinyin: nǐ yǒu hěn duō gòng huǒ chē lu:3 xíng shí yuè dú de dú wù ma?
english: Have you a good supply of reading matter for the train journey?

hanzi: 亚瑟王的传说代表骑士精神的顶峰.
pinyin: yà sè wáng de chuán shuō dài biǎo qí shì jīng shén de dǐng fēng.
english: The legends of King Arthur represent the apotheosis of chivalry.

hanzi: 回到原先状态在、到或向着从前的状态地
pinyin: huí dào yuán xiān zhuàng tài zài、 dào huò xiàng zhuó cóng qián de zhuàng tài de
english: In, to, or toward a former condition.

hanzi: 桶贮存液体的坚固的圆筒状容器；桶
pinyin: tǒng zhù cún yè tǐ de jiān gù de yuán tǒng zhuàng róng qì； tǒng
english: A sturdy cylindrical container for storing liquids; a barrel.

hanzi: 把土豆和青菜传一传－－小心，烫手。
pinyin: bǎ tǔ dòu huò qīng cài zhuàn yī zhuàn－－ xiǎo xīn， tàng shǒu。
english: Pass the potatoes and the greens--careful, they're hot.

hanzi: 他们祈求上帝把他们从危险中拯救出来。
pinyin: tā men qí qiú shàng dì bǎ tā men zòng wēi xiǎn zhòng zhěng jiù chū lai。
english: They prayed to God to deliver them from danger.

hanzi: 装订术，业装订书本的技艺、行业或职业
pinyin: zhuāng dìng zhú， yè zhuāng dìng shū běn de jì yì、 háng yè huò zhí yè
english: The art, trade, or profession of binding books.

hanzi: 学校、教堂、住宅、厂房均为建筑物.
pinyin: xué xiào、 jiào táng、 zhù zhái、 chǎng fáng jūn wèi jiàn zhù wù.
english: Schools, churches, houses and factories are all buildings.

hanzi: 她把玻璃杯送到嘴边[用嘴唇触及玻璃杯].
pinyin: tā bǎ bō li bēi sòng dào zuǐ biān[ yòng zuǐ chún chù jí bō li bēi].
english: She set the glass to her lips/her lips to the glass.

hanzi: 我憋不住了（要小便）, 得找个厕所.
pinyin: wǒ biē bú zhù le（ yào xiǎo biàn）,  de zhǎo gè cè suǒ.
english: I can't hold out (ie retain my urine) much longer; I must find a toilet.

hanzi: 弯弯曲曲的；迂回的充满弯曲和拐弯的；曲折的
pinyin: wān wān qǔ qǔ de； yū huí de chōng mǎn wān qǔ huò guǎi wān de； qū zhé de
english: Full of twists and turns; tortuous.

hanzi: 世界上最有效的水力是－女人的眼泪。
pinyin: shì jiè shàng zuì yǒu xiào de shuǐ lì shì－ nu:3 rén de yǎn lèi。
english: The most effective water power in the world-women's tears.

hanzi: 他的儿子已长那麽高了, 他不禁惊叫起来.
pinyin: tā de ér zi yǐ zhǎng nà mó gāo le,  tā bù jīn jīng jiào qǐ lai.
english: He could not help exclaiming at how much his son had grown.

hanzi: ｀啊!＇、 ｀小心!＇、 ｀哎哟!＇都是感叹词语.
pinyin: ｀ a!＇、 ｀ xiǎo xīn!＇、 ｀ āi yōu!＇ dōu shì gǎn tàn cí yù.
english: `Oh!', `Look out!' and `Ow!' are exclamations.

hanzi: 警方来到时, 他慌忙逃走[夺门而逃]了.
pinyin: jǐng fāng lái dào shí,  tā huāng máng táo zǒu[ duó mén ér táo] le.
english: When the police arrived he made a bolt for it/for the door.

hanzi: 她把新歌剧院称作｀那讨厌的庞然大物＇.
pinyin: tā bǎ xīn gē jù yuàn chèng zuò｀ nà tǎo yàn de páng rán dà wù＇.
english: She calls the new opera house that hideous erection'.

hanzi: 别这麽自私--在这所房子里要事事均分.
pinyin: biè zhè mó zì sī-- zài zhè suǒ fáng zi lǐ yào shì shì jūn fēn.
english: Don't be so selfish it's share and share alike in this house.

hanzi: 【谚】狐狸吃不到葡萄，就说葡萄酸。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 hú li jí bù dào pú tao， jiù shuō pú tao suān。
english: "The grapes are sour", as the fox said when he could not reach them.

hanzi: 该公司以前隶属於一个国际银行集团.
pinyin: gāi gōng sī yǐ qián lì shǔ yū yī gè guó jì yín háng jí tuán.
english: The company formerly belonged to an international banking group.

hanzi: 米切尔博士病了, 所以我做代理（她的）工作.
pinyin: mǐ qiè ěr bó shì bìng le,  suǒ yǐ wǒ zuò dài lǐ（ tā de） gōng zuò.
english: Dr Mitchell's ill so I'm deputizing (for her).

hanzi: 船遇难後因天气恶劣救援工作十分困难.
pinyin: chuán yù nàn後 yīn tiān qì è liè jiù yuán gōng zuò shí fēn kùn nan.
english: Salvage of the wreck was made difficult by bad weather.

hanzi: 她先去请教顾问然後再来宣布决定.
pinyin: tā xiān qù qǐng jiào gù wèn rán後 zài lái xuān bù jué dìng.
english: She withdrew to confer with her advisers before announcing a decision.

hanzi: 男女主人（在客人间）走来走去招待客人.
pinyin: nán nu:3 zhǔ rén（ zài kè ren jiàn） zǒu lái zǒu qù zhāo dài kè ren.
english: The host and hostess circulated (among their guests).

hanzi: 公路特指连结城市、县镇的公用道路
pinyin: gōng lù tè zhǐ lián jié chéng shì、 xiàn zhèn de gōng yòng dào lù
english: A main public road, especially one connecting towns and cities.

hanzi: 克鲁格金币南非共和国发行的一盎司金币
pinyin: kè lǔ gé jīn bì nán fēi gòng hé guó fā xíng de yī àng sī jīn bì
english: A one-ounce gold coin of the Republic of South Africa.

hanzi: 听到煤气的嘶嘶声，他冲进来把它关掉。
pinyin: tīng dào méi qì de sī sī shēng， tā chōng jìn lái bǎ tā guān diào。
english: Hearing the hiss of gas, he rushed in and turned it off.

hanzi: 燃烧著的煤开始发出了黄色与橙色的火焰.
pinyin: rán shāo著 de méi kāi shǐ fā chū le huáng sè yù chéng sè de huǒ yán.
english: The burning coals started to flame yellow and orange.

hanzi: 用不著穿讲究衣服－－就穿平常的衣服来吧。
pinyin: yòng bù著 chuān jiǎng jiù yī fu－－ jiù chuān píng cháng de yī fu lái ba。
english: Don't bother to dress up come as you are.

hanzi: 我那套狄更斯小说只差一卷就能配齐了.
pinyin: wǒ nà tào dí gèng sī xiǎo shuō zhǐ cī yī juàn jiù néng pèi qí le.
english: I only need one volume to complete my set of Dickens's novels.

hanzi: 她固然很好，但有必要那样大肆吹捧吗？
pinyin: tā gù rán hěn hǎo， dàn yǒu bì yào nà yàng dà sì chuī pěng ma？
english: She was good, but was it any good to pour it on like that?

hanzi: 她紧紧地、 目不转睛地、 好奇地...注视著他.
pinyin: tā jǐn jǐn de、  mù bù zhuàn jīng de、  hào qí de... zhù shì著 tā.
english: She regarded him closely, intently, curiously, etc.

hanzi: 她决定在获得学士学位之後继续深造.
pinyin: tā jué dìng zài huò dé xué shì xué wèi zhī後 jì xù shēn zào.
english: She decided to pursue her studies after obtaining her first degree.

hanzi: 新颁布的法令将使失业者遭受什麽样的打击？
pinyin: xīn bān bù de fǎ lìng jiàng shǐ shī yè zhě zāo shòu shí mó yàng de dǎ jī？
english: How will the new law hit the unemployed?

hanzi: 新颁布的法令将使失业者遭受什麽样的打击？
pinyin: xīn bān bù de fǎ lìng jiàng shǐ shī yè zhě zāo shòu shí mó yàng de dǎ jī？
english: How will the new law hit the unemployed?

hanzi: 独立自主的意识及判断上独立的；自我指引的
pinyin: dú lì zì zhǔ de yì shí jí pàn duàn shàng dú lì de； zì wǒ zhǐ yǐn de
english: Independent in mind or judgment; self-directed.

hanzi: 北极熊虽然会游泳，但也是陆栖动物。
pinyin: běi jí xióng suī rán kuài yóu yǒng， dàn yě shì lù xī dòng wù。
english: Although they can swim, the polar bears are terrestrial animals.

hanzi: 许多人到国外时，都感受到文化震撼。
pinyin: xǔ duō rén dào guó wài shí， dōu gǎn shòu dào wén huà zhèn hàn。
english: Many people suffered from cultural shock when they came abroad.

hanzi: 英美两国的政府体制有什么不同？
pinyin: yīng měi liǎng guó de zhèng fǔ tǐ zhì yǒu shén me bù tóng？
english: What are the difference between the American and British systems of government?

hanzi: 诚实、勤劳和善良是幸福生活的要素。
pinyin: chéng shí、 qín láo hé shàn liáng shì xìng fú shēng huó de yào sù。
english: Honesty, industry and kindness are elements of a good life.

hanzi: 她说时间不早了; 我心领神会, 於是告辞.
pinyin: tā shuō shí jiān bù zǎo le;  wǒ xīn lǐng shén kuài,  yū shì gào cí.
english: She said it was getting late: I got the message, and left.

hanzi: 他这人真讨厌! 我很庆幸能摆脱他的纠缠.
pinyin: tā zhè rén zhēn tǎo yàn!  wǒ hěn qìng xìng néng bǎi tuō tā de jiū chán.
english: He was a boring nuisance! I'm glad to be rid of him.

hanzi: 他说："我希望他们今后能更慎重一些。"
pinyin: tā shuō：" wǒ xī wàng tā men jīn hòu néng gèng shèn zhòng yī xiē。"
english: "I hope they'll be more cautious in future, " he observed.

hanzi: 她先为迟到表示歉意, 然後开始讲话.
pinyin: tā xiān wèi chí dào biǎo shì qiàn yì,  rán後 kāi shǐ jiǎng huà.
english: She prefaced her talk with an apology/by apologizing for being late.

hanzi: 我要是逮住这个流氓, 非狠狠揍他一顿不可!
pinyin: wǒ yào shì dài zhù zhè gè liú máng,  fēi hěn hěn zòu tā yī dùn bù kě!
english: If I ever catch the rascal I'll really wallop him!

hanzi: 戴安娜在希腊罗马神话中是狩猎女神。
pinyin: dài A1n nà zài xī là Luó mǎ shén huà zhòng shì shòu liè nu:3 shén。
english: Diana is the goddess of hunting in Greek and Latin mythology.

hanzi: 辣味的，开胃的尝起来辛辣但美味的；佐料多的
pinyin: là wèi de， kāi wèi de cháng qǐ lai xīn là dàn měi wèi de； zuǒ liào duō de
english: Pleasantly pungent or tart in taste; spicy.

hanzi: 受烤炙烙或印在一个表面上的一系列印记
pinyin: shòu kǎo zhì lào huò yìn zài yī gè biǎo miàn shàng de yī xì liè yìn jì
english: A series of marks grilled or embossed on a surface.

hanzi: ｀多国产物＇之说尽可遮人耳目了.
pinyin: ｀ duō guó chǎn wù＇ zhī shuō jìn kě zhē rén ěr mù le.
english: The description `produce of more than one country' can cover a multitude of sins.

hanzi: 崭新的处于新鲜和未使用状态的；全新的
pinyin: zhǎn xīn de chǔ yú xīn xiān huò wèi shǐ yòng zhuàng tài de； quán xīn de
english: Being in a fresh and unused condition; completely new.

hanzi: 角落里有一堆报纸--那底下你找过了吗?
pinyin: jiǎo luò lǐ yǒu yī duī bào zhǐ-- nà dǐ xia nǐ zhǎo guò le ma?
english: There's a pile of newspapers in the corner have you looked underneath?

hanzi: 违背违背一项法律、规则或协议；违反
pinyin: wéi bèi wéi bèi yí xiàng fǎ lu:4、 guī zé huò xié yì； wéi fǎn
english: A violation, as of a law, a regulation, or an agreement; a breach.

hanzi: 我们的口号是: ｀要循序渐进, 不要剧烈变革.＇
pinyin: wǒ men de kǒu hào shì: ｀ yào xún xù jiàn jìn,  bù yào jù liè biàn gé.＇
english: Our watchword is: Evolution, not revolution'.

hanzi: 对这种待遇[受到这样的待遇]我表示抗议.
pinyin: duì zhè zhǒng dài yù[ shòu dào zhè yàng de dài yù] wǒ biǎo shì kàng yì.
english: I object to such treatment /to being treated like this.

hanzi: 他的表演有进步，这应该归功於他的教练。
pinyin: tā de biǎo yǎn yǒu jìn bù， zhè yīng gāi guī gōng yū tā de jiào liàn。
english: His improved performance does credit to his trainer.

hanzi: 我又喝了一杯威士忌酒之後, 就觉得头晕目眩.
pinyin: wǒ yòu hè le yī bēi wēi shì jì jiǔ zhī後,  jiù jué de tóu yūn mù xuàn.
english: After another glass of whisky I began to feel dizzy.

hanzi: 她笨极了, 什麽事都要给她解释得明明白白.
pinyin: tā bèn jí le,  shí mó shì dōu yào jǐ tā jiě shì de míng míng bái bái.
english: She's so stupid that you have to spell everything out.

hanzi: 他洗衬衫时, 连胳膊肘都弄上了肥皂泡沫.
pinyin: tā xǐ chèn shān shí,  lián gē bo zhǒu dōu nòng shàng le féi zào pào mò.
english: He was up to his elbows in soapsuds, washing his shirts.

hanzi: 蜜蜂从花中啜蜜，离开时营营地道谢。
pinyin: mì fēng zòng huā zhòng chuò mì， lí kāi shí yíng yíng dì dào xiè。
english: Bees sip honey from flowers and hum their thanks when they leave.

hanzi: 契约诉讼对违背这种合同要求赔偿损害
pinyin: qì yuē sù sòng duì wéi bèi zhè zhǒng hé tong yāo qiú péi cháng sǔn hài
english: A suit to recover damages for violation of such a contract.

hanzi: 国防开支可削减不得--那可是关天关地的事!
pinyin: guó fáng kāi zhī kě xuē jiǎn bù dé-- nà kě shì guān tiān guān de de shì!
english: You can't cut spending on defence that's sacrosanct!

hanzi: 主队以悬殊比分垂手赢得（这场比赛的）胜利.
pinyin: zhǔ duì yǐ xuán shū bǐ fēn chuí shǒu yíng dé（ zhè chǎng bǐ sài de） shèng lì.
english: The local team won (the match) hands down.

hanzi: 我利用在伯明翰的机会探望了我的姨母。
pinyin: wǒ lì yòng zài bó míng hàn de jī huì tàn wàng le wǒ de yí mǔ。
english: I took the opportunity of visiting my aunt while I was in Birmingham.

hanzi: ＂他是个伪君子，从不尽力帮助任何人。＂
pinyin: ＂ tā shì gè wěi jūn zi， cóng bù jìn lì bāng zhù rèn hé rén。＂
english: He is a hypocrite and never exerts himself to help anyone.

hanzi: 对原文的分析研究鉴定出作者是莎士比亚.
pinyin: duì yuán wén de fēn xī yán jiū jiàn dìng chū zuó zhě shì suō shì Bǐ yà.
english: Textual analysis identified the author as Shakespeare.

hanzi: 他哪里是在赔钱，他几乎无法计算其利润呢！
pinyin: tā nǎ li shì zài péi qián， tā jī hū wú fǎ jì suàn qí lì rùn ne！
english: Far from losing money, he can hardly count his profits.

hanzi: 咱们在获取更多情报之後再做决定不迟.
pinyin: zán men zài huò qǔ gèng duō qíng bào zhī後 zài zuò jué dìng bù chí.
english: Let's postpone making adecision until we have more information.

hanzi: 反对[抵制]新政权的某些势力仍然存在.
pinyin: fǎn duì[ dǐ zhì] xīn zhèng quán de mǒu xiē shì li réng rán cún zài.
english: Pockets of opposition/resistance to the new regime still remained.

hanzi: 若不付费用, 就要停止供应电力[煤气].
pinyin: ruò bù fù fèi yòng,  jiù yào tíng zhǐ gōng yìng diàn lì[ méi qì].
english: If you don't pay your bills they'll disconnect your electricity/gas.

hanzi: 你怎么能看着孩子惨遭折磨而无动于衰？
pinyin: nǐ zěn me néng kàn zhuó hái zi cǎn zāo zhé mo ér wú dòng yú shuāi？
english: How can you turn away from a child that is being cruelly treated?

hanzi: 这个镇子引以为荣的是有个闻名於世的美术馆.
pinyin: zhè gè zhèn zi yǐn yǐ wéi róng de shì yǒu gè wén míng yū shì de měi shù guǎn.
english: The town boasts a world-famous art gallery.

hanzi: 呜呜声高速运转的机器的高且喧闹的噪音
pinyin: wū wū shēng gāo sù yùn zhuǎn de jī qì de gāo qiě xuān nào de zào yīn
english: The loud, roaring noise of an engine operating at high speed.

hanzi: 假如再让我逮著你偷东西, 看我怎麽揍你!
pinyin: jiǎ rú zài ràng wǒ dài著 nǐ tōu dōng xi,  kàn wǒ zěn mó zòu nǐ!
english: If I catch you stealing again, I'll beat the daylights out of you!

hanzi: 我们的科学家在宇宙探索中处於领先地位。
pinyin: wǒ men de kē xué jiā zài yǔ zhòu tàn suǒ zhòng chù yū lǐng xiān dì wèi。
english: Our scientists are leading the way in space research.

hanzi: 我们不能强迫你（去做）, 但认为你应该做.
pinyin: wǒ men bù néng qiǎng pò nǐ（ qù zuò）,  dàn rèn wéi nǐ yīng gāi zuò.
english: We cannot compel you to (do it), but we think you should.

hanzi: 你们参加高级程度英语考试要读哪些必修课本?
pinyin: nǐ men cān jiā gāo jí chéng dù Yīng yǔ kǎo shì yào dú nǎ xiē bì xiū kè běn?
english: What are your set books for English A Level?

hanzi: 扭转，扭曲扭动的动作或实例；压挤或扭曲
pinyin: niǔ zhuǎn， niǔ qū niǔ dòng de dòng zuò huò shí lì； yà jǐ huò niǔ qū
english: The act or an instance of wringing; a squeeze or twist.

hanzi: 词书编纂者必须精於给词语下定义的技巧.
pinyin: cí shū biān zuǎn zhě bì xū jīng yū jǐ cí yǔ xià dìng yì de jì qiǎo.
english: Dictionary writers must be skilled in the art of definition.

hanzi: 石蕊试纸可用以测试溶液是否含酸.
pinyin: shí ruǐ shì zhǐ kě yòng yǐ cè shì róng yè shì fǒu hán suān.
english: Litmus paper can be used as an indicator of the presence of acid in a solution.

hanzi: 直布罗陀海峡是通向地中海的必经之路。
pinyin: zhí bù luó tuó hǎi xiá shì tōng xiàng de zhòng hǎi de bì jīng zhī lù。
english: The straits of Gibraltar are the gate of the Mediterranean.

hanzi: 石蕊试纸可用以测试溶液是否含酸.
pinyin: shí ruǐ shì zhǐ kě yòng yǐ cè shì róng yè shì fǒu hán suān.
english: Litmus paper can be used as an indicator of the presence of acid in a solution.

hanzi: 要不是因为下雨, 我们的假日一定过得很惬意.
pinyin: yào bu shì yīn wèi xià yǔ,  wǒ men de jià rì yī dìng guò de hěn qiè yì.
english: But for the rain we would have had a nice holiday.

hanzi: （纬度）低的纬度接近赤道的，或与之有关的
pinyin: （ wěi dù） dī de wěi dù jiē jìn chì dào de， huò yù zhī yǒu guān de
english: Relating to or being latitudes nearest to the equator.

hanzi: 你们参加高级程度英语考试要读哪些必修课本?
pinyin: nǐ men cān jiā gāo jí chéng dù Yīng yǔ kǎo shì yào dú nǎ xiē bì xiū kè běn?
english: What are your set books for English A Level?

hanzi: 你要是以为我是出於私心, 那你就冤枉我了.
pinyin: nǐ yào shì yǐ wéi wǒ shì chū yū sī xīn,  nà nǐ jiù yuān wang wǒ le.
english: You wrong me if you think I only did it for selfish reasons.

hanzi: 约翰和琼是同胞，他俩都是苏格兰人。
pinyin: Yuē hàn huò qióng shì tóng bāo， tā liǎng dōu shì sū gé lán rén。
english: John and Jean are compatriots because they both come from Scotland.

hanzi: ＂用那张底片，你要我们印几张像片？＂
pinyin: ＂ yòng nà zhāng dǐ piàn， nǐ yào wǒ men yìn jǐ zhāng xiàng piàn？＂
english: How many copies do you ask us to print off from the negative?

hanzi: 渐强的在音强、力量或强度上逐渐增强的
pinyin: jiàn qiáng de zài yīn qiáng、 lì liang huò qiáng dù shàng zhú jiàn zēng qiáng de
english: Gradually increasing in volume, force, or intensity.

hanzi: 你应该给缝纫机上点油，以免发出轧轧声。
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi jǐ féng rèn jī shàng diǎn yóu， yǐ miǎn fā chū yà yà shēng。
english: You should oil the sewing machine to stop the squeaking.

hanzi: 两艘宇宙飞船将於轨道上（互相）连接.
pinyin: liǎng sōu yǔ zhòu fēi chuán jiàng yū guǐ dào shàng（ hù xiāng） lián jiē.
english: The two spacecraft will link up (with each other) in orbit.

hanzi: 两艘宇宙飞船将於轨道上（互相）连接.
pinyin: liǎng sōu yǔ zhòu fēi chuán jiàng yū guǐ dào shàng（ hù xiāng） lián jiē.
english: The two spacecraft will link up (with each other) in orbit.

hanzi: 在妻子体贴入微的关怀下，他很快就痊愈了。
pinyin: zài qī zi tǐ tiē rù wēi de guān huái xià， tā hěn kuài jiù quán yù le。
english: He recovered soon under his wife's tender loving care.

hanzi: 她扎入水中, 浮上来时呛得连咳嗽带喷水.
pinyin: tā zhá rù shuǐ zhòng,  fú shàng lái shí qiàng de lián ké sou dài pèn shuǐ.
english: She dived into the water and came up coughing and spluttering.

hanzi: 消极主义消极被动的性格、态度、品质或行为
pinyin: xiāo jí zhǔ yì xiāo jí bèi dòng de xìng gé、 tài du、 pǐn zhì huò xíng wéi
english: Passive character, attitude, quality, or behavior.

hanzi: 我把那旧家具统统扔掉了，真是谢天谢地！
pinyin: wǒ bǎ nà jiù jiā jù tǒng tǒng rēng diào le， zhēn shì xiè tiān xiè de！
english: I've thrown out all the old furniture, and good riddance!

hanzi: 紧跟在他身後出现了一个带角的分趾蹄动物
pinyin: jǐn gēn zài tā shēn後 chū xiàn le yī gè dài jué de fèn zhǐ tí dòng wù
english: Close behind him appear an animal with horn and cleave hooves.

hanzi: 毛茛是一种野生植物，开杯形黄色花。
pinyin: máo gèn shì yī zhòng yě shēng zhí wù， kāi bēi xíng huáng sè huā。
english: The buttercup is a wild plant with bright yellow cup-shaped flowers.

hanzi: 她扮作受了冤枉的情人, 好让他感到内疚.
pinyin: tā bàn zuò shòu le yuān wang de qíng rén,  hào ràng tā gǎn dào nèi jiù.
english: She acted out the role of wronged lover to make him feel guilty.

hanzi: 这农场一再徵用作救援队的活动基地.
pinyin: zhè nóng chǎng yī zài zhǐ yòng zuò jiù yuán duì de huó dòng jī dì.
english: The farm was in/under constant requisition as a base for the rescue team.

hanzi: 这位导演想让迈克尔·凯恩主演他的新片子.
pinyin: zhè wèi dǎo yǎn xiǎng ràng mài kè ěr· kǎi ēn zhǔ yǎn tā de xīn piàn zi.
english: The director wanted to star Michael Caine in his new film.

hanzi: 你认为这个病人什么时候可以做肿瘤手术?
pinyin: nǐ rèn wéi zhè gè bìng rén shén me shí hou kě yǐ zuò zhǒng liú shǒu shù?
english: When do you think the patient can be operated on for the tumor?

hanzi: 他在写一部关於其种族所受迫害的历史书.
pinyin: tā zài xiě yī bù guān yū qí zhǒng zú suǒ shòu pò hài de lì shǐ shū.
english: He is writing a history of the persecutions endured by his race.

hanzi: 瞧霜大哥在窗户上绘制了多麽美丽的图案.
pinyin: qiáo shuāng dà gē zài chuāng hu shàng huì zhì le duō mó měi lì de tú àn.
english: Look what pretty patterns Jack Frost has painted on the windows.

hanzi: 虽然他是懦夫，却无法忍受这样的侮辱。
pinyin: suī rán tā shì nuò fū， què wú fǎ rěn shòu zhè yàng de wǔ rù。
english: Coward as he is (=Though he is a coward), he can't bear such an insult.

hanzi: "早晨好，司令，"她说，"今天您可真早。"
pinyin: " zǎo chén hào， sī lìng，" tā shuō，" jīn tiān nín kě zhēn zǎo。"
english: "Good morning, Commander, " she said. "You're early this morning."

hanzi: 怪不得你们在舐着嘴唇，原来晚餐有肉。
pinyin: guài bù dé nǐ men zài shì zhuó zuǐ chún， yuán lái wǎn cān yǒu ròu。
english: No wonder you are licking your chops, there's pork for dinner.

hanzi: 我们把床单搓成绳子, 援绳下坠逃跑了.
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ chuáng dān cuō chéng shéng zi,  yuán shéng xià zhuì táo pǎo le.
english: We twisted the bed sheets into a rope and escaped by climbing down it.

hanzi: 我的最高目标是拯救美国，摧毁奴隶制度。
pinyin: wǒ de zuì gāo mù biāo shì zhěng jiù Měi guó， cuī huǐ nú lì zhì dù。
english: My paramount object is to save the union and destroy slavery.

hanzi: 花这麽一点钱也要去请示, 真烦人.
pinyin: huā zhè mó yī diǎn qián yě yào qù qǐng shì,  zhēn fán rén.
english: It's annoying to have to get authorization for spending such piddling amounts of money.

hanzi: 请你将诗人逝世的消息转播给公众好吗？
pinyin: qǐng nǐ jiàng shī rén shì shì de xiāo xi zhuǎn bō jǐ gōng zhòng hào ma？
english: Could you relay the news of the poet's death out to the public?

hanzi: 只要给他一个桶子和一把铲子, 他就高兴极了!
pinyin: zhǐ yào jǐ tā yī gè tǒng zi huò yī bǎ chǎn zǐ,  tā jiù gāo xìng jí le!
english: Just give him a bucket and spade and he's in seventh heaven!

hanzi: 不悔改的未在精神上自新或改良的；不惭愧的
pinyin: bù huǐ gǎi de wèi zài jīng shén shàng zì xīn huò gǎi liáng de； bù cán kuì de
english: Not spiritually renewed or reformed; not repentant.

hanzi: 他已经为赎罪自我惩罚了，我们应该原谅他。
pinyin: tā yǐ jīng wèi shú zuì zì wǒ chéng fá le， wǒ men yīng gāi yuán liàng tā。
english: He had done penance for his sins; we should forgive him.

hanzi: 在发生爆炸之後，警方用路障封锁了那条路。
pinyin: zài fā shēng bào zhà zhī後， jǐng fāng yòng lù zhàng fēng suǒ le nà tiáo lù。
english: Police blocked off the street after the explosion.

hanzi: 尽管我知道菠菜对我有益，我还是不喜欢它、
pinyin: jǐn guǎn wǒ zhī dào bō cài duì wǒ yǒu yì， wǒ hái shì bù xǐ huan tā、
english: I do not like spinach even though I know it's good for me.

hanzi: 这是我们一直在期待的（从纽约来的）邮包.
pinyin: zhè shì wǒ men yī zhí zài qī dài de（ zòng Niǔ Yuē lái de） yóu bāo.
english: This is the parcel which we have been expecting (from New York).

hanzi: 我们把床单搓成绳子, 援绳下坠逃跑了.
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ chuáng dān cuō chéng shéng zi,  yuán shéng xià zhuì táo pǎo le.
english: We twisted the bed sheets into a rope and escaped by climbing down it.

hanzi: 电流的，伏打（式）的通过化学反应产生的电流的
pinyin: diàn liú de， fú dǎ（ shì） de tōng guò huà xué fǎn yìng chǎn shēng de diàn liú de
english: Producing electricity by chemical action.

hanzi: 据报道说这种疾病破坏中枢神经系统。
pinyin: jù bào dào shuō zhè zhǒng jí bìng pò huài zhòng shū shén jīng xì tǒng。
english: It is reported that this disease attacks the central nervous system.

pinyin: yī zǔ mǒu wù bèi fēn gē hòu qí bù fen、 qū yù huò qún zǔ zhī yī
english: One of the parts, sections, or groups into which something is divided.

hanzi: 她双臂垂在两旁，懒洋洋地躺在椅子上。
pinyin: tā shuāng bì chuí zài liǎng páng， lǎn yáng yáng de tǎng zài yǐ zi shàng。
english: She was lolling in a chair, with her arms hanging over the sides.

pinyin: xiōng zhēn yòng jiā zi huò bié zhēn gù dìng de yī jiàn shǒu shì； xiōng zhēn

english: I was trying to tell him what really happened, but he cut me short.

hanzi: 这是否意味着贵国正在实施新的外贸政策？
pinyin: zhè shì fǒu yì wèi zhe guì guó zhèng zài shí shī xīn de wài mào zhèng cè？
english: Does it mean that you be apply a new foreign trade policy?

hanzi: 在绝密档案上标有｀只供总统亲阅＇字样.

english: The top secret file was marked For the President's eyes only'.

hanzi: 医术最精湛的医生们在国王生病时诊治他。
pinyin: yī zhú zuì jīng zhàn de yī shēng men zài guó wáng shēng bìng shí zhěn zhì tā。
english: The most eminent doctors treated the king in his illness.

hanzi: 停车後不关前灯, 电池的电很快就会耗尽.
pinyin: tíng chē後 bù guān qián dēng,  diàn chí de diàn hěn kuài jiù kuài hào jìn.

pinyin: pái xiè de， pái chú de yǐn qǐ fù xiè， yóu zhǐ cháng xiè de； jìng cháng de
english: Causing evacuation, especially of the bowels; purgative.

hanzi: 詹姆斯头上裹着穆斯林的头巾，看上去很陌生。
pinyin: zhān mǔ sī tou shàng guǒ zhuó mù sī lín de tóu jīn， kàn shàng qù hěn mò shēng。
english: James looks strange with a turban around his head.

hanzi: 小毛孩子, 别跟我来这一套, 要不然有你後悔的.
pinyin: xiǎo máo hái zi,  biè gēn wǒ lái zhè yī tào,  yào bu rán yǒu nǐ後 huǐ de.
english: Don't try anything on with me, kid, or you'll be sorry.

hanzi: 古代的庇护特权转移到了基督教的教堂。
pinyin: gǔ dài de bì hù tè quán zhuǎn yí dào le Jī dū jiào de jiào táng。
english: The ancient privilege of sanctuary was transferred to the Christian temple.

hanzi: 人家不看使用说明书, 我又有什麽办法呢?
pinyin: rén jiā bù kàn shǐ yòng shuō míng shū,  wǒ yòu yǒu shí mó bàn fǎ ne?
english: Can I help it (ie Is it my fault) if people don't read the instructions?

hanzi: 人间，俗世世间凡人凡物居住的地方；凡尘世界
pinyin: rén jiān， sú shì shì jiàn fán rén fán wù jū zhù de dì fang； fán chén shì jiè
english: The realm of mortal existence; the temporal world.

hanzi: 这笔钱有专门用途: 就是建造新剧院.
pinyin: zhè bǐ qián yǒu zhuān mén yòng tú:  jiù shì jiàn zào xīn jù yuàn.
english: The money is to be used for one specific purpose: the building of the new theatre.

hanzi: 及时的在一个适当或适宜的时间发生的；适时的
pinyin: jí shí de zài yī gè shì dàng huò shì yí de shí jiān fā shēng de； shì shí de
english: Occurring at a suitable or opportune time; well-timed.

hanzi: 放射性材料贮存在防辐射的特殊容器内.
pinyin: fàng shè xìng cái liào zhù cún zài fáng fú shè de tè shū róng qì nèi.
english: The radioactive material is stored in a special radiation-proof container.

hanzi: 我看到的不可能是鬼－－一定是幻想的东西吧。
pinyin: wǒ kàn dào de bù kě néng shì guǐ－－ yī dìng shì huàn xiǎng de dōng xi ba。
english: I can't have seen a ghost it must have been imagination.

hanzi: 从那时起，老乡们都在谈＂我们的梅大夫＂了。
pinyin: zòng nà shí qǐ， lǎo xiāng men dōu zài tán＂ wǒ men de méi dài fu＂ le。
english: From then on all the villagers talked about"our Doctor Mei".

hanzi: 你为什么不先把问题放在一边过会儿再说?
pinyin: nǐ wèi shén me bù xiān bǎ wèn tí fàng zài yī biān guò kuài er zài shuō?
english: Why don't you lay that problem aside for a while and work at it later?

hanzi: 模糊的不清楚的或者不明显的；含糊的或者朦胧的
pinyin: mó hu de bù qīng chu de huò zhě bù míng xiǎn de； hán hú de huò zhě méng lóng de
english: Lacking clarity or distinctness; cloudy or obscure.

hanzi: 詹姆斯头上裹着穆斯林的头巾，看上去很陌生。
pinyin: zhān mǔ sī tou shàng guǒ zhuó mù sī lín de tóu jīn， kàn shàng qù hěn mò shēng。
english: James looks strange with a turban around his head.

hanzi: 黄铜制品用这种合金制的装饰品、物件或器皿
pinyin: huáng tóng zhì pǐn yòng zhè zhǒng hé jīn zhì de zhuāng shì pǐn、 wù jiàn huò qì mǐn
english: Ornaments, objects, or utensils made of this alloy.

hanzi: 从群山之颠看到的匈牙利景色非常壮丽。
pinyin: zòng qún shān zhī diān kàn dào de xiōng yá lì jǐng sè fēi cháng zhuàng lì。
english: The Hungarian view is magnificent from the summit of the mountains.

hanzi: 对於令夫人之去世, 谨向您表示最深切的慰问.
pinyin: duì yū lìng fū ren zhī qù shì,  jǐn xiàng nín biǎo shì zuì shēn qiè de wèi wèn.
english: You have my deepest sympathies on the death of your wife.

hanzi: 我给我儿子买了为儿童改编的莎士比亚剧本。
pinyin: wǒ jǐ wǒ ér zi mǎi le wèi ér tóng gǎi biān de suō shì Bǐ yà jù běn。
english: I bought my son an adaptation for children of a play by Shakespeare.

hanzi: 那两个女孩经常一起在那棵大山楂树下玩耍。
pinyin: nà liǎng gè nu:3 hái jīng cháng yī qǐ zài nà kē dà shān zhā shù xià wàn shuǎ。
english: The two girls always play together under the large hawthorn.

hanzi: 那个众人眼中的乞丐，其实是化了装的警察。
pinyin: nèi gè zhòng rén yǎn zhòng dì qǐ gài， qí shí shì huà le zhuāng de jǐng chá。
english: The supposed beggar was really a police officer in disguise.

hanzi: 晦涩的以有意使风格或表达上含糊不清为特点的
pinyin: huì sè de yǐ yǒu yì shǐ fēng gé huò biǎo dá shàng hán hú bù qīng wèi tè diǎn de
english: Marked by deliberate obscurity of style or expression.

hanzi: 对於素食者来说, 豆类食物是蛋白质的理想来源.
pinyin: duì yū sù shí zhě lái shuō,  dòu lèi shí wù shì dàn bái zhí de lǐ xiǎng lái yuán.
english: Pulses are a good source of protein for vegetarians.

hanzi: 住在通衢大道上的最大缺点就是噪声不断。
pinyin: zhù zài tōng qú dà dào shàng de zuì dà quē diǎn jiù shì zào shēng bù duàn。
english: The great drawback to living on a main road is the constant noise.

hanzi: 艾奥宙斯所爱的少女，被赫拉变成丁小母牛
pinyin: ài ào Zhòu sī suǒ ài de shào nu:3， bèi Hè lā biàn chéng dīng xiǎo mǔ niú
english: A maiden who was loved by Zeus and transformed by Hera into a heifer.

hanzi: 参加了训练课程就有资格成为[当]驾驶教练.
pinyin: cān jiā le xùn liàn kè chéng jiù yǒu zī gé chéng wéi[ dàng] jià shǐ jiào liàn.
english: The training course qualifies you to be/as a driving instructor.

hanzi: 很抱歉, 你对政府功过的看法本人不敢苟同.
pinyin: hěn bào qiàn,  nǐ duì zhèng fǔ gōng guò de kàn fǎ běn rén bù gǎn gǒu tóng.
english: I am afraid I can't endorse your opinion of the government's record.

hanzi: 她列出了我们要购买的东西--糖、 茶叶、 肥皂等.
pinyin: tā liè chū le wǒ men yào gòu mǎi de dōng xi-- táng、  chá yè、  féi zào děng.
english: She enumerated the items we had to buy sugar, tea, soap, etc.

hanzi: 加紧干吧！如果不快点，我们永远也完不成的。
pinyin: jiā jǐn gàn ba！ rú guǒ bù kuài diǎn， wǒ men yǒng yuǎn yě wán bù chéng de。
english: Shake a let there! We'll never finish if you don't hurry up.

hanzi: 《解放黑人奴隶宣言》废除了美国的奴隶制。
pinyin: 《 jiě fàng hēi rén nú lì xuān yán》 fèi chú le Měi guó de nú lì zhì。
english: The Emancipation Proclamation abolished slavery in the United States.

hanzi: 那些忠实於她的人都认为她不会做坏事.
pinyin: nà xiē zhōng shí yū tā de rén dōu rèn wéi tā bù huì zuò huài shì.
english: She could do no wrong (ie do nothing wrong) in the opinion of her devoted followers.

hanzi: 再过几天，这家公司就将濒临破产的边缘。
pinyin: zài guò jǐ tiān， zhè jiā gōng sī jiù jiàng bīn lín pò chǎn de biān yuán。
english: A few more days, and the company will be on the verge of bankruptcy.

hanzi: 在乾旱时, 每天有几小时停止供应自来水.
pinyin: zài qián hàn shí,  měi tiān yǒu jǐ xiǎo shí tíng zhǐ gōng yìng zì lái shuǐ.
english: The water was turned off for several hours a day during the drought.

hanzi: 可能下雨--你最好带把伞, 以防万一（下起来）.
pinyin: kě néng xià yǔ-- nǐ zuì hǎo dài bǎ sǎn,  yǐ fáng wàn yī（ xià qǐ lai）.
english: It may rain you'd better take an umbrella (just) in case (it does).

hanzi: 顽固的，任性的好与人作对的；执拗的或故意作对的
pinyin: wán gù de， rèn xìng de hào yù rén zuò duì de； zhí niù de huò gù yì zuò duì de
english: Given to recalcitrant behavior; willful or perverse.

hanzi: 按照古老的传说，罗穆卢斯是古罗马的建国者。
pinyin: àn zhào gǔ lǎo de chuán shuō， luó mù lú sī shì gǔ Luó mǎ de jiàn guó zhě。
english: According to the old legend, Romulus was the founder of Rome.

hanzi: 前后摇晃摇摆不定的动作或实例；不稳定的行动
pinyin: qián hòu yáo huàng yáo bǎi bù dìng de dòng zuò huò shí lì； bù wěn dìng de xíng dòng
english: The act or an instance of wobbling; unsteady motion.

hanzi: 对於素食者来说, 豆类食物是蛋白质的理想来源.
pinyin: duì yū sù shí zhě lái shuō,  dòu lèi shí wù shì dàn bái zhí de lǐ xiǎng lái yuán.
english: Pulses are a good source of protein for vegetarians.

hanzi: 在电信发达的今天, 相距遥远已不再是什麽问题了.
pinyin: zài diàn xìn fā dá de jīn tiān,  xiàng jù yáo yuǎn yǐ bù zài shì shí mó wèn tí le.
english: Distance is no problem with modern telecommunications.

hanzi: 樫鸟是一种爱叫的欧洲鸟，有鲜艳的羽毛。
pinyin: 樫 niǎo shì yī zhòng ài jiào de ōu zhōu niǎo， yǒu xiān yàn de yǔ máo。
english: Blue jay is a type of noisy European bird with brightly colored feathers.

hanzi: 她列出了我们要购买的东西--糖、 茶叶、 肥皂等.
pinyin: tā liè chū le wǒ men yào gòu mǎi de dōng xi-- táng、  chá yè、  féi zào děng.
english: She enumerated the items we had to buy sugar, tea, soap, etc.

hanzi: 她列出了我们要购买的东西--糖、 茶叶、 肥皂等.
pinyin: tā liè chū le wǒ men yào gòu mǎi de dōng xi-- táng、  chá yè、  féi zào děng.
english: She enumerated the items we had to buy sugar, tea, soap, etc.

hanzi: 我骑著自行车顺著道路行驶, 那只狗在後面跟著跑.
pinyin: wǒ qí著 zì xíng chē shùn著 dào lù xíng shǐ,  nà zhǐ gǒu zài後 miàn gēn著 pǎo.
english: I cycled off down the road with the dog running behind.

hanzi: 你有没有听到这次谁要被调动到什么地方？
pinyin: nǐ yǒu méi yǒu tīng dào zhè cì shéi yào bèi diào dòng dào shén me dì fang？
english: Have you hear anything about who's get transferred to where this time?

hanzi: 教师的嗓音很高, 孩子们都不禁咯咯地笑起来.
pinyin: jiào shī de sǎng yīn hěn gāo,  hái zi men dōu bù jīn gē gē de xiào qǐ lai.
english: The children couldn't stop giggling at the teacher's high-pitched voice.

hanzi: 你现在先别决定接受这项工作: 考虑一天再说.
pinyin: nǐ xiàn zài xiān biè jué dìng jiē shòu zhè xiàng gōng zuò:  kǎo lu:4 yī tiān zài shuō.
english: Don't say now if you'll take the job: sleep on it first.

hanzi: 爱情、 喜悦、 憎恨、 恐惧、 嫉妒都是强烈的感情.
pinyin: ài qíng、  xǐ yuè、  zēng hèn、  kǒng jù、  jí dù dōu shì qiáng liè de gǎn qíng.
english: Love, joy, hate, fear and jealousy are all emotions.

hanzi: 铅管工把管口撑大後套在另一截管子上.
pinyin: qiān guǎn gōng bǎ guǎn kǒu chēng dà後 tào zài lìng yī jié guǎn zi shàng.
english: The plumber splayed the end of the pipe before fitting it over the next section.

hanzi: ＂局长看上去彷佛挺厉害，但他心地正直。＂
pinyin: ＂ jú zhǎng kàn shàng qù páng fú tǐng lì hai， dàn tā xīn de zhèng zhí。＂
english: "The director seems rather fierce, but his heart is in the right place."

hanzi: 这个贫穷的母亲怅惘地回忆她已经逝去的青春。
pinyin: zhè gè pín qióng de mǔ qīn chàng wǎng de huí yì tā yǐ jīng shì qù de qīng chūn。
english: The poor mother has wistful reminiscences of her lost youth.

hanzi: 运动员们离开赛场时，被愤怒的人群推搡着。
pinyin: yùn dòng yuán men lí kāi sài chǎng shí， bèi fèn nù de rén qún tuī sǎng zhuó。
english: The players were jostled by an angry crowd as they left the field.

hanzi: 我肯定那店老板给我称土豆时　扣了分量.
pinyin: wǒ kěn dìng nà diàn lǎo bǎn jǐ wǒ chèng tǔ dòu shí　 kòu le fèn liàng.
english: I'm sure the shopkeeper gave me short measure when she weighed out the potatoes.

hanzi: 那政权被推翻以後, 有一段时期是无政府状态.
pinyin: nà zhèng quán bèi tuī fān yǐ後,  yǒu yī duàn shí qī shì wú zhèng fǔ zhuàng tài.
english: The overthrow of the regime was followed by a period of anarchy.

hanzi: 我们被这所公寓的精致的室内装潢设计吸引。
pinyin: wǒ men bèi zhè suǒ gōng yù de jīng zhì de shì nèi zhuāng huáng shè jì xī yǐn。
english: We are fascinated by the delicate interior design of the apartment.

hanzi: 这件衣服是纯羊毛的，还是羊毛与尼龙混纺的 ？
pinyin: zhè jiàn yī fu shì chún yáng máo de， hái shì yáng máo yù ní lóng hùn fǎng de ？
english: Is this garment made of pure wool, or of wool mixed with nylon?

hanzi: 我喜欢乳酪果酱，不过这是后天养成的一种嗜好。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan rǔ lào guǒ jiàng， bù guò zhè shì hòu tiān yǎng chéng de yī zhòng shì hào。
english: I like jam with cheese, but it's an acquired taste.

hanzi: 中世纪时期的宗教文化；音乐文化；口头文化
pinyin: zhòng shì jì shí qī de zōng jiào wén huà； yīn yuè wén huà； kǒu tóu wén huà
english: Religious culture in the Middle Ages; musical culture; oral culture.

hanzi: 这场灾难过後，许多人既没有食物又没有住处。
pinyin: zhè chǎng zāi nàn guò後， xǔ duō rén jì méi yǒu shí wù yòu méi yǒu zhù chù。
english: After the disaster there were many who wanted food and shelter.

hanzi: 我们必须让警察人数达到（全部）编制所需的数量.
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū ràng jǐng chá rén shù dá dào（ quán bù） biān zhì suǒ xū de shù liàng.
english: We must bring the police force up to (full) strength.

hanzi: 我们两国之间的往来可以追溯到上个世纪。
pinyin: wǒ men liǎng guó zhī jiān de wǎng lái kě yǐ zhuī sù dào shàng gè shì jì。
english: The assiciation between our two countries can be traced back to last century.

hanzi: 哥伦布按顺序仔细而详尽地记载了他的各次航程。
pinyin: gē lún bù àn shùn xù zǐ xì ér xiáng jìn de jì zǎi le tā de gè cì háng chéng。
english: Columbus kept a careful and detailed chronicle of his voyages.

hanzi: 哈里以辉煌的１１０击球率给本赛季划上了句号。
pinyin: hǎ lǐ yǐ huī huáng de１１０ jī qiú shuài jǐ běn sài jì huà shàng le jù hào。
english: Harry ended this season with a splendid batting average of110.

hanzi: 我穿鞋总是先左後右, 我是很迷信（这件事）的.
pinyin: wǒ chuān xié zǒng shì xiān zuǒ後 yòu,  wǒ shì hěn mí xìn（ zhè jiàn shì） de.
english: I always put my left shoe on first; I'm superstitious (about it).

hanzi: 後面的门是在顶部铰接上的, 以便可以向上开.
pinyin: 後 miàn de mén shì zài dǐng bù jiǎo jiē shàng de,  yǐ biàn kě yǐ xiàng shàng kāi.
english: The rear door hinges/is hinged at the top so that it opens upwards.

hanzi: 我们爬上小丘的顶端，由此可以俯瞰城市。
pinyin: wǒ men pá shàng xiǎo qiū de dǐng duān， yóu cǐ kě yǐ fǔ kàn chéng shì。
english: We climbed to the top of the small elevation, from which we could look at the town.

hanzi: 大气球注入压缩空气後, 几秒钟就充足了气.
pinyin: dà qì qiú zhù rù yā suō kōng qì後,  jǐ miǎo zhōng jiù chōng zú le qì.
english: With a supply of compressed air the large balloon inflated in a matter of seconds.

hanzi: 那位胖妇人穿着金色的紧身礼服，显得滑稽可笑。
pinyin: nà wèi pàng fù rén chuān zhuó jīn sè de jǐn shēn lǐ fú， xiǎn de huá ji kě xiào。
english: That fat woman looked ridiculous in her tight golden dress.

hanzi: 我们不能走那条路, 因为牌子上 写著｀禁止入内＇.
pinyin: wǒ men bù néng zǒu nà tiáo lù,  yīn wèi pái zi shàng  xiě著｀ jìn zhǐ rù nèi＇.
english: We can't go along that road because the sign says No Entry'.

hanzi: 皮靴固定装置为使滑雪靴牢固而在雪橇上设置的扣拴
pinyin: pí xuē gù dìng zhuāng zhì wèi shǐ huá xuě xuē láo gù ér zài xuě橇 shàng shè zhì de kòu shuān
english: Fastenings on a ski for securing the boot.

hanzi: 民兵和公安人员这时（向这些特务）包围上来。
pinyin: mín bīng huò gōng ān rén yuán zhè shí（ xiàng zhè xie tè wu） bāo wéi shàng lái。
english: Militiaman and public security men now closed in(on the spies).

hanzi: 他装著不认识她, 其实他们暗中勾结（在一起）.
